Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: A loyal minister does not serve two masters, {PlayerSurName} is already a guest of others, and cannot join the Ye Family Battalion for the time being.
The Ye Family Battalion needs men of iron and blood, if you are a coward or a vain person, please find another place.
{PlayerName}, from today on, you are a part of the Ye Family Battalion, I hope you will not disgrace the fame of the Ye Family Battalion!
{PlayerName}Born as a man of Ye Family Battalion, die as a spirit of Ye Family Battalion, swear to defend the honor of Ye Family Battalion to the death!
{yell}Advance at the sound of the drum, halt at the sound of the gong, execute!
{yell}Advance at the sound of the drum, halt at the sound of the gong, execute!
{yell}No response when called, late for duty, execute!
{yell}No response when called, late for duty, execute!
{yell}Abuse the common people, force women, execute!
{yell}Abuse the common people, force women, execute!
{yell}Steal from others, kill the innocent for personal gain, execute!
{yell}Steal from others, kill the innocent for personal gain, execute!

{PlayerSurName}Young hero, you risked your life to rescue the former emperor in the Yan Army camp. Although the former emperor was killed, your righteous act has become famous. How can you be content with your position in Ye Family Battalion?
A man's success does not necessarily have to be in Ye Family Battalion. As long as you care about the country and the world, you will always find a place where you can fulfill your ambitions.

You are now a soldier, under the command of the Beiwei Army of Ye Family Battalion. In the future, you need to follow the orders of the <color=#c44b0e>Beiwei Army·General</color>, and you can receive a daily salary from him to meet your daily needs.
Subordinate {PlayerName} is ready for your orders, General!
Although we have a superior-subordinate relationship, we are also brothers in arms. There's no need for formalities unless it's a matter of military importance. Please, get up.
Your task for the next few days is to train your Formation Breaker Spear to the sixth level or reach level 25 at the <color=#c44b0e>Ye Family Battalion·Instructor</color>'s place, then come to me.
Understood!
When you have the ability to protect yourself, naturally there will be tasks for you to do. Otherwise, it would be no different from sending you to your death now!

Techniques are dead, people are alive. Don't think that mastering exquisite martial arts can make you undefeated. I will test your training results in the past few days. If you fail the test, you will have to continue training!
If it was on the battlefield just now, you would have died once!\nGo back to the instructor and train, prepare well and then come to me!
Are you ready to accept my test?
Stop dawdling, I don't want you to act like a woman.
Good, don't disappoint me this time!
Not bad, not bad, this is the strength that a man of Ye Family Battalion should have!
Now is the time for the small competition in the camp, specially prepared for you new recruits.\nIf you are ready, come to me to sign up for the competition.
Are you ready for the competition?
I really don't like your dawdling attitude.
You are a soldier of Ye Marshal's direct Beiwei Army, you must win honor for me in the competition!
Good boy, you really deserve to be a good seedling of our Beiwei Army!\nIt seems that I have to give you more special training in the future.

I know you've done your best, it's just a small competition, it doesn't matter.\nWhen we get to the battlefield and kill a few barbarians with real swords and guns, let those guys see your real skills.

In recognition of your efforts to win honor for the Beiwei Army, I have specially prepared a special training for you.\nAs long as you are under my command for one day, you can receive a copy of "Combat technique" from me every day.
This is today's "Combat technique", take it back and study it carefully, I hope it will be beneficial to your career.
Don't be greedy, you have already received the "Combat technique" today.
Now you are a guerrilla general, no longer belonging to the Beiwei Army, so you don't need to come here to get books from this general anymore.
This general has a personal ornament that has been treasured for many years. Today, I will give it to you as a testament to our time working together in the Beiwei Army.
Thank you, General.

The Ye Family Battalion has been ordered to disband. If you continue to train soldiers, you will be slandered by those with ulterior motives as rebelling. {PlayerSurName} General, if there is a day when the Ye Family Battalion is vindicated, I hope you can continue to train us.
There are these training programs now, choose one that suits you.
Your current skills are not yet suitable for real combat training, go practice on the wooden dummy over there.
Winning in a one-on-one practice is not a big deal, it's just a child's play. If you have the guts, try team combat.
In a team, if someone lags behind, the entire team will face the danger of being wiped out on the battlefield. Therefore, no one wants to team up with the weak. Do you know what to do?
You can turn the tide even when your team is slightly weaker than the opponent. You really have some skills!
Although you have the experience of winning against stronger opponents, this time your opponent is much stronger than you. In the face of absolute power, your defeat is only a matter of time.
Such strength at a young age, it seems that our Ye Family Battalion has found a treasure again.
Back then, only our Marshal Ye could come and go freely among thousands of soldiers and horses. You still have a long way to go with your current skills.
In my opinion, your skills are indeed unfathomable. I just don't know who is stronger between you and Junior General Ye Yun.
You are already a guerrilla general, how can you train with the new recruits?\nYou should be the one to train them personally, so they can become as strong as you as soon as possible.
I heard you framed Marshal Ye for rebellion in the Supreme Court?\nHow dare you return to the Ye Family Battalion, you villain!

The Ye Family Battalion has been ordered to disband. If you continue to train soldiers, you will be slandered by those with ulterior motives as rebelling. {PlayerSurName} General, if there is a day when the Ye Family Battalion is vindicated, I hope you can continue to train us.
{PlayerSurName} General, how do you plan to train these new recruits this time?
{PlayerSurName} General, if you can't show some real skills, these new recruits won't respect you.
These new recruits seem to have benefited a lot, but I don't know when they will be able to stand on their own.
{PlayerSurName} General, if you can't show some real skills, these new recruits won't respect you.
{PlayerSurName} General, you can knock down ten elite soldiers by yourself, which is enough to convince us.
What a pity, I thought I could witness the general's heroic act of fighting against hundreds of enemies.
{PlayerSurName} General, you are invincible, I admire you very much!
I heard you framed Marshal Ye for rebellion in the Supreme Court?\nHow dare you return to the Ye Family Battalion, you villain!
It's time to assign some real tasks to you new recruits. After seeing some blood, you won't be like soft-shelled shrimps on the battlefield, unable to move.

The duty of the Ye Family Battalion is to protect the people and maintain peace. Now there are a large number of bandits causing trouble in Xiangfan. This general orders you to quickly eliminate 3 groups of bandit forces and bring peace to the people.
Yes, sir!
I've been paying tribute to your General's mansion every year, why are you still making things difficult for us?
Open your eyes and see clearly, I am from the Ye Family Battalion!
It seems that you Ye Family Battalion are determined to kill us all.
As long as you abandon evil and do good, the marshal will still be lenient, and it may not necessarily be a dead end.
Pah, you make it sound so noble. Are we supposed to continue being defenseless commoners, oppressed by the government?
We're all going to die sooner or later anyway. Might as well fight you today. If we're lucky, we live another day; if we're not, we die here and become heroes in eighteen years!
Is there really no other way out besides becoming bandits...
Leave all your gold and valuables, or I'll take them by force!
Can't you see my uniform? You dare to rob even soldiers, you're really bold.
We rob people like you, everyone knows you soldiers are all filthy rich.
I think you've got the wrong idea. We, the Ye Family Battalion, have strict military discipline. No one dares to embezzle.
Hmph, all crows under the sky are black. I don't believe that Marshal Ye doesn't take bribes and is incorruptible.
However, I've heard that the Ye Family Battalion has a good reputation. Today, I'll give Marshal Ye face and won't make things difficult for you.
To be honest, I'm here on orders to suppress bandits. If you refuse to abandon your dark ways and insist on robbing people, I'll have to carry out my military orders.
I've heard too many stories of people being killed after they surrendered. Don't think you can fool me. I will never cooperate with you soldiers in this lifetime. Give up on that idea.
What exactly have you been through that you don't even trust the words of soldiers?
Kid, your General's mansion owes us several months' worth of pay. When are you going to pay up?
Owe you pay? You're not trying to frame us, are you?
My brothers and I have done so many dirty jobs for your General's mansion. Don't you remember? Now you're playing dumb and trying to deny it. It won't be that easy.
Debts have their debtors, you've got the wrong person. I'm from the Ye Family Battalion, not familiar with the General's mansion.
In a moment of haste, I forgot the password...
Kid, since you've discovered our secret with the General's mansion, to prevent this secret from leaking, it seems we have to send you to meet the King of Hell.
Officials colluding with bandits, if this continues, there's no way for the common people to survive.
The three bandit forces have been completely wiped out, I should go back and report.
Reporting to the general, the three bandit forces have been completely eradicated, I'm here to report.
Very good, I didn't expect you to complete this mission so quickly, was everything smooth along the way?
I learned a few things from the bandits, especially about the General's mansion...
Alas, I'm no longer surprised by such things.

Marshal Ye has his own difficulties. Although he is dissatisfied with the actions of the General's mansion, Chuxiang City is relatively independent and the General's mansion is not within the marshal's jurisdiction. The central government is paralyzed in the chaotic times, so no one can control the people of the General's mansion now.
Alas, in times of chaos, human lives are as cheap as grass. When will this chaos end...
Marshal Ye once said, if civil officials do not love money, and military officials are not afraid of death, the world can be peaceful.
When will that time come? It doesn't seem very realistic.

Have you heard the story of "The Foolish Old Man Moves the Mountains"? It's an endless task.\nAs long as the spirit of our Ye Family Battalion is passed down forever, influencing more and more people, even if we can't wait for it in our generation, there will be future generations!

{PlayerName}, it's time to pass on the unique spear technique of the Ye Family Battalion to you. This is the spiritual heritage of our Ye Family Battalion. I hope you can practice diligently and use this spear technique to drive out the invaders and reclaim our lost land in the future!
{yell}<size=150%>Yes!!!</size>

According to secret reports, the head of the Blue Wind Camp was once a brave general under General Yang. After the Yang Mansion was in trouble, he turned to banditry to avoid the pursuit of the court.

Nowadays, the grass-roots forces in various places are scattered. Marshal Ye wants to integrate these grass-roots forces into a righteous army. If the Yan army invades in the future, everyone can unite against the enemy.
I order you to go and recruit the head of the Blue Wind Camp. Under no circumstances should you use force to coerce him. He must willingly submit.
Yes, sir!
No need to bother, since {PlayerSurName} brother is already a member of the Ye Family Battalion, I trust Marshal Ye's character. I have no objections to being recruited.
However, let me make it clear, I'm used to being Adventurous, I'm not used to being cooped up in the camp every day, it's suffocating.
As long as the head of the camp makes this promise, it's enough!\nWhen the time comes, if there is a need for you to fight against the enemy, please don't refuse.
Rest assured, I promise that I will never go back on my word!
Oh, it's been a few days, and you've changed into this outfit?\nAre you surnamed Lu or Ye now?
I'm not hiding it from you, I'm now serving under Marshal Ye. I'm here on his orders to ask you to submit to the Ye Family Battalion.
Ye Pengju, although he's not as good as General Yang back then, he's indeed a figure...
Could it be that he also wants to expand his forces in this chaotic world and compete for territory with other forces?
Marshal Ye's intention is to integrate various grass-roots forces in the rivers and lakes into a righteous army. If the Yan army invades in the future, everyone can unite against the enemy.
What a big plan, I wouldn't mind selling my life to him, Ye Pengju, just for this!

{PlayerSurName} brother, go back and tell your commander that I agree.\nHowever, let me make it clear, this Blue Wind Camp is still my territory, I will garrison here and cooperate with the Ye Family Battalion.
I will definitely convey your words back!

Reporting to the general, the head of the camp agrees to submit to the Ye Family Battalion.\nBut he won't run away from the Blue Wind Camp, he wants to garrison at the Blue Wind Camp and cooperate with us.
So he listens to the tune but not the announcement...
This was also expected by the marshal. These heroes of the rivers and lakes are unruly. If we really use military discipline to teach them, they will all run away in a few days.
Anyway, as long as the head of the camp makes this promise, it's enough. After all, he is a subordinate of General Yang, and there is absolutely no reason to go back on his promise.
What brings you here?
I'm now serving under Marshal Ye. I'm here on his orders to ask you to submit to the Ye Family Battalion.
When the Yang Mansion was in trouble, if Ye Pengju had been willing to help argue a few words, perhaps the Yang Mansion tragedy would not have happened.
Now he wants to recruit me, I won't fall for his tricks, there's no room for negotiation!
Marshal Ye's intention is to integrate various grass-roots forces in the rivers and lakes into a righteous army. If the Yan army invades in the future, everyone can unite against the enemy.
Quite an appetite, who does he think he is? The emperor or a Jianghu Master?
What are you still doing here? Get back to your Ye Family Battalion!
(Kong Da is in a bad mood, it's better not to provoke him. If we can find someone he knows to help mediate, there might be a chance to resolve this.)
Brother Yidao, I heard that you're still upset about Marshal Ye not being able to save the Yang family back then?
That's right, I can't stand Ye Pengju's hypocritical face!
Ah, Brother Yidao, you don't know...
Marshal Ye did plead for the old general, on the contrary, he knelt outside the emperor's study for three days and nights, his forehead bleeding into the cracks of the bricks.

The emperor, suspicious by nature, anticipated that the generals who were close to him would plead for the Yang family, so he preemptively seized their military power and didn't hold court for several days, waiting for the day the Yang family was wiped out.

The emperor's ancestors were military generals who ascended to the throne, so he has always been wary of military officials. It's not surprising that he would deliberately smear and frame people like the old General Yang and Marshal Ye.
Are you saying that I've been blaming Marshal Ye all these years?
What do you think?
Oh, I, a fool, have wronged a good man.

{PlayerName}, go back and tell your commander that I agree to submit to Marshal Ye.\nHowever, let me make it clear, this Blue Wind Camp is still my territory, I will defend it here and cooperate with the Ye Family Battalion.
I will definitely convey your words back!
The task is not yet complete, are you planning to give up?
Alas, it's a pity that we've lost a powerful righteous army to resist foreign invasions in the future.
Alas, I thought you could stand on your own, but it seems you still lack experience.
General, I'm afraid this...
What's the matter, don't beat around the bush, just say it!
Reporting to the general, the Blue Wind Camp has already been wiped out...
How could this happen...\nAlas, it's a pity that we've lost a powerful righteous army to resist foreign invasions in the future.
Brother Yidao, listen to your elder brother.
Brother Eighteen, are you also speaking for that Ye?
Old Monster, I need to leave the city, can you make it easy for me?
You little brat want to leave the city? Given our relations, it's a small matter.\nBut don't forget, you owe Old Monster a favor.
You are blindfolded and follow Jiang Nanguai through the narrow alley, turning left and right, not knowing how long you've walked...\nFinally--
Leaving the city, sure!\nOur rule for leaving the city is, choose one that you can do and I'll let you out.
Hehehe, thank you for your patronage.\nOld Monster will escort you out of the city!
You are blindfolded and follow Jiang Nanguai through the narrow alley, turning left and right, not knowing how long you've walked...\nFinally--
Alright, then 10 taels of silver, no less!
This is an exception, little brat, Old Monster still has to do business!
Old Monster's personally trained <color=#c44b0e>Dog Bites Elephant Formation</color> will satisfy you!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ปีศาจเฒ่าได้ชี้แนะเป็นการส่วนตัว <color=#c44b0e>ค่ายกลสุนัขกัดคชสาร</color> จะทำให้เจ้าพึงพอใจ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since you've broken this formation, Old Monster will keep his promise and escort you out of the city.
You are blindfolded and follow Jiang Nanguai through the narrow alley, turning left and right, not knowing how long you've walked...\nFinally--
Hahaha, even the strongest elephant can still be killed by a pack of wild dogs!\nYou should go and practice more, I'll escort you out of the city when you break the formation.
Brat, if you're ready to leave the city, head to Dirty Street, we'll leave from there.\nI hope those people haven't blocked that broken path.
Hahaha, the broken path is still there! Brat, shall we go?
Almost forgot, Jiang Nanguai is no longer here.\nThis is troublesome, how are we going to leave the city now?
Right! This secret path must be in Dirty Street, I'll look carefully, I should be able to find it.
This must be the entrance to the secret path!\nThis crude disguise can't fool me!

I heard that the leader of Nest of Swallow in Zhongzhou, Bu Juechen, is a robber who robs the rich to help the poor. This kind of person is inherently good and loves the people, which is exactly what we, the Ye Family Battalion, want to win over.
{PlayerName}, the general orders you to go and recruit the leader of Nest of Swallow, Bu Juechen.
General, I'm afraid this...
What's the matter, don't beat around the bush, just say it!
Reporting to the general, the leader has already been executed...
How could this be...\nThere are fewer and fewer good men who rob the rich to help the poor, and the people of Zhongzhou are having a harder time.
Yes, sir!
I'm honored that the general thinks highly of Nest of Swallow. I've always admired Marshal Ye of the Ye Family Battalion!

I have no objections to leading Nest of Swallow to serve the Ye Family Battalion. However, the situation in Zhongzhou is complicated, and there are people being displaced every day. Nest of Swallow is needed to help them, so I still need to stay in Nest of Swallow.
In the future, if Marshal Ye has any orders, everyone in Nest of Swallow, young and old, will not hesitate to go through fire and water!
Marshal Ye also thinks this way, it's hard work for you to lead the brave men of Nest of Swallow to help the people in the Zhongzhou area.
It's our duty, not worth mentioning.
Boss Bu, I'm now serving under Marshal Ye. This time I came here on Marshal Ye's orders, hoping that you could lead Nest of Swallow to serve the Ye Family Battalion.
I'm honored that Marshal Ye thinks highly of Nest of Swallow. I also admire the Ye Family Battalion very much. Having this opportunity is something I've always wanted.
You go back and tell your commander, Nest of Swallow is willing to follow Marshal Ye's military orders.
Reporting to the general, the leader of Nest of Swallow has agreed to have Nest of Swallow serve the Ye Family Battalion.
I thought it would be difficult to accomplish this, but I didn't expect you to do it so effortlessly. You really are the lucky star of our Ye Family Battalion.
Sir, what have I done to make you come all the way here?
I'm now serving under Marshal Ye. This time I came here on Marshal Ye's orders, hoping that you could lead Nest of Swallow to serve the Ye Family Battalion.
You guys are soldiers, we are bandits, wouldn't this make us all the same?
Marshal Ye plans to integrate various forces from the rivers and lakes to form a righteous army. In the future, if the Yan army invades from the south, we can unite against the enemy.
Oh, so you plan to use us as cannon fodder...

We Nest of Swallow can risk our lives, but at least you have to show some sincerity. Choose one of these three things: gather 100 guan of money, 1 Lunar stone, or destroy the Crime Investigation Bureau.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: พวกเราสำนักนกนางแอ่นสามารถเสี่ยงชีวิตของเราได้. แต่อย่างน้อยเจ้าต้องแสดงความซื่อสัตย์บ้าง. เลือกหนึ่งในสามสิ่งนี้: เงิน 100 ตำลึง, หินนวลจันทร์ 1 ก้อน, หรือทำลายสำนักสืบสวน.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You soldiers are really generous, you can legitimately turn other people's money into your own, this method is much more sophisticated than ours in Nest of Swallow.
You can actually get a treasure like Lunar stone, it seems your hands aren't clean either.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าสามารถได้รับสมบัติเช่นหินนวลจันทร์, แต่ดูเหมือนว่ามือของเจ้าจะไม่สะอาดเท่าไหร่

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Our long-time enemy has finally been taken down, the brothers who died at the hands of the Crime Investigation Bureau can now rest in peace.
I heard that {PlayerName}'s Steal technique is unparalleled in the world. If you could teach me everything, I wouldn't mind working for Ye Family Battalion for a few years.
Once a word is spoken, even a team of four horses cannot chase it back!
You have taught all your life's knowledge of the Steal technique to Bu Juechen.
I didn't expect the Steal technique you taught to be so exquisite, it really opened my eyes.\nFrom now on, the strength of Nest of Swallow will surely soar to new heights.
I have shown my sincerity, I hope you can keep your promise.

I originally wanted you to back down knowing the difficulty, but I didn't expect you to really do it, you are indeed sincere.\nGo back and tell your commander, Nest of Swallow is willing to follow Marshal Ye's military orders.
The task is not yet complete, are you planning to give up?
There are fewer and fewer good men who rob the rich to help the poor, and the people of Zhongzhou are having a harder time.
Alas, I thought you could stand on your own, but it seems you still lack experience.

The Armory is seriously short of Leather needed for armor. In the past, there were people who regularly went to Wild Wolf Valley to kill wolves for their skins, but they never came back after they went to the battlefield...
So it's the guerrilla general, what can I do for you?
The weapons and armor in the Armory are the lifeblood of our army and cannot be lost. You must guard them carefully!
Yes! As long as I have a breath left, I won't let a mosquito fly in.
Can you help me get 10 Wolf skins? I'll have the craftsmen make some armor as soon as possible.
After the task is completed, I will report your merits to the marshal. I won't let you help in vain.
You are a real hero. With these Wolf skins, we can finally make more armor for our army. If you have spare time in the future, please help us more.
It seems that there are not enough Wolf skins. You need to go to Wild Wolf Valley again.
So it's the guerrilla general, what can I do for you?
I know why I'm here, I'm here to help you collect Wolf skins.
The general is a man of great deeds, how can he do these trivial things.\nThe task of collecting Wolf skins has been assigned to other soldiers. Please focus on your own duties, general.
{PlayerName}, Marshal Ye wants to see you, hope you can return to the camp as soon as possible.
I know, I will go back as soon as possible.

{PlayerName}, although you have not been in the Ye Family Battalion for a long time, your military achievements are outstanding. Today, I promote you to the rank of <color=#c44b0e>Guerrilla General</color>. From now on, you can participate in military affairs, and your daily salary will be personally distributed by me.
Thank you, Marshal!
This is today's salary, you need to check it carefully.\nIn our Ye Family Battalion, we will never deduct salaries, but we will not make up for expired ones.
You have already received today's salary, don't try to cheat here.
General {PlayerSurName}, these salaries are squeezed out of the common people's teeth. As soldiers, we must be worthy of every penny of the people's hard-earned money.
General {PlayerSurName}, you have already received today's salary.
Marshal Ye, it's really not easy for me to see you.
After many years, Marshal Ye is still as heroic as ever, it's really admirable.
Oh, I didn't expect {PlayerName} to join the Ye Family Battalion too, Marshal Ye is really good at recruiting talents.
Tong Daofu, what are you doing in my camp instead of sitting in the Imperial City Department?
I am Qin Huizhi, I pay my respects to Marshal Ye.
Hmph, so it's Qin Yushi!\nWhy did you run away alone when you were hunting with His Majesty in the north?
It was precisely because Qin Yushi risked his life to escape from Yan and report the news that we were able to learn of Yan's wolfish ambitions.
Oh, so he's actually a meritorious official?
Qin Yushi, it's up to you now.
Reporting to Marshal Ye, His Majesty is currently imprisoned in the Palace Camp of Yan. Although heavily guarded, his life is not in danger.

The Yan army originally planned to use the emperor to command the princes, but seeing that His Majesty did not return from the northern hunt, they not only refused the "imperial edict" sent by Yan, but also blatantly recruited soldiers and bought horses to grab territory...
The Yan army is now happy to see this, they want our country to be divided and fight each other to weaken the national strength, so they can defeat each one.

Among the current princes, only Prince Kang has the talent and strategy, and is most qualified to inherit the throne. If Prince Kang ascends the throne and unifies the princes, he will be able to recover the lost land with a ferocious dragon charge in the future!
(Isn't Prince Kang already dead? How can they still plan to support Prince Kang as emperor?)
So you want to be the minister of the dragon and establish the merit of support...
Marshal Ye controls tens of thousands of Ye Family Battalions, your intention can be said to determine the world. I wonder if you are willing to support Prince Kang to ascend the throne?
This is a major matter, please allow me to think about it. I will give you an answer at this time tomorrow.
Since Marshal Ye has said so, then we will wait for the good news with Qin Yushi.
{PlayerName}, what do you think of today's events?

Now that His Majesty has not returned and the court is paralyzed, it can be said that there is no leader, so the world is in chaos.\nPrince Kang is a royal relative, holding the military power of Wu and Yue, and his fame far exceeds that of Prince Qi who has been a puppet for many years. He is indeed the best candidate for the emperor.
This makes some sense, let me think about it.
As the saying goes: heroes emerge in troubled times!\nNow the world is in chaos, I don't know how many people are separatist and how many are dominant.

If Prince Kang ascends the throne, I don't know how many of the heroes who have separatist one side will follow suit. At that time, the heroes from all over the place will establish their own countries, and this great land will once again fall into a state of smoke everywhere, like hell.
This makes some sense, let me think about it.
The next day...
Marshal Ye, how have you considered?
I am willing to support Prince Kang to ascend the throne!
Marshal Ye's move is a blessing for the country and the people.
I do not agree with the matter of supporting Prince Kang to ascend the throne.
Ye Pengju, do you want to hold your own soldiers?
Here is the imperial token, I am here to convey the oral message of Prince Kang——

"Before His Majesty left, he left the imperial token and gave me a secret order: if there is a change in the world, I will be appointed as the Grand Marshal of the military and issue the soldiers of the whole country to serve the king..."

"Now His Majesty has not returned from the northern hunt, and the world is in chaos. I will follow the holy will, proclaim myself as the Grand Marshal of the military, control the military of the world, and if there are any princes who do not obey the order, the ministers of the world will jointly punish them!"
I will follow the order of the Grand Marshal of the military!
Marshal Ye, from now on we all work for Prince Kang, if there is any negligence in the past, please bear with me.
Marshal Ye's choice today, I will tell Prince Kang exactly, please Marshal Ye to seek more blessings.
<color=#c44b0e>Five days later</color>, Prince Kang Wang will issue a command, please be patient, Marshal Ye.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: <color=#c44b0e>ห้าวันต่อมา</color> องค์ชายคังหวังจะออกคำสั่ง. โปรดอดทนรอ, จอมพลเย่

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kang Wang is now the Grand Marshal of the Horse Army. If the Marshal intends to support Kang Wang, and if Kang Wang successfully ascends the throne in the future, the Marshal will definitely be regarded as a trusted minister.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตอนนี้คังหวังเป็นจอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้า หากท่านจอมพลตั้งใจที่จะสนับสนุนคังหวัง และหากในอนาคตคังหวังขึ้นครองบัลลังก์ได้สำเร็จ ท่านจอมพลจะเป็นอัครราชทูตที่ทรงโปรดปรานอย่างแน่นอน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alas, serving the king is like accompanying a tiger, unpredictable.
If the Marshal is unwilling to support Kang Wang, now that Kang Wang has proclaimed himself the Grand Marshal of the Horse Army, I'm afraid it will be detrimental to the Marshal in the future.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หากท่านจอมพลไม่เต็มใจที่จะสนับสนุนคังหวัง. ในตอนนี้คังหวังได้ประกาศตัวเองเป็นจอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้าแล้ว ข้าเกรงว่ามันจะเป็นอันตรายต่อท่านจอมพลในอนาคต

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: No worries, Prince Kang Wang is not such a narrow-minded person. Before the world is settled, I can sleep peacefully.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่ต้องกังวลไป องค์ชายคังหวังไม่ใช่คนคิดเล็กคิดน้อยอะไรขนาดนั้น ก่อนที่โลกจะกลับเข้าสู่ภาวะปกติ ข้าก็สามารถนอนหลับได้อย่างสงบเต็มอิ่ม

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: General {PlayerSurName}, Marshal Ye has received the command from Kang Wang and is now summoning you back to the camp.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นายพล {PlayerSurName} จอมพลเย่ได้รับคำสั่งจากคังหวังและตอนนี้กำลังเรียกท่านให้กลับไปที่ค่าย.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alright, tell Marshal Ye that I will return immediately.

You're here. Kang Wang just issued a command, ordering our Ye Family Battalion to march on Chuxiang City, to pressure Lü Wenhuan into pledging allegiance to Kang Wang. Prince Kang Wang is trying to use the Ye Family Battalion to clear obstacles for his future ascension to the throne.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าอยู่ที่นี่เอง. คังหวังเพิ่งออกคำสั่ง โดยสั่งให้กองพันตระกูลเย่ของเราเดินทัพไปยังเมืองฉู่เซียง เพื่อกดดันลู่เหวินหวนให้คำมั่นว่าจะจงรักภักดีต่อคังหวัง องค์ชายคังหวังพยายามใช้กองพันตระกูลเย่เพื่อขจัดอุปสรรคในการขึ้นครองบัลลังก์ในอนาคต

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (Kang Wang has been dead for a long time, and someone is impersonating him to issue commands, I wonder what their intentions are.)
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: (คังหวังตายไปนานแล้ว และมีคนแอบอ้างเป็นเขาเพื่อออกคำสั่ง ข้าสงสัยว่าพวกเขามีเจตนาอะไร)

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: If we are to march on Chuxiang City, a slight misstep could force Lü Wenhuan to rebel. I hope you can go to the General's mansion to persuade Lü Wenhuan to submit to Kang Wang, to avoid the disaster of war between the two sides as much as possible.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หากเราจะเดินทัพไปยังเมืองฉู่เซียง ความผิดพลาดเล็กน้อยอาจทำให้ ลู่เหวินหวน ก่อกบฏได้ ข้าหวังว่าเจ้าจะสามารถไปที่จวนแม่ทัพเพื่อชักชวน ลู่เหวินหวน ให้ยอมจำนนต่อคังหวังได้ เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงหายนะของสงครามระหว่างทั้งสองฝ่ายให้มากที่สุด

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Marshal Ye, Lü Wenhuan has actually died a violent death, I saw it with my own eyes.\nPresumably, the General's mansion is keeping his death a secret to stabilize the people's hearts, but once the Yan people find out, Chuxiang City will be in grave danger.
I didn't expect things to become so complicated. I will write a secret letter to inform Kang Wang immediately, so that Kang Wang can make arrangements in advance.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You can leave now. If there are follow-up tasks, I will inform you separately.
Yes, sir!
I am a guerrilla general under Marshal Ye, here to pay a visit to Lord Lü on behalf of the Grand Marshal of the Horse Army, Prince Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าเป็นแม่ทัพกองโจรภายใต้จอมพลเย่ มาที่นี่เพื่อเข้าเฝ้าใต้เท้าลู่ในนามของจอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้า องค์ชายคังหวัง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Prince Kang Wang has proclaimed himself the Grand Marshal of the Horse Army, intending to control the armies of the world. Is he eager to ascend the throne and become the emperor?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: องค์ชายคังหวังประกาศตนเป็นจอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้า โดยตั้งใจที่จะควบคุมกองทัพของประเทศ เขากระตือรือร้นที่จะขึ้นครองบัลลังก์และเป็นจักรพรรดิองค์ต่อไป?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I dare not speculate on the prince's thoughts. I am just here to persuade you to pledge allegiance to Prince Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่กล้าคาดเดาความคิดขององค์ชาย, ข้าแค่มาที่นี่เพื่อชักชวนให้ท่านปฏิญาณว่าจะจงรักภักดีต่อองค์ชายคังหวัง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: If Ye Pengju were here, I would give him some face, but as for you...
The great Jianghu Master has personally come forward, won't Lord Lü give some face?
Haha, Lord {PlayerSurName} of the Alliance has a lot of face, he won't mind me.
Since Lord {PlayerSurName} of the Alliance is willing to assist Kang Wang, where else do I have a choice? I am willing to follow Prince Kang Wang's orders, even if it means sacrificing my life.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เนื่องจากใต้เท้า {PlayerSurName} แห่งกองทัพพันธมิตรยินดีที่จะช่วยเหลือคังหวัง ข้าจะมีทางเลือกที่ไหนอีก? ข้ายินดีที่จะปฏิบัติตามคำสั่งขององค์ชายคังหวัง แม้ว่าจะต้องสละชีวิตก็ตาม.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Remember your promise. If you break it, not only Prince Kang Wang, but even I will not let you off easily.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: จำคำปฎิญาณของเจ้าไว้ หากเจ้าทำลายมัน ไม่ใช่แค่องค์ชายคังหวัง แม้แต่ข้าก็จะไม่ยอมปล่อยเจ้าไปง่ายๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I dare not, I dare not.
Lü Wenhuan, if you have the guts, finish what you were saying!
I am blind, I didn't recognize you just now as the unparalleled master who single-handedly defeated all the major sects, I deserve to die, I deserve to die!
What do you think about pledging allegiance to Kang Wang?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าคิดอย่างไรเกี่ยวกับการให้คำมั่นว่าจะจงรักภักดีต่อคังหวัง?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: However you want me to, I will. I will follow your orders.
I don't care what you were planning before, now I just want you to pledge allegiance to Kang Wang.\nIf you have any second thoughts...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่สนใจว่าเจ้ากำลังวางแผนอะไรมาก่อน ตอนนี้ข้าแค่อยากให้เจ้าให้คำมั่นว่าจะจงรักภักดีต่อคังหวัง\nหากเจ้ามีทางเลือกอื่น...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I swear to the heavens, if I have any second thoughts, I will surely die under a chaotic blade, with my body torn apart!
Alright, go back and continue your pacifying mission. There will be a time when you are needed.
Yes!
Lü Wenhuan, just because you have a large number of people in the General's mansion, do you think I can't deal with you?
You, aren't you the one who won the first place in the world on the Peak of Challenge, {PlayerName}?
How many guards do you think it would take to stop an assassination attempt by the world's number one?
You, you're joking. Who would dare to show off in front of you?
I don't want to waste words, I just want to know if you are willing to join Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่อยากเปลืองคำพูด, ข้าแค่อยากรู้ว่าเจ้าเต็มใจที่จะเข้าร่วมคังหวังหรือไม่.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: This, this...
Don't, don't do it! I choose to join Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อย่า อย่าทำมัน! ข้าเลือกที่จะเข้าร่วมคังหวัง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Remember your promise. If you break it, not only Prince Kang Wang, but even I will not let you off easily.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: จำคำปฎิญาณของเจ้าไว้ หากเจ้าทำลายมัน ไม่ใช่แค่องค์ชายคังหวัง แม้แต่ข้าก็จะไม่ยอมปล่อยเจ้าไปง่ายๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I dare not, I dare not.
I don't care if you are Ye Pengju's man or Kang Wang's man, sending a small guerrilla general to win me over is the biggest insult to me!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่สนใจว่าเจ้าเป็นคนของเย่เผิงจู หรือคนของคังหวัง การส่งแม่ทัพกองโจรขนาดเล็กมาเอาชนะข้าถือเป็นการดูถูกที่ยิ่งใหญ่ที่สุดสำหรับข้า!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I will break your legs and send you back to the Ye Family Battalion, so that those high and mighty guys can see clearly that I am not a pushover!
I am a general under Marshal Ye, how dare you lay a hand on me!

Humph, there are countless generals from the Ye Family Battalion who have died in my hands. If you keep talking nonsense, I will kill you too. There will be no evidence, and no one will be able to trace it back to me!
Today, I want to see what kind of skills you, the pacifying envoy, have!
{yell}, kneel down!
You kneel while I stand, do I have the right to talk to you now?
Hmm?
Yes! Do whatever you want, whether it's loyalty to Kang Wang or Marshal Ye, just spare my life.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ใช่! ทำทุกอย่างที่เจ้าต้องการเถอะ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นความภักดีต่อคังหวังหรือจอมพลเย่ แค่ไว้ชีวิตข้าก็พอ.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Listen carefully, I want you to join Kang Wang, and you must not have any second thoughts, otherwise...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฟังให้ดี ข้าต้องการให้เจ้าเข้าร่วมกับคังหวัง และเจ้าต้องไม่คิดถึงทางเลือกอื่น ไม่เช่นนั้น...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I swear to the heavens, if I have any second thoughts, I will surely die under a chaotic blade, with my body torn apart!
Alright, go back and continue your pacifying mission. There will be a time when you are needed.
Yes!
Phew, I finally escaped...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮ่า ในที่สุดก็หนีพ้น

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The matter has been settled, should I report back to Marshal Ye or Kang Wang...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เรื่องนี้ได้รับการแก้ไขแล้ว ข้าควรรายงานกลับไปที่จอมพลเย่หรือคังหวัง..

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The matter has been settled, report back to Marshal Ye as soon as possible.
Reporting to Marshal Ye, I have successfully persuaded Lord Lü Wenhuan to join Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: รายงานต่อจอมพลเย่แล้ว ข้าได้ชักชวนท่าน ลู่เหวินหวน ให้เข้าร่วมกับคังหวังสำเร็จแล้ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Good, this way we can avoid a pointless war, you have done a great job!
You can leave now, if there are any follow-up tasks, I will inform you.

I didn't expect things to become so complicated. I will write a secret letter to inform Kang Wang immediately, so that Kang Wang can make arrangements in advance.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่ได้คาดหวังว่าสิ่งต่าง ๆ จะซับซ้อนขนาดนี้ ข้าจะเขียนจดหมายลับแจ้งคังหวังทันที เพื่อที่คังหวังจะได้เตรียมการล่วงหน้า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You can leave now, if there are any follow-up tasks, I will inform you.
Reporting to Kang Wang, I have successfully persuaded Lü Wenhuan to join you, which will greatly enhance your strength.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: รายงานต่อคังหวัง ข้าได้ชักชวนให้ ลู่เหวินหวน ให้เข้าร่วมกับท่านได้สำเร็จแล้ว ซึ่งจะช่วยเพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งของท่านอย่างมาก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Only those who understand the times are heroes.\n{PlayerName}, do you agree with me?
I completely agree with you, my lord!
Good, good!

Reporting to Kang Wang, Lord Lü suddenly died. The General's mansion is keeping it a secret to stabilize the people, but the truth cannot be hidden. Once the Yan people find out, Chuxiang City will be in great danger.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: รายงานต่อคังหวัง ใต้เท้าลู่เสียชีวิตอย่างกะทันหัน จวนท่านแม่ทัพกำลังเก็บเป็นความลับเพื่อรักษาเสถียรภาพของผู้คน แต่ความจริงไม่สามารถซ่อนได้ เมื่อชาวหยานรู้ เมืองฉู่เซียงจะตกอยู่ในอันตรายอย่างยิ่ง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since it was a sudden death, how did you know?
Lü Wenhuan was killed by me.
You are ruthless and decisive, quite a character.
Why didn't you report this confidential matter to Marshal Ye, but told me instead?
I believe I should not hide anything from you, so I felt it necessary to report it in person. Even if you punish me, I am willing to accept it.
Only those who understand the times are heroes.\n{PlayerName}, do you agree with me?
I completely agree with you, my lord!
Good, good!
General {PlayerSurName}, Kang Wang has issued a new order, Marshal Ye has summoned you back to the camp.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นายพล {PlayerSurName} คังหวังได้ออกคำสั่งใหม่ จอมพลเย่ได้เรียกคุณกลับไปที่ค่ายทหาร

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alright, I'll go back right away.

Kang Wang has sent an order, asking us to secretly meet with Qi Wang. If we can win him over, we should. If not, we should demand a large sum of military pay from him, so as not to benefit Yan Kingdom in the end.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คังหวังได้ส่งคำสั่ง ขอให้เราแอบพบกับฉีหวัง หากเราสามารถเอาชนะเขาได้ เราก็ควรทำถ้าไม่เช่นนั้น เราควรเรียกร้องเบี้ยเลี้ยงทหารจำนวนมากจากเขา เพื่อไม่ให้เกิดประโยชน์ต่ออาณาจักรหยานในที่สุด

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (Since this impostor Kang Wang loves to act so much, I'll play along and see how he ends up.)
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: (เนื่องจากผู้แอบอ้างคังหวังชอบแสดงมาก ข้าจะเล่นตามดูว่าเขาจะจบลงอย่างไร)

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Qi Wang is based in Daliang and has long been a puppet of Yan Kingdom, with every move under the watch of Yan people. To avoid alarming the enemy, I order you to meet with Qi Wang, persuade him to join Kang Wang, or provide military pay to avoid aiding the enemy.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ที่ตั้งของฉีหวังอยู่ในต้าเหลียงและเป็นหุ่นเชิดของอาณาจักรหยานมายาวนาน โดยทุกการเคลื่อนไหวอยู่ภายใต้การดูแลของชาวหยาน เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงการทำให้ศัตรูตื่นตระหนก ข้าสั่งให้เจ้าไปพบกับฉีหวัง และชักชวนให้เขาเข้าร่วมกับคังหวัง หรือจัดหาค่าเบี้ยเลี้ยงทางทหารเพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงการช่วยเหลือศัตรู

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Qi Wang has actually died a long time ago. The Yan people created a false impression to confuse the public. The taxes and resources of Daliang City have long been in the hands of the Yan people.
This is shocking! In this way, Zhongzhou is completely occupied and has become the fish on the chopping board of others. The restoration of the country will be even more difficult!
Yes, sir!
Who are you, how dare you break into Duke Ji's manor!
(Damn, since it's a secret meeting with Qi Wang, I can't let these guards find out, to avoid complications.)
May I ask which general you are under, and what is your purpose in seeking me?
I am under the command of Marshal Ye, and I am here on the orders of the Grand Marshal Kang Wang, to persuade Qi Wang to submit to Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าอยู่ภายใต้คำสั่งของจอมพลเย่ และข้ามาที่นี่ตามคำสั่งของจอมพลคังหวัง เพื่อชักชวนให้ฉีหวังยอมเข้าร่วมกับคังหวัง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kang Wang and I are both royal family members, why can he self-proclaim as the Grand Marshal, but I have to submit to him?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คังหวังและข้าต่างก็เป็นเชื้อสายของราชวงศ์ ทำไมเขาถึงประกาศตัวเองว่าเป็นจอมพลได้ แต่ข้ากับต้องยอมจำนนต่อเขา?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kang Wang has the secret order of the emperor, and the Imperial token as proof. If you disobey, it is defiance, and he will call on the world's military to punish you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คังหวังมีคำสั่งลับของจักรพรรดิและมีตราจักรพรรดิเป็นหลักฐาน หากเจ้าไม่เชื่อฟัง ถือเป็นการก่อกบฎ และเขาจะเรียกร้องให้กองทัพโลกลงโทษเจ้า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Hmph, I don't recognize any Imperial token. Get out of here and tell Kang Wang, that milk-smelling child, not to dream of being the Spring and Autumn dream.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮึ่มม, ข้าไม่เคยได้ยินตราจักรพรรดิที่ไหนมาก่อน, ออกไปจากที่นี่แล้วบอกคังหวังว่า เด็กไม่สิ้นกลิ่นนมคนนั้น อย่าฝันลมๆแรงๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I have a duty to fulfill, and I will not leave until I complete my mission.
{yell} Guards, seize this madman for me!
Qi Wang, are you ready to consider Kang Wang's request now?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฉีหวังท่านพร้อมที่จะพิจารณาคำขอของคังหวัง แล้วหรือยัง?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I am under the surveillance of Yan people everywhere, even if I submit to Kang Wang, it won't change anything.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าอยู่ภายใต้การดูแลของชาวหยานทุกที่ แม้ว่าฉันจะยอมจำนนต่อคังหวัง ก็จะไม่เปลี่ยนแปลงอะไรเลย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: How about 700,000 military pay for your peace, Qi Wang?
Where can I get so much military pay? You might as well kill me!
I heard that the annual tribute you give to Yan Kingdom is more than this, isn't it?
Fine, I accept your challenge!
One shichen later, Qi Wang prepared 700,000 military pay to give to you.
I gave you this military pay, but are you going to give it to Marshal Ye, or to Kang Wang?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าให้เบี้ยเลี้ยงทหารนี้แก่เจ้า เจ้าจะมอบให้จอมพลเย่หรือคังหวัง?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: That's not for Qi Wang to worry about.\nGoodbye!
{PlayerSurName} General, please wait!
What does Qi Wang have to order?
I want to see the skills of General {PlayerSurName}.
You are a Rich maiden, and fights are blind. If I hurt you, wouldn't it be my fault?
Just let go and show me the power of a Ye Family Battalion guerrilla general!
I didn't expect you to be such a hidden master!
Alas, the Ye Family Battalion is just so-so, talking about restoring lost lands is just talk.
A guerrilla general of the Ye Family Battalion has such strength, it's really impressive.\nIt seems that Marshal Ye's idea of restoring lost lands is not just talk, it's really possible!
To protect the people of Daliang City, I had to pretend to get along with Yan Kingdom. In fact, I have long hoped that a large army could go north to clear out these inhuman Yan troops.
Now this king lends you a helping hand, hoping that the Ye Family Battalion can march northward and conquer the Central Plains soon.
Thank you, Qi Wang!
Reporting to Marshal Ye, I have obtained seven hundred thousand military pay from Qi Wang. This should alleviate the urgent needs of our Ye Family Battalion.
You did well on this matter!\nHowever, we cannot keep a single penny of this military pay, it all needs to be handed over to King Kang.
It's hard to give up so much military pay.

If the Ye Family Battalion takes this military pay today, it will surely arouse the suspicion of King Kang, which is not conducive to our future plans to resist Yan. Therefore, do not lose the greater good for these small benefits.

I want you to rescue the emperor at all costs! In this way, there will be no worries about invading the Central Plains, and the Ferocious Dragon Charge will be imminent.

Chuxiang City has been besieged by the Yan army for several days and has already run out of ammunition and food.

However, Lü Wenhuan's surrender did not win a glimmer of hope for the people of Chuxiang City.\nUnder the command of Wan Yan Wuzhu, the Yan army carried out a brutal massacre in Chuxiang City.\nWherever the Yan army went, not a single living thing was spared, and blood flowed like a river, like a living hell.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Chuxiang City, the southern gateway of the Zhao Kingdom that has been defended for hundreds of years, was razed to the ground.

Thus, the Zhao Kingdom, which had lasted for more than three hundred years, was completely destroyed.\nThe Yan Kingdom, originally located in the remote and cold north, has now become the hegemon of the Central Plains.
The old officials of the former dynasty who harbored dreams of restoring the country and the wandering heroes of the rivers and lakes were all purged by the Yan Kingdom.

And you, after a period of hiding, were eventually discovered by the Yan army.\nYou fought back bravely, killing hundreds of Yan soldiers, but in the end, you were outnumbered and died in the wilderness...
Chuxiang City has been besieged by the Yan army for several days and has already run out of ammunition and food.

Thus, the Yan army easily occupied Chuxiang City.

Under the command of Wan Yan Wuzhu, the Yan army carried out a brutal massacre in Chuxiang City.\nWherever the Yan army went, not a single living thing was spared, and blood flowed like a river, like a living hell.

The old officials of the former dynasty who harbored dreams of restoring the country and the wandering heroes of the rivers and lakes were all purged by the Yan Kingdom.

And you, after a period of hiding, were eventually discovered by the Yan army.\nYou fought back bravely, killing hundreds of Yan soldiers, but in the end, you were outnumbered and died in the wilderness...
And you, after a period of hiding, managed to escape by a hair's breadth and fled to the Refugee Camp outside Chuxiang City...
Finally escaped...
Sir, please have mercy, I have elderly parents and young children, I really can't go with you...
{yell} Don't push your luck, do you know what happens to those who defy us?
I know... I know...
There's a village nearby that refused to obey us,\nSince they're useless, we burned it to the ground.
I know... I know...
Since you know, hurry up and come with us!\nIf you dawdle any longer, we'll burn your village too!
Sir, I heard that even if you go with you, you're half dead.
I don't want to die...
What a nuisance.\nSince you don't want to go, then go to hell!
Ah--

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Wasting my time!
Let's go!

Oh, someone dares to come and die at this time, how commendable.
Young man, you better run, they kill without blinking an eye!
Hmph, just a bunch of barbarians, nothing to be afraid of!
Scum of Yan Kingdom, this is Chuxiang City territory, not a place for you to run wild!
Looking for death!!!!!
Thank you, brave man, for your timely rescue!
But they will surely send someone to investigate when they notice their patrol soldiers haven't returned, \nit will be even more dangerous here then.
If it's dangerous, why are you still staying here?
Alas, we were originally planning to seek refuge in Chuxiang City today,\nbut they found us. They saw that I am a blacksmith and wanted me to make weapons for them.
I need to hurry back and get my family to run away from here.
Alas, life is as insignificant as an ant in troubled times...\nIf I were stronger, could I have saved this man...
Brave man, you are so skilled, could you escort us to Chuxiang City?
I'm sorry, I was too presumptuous.\nIn that case, I will go ahead, brave man, be careful of the barbarians...
I can't thank you enough for your kindness, I will go back and have my family pack up,\nplease go to the village to the east to find us.
Brave man, you're finally here!
Thank you for making this trip, brave man.
Thank you, brave man.
Big brother, are you here to play with me?
Is everything packed up?\nIf everything is ready, let's set off.
Alright, let's go now.

Yes!

Chuxiang City...\nI can't believe I made it here alive...

Young man, thank you for escorting us this way.\nI have some cakes here, please accept them, I hope you won't mind.

I hid a lot of candied fruit in the pottery jar in the yard, but I'll never be able to eat it again.

So it's the young hero {PlayerSurName},\nOur Grand Marshal has heard of you. If he knew you were here to visit, he would surely treat you as an honored guest.
Please follow me...
Any Tom, Dick, or Harry dares to see our marshal!\nI think you are a spy sent by Chuxiang City to gather military intelligence!
Since I've seen through your identity, prepare to die!
So powerful... Luckily, I ran fast.
What Yan Yun Iron Army, they are simply no match!
I am {PlayerName}, the envoy sent by the Lord of Chuxiang City, here to pay a visit to the Grand Marshal.
Hmph, you're here to negotiate peace, aren't you?\nLet's see how sincere your Lord is.
Follow me...
The tone of your speech seems a bit guilty,\nAre you an assassin sent by Chuxiang City, planning to assassinate our Grand Marshal!
Dressed as a wanderer, you must not be from the court!\nGuards, there's an assassin! Someone is trying to assassinate the Grand Marshal!
This is the Commander's tent.\nBut you can only go in alone, let your friends wait outside the big tent.
What kind of rule is this?
This is a rule set by the Marshal, visitors can only see the Marshal alone,\nIf you don't heed the advice, I can only treat you and your party as assassins.
{PlayerName}, we'll wait outside.\nYou can go in with confidence, if there is danger, we will rush in at the first time!
Be careful!
Reporting to the Grand Marshal, someone claiming to be {PlayerName} is here to visit the Grand Marshal.
{PlayerName}...\nI've heard of him, a very active young hero recently.
Let him come, I'd like to see this person.
{PlayerName}... I've never heard of him.
Let him come.\nSince he dares to come alone, I'm somewhat interested in meeting him.
Yes!
Go ahead, the Marshal wants to see you.
I am {PlayerName}, paying my respects to the Grand Marshal of the Horse Army!
{PlayerName}, what brings you to see me?
Truly, the ignorant are fearless.\nToday, let me show you my skills!
A trap?!
Fool, without my bait, how could I catch all of you jianghu people in one net!
Better luck in your next life!
Phew... That scared me, but at least I escaped...
Hahaha, I'm curious, how can you be so naive?
I want to see, where can you escape now!
Unexpectedly, you have such strength at a young age, it's my miscalculation!
The Grand Marshal of the Yan Kingdom's Horse Army, killing you, I suppose Chuxiang City and Wuyue area can rest easy.
Hmph, wishful thinking!
If I die, the king will only send more and more brutal soldiers to the south,\nBy then, Chuxiang City will be a hundred times more miserable than it is now!
Soldiers will block, water will cover, we'll cross that bridge when we come to it!
If you spare me, I will immediately withdraw my troops and return to Yan Kingdom.\nAnd I promise that I will not set foot in the south for the rest of my life.
I can also form a brotherhood pact with you, and if you ever need my help in the future, I will not refuse!
What should I do with this guy?
Also, you haven't forgotten about the Soul taker poison pill in your body, have you? I can also give you the antidote for this poison.

Since you are loyal to me, I should trust you.\nHowever, as you Central Plains people say, "Those who are not of my kind have different hearts", I have to be cautious.
But don't worry, as long as you complete the task I give you, I will give you the antidote!
It seems I have no choice.\nIn that case, what task do I need to complete?
Don't worry, you can definitely do this.\n<color=#c44b0e>Take Lü Wenhuan's life within three days</color>!
Are you kidding me? It's no different from sending me to death!
To do or not to do, it's up to you.\nAt worst, you will die of intestinal rupture in three days.
I will inform the whole army that from today, you are a member of the <color=#c44b0e>Yan Yun Iron Cavalry</color>.\nHere, no one will trouble you, you can go to Chuxiang City with peace of mind.
Haven't you finished the task yet? Your time is running out.

When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, the young heroes!

The atmosphere here is a bit off, it's filled with killing intent, and I can faintly hear the sound of war drums.
Could it be that the Yan army is launching a full-scale attack today?\nThe sound seems to be coming from the <color=#c44b0e>north open area</color>, let's go and see what's happening.
Today is the day our army fights against the stubborn Chuxiang City,\nwhy are you still wandering around here, hurry to the front line and wait for the marshal's orders!
{yell} How dare you, spy, attack our camp before the army sets out!

Resisting to the end, causing the people to suffer and lose their wealth, is unkind!

What kind of ability do you have to compete with my Yan Yun Iron Cavalry with such stupidity, unkindness, and lack of courage!

I am afraid of death, but I am more afraid of becoming a slave to a fallen country, living under the breath of others every day!
Even if the outcome of today's battle is already determined, I will make you barbarians taste the pain,\nknow how much price you have to pay for starting a war without reason!
Given the current situation, which side should I assist?
{PlayerName}, what do you mean by this!
Isn't this meaning clear enough?\nI choose to stand in this position, of course, to protect the Chuxiang City behind me.
You fickle villain, have you forgotten how to pledge allegiance to me?\nDo you think the people you want to protect behind you will choose to trust you?
Whether they believe me or not is their business, my choice is in line with my conscience.
{PlayerGivenName} You finally came back, I thought you had run away.
If you haven't abandoned the city and fled, how could I possibly do such a thing.
It sounds good, but why does it feel like you're mocking me?
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, General Lu is missing, and I am temporarily leading the three armies.
Since the young hero is willing to help, please take the lead,\ndisrupt the enemy's formation first, and I will lead the army closely behind you!
Heh, in front of my million iron army, what can a mere {PlayerName} change?
Who said that only I {PlayerName} came?\nFriends who came to help, you have watched enough of the excitement, please show up!
Ye Family Battalion is here!
Amitabha...
The way of nature...
How can such a lively scene be without the Nine Factions Sect?
There was a beautiful woman named Gongsun, her sword dance moved all directions.
By the order of Kang Wang, fight to the death, no retreat!

From now on, Blue Wind Camp will be headless, and they will probably no longer commit crimes.\nYou have done a great good deed.

Brother Kong, why don't you go back and continue to be their boss.\nJust don't let those guys commit crimes.

Yes!
Hahahaha! The brat actually likes it!\nNext time, brat, just tell Old Monster, Old Monster will make a mud pill for you on the spot!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮ่า ๆ ๆ ๆ! ไอ้สารเลวชอบมันจริงๆ!\nคราวหน้า, เจ้าสารเลว, แค่บอกสัตว์ประหลาดเฒ่าไว้ สัตว์ประหลาดเฒ่าจะทำยาขี้โคลนให้เจ้าทันที!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What? Is that Old Monster's...
Ew...
Okay, okay, since Old Monster personally covers you, the brat, we can't let you suffer.
Stinky Bull Nose, how much money do you have on you, give it all to the brat.
This...
What? You're not satisfied?
No, no...\nYoung hero, I only have 5 guan left on me, I'll give it all to you, all to you...
Okay, brat, Old Monster has made a decision, let's just leave it at that.
Okay, then I'll give Old Monster this face.
Ah, I lost a lot...
Why should this kid benefit from the money I've worked hard to earn!
You stinky nose, you've only been with the old monster for a few days, and you've caused so much trouble! The old monster is really suspicious of your motives for coming here...
Since the boss doubts me, I might as well not stay here~
What a suspicious guy.
Better to avoid trouble than to invite it.
Alright, stinky brat, the old monster will compensate you for your loss, let's just leave it at that.
Stinky kid, why did you glare at me for no reason just now? \nYou're really bold, tired of living, aren't you?!
Give me 500 wen, and I won't hold it against you!
You're quite sensible, consider this money as a good deed with us Dirty Street.
Good boy, you dare to curse your grandpa!\nIf you have the guts, stay in Chuxiang City, I'll have all the brothers in the city clean you up!
Huh? Can't you see me with such a big figure?\nI'm asking you for money, can you show me some respect!
I have money, I just don't want to give it to you!\nIs this considered a response?
Dare to play tricks on grandpa, see if grandpa doesn't skin you!
You dare to rob with this little skill? I'm doing a good deed for the people!
Wouldn't it be better to pay up early, instead of getting beaten up, I think you're itching for a fight!
Ha-
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮา-

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Ha--
Achoo!!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮัดชิ้ว!!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: My money is gone again!
Eh, why did I say "again"?\nIt feels familiar.
I suspect you stole my money while I was sneezing next to you, give me back my money!
Since you found me, I'll give you back the money.
That was easy? I thought you would deny it.
You're quite capable to find me, I don't want to get beaten up for this little money.
Why is there less money on me?
Could it be that I've met the ancestor of this profession...
Ouch~
I'm going to kill someone! Help!
How should I deal with such an obvious touch porcelain?
Old lady, who do you think is worse off right now, you or me?
Madman, he's a madman!
Old lady, is my apology sincere enough for you?
Kneel and pay your respects to me for one shichen, then I'll consider it sincere!
Alright... okay...
My waist is about to break... when will this end?
Where did she go? When did she leave?!
You dare to bring beasts into the city!\nThere's no law and order anymore, I'm going to report this to the authorities!
Old lady, bear with the pain.\nI know medical skills, I'll heal you right away to prevent any after-effects.
Kind sir, please spare this old woman.\nAfter your torment, this old woman probably won't survive the night.
What a pity, I still have many methods I haven't used yet.
No need, no need.\nThis old woman is already well, no need to trouble you, sir.
The old woman is lucky to meet me.
You little brat, with the old monster protecting you, no one in Chuxiang City dares to mess with you!
Also, considering the delicious food you often bring to the old monster, he'll tell you a secret!
The stinky sewer where the old monster leaves the city, the entrance is in Dirty Street!\nThe location is easy to find, it's under that broken box!
Young man, you look very unfamiliar, you must be from out of town.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: น้องชาย เจ้าดูไม่คุ้นหน้าเลย เจ้าคงมาจากนอกเมืองสินะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What does it mean to eat and stay?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: กิน และพักแรมงั้นหรือ ช่วยแนะนำข้าหน่อยได้หรือไม่?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Eating means trading with me<color=#c44b0e>, buying food.\nWhen your stamina is low, you can take out food for emergency use.

Staying means I arrange <color=#c44b0e>accommodation</color> for you, each time 200 wen.\nYou can <color=#c44b0e>greatly replenish your stamina and recover HP</color>, the room will be reserved for you for twelve shichen.
Growling... Growling...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: โครก... คราก...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Innkeeper, get me some food first, the accommodation can wait.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เถ้าแก่เนี้ย ข้าขอของกินก่อน เรื่องพักแรมไว้ทีหลังนะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Only steamed buns are ready, please wait a moment, I'll heat it up for you.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Even if it's just low-grade tea and plain rice, it tastes like wild herbs and seafood to you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: แม้ว่าจะเป็นเพียงชาคุณภาพต่ำและอาหารง่ายๆ แต่สำหรับเจ้าแล้ว กลับมีรสชาติเหมือนสมุนไพรป่าและอาหารทะเล

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: After a gust of wind, you feel rejuvenated...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หลังจากมีสายลมพัดผ่าน เจ้าก็รู้สึกสดชื่นขึ้นมาทันที...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Do you want to stay, young man?
