Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What should I do?
What should I do...
Innkeeper, why do you look so distracted?\nDid you run into any trouble?
Last night, I think I saw a shadow wandering outside the inn.\nI don't know if it's a human or a ghost, I was too scared to sleep all night.
I don't know if the shadow will appear tonight, I don't know what to do.
When did the shadow appear last night?
Around Zi Shi to Chou Shi.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตั้งแต่ยามจื่อจนถึงยามโฉ่ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Okay, I'll come to the inn from Zi Shi to Chou Shi, to see what that shadow is.
It's about this shichen...
{PlayerName}, did you hear anything?
Huh? I didn't hear anything, nor did I see any shadows.\nInnkeeper, are you a bit too nervous?
No, I heard it, there are footsteps!
It's shichen, let's do it!
Breaking into a private house, what are you trying to do!
It's you! You're the one who caused trouble at the inn during the day!
Hua Siniang, someone paid for your life, I was going to kill you during the day, but you're tougher than I thought, so I had to wait until there were more people to make a move.
So the sneaky shadows these nights were you guys?
We should have acted earlier, but every night there's a man in black guarding your inn, ruining our plans several times. But he's injured now, he won't come tonight.
A man in black?\nCould it be that the shadow I saw was actually protecting me all along...
Hey, Si Niang!\nIn the face of the enemy, can you stop being absent-minded!
Who the hell is trying to hire a killer to take my life?
You can think about it in the underworld!
Speak! Who is the bastard who sent you to kill me?
Don't think you can get any information from us, the <color=#c44b0e>Black Robe Group</color>...
They actually committed suicide by poison...\nTo avoid revealing the employer's information, they chose such a radical method.
Boss, who have you offended? The other party even hired a killer to take your life.
Those people just mentioned the Black Robe Group, it is said to be a mysterious killer organization, they have branches in every town, specializing in doing some disgraceful things for others.
In this case, if we can find the Black Robe Group, we might be able to find the person who wants to take your life.
I want to see who has the guts to hire a killer to take my life.
Being an enemy of the boss is being an enemy of me, {PlayerName}!
Boss, why don't you come with me, we go find the Black Robe Group, and then find the reckless guy, I will help you get revenge!
In that case, I will have to trouble you to take care of me in the future.\nFrom now on, you don't have to call me boss, just call me Si Niang.
There is no place for me in your team,\nWait until you are ready, then <color=#c44b0e>Invite</color> me to Run away.
Boss, watch out!!!
Little girl, go to hell!
Uh--
{yell} Si Niang!!
{yell} Beast! Pay for Si Niang's life!!!
Si Niang, I have avenged you...
Boss, watch out!!!
Little girl, go to hell!
Cough, cough, you guys really don't give up.
So it was you who have been messing up our plans these nights!
He has been protecting me...
Dare to hurt Si Niang, unforgivable!
Speak! Who is the bastard who sent you to kill Si Niang?
Don't think you can get any information from us, the <color=#c44b0e>Black Robe Group</color>...
They actually committed suicide by poison...\nTo avoid revealing the employer's information, they chose such a radical method.
Si Niang, the Black Robe Group they mentioned is a mysterious killer organization, they have branches in every town, specializing in doing some disgraceful things for others.
This organization will never give up until it achieves its goal once it accepts a commission.\nSi Niang, this village is no longer safe for you.
Have you been protecting me these days?
I just wanted to sneak into the inn at night to steal a bun to eat, I would rather not taste meat for three years than not eat Si Niang's buns for a day.
I'm tired after a fight, I'm going to sleep.
Although we don't know who is trying to harm the boss now, at least we know the clue of the Black Robe Group, as long as we find the Black Robe Group, we can find the employer.
I want to see who has the guts to hire a killer to take my life.
Being an enemy of the boss is being an enemy of me, {PlayerName}!
Boss, why don't you come with me, we go find the Black Robe Group, and then find the reckless guy, I will help you get revenge!
I'm not interested in your fighting and killing, you've got the wrong person.\nIf you're not here for a meal or to stay, then get out of the way, don't interfere with my business!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าไม่สนใจการต่อสู้ฆ่าฟันกันหรอกนะ เจ้ามาหาผิดคนแล้ว\nหากเจ้าไม่ได้มาที่นี่เพื่อกินข้าวหรือพักแรมก็จงไปเสีย อย่าได้มาเกะกะการทำมาค้าขายยของข้า!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}, why do you think I have to go with you?\nWe don't seem to be very familiar, I don't welcome you here, get out of here!
I will have to trouble you to take care of me in the future.
Don't worry, sir, I'll take care of the meals on the way, I guarantee you'll be satisfied.
There's no room for me in your team right now. Come and get me when you're ready to run away.
Since the Black Robe Group has branches in every town, the innkeeper in the town inn must be well-informed. He should know how to find the Black Robe Group in the town.
Brother, don't bother, I know where the Black Robe Group is.
I almost forgot, you used to work at Hotel Delighted, so you know a lot.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าเกือบลืมไปว่าเจ้าเคยทำงานที่โรงเตี๊ยมสุขสำราญ, ดังนั้นเจ้าจึงรู้อะไรเยอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Zhangyue Casino in Daliang City is actually the headquarters of the Black Robe Group. Their business on the surface is just a disguise, and the shopkeeper <color=#c44b0e>Yi Zhihua</color> there is the leader of the Black Robe Group.
Good brother, this really saves a lot of trouble, let's go to Zhangyue Casino.
Xiaobai, do you know where the Black Robe Group branch is in this city?
Guest, there's a price for information. The information you're asking for is worth at least 2 taels of Scrap silver.

There's an Underground Arena in this city, which is the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group. The Underground Arena is under a large water tank in a courtyard, and you need to answer the doorman's password to be allowed in.
The password is <color=#c44b0e>Spring night is worth a thousand gold, money can't buy happiness</color>. You must remember it well, don't get it wrong.
I was just joking with you earlier, how can I take your money for such worthless information.

There's an Underground Arena in this city, which is the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group. The Underground Arena is under a large water tank in a courtyard, and you need to answer the doorman's password to be allowed in.
The password is <color=#c44b0e>Spring night is worth a thousand gold, money can't buy happiness</color>. You must remember it well, don't get it wrong.
Brother, you've asked the right person about this!

There's an Underground Arena in this city, which is the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group. The Underground Arena is under a large water tank in a courtyard, and you need to answer the doorman's password to be allowed in.
The password is <color=#c44b0e>Spring night is worth a thousand gold, money can't buy happiness</color>. You must remember it well, don't get it wrong.
Thanks for the information, brother.
Xiaoer, do you know where the Black Robe Group branch is in this city?
Guest, there's a price for information. The information you're asking for is worth at least 2 taels of Scrap silver.

There's actually no Black Robe Group branch in this city, only a ragged beggar who claims to be the master of the Black Robe Group Chu Xiang branch, who fights chickens with people in the Market all year round.
This person is easy to find, he leans against a tree outside the Ding family's door during the day, with a white rooster beside him.
I was just joking with you earlier, how can I take your money for such worthless information.

There's actually no Black Robe Group branch in this city, only a ragged beggar who claims to be the master of the Black Robe Group Chu Xiang branch, who fights chickens with people in the Market all year round.
This person is easy to find, he leans against a tree outside the Ding family's door during the day, with a white rooster beside him.
Xiaoer, do you know where the Black Robe Group branch is in this city?
Guest, there's a price for information...\nThe information you want to know is extraordinary, it's worth at least 10 taels of Scrap silver!
There's no Black Robe Group branch in Daliang City, only the Black Robe Group headquarters! The Zhangyue Casino in the city is the genuine Black Robe Group headquarters.
You're making money too easily, aren't you? One sentence is worth 10 taels of Scrap silver?
Hehe, if you go to other cities to inquire, you'll spend a lot of money and time. Although it's more expensive to get information from me, it saves you a lot of trouble.
Guest, you're joking, we make our money by selling information! Even the best relations can't give you information for free.
If you want to get information from me, this is the price! If you think it's expensive, you can go to other towns to inquire, you might also gain something.
Is this the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group?
You're quite well-informed, you even know such a secret. Yes, this is the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group, what can I do for you?
I want to inquire about an employer's information.
Sorry, we only arrange manpower to carry out tasks, the employer only posts commissions at the headquarters, we don't have direct contact with them.
Then where is the headquarters?
You're not an employer, you're not qualified to know the location of the headquarters.
I can also commission you to do things, and become your employer, right?
Our employers are all recommended through internal referrals, not just anyone is qualified to hire us, the Black Robe Group.
Besides becoming an employer, is there any other way to know the location of the headquarters?
Become the strongest person in this Underground Arena, defeat all opponents, and you will be eligible to get the news of the headquarters.
I see.
Before you become the leader of the Underground Arena, I won't tell you any information about the headquarters.
Can you tell me where the headquarters is now?
Well...
You want to go back on your word? Be careful, I'll tear down your Underground Arena!
I was just casually talking to you, who would have thought that you actually won against everyone. If I tell you about the headquarters, I will be severely punished.
If you don't tell me, I will make you wish you were dead.
Alright, I'll tell you, but you must never say that I told you.

The Zhangyue Casino in Daliang City is actually the headquarters of the Black Robe Group. The business on the surface is just a disguise, and the shopkeeper <color=#c44b0e>Yi Zhihua</color> is the leader of the Black Robe Group.
Thank you, I'll take my leave.
You must never say that I told you!
Is this the Chu Xiang branch of the Black Robe Group?
So it's the "King of Cockfighting" who has graced us with his presence, please forgive us for not welcoming you from afar.
This is the Chu Xiang branch of the Black Robe Group, and I am the leader here. I professionally help people solve problems and make some pocket money by cockfighting in my spare time.
May I ask what brings you here today?
I want to ask you some questions...
Rest assured, I will tell you everything I know!
I want to inquire about an employer...
Sorry, I have nothing to say!
Who just said they would tell me everything they know?
It's because I don't know that I have nothing to say. I only receive tasks from the headquarters, and I don't ask or know who the employer is.

I guess the employer posted a commission task at the headquarters, and then the headquarters distributed the tasks.\nI suppose if you find the headquarters, you can find clues, so tell me the location of the headquarters.

The Zhangyue Casino in Daliang City is actually the headquarters of the Black Robe Group. The business on the surface is just a disguise, and the shopkeeper <color=#c44b0e>Yi Zhihua</color> is the leader of the Black Robe Group.
Thank you, I'll take my leave.
You must never say that I told you!
Go away, if you're not here to cockfight with me, go cool off somewhere else.
It seems that I can only get clues from him through cockfighting.
{PlayerName} pays a visit to the leader of the Black Robe Group!
Since you call me that, it seems that you have business with me.
The leader misunderstood, I came to inquire about a person.
Inquiring about a person is also business, it's all the same to me, as long as you can afford to pay.
I want to know who hired you to assassinate Hua Siniang of the Nameless village.
It seems that you don't quite understand the rules, young man. We never reveal information about our employers.
Don't be so absolute, there are always exceptions to everything. Why not make a deal?
Good, straight to the point! I'll make an exception this time.
I'll give you two options: either you alone defeat ten of us; or you win all the money I have.
Both options seem difficult, which one should I choose?
Ha, arrogant!
I won, the leader can fulfill his promise now.
I didn't expect you to be so hidden, no wonder you dare to challenge ten of us alone...
It wouldn't hurt to tell you. The employer is the chief clerk of Duke Kang's manor in Lin'an City. Are you planning to go to Duke Kang's manor to seek trouble?
Thank you for the information. I'll handle the rest, no need to trouble yourself.
We are all people of the jianghu. I respect you and will be waiting here at any time.
Which way do you choose to challenge me now?
Humph, you've got guts! I'd like to see how you can win all the money from me.
If you're ready, let's <color=#c44b0e>start</color> at the table in front of me.
What's wrong? Don't you want to know who the employer is? I still have a lot of money on me.
I can't believe I lost to you! Good lad, did you win by luck or some special means?
Black Robe Group's leader, the famous Yi Zhihua, you wouldn't go back on your word, would you?
It wouldn't hurt to tell you. The employer is the chief clerk of Duke Kang's manor in Lin'an City. Are you planning to go to Duke Kang's manor to seek trouble?
Thank you for the information. I'll handle the rest, no need to trouble yourself.
{PlayerName}, what brings you here today?
Someone hired the Black Robe Group to assassinate my friend. I want to know who the employer is.
Although we can't reveal the employer's information at will, if someone wants to harm your friend, I have to make an exception.
Who is your friend?
Hua Siniang from the Nameless village.
Hua Siniang... I see, the employer is the chief clerk of Duke Kang's manor in Lin'an City.
{PlayerName}, this guy is not to be trifled with, be careful.
Even if it's the king himself, I'll go and seek trouble!
Are you the chief clerk of Duke Kang's manor?
Who dares to intrude into the royal manor!
{yell} Zhang Lang, it's you!
You, why aren't you dead yet!
You're so ruthless, it was you who hired the Black Robe Group to kill me. Why! Why did you do this to me!
Siniang, you shouldn't be here! You shouldn't be here!
I'm about to marry into Duke Kang's manor. I can't let the Duke know about our past.
If the Duke finds out about you, my future will be ruined, and all my plans will be in vain!
So you hired a killer? For wealth and honor, you can do such a thing, you're really a beast!
People die for money, and birds die for food. If you don't look out for yourself, you'll be doomed! If you want to block my bright future, then you all can die!
{yell} Guards, there's an assassin!!!
The guards of Duke Kang's manor rush into the room at the shout, surrounding you all.
Chief clerk, what happened?
These people are trying to assassinate the Duke, kill them on the spot!
Yes!
Siniang, for the sake of our past, please spare me and don't ruin my plans, okay?
I can give you a lot of money. Didn't you always say that you wanted to expand the inn in the village once you had money? This money is enough for you to build several more large inns.
That inn is a memory between you and me. Since you're not going back, the inn is meaningless.
The memory between you and me... Yes, it's a memory, and it's our past.
Now that it's meaningless, it's better to burn it down as soon as possible. You can take the money and live a better life elsewhere.
Zhang Lang, are you really so heartless?

Siniang, I've been studying hard for ten years, and finally got the appreciation of Kang Wang. If I can marry into Duke Kang's manor next, it would be a great leap forward, which is worthy of my life's ambition!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ซินเหนียง, ข้าเรียนหนักมาสิบปีแล้ว และในที่สุดก็ได้รับความชื่นชมจากคังหวัง หากข้าสามารถแต่งเข้าตำหนักองค์ชายคังได้ มันจะเป็นการก้าวกระโดดที่สำคัญยิ่งซึ่งคู่ควรกับความทะเยอทะยานในชีวิตของข้า!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerGivenName}, I'm in a mess now, can you help me make a decision?
How should we deal with this guy...
I, the king, respect the virtuous and the scholars. You, like a dog, have no self-awareness. Relying on your little talent, you dare to covet the Rich maiden!
You are nothing more than a dog of mine, and now you are even worse than a dog!\nGuards, drag him out, I don't want to see him again!
{PlayerName}, it's good that you didn't handle it yourself since this matter was caused by my subordinates.\nNow that I have given you an explanation, you can leave.
This matter was caused by my subordinates, and it's good that you didn't handle it yourself.\nNow that I have given you an explanation, you can leave.
Siniang, what are you going to do in the future?
I've been waiting in the inn of the village for this heartless man to come back all these years...\nNow the result is a relief for me, {PlayerName}, thank you.
I don't want to go back to the sad place of Nameless Village yet. If you don't mind, I'd like to continue to see the world with you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้ายังไม่อยากกลับไปยังสถานที่อันแสนเศร้าที่ชื่อหมู่บ้านไร้นาม ถ้าเจ้าไม่รังเกียจ ข้าอยากจะออกไปท่องโลกกับเจ้าต่อ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Yes, you're right!\nSince the past is a karmic relationship, only I can put an end to it.
Zhang Lang...
Siniang...
It might hurt a bit, just bear with it.
Broken, it's broken...
{PlayerName}, the matter is resolved, let's go.
Because you punished the chief book of Duke Kang's manor without authorization, it caused Kang Wang's great dissatisfaction, and the past friendship was cancelled.
Why! He was going to kill me, how could I spare him!
Hua Siniang, do you dare to kill me?
This is the royal mansion, I am the most favored chief clerk of the prince, and I will be the brother-in-law of Kang Wang in the future. What qualifications do you, like ants, have to judge me!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือตำหนักหลวง, ข้าเป็นหัวหน้าเสมียนที่เจ้าชายโปรดปรานมากที่สุด และข้าจะเป็นน้องเขยของคังหวังในอนาคต เจ้ามีคุณสมบัติอะไร มดปลวกอย่างเจ้าถึงมาตัดสินข้า!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Your shameless appearance really disgusts me!\nHow could I have liked someone like you back then!
I think you misunderstood, I haven't finished my words, what I wanted to say just now was:\nSpare his life, let him experience what is worse than death.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าคิดว่าเจ้าเข้าใจข้าผิดไป, ข้ายังพูดไม่จบ สิ่งที่ข้าต้องการจะพูดตอนนี้คือ:\nปล่อยให้มันมีชีวิต, ให้มันลิ้มรสชาติที่โหดร้ายยิ่งกว่าความตาย.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You, what are you going to do!
Siniang, what do you think of my suggestion?
It's exactly what I want.
Don't, don't mess around!
I, I can call for help!
Help!!
Siniang, be careful!
<size=300%>Cloud Piercing Chopstick!</size>
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: <size=300%>ตะเกียบบินทะลวงเมฆา!</size>

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: How is it possible...
It's over, everything is over...
Heaven is merciful, but he chose his own path to death, and he can't blame others.
{PlayerName}, the matter is resolved, let's go.
{PlayerName}, you ruined my good deeds! I wish I could tear you to pieces!
Siniang is my friend, since you tried to harm her, I won't let you go.

My hatred for you has nothing to do with Siniang!\nI was just one step away from winning the heart of the county princess, but I didn't expect to be overtaken by you, a shameless villain, and all my previous efforts were in vain!
Oh~ So you want to marry into Duke Kang's manor and become a royal son-in-law, huh?\nIt's a pity, man proposes but God disposes, I've done what you wanted to do.
No, I still have a chance!\nI don't mind if the princess becomes a widow, so you can die!!!
Heaven cherishes all living things, yet you seek your own death, you can't blame others.
So he wants to marry into Duke Kang's manor, afraid that people will know about our past, so he wants to kill me to silence me, so he can rest easy.
I didn't expect there to be such a heartless person in the world.
{PlayerName}, the matter is resolved, let's go.
Are you the chief clerk of Duke Kang's manor?
Who are you? Why are you trespassing in the royal palace!
I want to ask you about someone, do you know Hua Siniang?
Hua Siniang? You've got the wrong person, I don't know her.
(It seems I should have brought Siniang here, let her identify him in person, see how he can still deny it.)
{PlayerName}, why did you bring me here?
I sincerely consider you a friend, don't have any improper thoughts about me.
You stay here by yourself, I'm not going to accompany you.
It seems I've outsmarted myself...
Siniang, wait for me——
{PlayerGivenName}, why did you bring me here?
Siniang...
Hmm?
My sincerity towards you can be witnessed by heaven and earth, the sun and the moon.\nI am willing to stay with you for a lifetime.
Whether we are destined in this life, we still need to use the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> to verify, I hope you didn't deceive me just now.
Wedding Stone... I seem to have forgotten to bring it.
{PlayerName}, are you making fun of me?!
You stay here by yourself, I'm not going to accompany you.
I was really careless...
Siniang, wait for me——
Do you want to place the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> on the shrine?
{PlayerName}, are you serious?
You stay here by yourself, I'm not going to accompany you.
I really shouldn't have said that...
Siniang, wait for me——
You place the Wedding Stone on the shrine, and the two of you begin to pray devoutly.
It exploded, the Wedding Stone actually exploded!
Alas, it seems our fate has not yet arrived, this is a warning from the old man of the moon.
We can't go against the will of heaven, let's talk about this later.
Is it really the will of heaven?...
Siniang, wait for me——
It seems...
Mission accomplished!
Siniang...
Hmm?
In broad daylight, you're really not ashamed!
I hope I won't make the wrong choice this time.
Brother, why do you look so worried, is there something on your mind?
Sigh...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เฮ้อ...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The flower falls willingly, but the water flows heartlessly.\nI'm afraid Hua Siniang and I are destined to be apart in this life.
It's rare for you to be self-aware.\nSince that's the case, why are you still lingering at the inn's door?
I'm about to run away from this village, but there's one wish I haven't fulfilled before leaving.\nCould you help me get a piece of Siniang's jewelry as a keepsake for future thoughts?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้ากำลังจะหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านนี้ แต่มีความปรารถนาอย่างหนึ่งที่ข้าไม่ได้เติมเต็มก่อนออกเดินทาง\nท่านช่วยข้าหาเครื่องประดับของซื่อเหนียงเป็นของที่ระลึกสำหรับความคิดถึงในอนาคตได้ไหม?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Why me?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ทำไมต้องเป็นข้า?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Brother, you look very familiar with Siniang, I can only ask you for help!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: พี่ชาย, ท่านดูคุ้นเคยกับซื่อเหนียงมาก ข้าทำได้เพียงขอความช่วยเหลือจากท่านเท่านั้น!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I want to help you, but I really can't.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, why do you say that?
Hua Siniang is no longer at the inn, so of course you can't get what you want.
How could this be... Is my wish destined to be unfulfilled?\nI will find Si Niang even if I have to travel to the ends of the earth, {PlayerName} brother, let's meet again if fate allows.
Farewell, brother.
Si Niang, where have you gone...
Seeing your devotion, I'll give it a try.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เห็นแก่ความจงรักภักดีของเจ้า ข้าจะลองดู

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Knowing that it's a hopeless cause, why torture yourself like this.\nI can't help you with this.
Brother, have you gotten the item?
It's not that easy, you'll have to wait for my news.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, this is my only request, please help me!
Shopkeeper, do you have any personal items you don't need, like jewelry, handkerchiefs, etc.?\nJust give me one.
What do you want with my personal item?
Just for a keepsake.
It feels a bit strange,\nWell, for the sake of our friendship, I'll give you this handkerchief I've carried for many years.
You want my stuff? You're not going to do something weird with it, are you?
Just for a keepsake.
Go away, I don't know you.\nLet me tell you, don't mess with me, or I'll skin you!
Will this handkerchief do?\nIt took me a lot of effort to get it.
This! This is really Si Niang's handkerchief!\nBrother, you're amazing!!
Now I can finally make up my mind to run away from the village.\nDo you need help? I should be able to help you out with my skills.
From now on, I'll be your follower, wherever you go, I'll go.
Come find me when you've made up your mind, I'll stay in the village for a few more days.
Now I can finally make up my mind to run away from the village.\nIf you need help, feel free to <color=#c44b0e>Invite</color> me anytime.
It's really Si Niang's handkerchief!
But, why didn't I see Si Niang today, it's a bit strange.
Si Niang gave me the handkerchief and said she was going to a faraway place, then she ran away on her own.
How could this be!\nNo, it's too dangerous for Si Niang to go out alone, I have to find her even if I have to travel to the ends of the earth.
(Unfortunately, the beauty has passed away, they will never see each other again.)
I will find Si Niang even if I have to travel to the ends of the earth, {PlayerName} brother, let's meet again if fate allows.
Si Niang, where have you gone...
Si Niang, you rarely leave the inn, where are you going?
Mind your own business, continue sunbathing.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, it looks like you're going on a long journey, do you want to take me with you? With my skills, I should be able to help you out with a lot of trouble.
Come find me when you've made up your mind, I'll be waiting for your news here.
Don't forget about me when you need help, I'll be waiting for your news here.
Why did you block that for me just now, don't you know it could have killed you!
I can take a few hits, I won't let them hurt you.
You have a conscience, but don't do such dangerous things in the future, it's not worth it.
Hehe...
"Hehe" what? Didn't you hear what I said!
{PlayerSurName} Brother, it looks like you're going on a long journey, do you want to take me with you? With my skills, I should be able to help you out with a lot of trouble.
Hey, Bao Dating!\nYou haven't answered me yet, what does this "hehe" mean?
Let's go, let's go, you can interrogate him slowly on the road, no need to rush.
Let's go, let's go, we can interrogate him slowly when we come back, no need to rush.
What's wrong with basking in the sun, why torture yourself with such hard travel.\nI don't want to go anywhere now, if you need help, please find someone else.
Si Niang, you rarely leave the inn, where are you going?
Mind your own business, continue sunbathing.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, it looks like you're going on a long journey, do you want to take me with you? With my skills, I should be able to help you out with a lot of trouble.
From now on, I'll be your follower, wherever you go, I'll go.
Come find me when you've made up your mind, I'll be waiting for your news here.
Tsk, how dare you come to me for help?\nI don't want to see you anymore, take care!
With my eloquent tongue, I can surely help you solve a lot of troubles.
Don't forget about me when you need help, I'll be waiting for your news here.
{PlayerSurName} brother, everyone has their own ambitions, I have found my own now, I am going to run away from your team.
Isn't your ambition to bask in the sun under the eaves and find someone to brag to?
Fourth Lady, along the way, I have seen the excellence of {PlayerName} brother, with him by your side, I believe no one can bully you anymore.
{PlayerName}, before I leave, I have a word of warning for you:\nDon't let Fourth Lady suffer any grievances, or I won't be polite to you next time we meet!
The mountains are high and the waters are long, let's meet again in the future~
{PlayerName}! I've told you, if you let Fourth Lady suffer any grievances, I won't be polite to you when we meet again!
So what do you want to do now?
You should pay for Fourth Lady's life!
Do you want to challenge all of us by yourself?
No, this is between him and me, you guys don't interfere.
I knew this day would come sooner or later, let's settle this between us!
Bao Dating, what are you going to do next?
Fourth Lady, I couldn't protect you when you were alive, and I can't avenge you after you die...\nForgive me, I really tried my best...
Alas, the flowers fall with a will but the water flows heartlessly, your life is really sad.
{PlayerName}! I've told you, if you let Fourth Lady suffer any grievances, I won't be polite to you when we meet again!
Bao Dating, what are you doing here? Where have you been these days?
Fourth Lady, {PlayerName} this bastard hasn't bullied you too much, has he? I'm here to take revenge for you!
Do you want to challenge all of us by yourself?
No, this is between him and me, you guys don't interfere.
Since you're so nosy, let's settle this between us!
Bao Dating, what are you planning to do next?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เปาต้าถิง เจ้ามีแผนอะไรต่อ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Fourth Lady, {PlayerName} is not good to you, come with me, I won't let you suffer any grievances.
If {PlayerName} is not good to me, I will naturally run away from him, but I won't go with you.
Alas, the flowers fall with a will but the water flows heartlessly.\nBao Dating, your life is really sad.
Fine, I'm delusional, I'm overestimating myself!\nFourth Lady, take care of yourself.
Hehe, {PlayerName}, that's all you got.
How did you become so powerful?
To protect the one I love, you can't imagine how much hardship I've endured, how many times I've been on the edge of inseparability.

Fourth Lady, you see, {PlayerName} can't protect you anymore.\nAs long as I still have a breath, I will always be by your side, but I won't join {PlayerName}'s team, I will protect you in another way.
What a thick-skinned mangy dog.
Young man, I have a favor to ask of you.
Senior, don't be polite, just tell me what you need.
Back in the day, I heard that someone had found <color=#c44b0e>Lingzhi</color> in Lost Forest.\nSo I traveled thousands of miles to look for it, and this search has lasted for more than ten years.
Now I am old and weak, and I don't have the strength to continue.\nI would like to ask you to go to Lost Forest and see if you can find any traces of Lingzhi.
Don't worry, as long as the news about Lingzhi in Lost Forest is true, I will definitely find it and give it to you!
Don't refuse so quickly, I won't let you help me for nothing.\nWhen you have thought it through, come and find me.
So, can you help me find Lingzhi now?
I can wait, take your time to think about it.
Haven't found it yet?\nDon't worry, after all, I have been looking for it for more than ten years without success, it should not be easily found.
I got the Lingzhi!\nIs this what you have been longing for, senior?
Quickly, let me see it!
It's Lingzhi... It's Lingzhi!
Finally found it... Finally found it...
Kid, you have fulfilled my wish of more than ten years.\nI must reward you well, this <color=#c44b0e>Breathing Technique</color> has been with me for many years, I will give it to you today.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไอ้หนู เจ้าได้เติมเต็มความปรารถนาของข้ามานานกว่าสิบปีแล้ว\nข้าต้องตอบแทนเจ้าให้ดี <color=#c44b0e>เคล็ดปรับลมหายใจ</color>นี้อยู่กับข้ามาหลายปีแล้ว ข้าจะมอบมันให้เจ้าวันนี้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Now that my wish has been fulfilled, it's time to run away from this village.\nIf you value my medical skills, you can invite me to join your team at any time.
I still have many ways to heal people.\nWith me by your side, you can save a lot of money on medicine.
Come and find me when you have thought it through.
Now that my wish has been fulfilled, it's time to run away from this village.\nIf you value my medical skills, you can invite me to join your team at any time.
I am old and weak, not like you young people, I should give up this wandering life.
I have nothing to say to you, please don't bother me anymore.
I still have many ways to heal people.\nWith me by your side, you can save a lot of money on medicine.
Your team has no vacancies, I can't help you.
This, this is the Plant Sect, the holy land of healers!\nI have long admired it, I didn't expect to be able to set foot here in my lifetime.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือสำนักพฤกษา ดินแดนศักดิ์สิทธิ์ของผู้รักษา!\nข้าชื่นชมมันมานานแล้ว ไม่คิดว่าชีวิตนี้จะได้มาอยู่ที่นี่.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Are you the famous national medical saint, Qu Wangyou, who is known as "Yan Wang calls people to die at three in the morning, Wangyou keeps people until five in the morning"?
Senior, you flatter me, I am Qu Wangyou.
Wonderful, wonderful!
Kid, I plan to stay here and learn some exquisite medical skills from Miss Wangyou, is that okay?
(Should I let the old man stay here for a while? If he can improve his medical skills, it might be a good thing for me)
Well, I'll follow your advice...\nAlthough it's a pity, I guess I can't make any further progress at my age.
Kid, I still plan to stay here and learn some exquisite medical skills from Miss Wangyou, is that okay?
(Should I let the old man stay here for a while? If he can improve his medical skills, it might be a good thing for me)
Thank you for your understanding, I won't be able to accompany you these few days, please take care.\nI should be able to make progress in about <color=#c44b0e>five days</color>.

This Plant Sect gathers the spiritual energy of heaven and earth, no wonder all kinds of herbs thrive here.|Miss Forgetful's medical skills are profound, I can hardly catch up in my lifetime.|My medical skills compared to Miss Forgetful's, are like the light of a firefly compared to the brightness of the moon.|As the saying goes, one is influenced by one's surroundings. I have benefited a lot from Miss Forgetful's teachings.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สำนักพฤกษารวบรวมพลังวิญญาณจากสวรรค์และโลก ไม่น่าแปลกใจเลยที่สมุนไพรทุกชนิดจะเจริญเติบโตที่นี่|ทักษะวิชาแพทย์ของท่านหญิงฉู่หวังโหย่วนั้นลึกซึ้ง ตลอดชีวิตข้าคงตามไม่ทัน|ทักษะวิชาแพทย์ของข้าเมื่อเทียบท่านหญิงฉู่หวังโหย่ว นั้นเปรียบเสมือนหิ่งห้อยแข่งแสงกับดวงจันทร์|ดังคำที่ว่ากันว่าสิ่งรอบตัวได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากสิ่งรอบตัว ข้าได้รับประโยชน์มากมายจากคำสอนของท่านหญิงฉู่หวังโหย่ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Miss Forgetful's skills can be described as divine, my little tricks are really laughable.
What I have learned in this Plant Sect in a few days has far exceeded my lifetime's understanding. However, due to my limited talent, I can no longer make progress and have to give up.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สิ่งที่ข้าได้เรียนรู้ในสำนักพฤกษานี้ในเวลาไม่กี่วันนั้นเกินความเข้าใจตลอดชีวิตของข้ามาก อย่างไรก็ตาม เนื่องจากพรสวรรค์ที่จำกัดของข้า ข้าไม่อาจก้าวหน้าอีกต่อไปและต้องยอมแพ้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Little guy, we can run away now.\nI can try out these new skills I've learned!
Ah, the food cooked by Hua Siniang smells so good, our appetite is being tempted again!\nUnfortunately, we don't have this blessing.
(This guy is drooling with hunger, how should I respond?)
Can you cook too?\nDon't joke, even if what you say is true, how can it compare with Hua Siniang's cooking skills.
Well, how do you know if you don't try! Today, let this little beggar open his eyes!
If you have this skill, I'll acknowledge you as the big brother!
Alright, it's a deal!
High-end cuisine often only requires the simplest cooking methods.\nThe potato you casually roasted can also make Hong Xiaoqi's mouth water, and he grabs it and swallows it whole.
{yell} It's so delicious!
Please, keep your voice down!\nIf Hua Siniang hears this, how can I continue to freeload at her place.
{PlayerName}! I heard everything you guys said!\nFrom now on, don't even think about freeloading at my place!
...Sorry {PlayerSurName} big brother, we've caused you trouble.\nBut the roasted potato you made is really amazing!
Of course, I have many skills!\nI just keep a low profile and never show off!
To be honest with {PlayerSurName} big brother, I actually have a special ability, that is, if I eat well and sleep well, I will be much stronger than usual, and I will be more resistant to fights.
This ability seems a bit useless in your current situation.
Hehe, if it weren't for big brother's blessing today, allowing me to have a full meal, I would have forgotten about this ability.

Then I won't be polite! I want to eat <color=#c44b0e>Homemade tofu</color>, <color=#c44b0e>Braised chicken</color>, and <color=#c44b0e>Fresh fish soup</color>!\nThese can all be bought at Hua Siniang's place.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: งั้นข้าจะไม่เกรงใจนะ! ข้าอยากกิน <color=#c44b0e>เต้าหู้ทรงเครื่อง</color> <color=#c44b0e>ไก่ตุ๋น</color> และ <color=#c44b0e>ซุปปลาสด</color>!\nทั้งหมดนี้สามารถซื้อได้ที่โรงเตี๊ยมของฮวาซื่อเหนียง.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: No, no, I dare not enter Hua Siniang's inn in this dirty state, she will beat me out with a big stick.
I see, then whatever you want to eat, I'll buy it for you.
Hehe, {PlayerSurName} big brother is really generous and trustworthy!
With {PlayerSurName} big brother, there's food to eat!\nTo avoid going hungry again, I'll follow you for the rest of my life!
You've committed your life for a meal... Isn't that a bit rash?\nAnd I'm going to wander the martial world, it's very dangerous.

Hehe, although I'm not as powerful as {PlayerSurName} big brother, I'm not easy to mess with either!\nWhen you, {PlayerSurName} big brother, have made up your mind, come and <color=#c44b0e>Invite</color> me!
Hey! Don't Pierce me!
Hmph, I knew you were bluffing.\nWho would be so kind to invite a little beggar to a feast.

In this village, there are broken houses to shelter from the wind and rain, and the alms of the villagers can barely fill my stomach. Going out with you might make it hard to eat and sleep, I don't want to suffer that.
Bah, even if I starve to death, I won't join your team. Don't dream of Spring and Autumn.
As long as I can eat and sleep well, no matter what {PlayerSurName} big brother asks me to do, I won't say a word!
Big brother, your team doesn't have a place for me, I'm afraid I'm going to starve today.
What are you looking at? Don't think that a few copper coins will make me teach you my unique martial arts.

Who would have thought that he would show his true colors after coming to my house, constantly bothering me.\nI didn't want to make a scene, so I had to ask my father to do something.

You really think this young master is a punching bag!\nDon't think that just because this young master values you, you can take yourself seriously.
This young master won't fight you one-on-one today!\nIf you can defeat these useless minions of mine, this young master will acknowledge you as the boss.
If you can't do it, stay away from this young master in the future!
Master Lü, we agreed to a one-on-one fight, don't trick me!
The rules are set by this young master, I play however I want!
Enough talk, let's start!
So powerful...
How about it, Master Lü, am I qualified to be your boss now?
Enough! More than enough!
Lü Zixu pays his respects to big brother!
Since I'm your big brother now, I'd like to meet your father. Can you introduce me?
Leave this small matter to me!
Then please accompany me to the General's mansion, big brother. There might be some minor troubles without me.

If big brother wants to go to the General's mansion, it's best to <color=#c44b0e>Invite</color> me to go with you.\nOtherwise, those dog slaves might bully you for being a stranger and cause some trouble.
Don't think that just because we have close relations, you can invite this young master, <color=#c44b0e>first spar with me for a few days</color>.
You're not qualified to ask for this young master's help yet.
This young master doesn't get along with you, there's nothing to talk about.
With this young master's presence, who in the martial arts world wouldn't give face.
Big brother, your team is too big, there's no place for me.
I heard there's an underground Arena in Lin'an City?\nDo you know the details?
Yes, although many people have heard of the underground Arena, few know the details.
I'm from out of town, could you tell me about this underground Arena?
Not a local, huh...
You can know about this underground Arena, but at least you have to show some sincerity.
I'm rich, I'm rich.\nYoung man, what do you want to know? Just ask me.
Alright, alright, I know your sincerity.\nYoung man, what do you want to know? Just ask me.
Young man, I have old and young to take care of, please spare me.\nWhat do you want to know? Isn't it enough that I tell you everything?
What is that underground Arena for?
This Arena has another name, called <color=#c44b0e>Underground Arena</color>. It's said that it used to be called "cockfighting arena"...
Cockfighting...combat...
It's all those boring dignitaries who are playing around, anyway, it's all for their amusement.
The Underground Arena initially started with local ruffians participating, but later, for the sake of the reward money, people from the rivers and lakes also joined in.
Now, to satisfy the special preferences of a certain big shot, fierce beasts are occasionally added to fight against humans, and the scene is truly unbearable to watch.
Is the reward money for winning in this Underground Arena very high? It's worth them fighting so hard.
Not only is the reward money ridiculously high, but the winners can also gain considerable Fame!
Where is this Underground Arena located?
Actually, this Underground Arena is right across from the Lin'an City Government Office.

Then let me tell you the rules of the Underground Arena, listen carefully...
The Underground Arena <color=#c44b0e>opens every 5 days</color>, if it's not time yet, you can only make a wasted trip.
As long as you are confident in your abilities, you can sign up for the competition, each time the <color=#c44b0e>registration fee is 500 Wen</color>.

In addition to the various people from the rivers and lakes participating in the Underground Arena, sometimes fierce beasts will be arranged to appear, which is a highlight of the Underground Arena, hence the saying "Inseparable, life and wealth are in heaven".
People come to the Underground Arena for fame and fortune, only the person who wins the final victory can get the enviable rich rewards.

The Underground Arena adopts an elimination system, as long as you win, you will be arranged to continue fighting with the next opponent, if you can persist in winning <color=#c44b0e>five rounds</color>, then you are the champion of the day's Underground Arena.
Did you understand the rules of the Underground Arena?
There is a competition in the Underground Arena today, would you like to sign up to participate?
The Underground Arena will end tonight at Zi Shi. If you want to participate again, you'll have to wait for five days. Consider carefully.
Alright, please welcome {PlayerName} to the stage for the competition!
Congratulations to young hero {PlayerSurName} for winning the championship of this session!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, don't be discouraged. Try again in five days.
The Underground Arena has lost its appeal, with few participants.\nFrom today, I declare the permanent closure of the Underground Arena. It will no longer be open!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you have already participated in the competition today and cannot continue.

A merchant from the Western Regions hands you a few colorful beads and runs away...

Register? Register for what?
Ah, really? Haven't you heard of our Wind and Cloud Arena?
I am {PlayerName}, new to Daliang City. I am not familiar with the rules of this Arena. Could you please explain it to me?
Our Wind and Cloud Arena is famous. Even if you haven't been to Daliang City, you should have heard of it. Well, let me tell you about the Wind and Cloud Arena...

The Wind and Cloud Arena is a place for heroes from all over the world to compete in martial arts. Whether they are new talents or famous veterans, they all take pride in winning the championship here.

The Arena is divided into four stages: Heaven, Earth, Xuan, and Huang. It starts with "Huang" and ends with "Heaven". Only by becoming the champion of the current stage can you participate in the higher level competition in the next Arena.

The higher the stage, the stronger the opponent, the more generous the rewards, and of course, the higher the registration fee! The same level opponents will become stronger and stronger. If you want to stay where you are and only pick easy fights, you are asking for trouble.

The Arena uses an elimination system. As long as you win, the next opponent will be arranged for you. If you can win <color=#c44b0e>five</color> matches in a row, you will be the champion of the day's Underground Arena.
Also, the Arena is only <color=#c44b0e>open from Si Shi to You Shi every day</color>. If it's not time yet, you can't register to participate.
Did you understand the rules of the Wind and Cloud Arena?
Unfortunately, it's not the time for the Arena competition now. Young hero, you have to come back to register between <color=#c44b0e>Si Shi and You Shi</color>.
Young hero, you have already participated in the Arena today and cannot continue. If you want to participate, please come back tomorrow.

{PlayerSurName} young hero, you are now the champion of the Heaven stage, who would dare to compete with you. If you are itching for a fight, I'm afraid you can only participate in the <color=#c44b0e>Peak Debate</color>.
What is this Peak Debate you speak of?

The Peak Debate is a century-old event in the martial arts world. All participants are <color=#c44b0e>revered</color> unparalleled masters, and the final winner is recognized as the "Peak of Jianghu"!
It seems that my fame has not yet reached the revered level, and I am not qualified to participate in this grand event.
It's time for the Arena competition now, would you like to register?
As long as it's between Si Shi and You Shi, you can participate in the Arena. Don't forget what I told you, your opponents will only get stronger and stronger, they won't wait for you.
Alright, please step onto the Arena, young hero {PlayerName}!
Congratulations to young hero {PlayerSurName} for winning the championship of this session!
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, don't be discouraged, try again tomorrow.
Congratulations to {PlayerSurName} for becoming the champion of the Wind and Cloud Arena!\nYou are the youngest champion in nearly a decade, your future is boundless.
I didn't expect this competition to attract the attention of legendary figures...
Congratulations to {PlayerSurName} for winning the Yellow Rank Championship of the Wind and Cloud Arena!
Congratulations to {PlayerSurName} for winning the Black Rank Championship of the Wind and Cloud Arena!
Congratulations to {PlayerSurName} for winning the Earth Rank Championship of the Wind and Cloud Arena!

The Glittering Artifact House is filled with countless treasures, it's not an exaggeration to say it's as rich as a nation.\nBut the current scale is thanks to the patronage of all distinguished guests.

I heard that {PlayerSurName} brother has not joined any sect yet, I wonder why.\nIt's good to be under a big tree, if there is no fellow disciple to guide the practice, it's hard to stand in the rivers and lakes.

I was in a hurry earlier and forgot to give {PlayerSurName} a valuable item.
What is it? Don't keep me in suspense.
This <color=#c44b0e>Forgotten Pill</color> is a rare treasure, specifically used to forget learned external and internal martial arts.
I was just worried about not being able to forget the wrong martial arts I learned. This is just in time.
There are only a few of these pills, how could they be enough?\nWhy don't you give me a few more?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ยาพวกนี้มีเพียงไม่กี่เม็ดจะเพียงพอได้อย่างไร?\nทำไมเจ้าไม่ให้ข้าเพิ่มอีกสักหน่อย?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: This pill is extremely rare in the world. Some sects regard it as a treasure of the sect, and some auction houses will auction it as the finale. If you want it, you'll have to find a way to get it yourself.

That guy mentioned that this is a poison from the Jiuli tribe,\nso if I can find someone from the Jiuli tribe, I should be able to find a way to detoxify...
But in this vast Lin'an City, where can I find someone from the Jiuli tribe...
Hmm... It's time for the Seven-day Heartbreak Gu to act up again...
But I already have a way to deal with this poison!
Little Seven-day Heartbreak Gu, what can you do to me!
Hmm... It's time for the Seven-day Heartbreak Gu to act up again...

Sigh... it's fate... I didn't expect to fall victim to the Seven-Day Heartbreak Gu...
{yell}God, I'm not willing to accept this!
I didn't expect that {PlayerSurName} young master would be the first outsider to be accepted by the whole village in more than ten years.
Sigh... My long-cherished wish for many years, today finally...
What's going on? Don't tell me you want to pass the position of Village Head to me?\nI haven't started my journey in the martial arts world yet, I don't want to spend my old age in this village...
{PlayerSurName}Young master is joking.\nI'm crying with joy, today I can finally entrust the guardian object.
There is a <color=#c44b0e>large pottery jar</color> in the bedroom of my house, underneath is the secret chamber of my house.
The secret chamber contains treasures that I have collected for many years, as well as the object I have been guarding.
This <color=#c44b0e>Dragon key</color> is the key to open the coiling dragon chest in the secret chamber, the object I have been guarding is in it, you can take it yourself.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือ <color=#c44b0e>กุญแจมังกร</color>นี้เป็นกุญแจสำคัญในการเปิดหีบสมบัติมังกรขนดที่อยู่ในห้องลับ สิ่งของที่ข้าคอยเฝ้าดูแลอยู่ในนั้น เจ้าสามารถนำมันไปได้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: As for the other treasures in the secret chamber, they are also given to {PlayerSurName} young master.\nThis is a reward from the village to {PlayerSurName} young master.
Thank you, Village Head! Then I won't be polite!
{PlayerSurName}Young master, this Animal ring - The Ox is the object I have been guarding!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerSurName} จอมยุทธ์น้อย แหวนนักษัตร - ฉลู นี่คือวัตถุที่ข้าคอยคุ้มกัน!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: This object was left by a young ranger who passed by here fourteen years ago.\nHe told me that there are a total of twelve of these objects, collectively called the twelve Animal rings. Although they are named after the twenty-eight constellations, they actually correspond to the twelve zodiac signs.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: วัตถุชิ้นนี้ถูกทิ้งไว้โดยพรานป่ารุ่นเยาว์ที่เดินผ่านมาที่นี่เมื่อสิบสี่ปีที่แล้ว\nเขาบอกฉันว่าวัตถุเหล่านี้มีทั้งหมดสิบสองชิ้น เรียกรวมกันว่าวงแหวนนักษัตร 12 วง แม้ว่าพวกมันจะถูกตั้งชื่อตามกลุ่มดาวทั้ง 28 ดวง แต่จริงๆ แล้วพวกมันมีความสอดคล้องกับราศีทั้ง 12 ราศี

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: There is a great secret hidden in these twelve Animal rings. To prevent them from falling into the hands of evil people, the young ranger scattered the twelve Animal rings and entrusted them to reliable people to guard.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: มีความลับอันยิ่งใหญ่ซ่อนอยู่ในแหวนนักษัตรทั้งสิบสองวงนี้ เพื่อป้องกันไม่ให้พวกมันต้องตกไปอยู่ในมือของคนชั่ว, เจ้าพรานหนุ่มจึงกระจายแหวนนักษัตรทั้งสิบสองวงและมอบหมายให้คนที่เชื่อถือได้คอยเฝ้าคุ้มกันไว้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The one entrusted to me to guard is this Animal ring - The Ox!\nNow that I am old, I entrust it to {PlayerSurName} young master, hoping that the young master will guard it well and not let me entrust it to the wrong person.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สิ่งเดียวที่ข้าถูกมอบหมายให้คอยปกป้องคุ้มครอง สิ่งนั้นก็คือ แหวนนักษัตร - ฉลู \nตอนนี้ข้าชราเฒ่ามากแล้ว ข้าขอฝากมันไว้กับท่าน {PlayerSurName} หวังว่าท่านจะคอยปกป้องมันเอาไว้อย่างดี และไม่ปล่อยให้มันตกไปอยู่ในเงื้อมมือของคนชั่ว.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You are now destined with this Animal ring, you should go to <color=#c44b0e>Linlang Temple</color>, the old immortal there is said to know more about the Animal ring.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตอนนี้เจ้าถูกชะตาลิขิตให้ได้รับแหวนนักษัตรนี้แล้ว เจ้าควรไปที่ <color=#c44b0e>วัดหลินหลาง</color> ตาเฒ่าอมตะที่นั้นกล่าวเอาไว้ว่าเขารู้เพิ่มเติมเกี่ยวกับแหวนนักษัตร

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerSurName}Young master, is there anything else?
This expression...\nCould it be that {PlayerSurName} young master is fond of the scenery here and really wants to live in seclusion here?
Alas, the new wave always replaces the old one...
Since you are willing, from today on, you can stay here,\nI will hand over the position of Village Head of this Nameless village to you.
I have been stuck in this small village for decades, and finally I can let go of my burden and travel around today.
I came here specifically to say goodbye to the Village Head. I am grateful for the care of all the villagers, {PlayerName} is very grateful!
{PlayerSurName} son, there is no need for polite words.\nI hope that from now on, you can continue to be kind to others and become a hero that everyone Honored.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerSurName} ลูกเอ๋ย ไม่จำเป็นต้องกล่าววาจาที่สุภาพ\nข้าหวังว่าจากนี้ไปเจ้าจะยังคงมีน้ำใจต่อผู้อื่นและเป็นฮีโร่ที่ทุกคนให้ความเคราพนับถือต่อไป

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: There is only this jar in the Village Head's bedroom, it should be this one that the Village Head mentioned.
No, I can't move it at all.\nHow can I reveal the Secret chamber below?

There is only this pickles jar left in my house, why don't you know how to be gentle!\nIt's really worrying, you are so impulsive, I don't know whether it is a blessing or a curse to entrust this treasure to you...
Sigh...
{yell} Stop!

There is only this pickles jar left in my house, why don't you know how to be gentle!\nIt's really worrying, you are so impulsive, I don't know whether it is a blessing or a curse to entrust this treasure to you...
There is indeed a Secret chamber below!\nThe Machinery technique I learned unexpectedly came in handy here, I am really smart.
Hahahaha——
Looking at the hero statue again, it still feels so majestic!\nI wonder if someone will erect a statue for me that is equally majestic in the future!
Disciple, the person sculpted in this statue is my master, your grandmaster, kowtowing a few more times will do you good.
Who would have thought this great hero is my grandmaster?\nMaster, I've never heard you mention it, can you tell me about grandmaster's glorious deeds?
You will know when it's time for you to know, no need to say more now.
Grandmaster, your disciple is here to kowtow~
This great hero is really a role model for my generation.\nAs a rookie who just entered the arena, I should show my respect.
It doesn't seem appropriate to kowtow here, my head is dizzy.
If there is a <color=#c44b0e>Soft cushion</color> here, I will definitely kowtow a hundred times!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ถ้ามี<color=#c44b0e>เบาะนุ่ม</color>อยู่ตรงนี้ จะคำนับร้อยครั้งแน่นอน!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The big sword on the statue seems to be loose, don't suddenly fall and hurt the pedestrians!
I happen to have a Soft cushion on my body, should I put it here for convenience to kowtow?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: บังเอิญมีเบาะนุ่มๆ ติดไว้กับตัว, ข้าควรจะวางไว้ตรงนี้เพื่อความสะดวกในการคำนับหรือไม่?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I have other uses for this Soft cushion, I think the great hero won't be Economical with me.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้ามีประโยชน์อื่นสำหรับเบาะนุ่มนี้ ข้าคิดว่าฮีโร่ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่จะไม่ประหยัดกับข้า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Soft cushion has been put in place, so I won't get hurt when I kowtow.\nI am really smart!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: มีการวางเบาะนุ่มไว้แล้ว ดังนั้นข้าจะไม่เจ็บเมื่อคำนับ\nข้านี่ฉลาดจริงๆ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Are you planning to kowtow to the hero statue now?\nThere is no Soft cushion here, this kind of kowtow is more sincere.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตอนนี้เจ้าวางแผนที่จะคำนับรูปปั้นฮีโร่หรือไม่?\nที่นี่ไม่มีเบาะนุ่มๆ คำนับแบบนี้จริงใจกว่า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: My current physical condition is not suitable for kowtowing, let me recover my body and come again.
As expected, sincerity can move stones!
Are you planning to kowtow to the hero statue now?
The Soft cushion under you can't bear the weight and shatters, a Manual falls out from inside...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เบาะนุ่มข้างใต้เจ้ารับน้ำหนักไม่ไหวและแตกออก มีตำราหลุดออกมาจากด้านใน...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: This result seems to be expected.
You have already kowtowed <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:英雄雕像无软垫}</color> times, do you want to continue?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าได้คำนับ <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:英雄雕像无软垫}</color> ครั้งแล้ว เจ้าต้องการทำต่อหรือไม่

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You have already kowtowed <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:英雄雕像有软垫}</color> times, do you want to continue?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าได้คำนับ <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:英雄雕像有软垫}</color> ครั้งแล้ว เจ้าต้องการทำต่อหรือไม่

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What else needs to be done?

Young man, where are you going? Our Horse carriage can go anywhere in the north and south of the river, not only directly to all major towns and martial arts sects, but also to some remote places, as long as you know the way, we can find a way to get you there.
I'm so tired, I can't use any strength.
If I don't RecoveryStamina, I guess I <color=#c44b0e>won't last a shichen</color>.
What rivers and lakes... what heroes...\nAs long as I can survive, everything else is bullshit...
{PlayerName}, if you join Yan Country, you will be an enemy of the entire Ye Family Battalion. I can't be with you anymore, take care of yourself.
{PlayerName}, since you've chosen to side with that traitor Wan Yan Wuzhu, our friendship ends today. We'll settle our scores on the battlefield!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerName} เนื่องจากเจ้าได้เลือกที่จะเข้าข้างผู้ทรยศหวันหยานอู๋จู มิตรภาพของเราจึงสิ้นสุดลงในวันนี้ เราจะตัดสินคะแนนของเราในสนามรบ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Yang family was loyal and brave. As an old soldier of the Yang family, I'm ashamed to be associated with you!
I never thought you'd be such a treacherous villain. We have different paths and cannot plan together!
I've killed so many Yan dogs, and now the brother I trusted most has joined them. Our brotherhood ends here, and the next time we meet, we'll be mortal enemies!
Surrender to Yan country, willing to be a running dog of Yan people, from now on you and I are enemies!
The poison from the Soul-binding Pill is starting to take effect, only 6 shichen left.
Let's fight! There might still be a glimmer of hope!
In the end, I couldn't make it...
This thing is indeed poisonous...
I can't believe I'm going to die from food poisoning in this life...
Curiosity really does kill...
The taste... is really bad...
I won't eat anything randomly in my next life...
Diet... is the key to longevity...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อดอาหาร...คือกุญแจสำคัญในการมีชีวิตยืนยาว...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young hero, please stop!
Beasts are not allowed in Chuxiang City, young hero, please leave your pet outside the city.
(Pets are not allowed in Chuxiang City, but if I have a certain <color=#097a76>fame</color> to vouch for me, they probably won't stop me. What should I do now?)
Wow, so much money!
Uh... this... isn't very good...
You say it's not good, but you still take the money.
Cough, I'll let you in this time,\nBe careful after you go in, don't let those yamen runners bump into you.
Don't worry, I know what I'm doing!
Well, forget it, who made us brothers?\nI'll pretend I didn't see anything, you go in.
Okay, thank you, big brother!
Be careful after you go in, don't let the yamen runners bump into you.\nIf something really happens, I can't protect you, brother.
Understood, understood! Don't worry, big brother!
This seems a bit troublesome...
Big brother, what should we do?
How would I know what to do!
Big brother, I have a plan!
Oh, my stomach hurts, I need to go to the toilet...
Wait for me, my stomach also hurts, I'm going too!
These soldiers, they only know how to bully the weak.\nI don't believe there's anything wrong with me bringing my pet into the city!
Hey you! Stop right there!
No beasts are allowed in Chuxiang City!
Damn, they found out, run!
Where do you think you're going!
Beasts are strictly forbidden in Chuxiang City,\nplease take care of yourself, this will not be tolerated again!
Ah, such bad luck...\nI should be more careful next time.

Be careful after you go in, don't let the yamen runners bump into you.\nIf something really happens, I can't protect you, brother.

Big brother, what should we do?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Sir, you are our benefactor. If you want to stay, you can go upstairs directly, no need to greet me.
Sigh...
Why is Miss Qianxue sighing?
In my years at the Crime Investigation Bureau, I've found that right and wrong are not as simple as people think...
Those who do evil may have unspeakable hardships or secrets that are not to be told to outsiders;\nAre those who do good really as bright and beautiful as they appear?
Is the judgement of the Crime Investigation Bureau really as precise as they say?
Although the head of the bureau is my brother, I don't fully agree with his philosophy...
I should go out and experience the world, understand human nature...
In this way, every event will have a different conclusion for me!
Why is Senior Sister Qianxue sighing?
So Miss Qianxue is worried about this, what's the difficulty!\nI am willing to accompany Miss Qianxue to experience the world and the warmth and coldness of human nature.
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, I appreciate your kindness.\nUnfortunately, you are not a disciple of our sect, so to avoid suspicion, I cannot travel with you.
So Senior Sister Qianxue is worried about this, what's the difficulty!\nNo matter where you want to go, even if it's through fire and water, I will accompany you.
Since {PlayerSurName} junior brother is so determined, I will not refuse.\nWhen you are ready, come and <color=#c44b0e>invite</color> me to set off together.
As the head of the Crime Investigation Bureau, I cannot leave my post without permission!
I have nothing to say to you!
You are no longer a disciple of the Crime Investigation Bureau, and to avoid suspicion, I cannot accompany you.
Whether you are from the Crime Investigation Bureau or not, since I'm with you, I'll follow you wherever you go.
{PlayerSurName}, my junior brother, remember your promise, even through trials and tribulations, you must accompany me!
Hua Qingqing, I didn't expect to see you again.\nNo matter what your relationship is with {PlayerSurName}, my junior brother, if you dare to act recklessly again, I will not be polite to you!
Hmph, don't try to scare me with these words, let's see if {PlayerName} will help you or me when the time comes.
It's a pity, your team is already full, and I can't accompany you to wander the martial arts world for now.
Every time I come to Chuxiang City to investigate a case, I sincerely pray in front of the hero statue.\nOnly by doing this, my lack of confidence and timidity at the time will be swept away,
The hero statue has been protecting Chuxiang City for decades, I wonder when the new hero will appear.
This hero statue seems a bit different from before.\nAnd, why does this hero statue always give me a familiar feeling.
The people outside the city are displaced, but the General's mansion in the city is peaceful and prosperous.\nIs this the pillar of Chuxiang City? I can't feel the future of Chuxiang City at all.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I didn't expect that there would be such dirty and filthy corners in Chuxiang City, the people here probably all have criminal records, I wonder why the government allows such forces to exist?
How could you bring me to such a place?!\nNo, how could you come to such a place, do you frequent here?
These women are all heavily made up and flirtatious, they have no shame.
The Glittering Artifact House is indeed well-known, but with so many priceless antiques casually displayed outside, aren't they afraid of being coveted by thieves?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หอไข่มุกมีชื่อเสียงสมคำร่ำลือจริงๆ. แต่ก็มีโบราณวัตถุล้ำค่ามากมายที่จัดแสดงข้างนอกนั้น พวกเขาไม่กลัวที่จะถูกขโมยบ้างหรือ?

{PlayerSurName}, my junior brother, you are indeed brave and talented.\nAre we planning to catch all the thieves in the Nest of Swallow this time?
The refugees here are not protected by the city, once the war breaks out, they will be the first to become cannon fodder, when will this tragedy end?
The people buried here have a place after death, and there are people to collect their bones. But we martial artists, who have offended too many enemies, may really die without a place to bury.
After this period of experience, the martial arts world is no longer as lifeless as before, and I have my own views on many things.
{PlayerName}, thank you, you let me see the world again, and also let me know myself again.

Stop talking nonsense and just answer.

I finally had a chance to go out and handle things on my own, but that bitch Luo Qianxue found out and ruined everything.
I don't want to be a burden to the Nest of Swallow, I can't stand being treated as a loser...
As for the skill of Steal, I can train you.\nAfter all, my Steal skill is much better than yours, a good teacher produces a good student...

I've heard from my fellow disciples that although you've just joined the sect, you've made rapid progress!\nEveryone says you must have received the secret teachings from the leader, and they all want to learn from you.
It's absolutely impossible for others to learn!\nBut for my senior sister, I will definitely teach you everything I know!

Stop messing around here, I need to continue practicing the Steal technique, don't disturb me if it's not necessary.
As a disciple of the Nest of Swallow, have you mastered the skill of Steal?\nIf you don't work hard, don't drag me down.
As for the skill of Steal, I can train you.\nAfter all, my Steal skill is much better than yours, a good teacher produces a good student...
You're not from our Nest of Swallow, I don't want others to think that Nest of Swallow disciples learn the skill of Steal by relying on outsiders to teach.
Stop messing around here, I need to continue practicing the Steal technique, don't disturb me if it's not necessary.

I treat you as a brother, don't have any improper thoughts about me, be careful I castrate you!

Wait for me, Qingqing——

Pah, how could I be interested in an unreliable guy like you.

Wait for me, Qingqing——

Hey, {PlayerName}, are you making fun of me?
Pah, how could I be interested in an unreliable guy like you.

It's so boring, I don't want to stay here for a moment.\n{PlayerName}, I'm going back, you can play here by yourself.

Qingqing...
Hmm?

Hey, you're not being precise in your words, didn't you take things from the air when you were on a mission before?
Oh, I was wrong, I've never done this with anyone...
Wait, what do you mean by murdering your husband?!\nI think you're itching for a fight, come on, let this lady give you a few whips first!
This Daliang City is indeed the number one city in the world!
It's really worth the trip!
Alas, in the dazzle of the eye, the Money bag is unknowingly empty.

Sounds good, but where do we go to accept the bounty?
Look, it's far in the distance but close at hand!
In that case, let's go get the bounty quickly, so we don't miss out on a good opportunity.
Attacking from behind the target will cause more damage and is more likely to be Critical!
Attacking from the side of the target will cause more damage, and the target is not easy to Parry!
The internal strength that has been learned is set as the main function, which can play the greatest effect in battle.
Forcibly equipping equipment that does not meet the conditions will greatly reduce the actual effect.
Passive represents different fighting styles, and comprehension points can improve the understanding of Passive.
Frequent use of martial arts can also accumulate Experience, but it is much slower than learning through Manual.
Both attacking and getting hit will gain Spirit. When Spirit reaches 100, you can use martial arts to severely damage your opponent.
The more Spirit cost for a Super Move, the more noticeable its effect.

Learning external skills can enhance your Attack attribute, while learning internal skills can enhance your HP and MP.
To use martial arts, you need to hold the corresponding Weapon. If you're holding a Folding fan and want to use a stick to hurt the enemy, it's simply a pipe dream.

The streets of Lin'an City are bustling and buildings are everywhere, it would be a waste not to see them all.

I have a <color=#c44b0e>Map - Lin'an City</color> here, with clear markings of shops and streets, guaranteed not to get lost.\nThe price is <color=#c44b0e>500 Wen</color> per copy, would you consider it?
Thank you for your patronage, sir!\nKeep the map safe!
I guess you'll need this map sooner or later, I'll keep it for you, if you change your mind, just come and find me.
Do you still have the map of Lin'an City, would you like a copy?
Young man, wait a moment!
Daliang City is grand in scale, far beyond ordinary towns, and you can easily lose your way if you're not careful.

I have a <color=#c44b0e>Map - Daliang City</color> here, with clear markings of shops and streets, guaranteed not to get lost.\nThe price is <color=#c44b0e>500 Wen</color> per copy, would you consider it?
Thank you for your patronage!
I guess you'll need this map sooner or later, I'll keep it for you, if you change your mind, just come and find me.
Do you still have the map of Daliang City, would you like a copy?
What you've done in the White Cloud Temple, are you trying to deny it now?
So this is how you make your ill-gotten gains!
Either hand over that Taoist or pay up!
If you don't give an explanation today, I'll smash this place!
These matters really have nothing to do with our White Cloud Temple, it's hard for us to comply with your demands.
This temple is really lively!\nIt seems that something has stirred up public anger, I'd better just watch for now.
Your Taoist tricked us into buying so-called miraculous pills, but after taking them, we vomited and had diarrhea, almost losing half our lives.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young hero, you be the judge!
Young benefactor, recently a Taoist claiming to be from the White Cloud Temple has been swindling and tarnishing the reputation of our White Cloud Temple.
But the evil deeds of that impostor can't be blamed on our White Cloud Temple.\nEveryone here wants an explanation from us, but what can I do?
Young benefactor, please speak up for justice, what should we do about this?
(How should I respond to this?)
This matter has nothing to do with the White Cloud Temple, it's actually a Taoist from Dirty Street pretending to be a Taoist from the White Cloud Temple...
The pills you got from that Taoist are not miraculous pills, but a lump of mud rolled off Jiang Nanguai's body...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Ew, that's disgusting...
I actually ate this thing...
I knew it had a strange taste...
The evil Taoist has already been punished by heaven and taken away.\nIf you don't believe it, you can ask around in the Dirty Street area to find out the truth.
I didn't expect it was someone from Dirty Street...
This... we can't afford to offend!
How could this happen...
Since the evil Taoist has already been punished, we won't pursue it anymore.
We accept our bad luck.
Disperse, disperse, let's all go home.
I presume this is the recently rising star in the martial arts world, {PlayerName}, the young hero {PlayerSurName}.
I am indeed {PlayerName}.
Hmm, if I'm not mistaken, that evil Taoist finally fell into your hands, didn't he?
He committed many evils, and everyone wanted him dead.\nHe just had the bad luck to run into me.

Actually, I knew about that Taoist's deeds a long time ago, but I was afraid of the power behind Dirty Street and worried about retaliation against the White Cloud Temple, so I had to swallow my anger.
That Taoist was very cunning, not only impersonating the White Cloud Temple, but also often pretending to be disciples of other Taoist sects to deceive people, I don't know what his intentions were.

Now that the evil Taoist is gone, the White Cloud Temple no longer has to take the blame for others, this is great news.\nI have a swordsmanship manual to give to the young hero as a token of my gratitude.
Thank you, Taoist.
The evil Taoist is still at large in Chuxiang City, you should go find him to settle the score.
I didn't expect it was someone from Dirty Street...
This... we can't afford to offend!
What should I do...
To prevent more people from being deceived, I implore you to personally punish the evildoer.
Master, you're too serious. I'll do my best.
Brave one, since you've taken up this matter, you must keep your word!
Even if I can't get the money back, as long as that guy is punished, I'll feel better.
Don't let us down, we're waiting for your good news.
What a small world, to meet you here.
You're relentless, what do you want?
Speak up for those innocent people you've deceived!
Speak up? They're just stupid, why blame me!
Oh right, you seem to be one of the stupid ones.\nHow about it, want to taste that melt-in-your-mouth flavor again?
Oh right, you seem to be one of the stupid ones.\nIf it weren't for the old monster's orders not to bother you, I'd have to feed you a few more!
Since you're stubborn, don't blame me for taking action!
Kid, do you really think you can bully me?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าหนู, เจ้าคิดจะรังแกข้าได้จริงๆ เหรอ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kid, you've got some skills!\nBut, these skills are not enough to deal with me.
Since Chuxiang City is no longer a place to stay, I have to find another place.
Kid, don't be too happy too soon, there will be a day when you fall into my hands!
Alas, I let that guy escape.\nI can only report this to the Master of White Cloud Temple.
I'm incompetent, although I won against that evil Taoist, I let him escape.
You don't have to blame yourself, you've done your best.\nAlas, in this way, I don't know how many innocent people will suffer.
I was too careless, this kind of character is not something I can handle with my current strength.
Kid, you're meddling in other people's business, today you will close your eyes!
Just as you close your eyes and wait for death, you suddenly hear a scream.
Three Friends of Winter! You couldn't help it, you finally made a move!
Kid, today someone is protecting you, you should be grateful for your luck.\nYou won't be so lucky in the future, you better pray for good luck.
Who saved me just now?
I don't know where that guy escaped to, I can only report this to the Master of White Cloud Temple.
I'm sorry, I'm incompetent, I let that evil Taoist escape.
You don't have to blame yourself, you've done your best.\nAlas, in this way, I don't know how many innocent people will suffer.
I believe White Cloud Temple is innocent!
The Taoist in the city is pretending to be from White Cloud Temple and deceiving people, he should still be in the city, you might as well find him and question him.
Aren't you {PlayerName}, the great hero {PlayerSurName}?
Yes, I am {PlayerName}.
We trust the words of the great hero {PlayerSurName}!\nMaybe we really misunderstood White Cloud Temple.
The great hero {PlayerSurName} wouldn't lie to me, would he?
It seems I was a bit rash.
You should apologize to the master quickly.
We acted rashly this time, please don't blame us, Taoist.
It's okay, it's not too late to pull the horse back from the cliff.
Thank you for helping White Cloud Temple out of the predicament, here is a manual for you as a token of my gratitude.
You're too kind, Taoist.
Who are you, and why should we believe what you say?
My name is {PlayerName}...
