Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}? Never heard of it.\nYou wouldn't happen to be in cahoots with this White Cloud Temple, would you?
Why don't you learn something good at such a young age?
Helping the tyrant...
I wonder how much money he got from inside!
Who reported the case, saying that this White Cloud Temple is deceiving people and collecting money?
Sir, we were all deceived by the Taoist priests of the White Cloud Temple!\nAnd this kid, he's in league with the White Cloud Temple, please, sir, stand up for us.
Young man, you've got guts!\nBring me the Taoist priests of the White Cloud Temple and this guy for a thorough interrogation!
Sir, let's talk it out!
Arresting people without asking right from wrong, is there no law left!
Oh, you dare to resist arrest!\nYou'll be sitting in jail for a long time!
Sir, please be generous!\nConsidering this young man's ignorance, don't stoop to his level.
Get out of the way, stay put!\nIf you dare to make a move, I'll charge the White Cloud Temple with harboring enemies and seal it off completely!
You dare to assault an officer!\nIt seems that there are indeed thieves hiding here, bring them all in!
Do you think they can still stand up?
Do you think calling more people can catch me?
Do you think that if you completely infuriate me, you can still walk out alive?
Sir, I was wrong.\nIt's all these damn troublemakers who misled me, I'll lock them all up!
Stop playing dead, get up and work!
You troublemakers!\nDaring to falsely accuse others, all of you follow me to the jail for a few days.
That's pretty straightforward...
Sir, are you satisfied with this handling?
Just tell those people not to bother the White Cloud Temple anymore, don't make it hard for them.
That's easy, I'll let them go on some pretext later.
Thank you for helping White Cloud Temple out of the predicament, here is a manual for you as a token of my gratitude.
Taoist priest, even if this matter is not the fault of the White Cloud Temple, isn't there a negligence?
So many people were deceived, didn't the White Cloud Temple have any prior knowledge?
Tolerating and indulging, how is this different from being in league with the evil path?
The White Cloud Temple's hundred-year reputation, I won't allow you, a young child, to slander it like this!
Taoist priest, I give in.
So the Taoist priest is so powerful!
Did I say anything excessive?
Fortunately, I didn't fight with the Taoist priest just now...
You all see, anyone who insults the reputation of the White Cloud Temple, the Taoist priest will fight to the death, so he will definitely not do anything that damages the Fame.
Besides, with the Taoist priest's skills, if it really comes to a fight, I'm afraid you'll be the ones to suffer.
Everyone, do you still insist that the White Cloud Temple give you an explanation?
Alas, we were indeed rash in this matter, and disturbed the Taoist priest's cultivation.\nLet's just let it go, we'll take our bad luck.
So the young hero has such good intentions, I thought you were deliberately slandering.
Thank you, young hero, for helping the White Cloud Temple out of the predicament. This swordsmanship insight is given to you as a token of gratitude for your help.
So the Taoist priest is so powerful!
Did I say anything excessive?
Fortunately, I didn't fight with the Taoist priest just now...
Alas, we were indeed rash in this matter, and disturbed the Taoist priest's cultivation.\nLet's just let it go, we'll take our bad luck.
Alas, I'll let you off for your ignorance and first offense, you Run away.
Sorry to disturb you, Taoist priest.
You're bold but not very capable, you even dare to assault an officer!\nTake him back and sentence him to ten or twenty years!
Hold on, officer, this young hero is implicated by me, he has nothing to do with this.\nPlease let him go, I will go back with you for investigation.
Hmph, fine. The monk may run away, but the temple can't. If he is really involved, it's not too late to catch him!
Taoist priest, please come with us.
Alright, the innocent will clear themselves.
Now that the evil Taoist has been brought to justice, we can report back to the White Cloud Temple's master.
I have successfully completed the task, the evil Taoist can no longer do evil in this life.
Indeed, heroes come from youth, you have helped me solve a big trouble.
It's nothing, just doing what is right.

Actually, I knew about that Taoist's deeds a long time ago, but I was afraid of the power behind Dirty Street and worried about retaliation against the White Cloud Temple, so I had to swallow my anger.
That Taoist was very cunning, not only impersonating the White Cloud Temple, but also often pretending to be disciples of other Taoist sects to deceive people, I don't know what his intentions were.

Now that the evil Taoist is gone, the White Cloud Temple no longer has to take the blame for others, this is great news.\nI have a swordsmanship manual to give to the young hero as a token of my gratitude.
Why aren't the gods of your White Cloud Temple effective? Isn't this a scam!
Boundless Heavenly Lord, what has caused you to speak so rudely?
My wife and I came to your temple to pray for a marriage bond years ago, because everyone said the gods in your White Cloud Temple are effective, so we donated a lot of incense money!
We prayed for the marriage bond and donated the incense money, so our marriage should be blessed by the gods in your temple!
But what happened? It's only been a few years, I was really blind and stupid to marry this idiot, this marriage is a complete mess, it's terrible!
Wife, don't say that, I've been working very hard, getting up early and working late every day, isn't it just to support the family?
You have the nerve to say that! With the little money you earn, when can you buy me jewelry, when can we live in a big house?!
I've had enough of this life, I want a divorce!
Please help me persuade my wife, she is angry now, she won't listen to anything I say...
As the saying goes, family ugliness should not be aired in public, how can you shout and scream in front of the gods, it's too undignified.
What the old man said is true...
Hmph, what kind of gods, they can't even bless a marriage, they don't deserve to enjoy the incense offerings!
Oh my, you've made a big joke!\nHow can you come here to pray for a marriage bond, you should go to the God of Marriage's Shrine, that's the proper place to pray for a marriage bond.
Old lady, is what you said true?
Why would I lie to you! We old couple have been respecting each other for decades, all because we received the blessing of the old moon at the God of Marriage's Shrine.
Where is the God of Marriage's Shrine? Old lady, tell me quickly!
It's in the southwest direction outside the city, there is a big pink tree there, it's easy to recognize.
You fool, if you don't want a divorce, hurry up and go to the God of Marriage's Shrine with me, this time we must get the blessing of the gods, I've had enough of this life!
Wife, slow down, wait for me——
This lady really has a fiery temper, I don't know if the old moon can bless her.
Oh, are you two here to pray for a marriage bond too?\nYou should go to the God of Marriage's Shrine to pray for a marriage bond, it's very effective there.
Old lady sees that you two are a good match, meeting today is fate, old lady will give you a small gift, wish you can also get the blessing of the old moon at the God of Marriage's Shrine.
Old woman, do we still need to do the important thing, don't delay the main business.
Oh yes, look at my memory, this important thing can't be delayed.
What brings you two old folks to the White Cloud Temple?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อะไรทำให้เจ้าเฒ่าสองคนมาที่อารามเมฆขาว?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Although we have been in love for decades, we have never had a child.\nI heard that the White Cloud Temple here is efficacious in granting wishes, so we came here to pray for a child...
Our temple is small and cannot accommodate great gods, so our powers are limited and may not be able to help you.
What a bullshit temple, can't grant children or blessings, just enjoying the incense offerings for nothing!
I must find that Taoist priest before it gets dark. I wonder if he still has any "Fertility Elixir" in stock. I'm willing to spend all my savings to buy one.
Old man, slow down, wait for me——
Although it is said that sincerity can move gods, this is an exception...
Master always says that moves are dead, but people are alive.\nA swordsman should not be confined to sword moves, but should adapt to the situation and the opponent.
It seems that I need to spar with others more to understand what Master meant.\nBut I don't know why, my junior brothers always avoid me when they see me...
Alright, I'll be merciful and spar with you a few rounds, how about that?
It's because you always pick fights...\nNot only do you want to fight twice, but you also show no mercy. If they lose, they will be looked down upon by you...
Guarding the Weapon Pavilion is really boring!\nWho dares to steal under Master's watch? I'm so bored that I have nothing to do all day. If I get the chance, shouldn't I have a good fight?
Your skills are still not mature enough to be of any help to me.\nIf your Sword skills were more advanced, or your strength was greater, perhaps you could help me.
Good idea! I'm sure I can learn a lot from you!
I feel like something is missing, let's try again when we have time!
No, no, you can't even take two moves, you can't help me like this.
Are you ready to spar with me?
I think I have some ideas... Come back when you have time to help me verify them!
So that's how it is!
Respond to changes with constancy, with One Sword Annihilation!!!
Thank you, junior brother {PlayerSurName}, for your help. I have found my own path.
Thank you, brother {PlayerSurName}, for your help. I have found my own path.
Congratulations, congratulations!\nSince I've helped you so much, don't refuse if I ask for your help in the future.
Of course, as long as it's not for evil purposes, I will definitely help!
You seem to be progressing rapidly, now you should be able to help.\nCome on, spar with me!
Don't disturb me for now, my martial arts are at a bottleneck, I need to break through as soon as possible.
Our Relations are not enough for me to accompany you.
Stay away from me, be careful not to be hurt by my sword qi!
After experiencing a few Inseparable trials in the Jianghu, perhaps my swordsmanship can break through to the next level!
There's no place for me in your team, you didn't even leave a spot for me.
Sigh——————
Such a long sigh.\nDid you encounter any difficulties, senior brother?
Such a long sigh.\nDid you encounter any troubles, Brother Ouye?
I'm sorry, I was thinking about something just now and didn't notice you came...
What's bothering you so much?
As you know, I practice the art of forging that combines the strengths of both the Langya Sword Pavilion and the Ouye family.
But as I delve deeper, I found that although the techniques of these two families seem to originate from the same source, their handling of certain Materials is completely different.

But I always feel that both sides have their merits and shortcomings.\nIf I could combine the strengths of both, my crafting skills could definitely improve, but I need the help of a noble person, otherwise it would be difficult to gather so many Materials.
What kind of noble person can help you?
It has to be someone who is good at <color=#c44b0e>Mining</color>, at least at the Expert level.
Do you think I can do it?\nMy MiningSkill should be considered Expert level, right?
How could I forget about you!\nNow I finally have a solution for the high-level Materials I need for crafting.
You're not going to use me as a laborer to supply you with Ore all the time, are you?
I just need your Skill to help me mine some rare Ore.\nBesides, with my help, if you want to improve your crafting Skill, it will be much easier.
Deal!
I'm powerless in this matter.
Has Senior Brother not found someone who is good at Mining yet?
Has Brother Ouye not found someone who is good at Mining yet?
Not yet... where can I find such a noble person...
I still have some important things to do, so I can't travel around with you.
Our Relations are not enough for me to accompany you.
If the ways are different, we can't plan together, I don't want to team up with you.
I hope that after this journey, my Skill can break through the bottleneck and reach a new level.
Your team has no reserved positions, so I can't join.
{yell} Stop!!!
This is a prison area, outsiders are not allowed to enter!
(What should I do to get in?)
{yell} There's a jailbreak!\nQuick, back up!!!
You dare to stop me, you're really overestimating yourselves.
Since you're so sensible, I won't make things difficult for you.\nGo ahead, but don't cause me any trouble.
It's {PlayerSurName}, I almost didn't recognize you!
You want to get into this Prison? That's a tough one.\nWell, for the sake of our relationship, I'll let you in, but don't cause me any trouble.
Stop!\nIs Duke Kang's manor a place for people like you to enter at will?
(What should I do to get in?)
{yell} There's a disturbance, come and help!
Kid, you dare to make a scene here, you're really tired of living!
Dare to stop me, you guys are really tired of living!\nIf you dare to stop me next time, I will really send you to meet the King of Hell!
For the sake of the silver, you can go in, I'll pretend I didn't see anything.
I can let you in, but don't mess around inside, if you annoy the Duke, I can't protect you.
Since you have a Hero Card, you are a distinguished guest in the mansion.\nPlease come in.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Stop, this is the General's mansion, no outsiders allowed!
(What should I do to get in?)
{yell} There's a disturbance, come on!
You choose not to take the road to heaven, but to break into hell!
Now you know how powerful I am, remember to avoid me next time you see me!
For the sake of the silver, you can go in, I'll pretend I didn't see anything.
Don't cause me any trouble when you go in, if you get me involved, don't blame me for turning against you.
How dare you! Who gave you the courage to stop me?

Every time I see the majestic figure of the young master, I can't help but feel AdmireHonored; I am fortunate to be the servant of the young master in this life, and I will die for the young master...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ทุกครั้งที่ข้าเห็นรูปร่างอันงดงามของจอมยุทธ์น้อย ข้าก็อดไม่ได้ที่จะรู้สึกชื่นชทให้เกียรติ; ข้าโชคดีที่ได้รับใช้ของจอมยุทธ์น้อยในชีวิตนี้ และข้าจะยอมตายเพื่อจอมยุทธ์น้อย...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alright, alright, shut your mouth!\n{PlayerSurName} is my brother, and also your half master, treat him as you would me in the future!
Yes, yes, yes.\nYoung master, {PlayerSurName} master, please come in.
{yell} Stop!!!
Who are you?\nIs the gate of the Ding family something that anyone can enter?
(What should I do to get in?)
{yell} Guards, there's trouble!
You dare to stop me, you're really overestimating yourselves.
Alright, alright, if you have the ability to be favored by the old master, and become the son-in-law, you will be half the master in the future, don't forget to take care of me then.
So it's {PlayerSurName} brother, I almost didn't recognize you!
If you have the ability to be favored by the old master, and become the son-in-law, you will be half the master in the future, don't forget to take care of your old brother then.
Who dares to disturb my sleep...
Bah, who dares to obstruct my official duties!
(Damn, this guy sleeps with his eyes open, who knows he's napping.)
General, I want to go into this tower to broaden my horizons...
Nonsense!\nThis Enlighten Tower is full of treasures, how can we let people like you in.
{yell} Boy, stop for the general!
General, I want to go into this tower to broaden my horizons...
Nonsense!\nThis Enlighten Tower is full of treasures, how can we let people like you in.
(What should I do to get in?)
{yell} Rebellion, openly attacking the general!
These people are rebels, kill them on the spot!
What treasures are in this tower, I have to go in and see for myself.
Boy, you're quite capable.\nSince you insist on going in to see, I hope you won't regret it later.
Given our Relations, I advise you not to go in!
What do you mean? Are you afraid of being punished by your superior for letting outsiders in?
I've said all I can, you take care of yourself.
Do you think that guy just now can make it?
There hasn't been a good fighter for so many days.
That guy just now has been in there for a long time, he might be able to make it.
If I were 40 years younger...
I wonder who will end up with the treasure.
Damn it, that was a hard hit...
Who cares about the treasure, I need to save my life!
Wow, he got beaten up pretty bad...
Heh heh, I told you he couldn't make it!
Sure enough, he came with high hopes and left disappointed.
Hero, would you like to buy some Healing medicine?
It's so lively here.
How can it not be lively, this tower climbing treasure hunt is now the hottest thing in Lin'an City.
What's this tower climbing treasure hunt all about?
How can you not know about such a big event?
I'm new here and don't know much about many things, could you please tell me?
Alright, there's nothing exciting going on right now, I'll tell you.
This Enlighten Tower was originally used to suppress the river tide, later it became a place for dignitaries to play and sightsee, ordinary people are not allowed to enter.

Recently, a big shot from the Imperial City Department visited the Enlighten Tower and set up a treasure hunt Arena, claiming that anyone who can reach the top floor will receive a priceless treasure and the opportunity to join the Imperial City Department.
I don't know what the Imperial City Department is, but if it can be listed alongside a priceless treasure as the final reward, it must not be bad.

We ordinary people only hear that the Imperial City Department is very powerful, even the royal family and relatives dare not provoke them, I heard that even Prince Kang Wang is very polite to that big shot.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คนธรรมดาอย่างพวกเราได้ยินเพียงว่าหน่วยมหาดเล็กวังหลวงมีอำนาจมาก แม้แต่ราชวงศ์และเครือญาติก็ไม่กล้ารบกวนพวกเขา ข้ายังได้ยินมาว่าแม้แต่องค์ชายคังหวังก็ยังต้องสุภาพด้วย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: In that case, I'm interested in trying my hand, maybe I can get a high position in the Imperial City Department.
Oh, that's good. If you become a high official in the future, I can also benefit from your good fortune.
I came here for this reason, I'll give it a try, maybe the treasure will be mine.
There's going to be a show~
If you want to participate in the treasure hunt, go talk to the general in front of the tower.
Thanks for the information.
General, I want to participate in this treasure hunt Arena.
Are you familiar with the rules of this Arena?\nThis Arena is not something you can win just by brute force.
I'm about to request the rules of the Arena from the general.
This Enlighten Tower has 6 floors, each floor has a gatekeeper, you can only enter the next floor after defeating the gatekeeper.
The rules don't sound special, just defeat the gatekeeper on each floor, right?
Nothing special? These gatekeepers are martial arts masters carefully selected by the commander, if you underestimate them, you will definitely suffer.
Are you sure you want to participate in the treasure hunt now?
Get out of the way, don't interfere with my work.
Go in quickly, the commander is waiting anxiously.
Good luck, young hero.
Oh, someone is going for the treasure again!
Come on!
Tsk, doesn't look as good as me.
You look weak, and you dare to challenge the Enlighten Tower?
We'll see.
It's hard to guard the first floor, all kinds of people come to fight, it's exhausting.
If you talk so much to everyone who comes to challenge, it will indeed be very hard.
Humph, I'll show you my power on the horse!
It's nothing great to beat me, I'm just the bottom of the barrel.\nThere are more powerful guys upstairs, if you're not afraid of getting beaten, just go upstairs.
I've finished my work for today, I'll take my leave.
You're really a low-level character, get out of here, don't get in the way.
Do you want to give up the treasure hunt?
Young hero {PlayerName}, I'm sorry, according to the rules, you need to have 6 people in your team to hunt for treasure, now you have violated the rules, please run away from the Enlighten Tower.
Finally, someone decent has come, I hope this will be an interesting fight!
You're an interesting guy, go upstairs.
By the way, let me remind you, the guy upstairs is much more powerful than me, you have to be careful~
You scared me!
Hahahaha——
Is that all you've got? It seems I can be wrong about people too.\nYou'd better go home and practice more, your current skills are not enough!
Someone's coming, you're in luck.
{yell}This guy is crazy, run——
What's going on?
The treasure belongs to me alone, you are not worthy!
If you have the ability, go challenge the next level, why are you competing with me? We are both challengers.
He just tried to blow up the stairs to the third floor, but I stopped him.
Blow up... indeed a despicable madman.
You rats are simply wasting my time, Blitz attack!
You are very powerful...
Wait until my swordsmanship is perfected, I will make you feel the pain from hell!
How are your injuries?
They are all superficial wounds, I won't die...
Come on, gatekeeper, I'm in a hurry.
Stop joking, you've driven that madman away, I admit I can't beat you, you've passed this level.
I don't know how many ribs were broken by that guy, I'm going to have to rest for several months now.
Alas, you really disappoint me, it seems that the madman you drove away is also mediocre.
What just happened downstairs?
A madman didn't want other challengers to climb the tower, he wanted to blow up the stairs, but I drove him away.
Since you say so, I suppose your skills won't disappoint me.
If I didn't have some skills, I wouldn't have reached the fourth floor of this Enlighten Tower.
Make your move, as long as you defeat me, you can go to the fifth floor.
I won't hold back, be careful!
Impressive, indeed there are always people better than oneself.\nPlease go to the fifth floor, young hero.
Yo~ I thought the person who could reach the fifth floor must have some extraordinary abilities, but it turns out to be a green kid.
I originally thought the fifth floor gatekeeper would either be a handsome gentleman or a heroic woman, but it turns out to be neither male nor female.
You little kid, you are good at verbal fights, if I have the chance in the future, I will definitely take you back to the palace and train you well.
I don't want to waste words with you, a disgusting person, let's fight quickly!
You are really impatient, but I like it.
Now that I've won, you can get lost, I feel uncomfortable seeing you.
Don't be too proud too early, the commander won't be as soft-hearted as me!
You are still a kid after all, your Amateurish Strike can't catch the commander's eye.
Finally someone has reached the sixth floor, it's worth my long wait.
{PlayerName}! It's you, this is beyond my expectation.
Tong Daofu, so you are the big shot from the Imperial City Department!
In the Imperial City Department, I am the most respected, the power of the Imperial City Department is second only to one person and above all others...
I fought all the way here, not to listen to your bragging about the Imperial City Department.
Good, let me see how much your martial arts have improved, {PlayerSurName} young hero!
Now that I have reached the top, should the reward be fulfilled?
Oh, there are still people in the martial arts world who don't know me, I'm so sad.

I am the commander of the Imperial City Department - Tong Daofu, in the Imperial City Department, I am the most respected, the power of the Imperial City Department is second only to one person and above all others...
I fought all the way here, not to listen to your bragging about the Imperial City Department.\nSo how can I get that priceless treasure?
Want a treasure? That's easy.\nLet's see what you, who have reached the sixth floor of the Enlighten Tower, are capable of!
Huh, I didn't expect you to be so mediocre, it's disappointing.\nThose lazy guys on the first five floors must have let you through.
Guards, kick this kid out of the Enlighten Tower!\nThe previous five tower guards are banished to the wilderness, unforgivable till death!
I don't know which bastard pissed off the commander, the treasure hunt in the tower is cancelled, you all can leave, there's no more excitement.
Who's so unkind, I won't let him off
What, no more excitement?
I haven't participated yet, how can it end
The commander is as capricious as a woman
Disperse, disperse
...What a handsome kung fu!
I concede!\nThis priceless treasure...
I always keep my word. The treasure of the Enlighten Tower is in that box over there. Here's the key, you can take the treasure.

{PlayerName}, would you like to join Duke Ji's manor and work for Qi Wang?

Yes, Duke Qi is being watched closely by those people from Yan country, otherwise I wouldn't have to come this far to put on this bad show!
Qi Wang? He's just a dependant who bows and scrapes to the Yan people, {PlayerName}, you can't listen to this eunuch's nonsense!
Miss Ye, I didn't ask for your opinion, you better stand aside.
Bah, he's just a puppet being manipulated!\nIf he really had the intention, he would have sent troops to fight those Yan dogs long ago!
You reckless kid, you only know how to charge like a mad bull, how can you understand how Duke Qi bears humiliation and tastes hardship?
Old monster, believe it or not, I'll smash you with a hammer!
{PlayerName}, your father's last wish was to drive out the barbarians and restore the country, and you agreed at the time. If you listen to this eunuch, you are a traitor!

Oh, I thought it was someone else, isn't this the young master of the Yang family?\nIt seems that those who arrested your Yang family back then were really useless, they didn't cut the grass and remove the roots, leaving a little trouble.
You dare to disrespect my father! My father was loyal to the country, but was framed, how can you, a eunuch, point fingers here!

{PlayerName}, our family is waiting for your answer. Think about it, once Qi Wang's plan is successful, you will be above everyone else! As long as you agree, the wealth and glory of the rest of your life are within easy reach.
Duke Qi is weak and willing to work for the Yan people, it's obvious to everyone.
If I were to join Duke Qi, wouldn't I be a dog to a dog? That's worse than a dog!
I'll take a step back, {PlayerName}, you are one of the few young talents who can catch my eye, our Imperial City Department is recruiting talents from all over the world, would you like to join us?
The Imperial City Division sounds impressive, but the one in charge is not a real man.\nI wonder if staying inside for a long time will make you neither male nor female like you?
{PlayerName}, I have been tolerating you because I see you as a talent. I didn't expect you to not appreciate my kindness and keep insulting me. Do you really think I'm easy to bully?
Prince Qi Wang instructed me, if this person can be recruited, recruit him. If he can't be recruited, even if he is destroyed, he can't be used by others!
{PlayerName}, you are here, just like a turtle in a jar, a meat on the case. You can take your arrogance and go on your way!
You think you can take me down with this little skill?\nHave you been sitting in the position of the commander of the Imperial City Division for too long, and your brain is not working well?
Hehehehe——
Kid, you're still too green.\nI am the commander of the Imperial City Division, how could I have only this trick.
Do you have any other tricks?
{yell} Come here, kill him for me!
Tsk, how is this brat so powerful...
Kid, you offended me, just wait for your ten clans to be implicated!
The things in this box are finally mine!
This box has been tampered with and a gunpowder fuse has been installed, luckily I'm good at cracking machinery!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Whether it's luck or skill, I can tell at a glance, you don't need to be modest.
Although the Hero Convention has ended, there will be a Peak Swordsmanship Tournament here. If you are interested, you are always welcome.
Peak Swordsmanship? What are the rules, tell me about it?
The Peak Swordsmanship Tournament is arguably the biggest event in the martial arts world today.\nAll participants are top-notch martial artists from various sects or wandering the world.
The tournament is open all day, with no time limit.\nIt is divided into three levels, suitable for martial artists of different skills.
First is the "Shrimp" level, only the top disciples and young talents of each sect are eligible to participate.
Next is the "Chief" level, those eligible to participate in this level are all well-known in the martial arts world, or are heroes who can dominate one side.
Finally, there is the "Grandmaster" level, as the name suggests, only those who can establish their own sects are eligible to participate.
The competition method is the same as the Hero Convention, using an elimination system. If you can win <color=#c44b0e>ten</color> games in a row, you will be the leader of the current level.
However, if you are unlucky and fail to win, it doesn't matter, both the runner-up and the third place can get Swordsmanship Tokens that can be used to exchange for some rare materials.
Do you have any other questions?

You are indeed a reasonable and understanding person!
If you can save me, the <color=#c44b0e>10 taels of silver</color> on me will be yours.
(Should I agree to his request?)
Please take my token and inform General Lu to come and save me as soon as possible.\nI entrust my life and all my possessions to you!
Alas... it seems I am destined to die here.
Your heroic act of eliminating the Blue Wind Camp has truly moved me!\nYou are indeed a promising young hero!
Oh, you flatter me.
I was tricked by these bandits and ended up in this predicament.\nNow that the Blue Wind Camp has been destroyed, please let me out.
Of course.
Thank you for your help, Righteous. I will definitely spread your good name once I escape.
Hey, you don't even know my name, how can you spread my good name?
My apologies, may I ask for your name?
I am {PlayerName}!
Ah, {PlayerName}, a good name!\nI will remember it and I promise to keep my word.
Do you need anything?
(Should I tell him about the official who was tied up at the Blue Wind Camp?)
What did you say!\nHe actually joined the Blue Wind Camp?
What evidence do you have to make me believe you?\nSlandering a court official is a serious crime, you can't afford it!
Here is his Official seal!\nHe said he was tired of being an official and wanted to be a bandit for a few days, so he casually threw away his Official seal.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือตราประทับทางการ!\nเขาบอกว่าเขาเบื่อที่จะเป็นข้าราชการและอยากเป็นโจรสักสองสามวัน เขาก็เลยโยนตราประทับอย่างเป็นทางการทิ้งไป

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: This is indeed his Official seal!\nSince he disregards the dignity of the court, don't blame me for punishing him for colluding with bandits!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือตราประทับทางการของเขาจริงๆ!\nในเมื่อเขาไม่คำนึงถึงศักดิ์ศรีของศาล อย่าโทษฉันที่ลงโทษเขาที่สมรู้ร่วมคิดกับโจร!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}, to preserve the dignity of the court, I order you to go to the Blue Wind Camp and eliminate this official who colludes with bandits, and enforce justice!
There will be a great reward afterwards, but you must not leak any information.
Yes, sir!
Although I don't believe what you said, this Official seal is undoubtedly genuine...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: แม้ว่าข้าจะไม่เชื่อสิ่งที่คุณพูด แต่ตราประทับทางการอันนี้เป็นของแท้อย่างไม่ต้องสงสัย...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Here's what, I'll give you a squad of soldiers, you go and rescue that useless official.\nIf you can rescue him, there will be a great reward. If you can't, don't show up in front of me again!
If you were not my man, I would have kicked you out.\nBut I trust my people, since you said so, it must be true.
Here's what, I'll give you a squad of soldiers, you go and rescue that useless official.\nIf you can rescue him, there will be a great reward. If you can't, don't show up in front of me again.
How dare you, slandering a court official is a serious crime!
I'll let you off this time considering your youth and ignorance.\nIf you dare to do it again, I will punish you severely!
You are incorrigible!\nGuards, kick this man out of the General's mansion!
How dare you, acting so recklessly in front of me, do you intend to assassinate me!

I, a humble citizen, dared to ask for help for the official who fell into the bandit's den, but now I am misunderstood by the general.\nIn that case, let that official fend for himself, I will take my leave.
Why act so impulsively, young hero?\nJust now, this general was merely testing you. After all, this is a matter of great importance and must be handled with caution.

{PlayerSurName}Young hero, this general entrusts you to lead a team of soldiers to the Blue Wind Camp for a rescue mission.\nOnce the mission is accomplished, this general will reward you accordingly.
Alright, I'll do my best.
What a presumptuous stray cat and dog daring to run wild in the General's mansion, you're asking for it!
If the general doesn't believe my words, are we really going to let those officials in distress fend for themselves?
{PlayerName}You have good intentions, you may leave if there's nothing else.
Get lost, this general's time is not to be wasted on the likes of you.
Damn, I accidentally killed him...\nI haven't even gotten the money yet, this is a big loss...
It turns out to be the official I saved ten days ago, he really kept his promise and sent 50 taels of money.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, General Lu has ordered us to follow your command.\nWhat should we do now, please give your orders.
{PlayerSurName}General, we are all under your command.\nWhat should we do now, please give your orders.
{PlayerName}!\nI can't believe you're colluding with the court, I must be blind!
Leader, as long as you release the captured official, I will speak well of you in front of General Lu and spare your life.
That dog official is already dead, I don't mind sending you on your way too!
Shut your damn mouth!\nToday, I'm going to clean house myself!
Leader, this Blue Wind Camp is always against the court, it will be wiped out sooner or later.\nWe've known each other for a while, why not give this fortune to me.
Shut your damn mouth!\nToday, I'm going to clean house myself!
It's really lively in the stronghold today.\nBrothers, the court has sent people to deliver weapons to us again, let's give them a warm welcome.
Sir, come out, the Blue Wind Camp has been wiped out, you are free now.
It took you so long to rescue me, you're useless!
Hmph, back to the mansion!
Releasing such a person is a disaster, I should have killed him in the chaos just now.
This time I failed to rescue the official, I don't know how General Lu will punish me, I can only leave it to fate.
Yes, sir!

Under your instruction, the soldiers set fire to the trees around the stronghold.
The fire grew bigger and bigger, gradually surrounding and engulfing the entire Blue Wind Camp.
The heart-wrenching screams came from the direction of the Blue Wind Camp.
An hour later, apart from the sound of the fire burning everything, no other sound could be heard.
In this man-made fire, no one could escape.
The unknown Blue Wind Camp silently ended in this fire...
The mission is completed, let's go back to report, goodbye.
Yes, sir!
Under your instruction, a group of soldiers quietly sneaked into the Blue Wind Camp.\nAll the bandits guarding outside the house were cleanly killed.
The mission is completed, let's go back to report, goodbye.
Hero, over here, come here!
What's this noise again?
Hero, when will General Lu come to rescue me?
The general asks you to be patient, he will rescue you when the time is right.
Could General Lü be planning to sacrifice the pawn to save the king?\nI don't want to die, I still have a bright future, I haven't enjoyed enough of my beautiful wives and concubines...
Sacrifice the pawn to save the king? Do you know something?
No! Nothing at all, you heard wrong!
How did you get this PrisonKey?\nSo you mean I can Run away from this damn place on my Horse!
(This little official wants me to save him, but General Lü wants me to kill him, what should I do?)
What!!!\nHow is that possible, General Lü wouldn't do that!
Do you know something about him? Is he worried about leaks and wants to get rid of you?
This...
General Lü promised me a great reward for accomplishing this task.\nI'm not interested in any secrets between you two, the more I know, the shorter I live.
Wait, isn't it all about money!
I have plenty of money, as long as you let me Run away, not only will I give you 10 taels on the spot, but I will also give you <color=#c44b0e>50 taels</color> in 10 days!
(Considering he's willing to pay for his life, should I let him Run away?)
I can let you Run away, but whether you can escape or not depends on your own ability.
Thank you, young hero, thank you!\nI promise you that the reward I promised will not be less!
Although there's money to be made, how am I going to explain this to General Lü...
I'm sorry, but I don't want to offend General Lü.\nSo I have to send you to the afterlife.
Lü Wenhuan, you despicable man, you actually want to kill to silence!
Lü Wenhuan is actually in cahoots with...
Uh--
The task is done, it's time to go back for the reward.\nI hope everything goes smoothly and there are no hitches.
Young hero, how did you get in?
Do you really need to bother General Lü with such a small matter?\nThe prison door is already open, you should hurry up and leave.
Are you kidding me!\nYou're asking me to go out now, isn't that suicide?
Just be careful not to be discovered by them, I don't have time to protect you.
No, no, I'd rather wait here for reinforcements.
If you want to wait, then wait, but if the reinforcements don't come, don't blame me.
Thank God, I really don't want to stay in this ghost place for a moment longer.
Hey, did you forget something?
Hehe, I won't forget, I won't forget.\nThe reward I promised you will not be less.
You officials really have money, I can't earn a few pennies even if I work my ass off.
What's the big deal, it's just the cost of a meal.
Oh~ You're getting rid of me with the cost of a meal, isn't this reward mismatched with your status?
I misspoke, I misspoke.\nYoung man, we'll meet again.
Why hasn't General Lü's reinforcements arrived yet...
The prison door is already open, why are you still waiting for his reinforcements? You should hurry up and leave.
How did the task I assigned you to Blue Wind Camp go?
Hmm, very good.\nAs the saying goes, a dying man's words are good, did he say anything before he died?
It seems he said something, but he died before he could finish.
I see...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อย่างนี้นี่เอง...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {yell} Help, there's an assassin!
What do you mean by this!
I can't trust you, General. Maybe you've been in cahoots with him all along!\nOnly when you're dead can I truly be at ease.
Hehehe, do you dare to kill me, General?
Let me tell you, the Iron Army of Yan Kingdom will soon march south. Without me, the hundreds of thousands of people in Chuxiang City will be reduced to ashes.
Damn it, using this to threaten me, what should I do?
Go to hell!
Uh--
Sooner or later, you will all accompany me in death...
For the people of Chuxiang City, I will spare your life. I hope you will behave yourself!\nFrom now on, we will not interfere with each other!
{PlayerName}, you handled this matter very well, I am very satisfied.\nI always reward and punish clearly, this is your reward.
Missing?\nYou let him go, didn't you?
This...
Do you know what kind of person I hate the most in my life?
The last person who tried to deceive me, his grave grass should be half a person high now.
So what if I do?
I think, you should go and keep them company!
Report to me after the matter is resolved!
Well... forget it, I won't argue with you anymore.
What are you still doing here? Waiting for me to reward you?
Oh, I was wondering why I was restless in the middle of the night, turns out a handsome young man is passing by my door~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อุ๊ย ข้าสงสัยอยู่ว่าเหตุไฉนข้าจึงนอนไม่หลับในค่ำคืนนี้ ที่ไหนได้ มีหนุ่มน้อยรูปงามคนหนึ่งกำลังผ่านประตูบ้านของข้านี่เอง~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young master, I'm alone at home in the middle of the night, I can't sleep because I'm scared~\nWhy don't you come into my room and give me some courage~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คุณชาย ข้าอยู่บ้านคนเดียวในยามค่ำคืนเช่นนี้ มันช่างเงียบเหงาและน่ากลัวเหลือเกิน~ \nเหตุใดท่านจึงไม่เข้ามาห้องของข้าแล้วมอบความกล้าให้ข้าเสียหน่อยล่ะเจ้าค่ะ~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Is there no one else in your house?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่มีใครสักคนอยู่ในบ้านของเจ้าเลยหรอ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You're joking, young master. Who in the city doesn't know that my husband passed away from illness three years ago?\nThese three years, I have been alone, living a lonely life...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ท่านกำลังล้อเล่นอยู่สินะคุณชาย ในเมืองนี้มีใครบ้างที่ไม่รู้ว่า สามีข้าเสียไปเพราะอาการป่วยเมื่อสามปีที่แล้วกันล่ะ?\nสามปีนี้ ข้าใช้ชีวิตคนเดียวอย่างโดดเดี่ยว อ้างว้างเหลือเกิน...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alas, it's all your fault, young master, for bringing up my sad past. You have to take responsibility!\nCome in and talk to me.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: โธ่เอ๊ย ทั้งหมดนี้เป็นความผิดของท่านนะคุณชาย ที่ทำให้ข้าต้องเอ่ยถึงอดีตอันแสนเศร้า ท่านต้องมีส่วนรับผิดชอบ! ตามเข้ามาคุยกับข้าเดี๋ยวนี้เลยนะเจ้าค่ะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (What... should I do?)
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ("ข้า...ควรทำเช่นไรดี?")

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Tsk, all you talk about is morality, it's so boring.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เชอะ พูดแต่เรื่องศีลธรรมอยู่ได้ น่าเบื่อชะมัด

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: To avoid idle talk, I'd better stay away from this house.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงเรื่องไร้สาระ ข้าควรอยู่ให้ห่างจากบ้านหลังนี้เสียดีกว่า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young master, you're back? I knew you couldn't forget about me.\nYou must be tired from working all day, come in and rest your feet~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คุณชาย ท่านกลับมาแล้วหรือเจ้าค่ะ? ข้ารู้ว่าท่านยังคงมิอาจลืมข้าไปได้ ท่านคงเหนื่อยล้าจากการงานมาทั้งวันแล้วกระมัง \nเชิญเข้ามาพักผ่อนก่อนสักครู่เจ้าค่ะ~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (Here we go again, what should I do?)
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: (อีกแล้วหรือเนี่ย ข้าควรทำอย่างไรดี)

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Please come in, young master~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เชิญท่านเข้ามาด้านในเจ้าค่ะคุณชาย~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}, we're not interested in entering a widow's house in the middle of the night, we'll wait for you outside.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerName} พวกเราไม่ประสงค์ที่จะเข้าเรือนหม้ายในยามวิกาล พวกเราจะรอเจ้าอยู่ข้างนอก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young master, you have a strong physique~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คุณชาย ท่านมีร่างกายที่บึกบึนมากเลย~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: It's this kid!\nI saw him sneaking around Widow Liu's house, I knew he was up to no good!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าเด็กนี่แหละ! ข้าเห็นเขาแอบๆย่องๆมองๆอยู่รอบๆ เรือนแม่หม้ายหลิว ข้าคิดไว้อยู่แล้วล่ะว่าเขาต้องมีเจตนาไม่ดี!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: No, no, it was her——
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่ ไม่ มันเป็นนางนั่นแหละที่——

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Officer, please help me!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ท่านเจ้าหน้าที่เจ้าค่ะ โปรดช่วยข้าด้วย!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I was about to go to bed when this man suddenly broke into my house and forced me to share the bed with him.\nIf it weren't for you officers coming in, I might have...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในขณะที่ข้ากำลังจะเข้านอน ทันใดนั้น ชายผู้นี้ก็บุกเข้ามาในบ้านข้าและบังคับให้ข้าร่วมหลับนอนกับเขา หากไม่ใช่เพราะท่านเจ้าหน้าที่เข้ามาช่วย ข้าก็คงจะ...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You sure know how to change your tune.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้านี่ช่างรู้จักเปลี่ยนท่าทีได้ไวเสียจริง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kid, the evidence is clear. According to the laws of our dynasty, breaking into a widow's house at night is a crime punishable by imprisonment!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เด็กน้อย หลักฐานชัดเจนยิ่งนัก ตามกฎมณเฑียรบาลของเรา การบุกรุกเข้าไปในเรือนของหญิงหม้ายในยามวิกาล ถือเป็นโทษหนักต้องจำคุก!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Hey, if you don't want to go to jail, you'd better pay the fine now!\nThere are so many witnesses here, you can't win this lawsuit no matter how far you take it.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เฮ้ย! หากเจ้าไม่อยากนอนตาราง รีบจ่ายค่าปรับมาเดี๋ยวนี้! \nมีพยานพบเห็นเหตุการณ์อยู่ที่นี่มากมาย เจ้าไม่มีทางที่รอดตัวไปได้หรอก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (I can't afford to lose face as a hero... What should I do?)
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: (ข้ามิอาจยอมให้เสียหน้าในยุทธภพได้... ข้าควรทำเช่นไรดี?)

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You must be tired from wandering around, young master.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ท่านคงต้องอ่อนล้าจากการออกเดินทางอยู่เป็นแน่สินะ คุณชาย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Oh, my dear heavens!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: โอ้ ขอบคุณสวรรค์!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You're finally here——
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในที่สุดท่านก็มาเสียที——

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Fine, you're sensible. I'll let you off this time, now get lost!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ดี ในเมื่อเจ้าสำนึกแล้ว ข้าจะปล่อยเจ้าไปสักครั้ง ตอนนี้ก็ไปให้พ้นซะ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I just suffered a big loss, I'd better not ask for trouble.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าเพิ่งพบกับความสูญเสียครั้งใหญ่ ไม่ควรหาเรื่องให้ตัวเองต้องลำบาก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Tsk, with such little skill, you dare to fight? You're really making me laugh!
I'm sorry, here's the money, I won't dare to do it again.
Why suffer a beating when you could have paid earlier? You're really asking for trouble.\nGet out of here now.
Stop hitting me, I know I was wrong.\nThis is all the money I have on me, it's all yours.
Tsk, is this all the money you have? It's not even enough to fill my teeth!
Well, since I can't get any money today, I might as well beat you up to vent my anger!
<size=200%>No, don't——!</size>
With your level of skill, you dare to play the Immortal Jump?\nShame on you as law enforcers, knowingly breaking the law, isn't this a double crime?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: พวกเจ้ามีฝีมือแค่นี้ ยังกล้ามาหลอกลวงข้างั้นหรอ？พวกเจ้าช่างน่าละอายในฐานะผู้รักษากฏหมายเสียจริง \nจงใจละเมิดกฏหมายเองซะได้ นี่ไม่ใช่ความผิดร้ายแรงกว่าเดิมดอกหรือ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Young Master, how dare you come to find me...
I don't know why, I just came in inexplicably...
You again? Don't you have any memory?
Does this kid have a masochistic addiction?
We have a profit, not a loss.
Since you already have Experience, I won't waste words, be conscious and pay up.
What should I do?
Young Master, please sleep at my place tonight...
(She glared at you, shook her head and sighed, standing far away)
{PlayerName} Young hero, you are young but have achieved so much, your future is limitless.
I, Ding, have no son, only a daughter, who is the apple of my eye.\nNow my daughter is at the age of marriage, but there is no young master in Chuxiang City who is worthy of her.
Wait, you're not planning to—

The young hero is talented and handsome, and my daughter is a beauty. They are a perfect match.\n{PlayerName} If the young hero doesn't mind, I, Ding, would like to take you as my son-in-law, which would also ease my worries.
This lifelong matter can't be decided hastily, let me think about it.
I, Ding, am not in a hurry, the young hero can take his time to consider.
My daughter has suffered a misfortune, I, Ding, will definitely investigate the murderer and avenge her!
I, Ding, will give you money, but you must ensure that my daughter is not harmed.
I hope you can keep your promise and return my daughter safely as soon as possible...
Such a shameless person actually wants to marry into my Ding family, could it be that you are coveting my property? I, Ding, will never entrust my daughter to someone like you, give up this idea!
{PlayerName}Young hero, would you be willing to marry into my Ding family?
The Ding family is quite wealthy, marrying into the Ding family would at least not worry about money. The daily expenses of the young hero will be provided by the Ding family.
There is even a secret chamber in the house, filled with countless gold, which is also to be handed over to the son-in-law to manage.

If you form a good relationship with my daughter, you can still travel around, but <color=#c44b0e>don't have too much contact with other girls, otherwise you will be punished by the ancestors of the Ding family!</color>
Please think about it, young hero.
A good son-in-law is hard to find, I will wait here for your answer.
Even so, let's drop the matter, I won't mention it again.
This is a great joy!
I need some time to prepare for the wedding banquet, the auspicious time is set <color=#c44b0e>after Xu Shi and before Zi Shi</color>, please don't forget, son-in-law!
Don't worry, son-in-law, the auspicious time is set <color=#c44b0e>after Xu Shi and before Zi Shi</color>, there is still some time.
Sir, according to the rules, we can't see each other before we get married...
Being able to accompany you in this life, I am satisfied.
Would you be willing to accompany me for a lifetime, sir...
After getting married, sir, don't go flirting with other women, otherwise...
Congratulations on your new marriage!
The auspicious time has come, the wedding banquet is about to begin, I should be the only one missing.\nIt's not too late to back out now, do you decide to marry into the Ding family?
You have fulfilled your wish to marry into the Ding family, and finally have a place to settle down after half a lifetime of wandering.

Son-in-law, now that you have married into the Ding family, you can know the secret of the Ding family:\n<color=#c44b0e>Turning the two vases in the room can open the secret chamber of the Ding family.</color> From now on, it's up to you to manage.
Son-in-law, don't forget my advice to you, you are a married man, don't have ambiguous relationships with those women in the rivers and lakes, be careful of backlash!
You vaguely feel the complex gazes of the guests, jealousy, ridicule, hatred...
You face it calmly, because this is your own choice, you know the warmth and coldness.
Now is the auspicious time! Don't delay, the wedding banquet starts now!
The auspicious time has come! Don't delay, the wedding banquet starts now!
This is the key to the entrance of the secret chamber mentioned by my father-in-law, let me try it.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือกุญแจสู่ทางเข้าห้องลับที่พ่อตาของข้าพูดถึง, ไหนข้าขอลองดูหน่อยสิ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Husband, this is your home from now on.\nFrom now on, I am yours, you must not let me down.
Husband, how can you bring other women home?\nHave you forgotten my father's advice? Don't let down our Ding family!
Husband, I feel that you are getting colder and colder towards me, did I do something wrong?
Husband, this is the meal I cooked today, taste it and see how it is.
Husband, keep these drinks on you, they might come in handy when you visit friends.
Husband, how can you go out without money?\nKeep this money, don't spend it recklessly.
Husband, you have ambitions, I can't accompany you, I just hope you take care of yourself.
Husband, you must be tired after a day outside?\nIt's getting late, do you want to sleep at home tonight?
Take care of yourself, my lord. Don't overwork yourself.
A night has passed...
{PlayerName}, you dare to come back!
An eye for an eye, I have reported to the authorities, today I must avenge my father!
Do you have anything else to say?
I have nothing to say, if you want to kill me, just do it.\nIt's our fault for trusting you, a beast in human skin!
(What should I do?)
Father, your daughter has failed you...
We were once husband and wife, I don't want to be so ruthless.\nNext time I won't be merciful, don't bother me again.
{yell}{PlayerName}, I don't want to see you again!
This case only involves {PlayerName}, anyone else who interferes will be guilty as {PlayerName}!
Come at me all together, if I'm afraid of you, I'm not {PlayerName}!
{PlayerName}! You have committed a capital crime, the evidence is conclusive, if you resist, there is only one way to death!
{PlayerName} young hero, today is a special day, besides the regular arena, there is another Arena.
Another Arena? What kind of Arena is this?
A powerful figure is holding a martial arts competition for marriage here.
A powerful figure is holding a martial arts competition for marriage?\nTell me, how does this martial arts competition for marriage work?
The rules are similar to the Arena competition, you need to defeat ten competitors in a row, and pass the test of that powerful figure, then you can win the beauty.
This <color=#c44b0e> martial arts competition for marriage is held from Si Shi to You Shi every day</color>, and the regular arena will not stop.
In addition, the host is generous, so there is no registration fee for the competition, but each person only has one chance to participate, if eliminated, they cannot continue to register.
Did you hear that clearly?
What do you think? Are you interested in participating in this martial arts competition for marriage?
If {PlayerName} young hero is interested in this martial arts competition for marriage, please register with me during Si Shi to You Shi. If you miss the time, you will miss the chance of marriage.
Good! I wish you success!
Alas, it's a pity, it seems this marriage is not destined for me.
No, I can't just leave like this, at least I have to see the beauty of this young lady!
{yell} Who else is not convinced!
Congratulations to this hero for becoming the final winner of the martial arts competition for marriage!
What are we waiting for, bring out my future wife, let me kiss her.
What a cute girl!\nIt's a pity, a beautiful flower is stuck on cow dung.
Congratulations to this hero for winning the first place!\nWhether you can marry my daughter in the end, you still need to pass my daughter's test.
My daughter's test?\nCould this girl be the powerful figure the host mentioned?
Test? What a hassle, no test is a problem for me.
As long as the hero can take a punch from my daughter, he has passed my daughter's test.
What kind of test is this, it's too obvious that she's going easy on me.
Just one punch, simple, let the girl hit me!
Just being punched by such a weak girl, this guy is really lucky...
Be careful, brave man, it might hurt a bit...
Come on, pretty lady, after this punch, we'll go and worship heaven and earth!
Stop it~
What just happened! One palm, just one palm and this big guy was sent flying?!
Miss, why don't you hold back at all...
He just mentioned worshipping heaven and earth, and couldn't control himself...
I, I think I just saw my dead mother...
Did it hurt you?
{yell} You, you, you, don't come over!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {yell} เจ้า เจ้า เจ้าอย่าเข้ามานะ!

Mother...
Miss, you've made such a big fuss, you should have had enough fun.\nLet's go back to Lin'an with the old servant, the master should not force you anymore.
Well... okay, at worst we'll sneak out again.
Who would have thought that this young lady, who looks so delicate, is so powerful.\nIndeed, you can't judge a book by its cover...
Congratulations to {PlayerSurName} young hero for winning the first place, this is my young lady.
(What a cute girl, this is a real bargain!)
I, {PlayerName}, have seen the young lady.
{PlayerSurName} Young master, may you be blessed.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Whether the young master can finally have the honor of marrying my young lady depends on the young lady's test.
The young lady's test?\nCould it be that this young lady is the big shot mentioned by the host?
As long as you can take a punch from the young lady, you will be the new master of the old servant.
It's so obvious that you're going easy on me, how can I be so shameless.
Be careful, young master, it might hurt a bit...
Hurt???
My apologies!
Such a strong force, if it weren't for my sturdy body, I would have been blown away just now.
Young master, did it hurt you?
No, it didn't hurt, it's nothing!
Young master is really capable, he is indeed worthy of the young lady!
Wait, what's going on, why is your young lady so strong...

Young master, you have passed the young lady's test, now there is only one last step left.\nThe young master needs to present <color=#c44b0e>20 taels of betrothal gifts</color> to show his sincerity, so that the old servant can entrust the young lady to you with peace of mind.
Wait, did you just avoid my question?\nAnd you're asking for money as soon as you open your mouth, you're not a scammer, are you?

Don't worry, young master, the old servant has no such intention, and our family is not short of money.\nIt's just that the young lady has been pampered all her life, and the old servant is afraid that she will suffer with the young master.
(What should I do now?)
This... young hero, can I have a word with you...
Actually, the young lady looks delicate, but she has Herculean strength and can't control herself, often accidentally hurting people.
The fact that the young master could take the young lady's punch is a sign of destiny...
What are you whispering about, can you include me?
Ahem, about the betrothal gift...
The young master is wealthy, and the young lady should not live a poor life with the young hero.\nThe old servant has a <color=#c44b0e>Lucky pill</color> here, as a gift to the two of you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นายน้อยมีฐานะร่ำรวย และหญิงสาวไม่ควรมีชีวิตที่ย่ำแย่กับจอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม\nคนรับใช้เก่ามี <color=#c44b0e>โอสถโชคสวรรค์</color> อยู่ที่นี่ เป็นของขวัญให้กับท่านทั้งสอง

Well...
Young master...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์น้อย...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Miss, you're here, we've been looking for you!
Miss, the prince misses you very much and hopes you can return to the mansion soon.
He doesn't miss me at all, he just wants me to marry that Lu guy, I don't want to.
Miss... the prince has his difficulties...
I don't care, if he wants to marry, let him marry himself.
The prince already knows about your martial arts competition for marriage here.
The prince ordered, if the princess refuses to return, I can only arrest all these related people to prevent them from spreading rumors and damaging the prince and the princess's fame.
What if he doesn't come?
If he doesn't come, it means that he is not the right match for the princess, and the lady doesn't need to worry about it.
In that case, I'll listen to you.
Young master, I'm sure you understand the situation now.\nThe lady can't go with you for now, this old servant needs to accompany her back to Lin'an to handle some matters.
Explain yourself! Who are you guys?
Lin'an City·Duke Kang's manor, the lady is Fuqing Junzhu.\nIf the young hero is fond of the lady, please come to Duke Kang's manor to propose marriage as soon as possible.
{PlayerSurName} Young master...
Congratulations! Oh my, I didn't expect that she is the princess of Duke Kang's manor!\nThe son-in-law is really lucky, don't forget to take care of me in the future!
I've given the betrothal gifts, I won't give up.\nIsn't it just Duke Kang's manor? Princess, wait for me!
Miss, listen to this old servant.
Are you serious, young master?
I was a bit interested at first, but with all the fighting and paying, I've lost interest.
I'll just consider today as a day for exercise, let's forget about the marriage proposal.
You...you...
Young man, what you're doing is not right.
What's the right way then?
Everyone in the city knows this is a martial arts competition for marriage, you won, of course, you should marry her.
I don't want to marry, if you like her, you can marry her.
Sigh...
Let's go, I want to go back.
Princess, sigh, alright...
Huh? Why am I lying here?
What happened?
Young hero, you're finally awake, you were knocked out by the lady's punch, I was afraid something happened to you.
A punch... I seem to remember...
Where are they?
That old steward saw that you couldn't even take a punch, he sighed and ran away with the lady.
Sigh, the good marriage that was within reach flew away...
Are you {PlayerName}? I've heard of your name and know your abilities.\nBut if you think I will let the princess marry you, it's a pipe dream!
Tell me, what do I have to do for you to agree to this marriage?
If you are sincere, bring me the treasure from the top of the Enlighten Tower.\nIf you can do it, I will recognize you as my brother-in-law.
You are a prince, isn't everything within your reach? Why do you want me to do this?
Although I am a royal noble, there are many constraints in doing many things.

According to the royal rules, the royal family is not allowed to marry commoners.\n{PlayerName}, if you help me with this, not only will I facilitate this marriage, but I will also personally arrange your wedding, making you the center of attention!
Deal!
The treasure on the top floor of the Enlighten Tower...\nCould this be the treasure that Kang Wang wants?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สมบัติที่ชั้นบนสุดของหอรู้แจ้ง...\nนี่อาจเป็นสมบัติที่คังหวังต้องการหรือเปล่านะ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: How is the progress?\nThat Enlighten Tower is not a place where ordinary people can enter.
Your Highness Kang Wang, I have brought you the thing you wanted.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฝ่าบาทคังหวัง ข้าได้นำสิ่งที่ท่านต้องการมามอบให้ท่านแล้ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Seal of the Common People! It really is this treasure, finally it's mine!
This is a treasure? I can't see anything special about it.
Knowing too much can be harmful to you.

How did this thing end up in the hands of Tong Daofu? It seems that he is using it as bait to attract some powerful people in the martial arts world to serve Qi Wang, and even join his Imperial City Division.

Tong Daofu was once highly appreciated by the king. Since the king was trapped, the status of the Imperial City Division has plummeted, so he has to look for backers everywhere. He not only works for Qi Wang, but also for me. However, whether he is sincere or not, only he himself knows.
You let me know such a big secret, are you planning to kill me to keep it quiet?
{PlayerName}, do you think so little of me?\nYou are a rare talent, and now you are about to become my brother-in-law. How could I harm myself by hurting you?
Have you agreed to let the princess marry me?
What I promised will certainly be fulfilled!
Martial artists don't care about trivial matters. It's better to choose a day than to bump into it. How about getting married today?
Happiness came so suddenly, should I accept it right away?
I still need him, so I can't afford to fall out with him. That's why I asked you to steal the treasure. This way, no one would suspect that the treasure would end up in my hands.
Do you think you are not worthy of the princess, or the position of the son-in-law of Duke Kang's manor is not worthy of you?
Your Highness Kang Wang, please calm down. I have some mundane affairs to deal with as soon as possible. I will come to marry the princess as soon as possible.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฝ่าบาทคังหวัง โปรดสงบสติอารมณ์. ข้ามีเรื่องบ้างเรื่องที่ต้องจัดการอย่างเร่งด่วน แล้วข้าจะกลับมาสู่ขอเจ้าหญิงให้เร็วที่สุด

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Good, don't keep me waiting too long.
Good, from this moment on, you {PlayerName} are the son-in-law of Duke Kang's manor!
Duke Kang's manor is indeed very luxurious, with guests coming in an endless stream. Looking around, they are all high-ranking officials and nobles.
In the congratulations of these people, you married Fuqing Junzhu.
A few days ago, you were a nobody, but now you are dressed in red and become the Royal son in law.
Such a marriage seems like a farce and seems to be destined. Anyway, what's done is done.
The gentle township is the grave of heroes. Will such wealth and honor stop your future progress?
Today is just a new turning point in your life...
How are you considering, will you marry the princess today?
Happiness comes so suddenly, should I agree right now?
Sir, you brought other sisters to Duke Kang's manor, aren't you afraid of being punished by the prince?
Sir, it's so boring to stay in the palace, when can you take me to experience the martial arts world?
{PlayerSurName} Young master, I knew you would come to find me.\nDid Brother Wang give you a hard time? Did he make any conditions?
Brother Wang has always wanted me to marry Lü Zixu from Chuxiang City, in order to appease Lü Wenhuan. But who doesn't know that Lü Zixu is a notorious prodigal, how could I possibly marry him?
Hey, can you consider the feelings of the person involved when you're having a private conversation?
This martial arts competition is a bet I made with Brother Wang. He said that if anyone could take my punch without injury, he would no longer force me to do things I don't like.
Brother Wang wasn't like this before. Since our father was taken away by the Yan army, Brother Wang has become extremely power-hungry.
Although Brother Wang didn't punish me when I returned from the martial arts competition, the people who went with me were all driven out of the Wang's mansion. I got them into trouble.

I've sought many famous doctors for this strange strength of mine, but none of them could cure it. Brother Wang simply found some people to teach me martial arts, hoping that I could control this strange strength, but so far it hasn't been very effective.
For a girl to have this kind of strength, it's actually quite troublesome at times...
Sir, what place is this? It's so beautiful, I've never seen it before.
This is the God of Marriage's Shrine.
God of Marriage's Shrine? The matchmaker who ties the red thread for men and women all over the world?
Yes, young men and women who make a wish here can receive the blessing of the Moon Elder.
In that case, I also want to make a wish for the Moon Elder to bless us.
We're already married, do we still need his blessing?
What did you wish for, my lord?
As long as I know what I wished for, it's okay. If I say it out loud, it won't come true.
Hmm, hmm, I've heard others say that too, but I still wanted to tell you my wish.

Great, I finally met a real hero!\nMy name is Fang Xiao Bai, and I admire the heroes in the martial world the most in my life!
If you have time, please come often, and please tell me more about the stories of the martial world!
Sir, you look highly skilled, can you teach me a few moves?
Hmm? What are you going to do?

It's not a problem to take you with me in the martial arts world, but you have to stop calling me "guest" and "little one", it sounds too distant.
Alright, big brother! I'll do whatever you say.
I have a small request. I have a family heirloom manual, which is said to be a rare thing passed down by my ancestors. But I can't read much, so I can't understand it. I hope you can help me.
Sir, you don't have to be so merciful just because I can't do martial arts, I've been used to being beaten by the shopkeeper since I was a child, I'm very strong, I'm not afraid of your hits.
Sir, are you going to teach me a few moves?
Sir, you're really funny.\nI rely on my monthly wages to live, if I run away from here, I'll starve to death.
I can't afford to associate with you, please find someone else.
I'll learn a lot from you, big brother, I won't let you down.
Big brother's team is full, I can only wait here.
(Do you want to give the martial arts manual from the Fang family heirloom to Fang Xiao Bai?)
This is the finger technique manual cracked from your family heirloom, now it's returned to its original owner.
With this manual, I will soon become a peerless master. Our Fang family is finally going to rise, hahaha--
You have given me a new life, please accept my bow, Fang Xiao Bai!
It's just a small effort, we don't need to be so formal.
I will definitely practice diligently, and in the future, I will be your right-hand man, solving problems for you!
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name, sir?

Firstly, congratulations to {PlayerSurName} for joining the Confucius Temple. It is {PlayerSurName}'s honesty and trustworthiness that passed the test, not the merit of this young master's recommendation.
This young master, surnamed Cai and named Youzhi, enjoys making friends. If {PlayerSurName} has a penchant for composing poetry, we can often exchange ideas.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name, sir?

This young master Cai Youzhi despises those who curry favor. Now that you have entered the Confucius Temple, you should abandon your previous unscrupulous behavior. The Confucius Temple is not a place to harbor filth.

My father has planned to send troops to conquer them several times, but the Yan Kingdom army seems to have the intention of invading from the south, so my father can only be conservative and not move the troops.

Each for its own, it's really helpless.

If you are willing to have a drink, let's be friends. I will pay for everyone's expenses in the restaurant today, how about it?
Yan barbarian, stop pretending, I don't buy it!\nI just don't like you Yan people, I want to teach you a lesson today.
Although I am a Yan person, I have no conflict with you. Is it appropriate for you to vent your anger on the innocent?
All Yan people should die, there is no innocent!
These years, the Gold treasures looted from us have supported how many Yan people, maybe the jewelry on your body was robbed from us.

Those treasures were tributes given to Yan Kingdom by your court, not robbed by us. If you want to complain, you should complain about your court. It seems like you are barking up the wrong tree to vent your private anger on me.
I don't care for your excuses. Today, I'll teach you a lesson, you Yan Kingdom's young master. Once I find out the whereabouts of the new Yan Kingdom's envoy, I'll teach him a lesson too!

To the onlookers from the martial arts world, if you want to be friends, come over for a drink; if you want to be enemies, take this opportunity to make your move. I don't have all day to entertain you.
Is he talking to me? Seems like I can't stay out of this anymore, I need to respond.
I'm just passing by, I'm not interested in your affairs, I don't want to meddle.

I don't go looking for trouble, but some people can't seem to keep quiet, always stirring up something.\nIf that's the case, if I don't show some of my skills, these ignorant people will look down on me.
I am the Yan Kingdom's envoy, <color=#097a76>Wan Yan Liang</color>. Your way of treating guests is hardly fitting for a nation known for its etiquette.
{yell} You're Wan Yan Liang?! I'll fight you to the end!
Since blood has already been shed today, might as well...
Hold on!
I am the master of the Tower of Prosperity, <color=#097a76>Liu Fuming</color>. I apologize for disturbing your peace, Master Wan Yan.

I didn't expect the mysterious master of the Tower of Prosperity to be the same Liu who wrote the Royal Decree years ago. I heard you were poisoned by the Love Gu from Miaojiang and had died, is that not true?
The Liu who wrote the Royal Decree has indeed died. The person standing before you now is just the master of the Tower of Prosperity.
Master, you rarely show yourself. Why have you appeared now?
This young man has some connections with my Tower of Prosperity. Please, Master Wan Yan, don't hold it against him.
Well, let's see if you have the ability to protect him first.
Thank you for your understanding, Master Wan Yan.
Let this kid fend for himself in the future. I'll take my leave now.
Thank you for your help, Master.
I don't know you, Master. What did you mean by "connections" earlier?
I didn't save you. My master values your talent and gave you a chance to live.
Don't bother trying to find out about my master. When the time is right, you'll know.
I can't believe I, the Yan Kingdom's envoy <color=#097a76>Wan Yan Liang</color>, have to deal with a nobody from the martial arts world. How undignified.
{yell} You're Wan Yan Liang?! I'll fight you to the end!
You're no match for him. If you don't want to die in vain, calm down.
Hmph!
Your name is {PlayerName}, right? I'll remember that. I won't hold it against you today, but we'll meet again.
You're as strong as that envoy from Yan Kingdom. Why didn't you kill him just now?
Did you want to kill him for revenge or to vent your anger?
There's not a single good person in Yan Kingdom. They've killed so many of us, killing an envoy would be a good way to vent the anger of the people!
If killing him could make Yan Kingdom withdraw their troops, I wouldn't mind killing more than one envoy.
But if this envoy dies in Daliang City today, Yan Kingdom will make a big fuss about it tomorrow. What do you think the people in power will do to keep the peace and protect their positions?
...Find a few scapegoats... continue to cede territory and pay reparations... further increase taxes without limit...
Sigh, I almost made a big mistake.
To drive out these Yan people, we need to plan for the long term. Mere bravery won't solve the problem.
What you said is very true, brother. People like me who only know how to fight and kill will only make things worse.
This item is a token of my gratitude for saving my life, brother. Only in your hands will its value not be buried.
Good wine, good wine.
