Yes, this chess game has troubled me for many years. If I can't crack it, I won't rest in peace!
Alright, I'll give it a try.
No need to bother, I've already cracked this chess game.
Tell me the solution in detail!
You tell Can Qi the method to crack the Linlang Go puzzle in detail.
So that's how it is, that's how it is!
Thank you for helping me solve the puzzle that has troubled me for years. Here's a manual for you, we owe each other nothing.
How's the progress on cracking the Linlang Go puzzle?
Don't rush, it's not that easy to crack, give me more time.
I've already cracked it.
Tell me the solution in detail!
You tell Can Qi the method to crack the Linlang Go puzzle in detail.
So that's how it is, that's how it is!
Thank you for helping me solve the puzzle that has troubled me for years. Here's a manual for you, we owe each other nothing.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name?
Who do you think I am, sitting in the main seat in Duke Kang's manor?
So you are Duke Kang.
I, a commoner {PlayerName}, pay my respects to Duke Kang.
Please rise, young hero {PlayerSurName}.\nYoung hero {PlayerSurName}, your reputation precedes you. Seeing you today, you truly are a young hero!
Your Highness is too kind.
I, a commoner {PlayerName}, pay my respects to Duke Kang.
Hmm, rise.
Thank you, Your Highness.
{PlayerName} pays respects to Duke Kang.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you have a proud spirit, truly a chivalrous demeanor!\nYour fame has reached my ears, seeing you today, you truly are a young hero!
Your Highness is too kind.
{PlayerName} pays respects to Duke Kang.
Are you just a rough warrior, showing such disrespect to me?
People of the martial world follow their own rules, there's nothing wrong with that.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name?
I'm just a leisurely prince, you don't need to be so formal.
So you are Prince Qi.
I, a commoner {PlayerName}, pay my respects to Prince Qi.
Please rise, brave man {PlayerSurName}, no need for formalities.
{PlayerName} pays respects to Prince Qi.
Hmph, young people have no manners!\nHeaven, earth, monarch, parents, and teacher, I am a royal relative, am I not worth your kneeling?
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask the young lady's name?
Luo Qianxue, current head of the Crime Investigation Bureau.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ลั่วเฉียนเสวี่ย หัวหน้าสำนักสืบสวนคนปัจจุบัน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You look familiar, have we met somewhere before?
So you're the one who fell from the tree that day and refused to help.
What a coincidence, Luo, we meet again here.
Thanks to you, I couldn't bring that female thief to justice.
You look a bit like the coward I met in the woods a few days ago.
Perhaps my appearance is a bit ordinary, easy to be confused with others.
Maybe I got it wrong.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask the young lady's name?
Nest of Swallow, Hua Qingqing.
Have you recently appeared in some Suburds forest?\nYou seem familiar to me.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าเพิ่งปรากฏตัวในป่าชานเมืองบางแห่งหรือไม่?\nเจ้าดูเหมือนรู้จักกับข้า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Thanks to you not helping that scoundrel at the beginning, I finally had a chance to escape.\nI should really thank you.
Hehe, it's just a small effort, not worth mentioning.
Perhaps my appearance is a bit ordinary, easy to be confused with others.
Maybe I got it wrong.
Blind guy, dare to block my way?\nGet out of the way if you know what's good for you!
I am {PlayerName}, I had the honor to glimpse your elegance before, may I ask how to address you?
You are sensible, today I am in a good mood, I will tell you exceptionally.\nRemember! I am the eldest son of Lü Wenhuan, the pacifier of Chuxiang City - Lü Zixu!
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask how to address you, brother?
Wandering the rivers and lakes for more than ten years, I have long forgotten my original name.\nWe meet by chance, it's better not to inquire about each other's news.
Young brother, do you want to compete with me?\nThis time I will use 30% of my strength, you have to be careful.
Young brother, your kung fu is not bad, it won't take long for me to let go and fight with you.
Young brother, don't mind, victory or defeat is a common thing for the military.
Young brother, do you want to compete with me?\nThis time I will use 50% of my strength, you have to be careful.
Young brother, do you want to compete with me?\nThis time I will go all out, you have to be careful.

Young brother's skills have made rapid progress, now I am no longer an opponent.\nI have some insights from practicing martial arts in the past, I will give them to you, maybe they will help you in the future.
{PlayerSurName} brother, although we have been together for a short time, I feel that you will be a promising person in the future.
This place is no longer suitable for me to stay for a long time, before parting, I will give you some things, maybe they will help you achieve great things in the future.
Bold thief, hiding here!
Hand over the stolen things, and you can avoid death.\nIf you are still stubborn, I will have to teach you a lesson today.
How could I possibly carry those things with me, if you have the ability, go find them yourself.
Humph, take you back to the prison, after tasting the ten major tortures, see if you will continue to be tough.
The government is hunting down the wanted, irrelevant people leave quickly, otherwise they will be treated as accomplices.
Kid, it seems you want to meddle in other people's business!
{PlayerSurName} brother, don't do stupid things!\nYou are young, don't get into this muddy water!
After all, we are known to each other, I can't stand by and watch!
Sure enough, they are accomplices, let's take them down together!
I didn't manage to save his life, is this the cruelty of the rivers and lakes...
In my lifetime, I can have you, young brother, to accompany me, I have enough in this life!

The things I promised to give to the young brother just now were almost messed up by these dog officials.\nDon't underestimate these things, they may become your capital to do big things in the future!
What, what are all these.
Such an obvious treasure map, can't you see it?
The treasure location marked on this is too abstract, where should I go to find it.
A treasure map naturally needs to hide its secrets. If it were obvious, these treasures would have been taken long ago.
Well, that's all I can say. Whether you can find it or not depends on your own luck.\nThe longer I stay here, the more danger I'm in. Brother, we'll meet again!
You hide in the distance, timidly looking towards the Tea shop...\nWithout a doubt, a group of officers dragged the man away, not knowing whether he was dead or alive.
General, when will this place be open for passage?

The southwestern region is uncivilized, and the Jiuli tribe often invades the border. In order to prevent accidents, the court has ordered the closure of the pass. Without the handwritings of <color=#c44b0e>Kang Wang and Qi Wang</color>, no one is allowed to leave!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ภูมิภาคตะวันตกเฉียงใต้นั้นไร้อารยธรรม และชนเผ่าจิ่วลี่มักบุกรุกชายแดนเสมอ, เพื่อป้องกันเหตุการณ์ไม่คาดคิด. ศาลจึงมีคำสั่งปิดทางผ่าน หากไม่มีลายมือของ <color=#c44b0e>คังหวัง และ ฉีหวัง</color> จะไม่มีใครได้รับอนุญาตให้ออกไป!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: It's you again! I've told you, without the handwritings of <color=#c44b0e>Kang Wang and Qi Wang</color>, no one is allowed to leave!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เป็นเจ้าอีกแล้ว! ข้าบอกเจ้าแล้วว่าหากไม่มีลายมือของ <color=#c44b0e>คังหวัง และ ฉีหวัง</color> จะไม่มีใครได้รับอนุญาตให้ออกไป!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I came to see you specifically because...
You sure have a way with words, kid. But even if your tongue is as brilliant as a lotus, this general won't let you pass!
Smooth talker, get lost!
Hahaha, I've never heard such an absurd joke, who do you think you are?
You won't be laughing for long!
There's a thief breaking through, kill without mercy!
Open the gate, let me pass!
We would lose our heads if we let people pass without permission!
It seems you want to lose your heads now.
No, no, please spare us, hero.
I don't want to waste time, I'll give you three breaths.
Open the gate, see the young hero off!
Indeed, these are the personal orders of Prince Kang Wang and Prince Qi Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: แท้จริงแล้ว, นี่เป็นคำสั่งส่วนตัวขององค์ชายคังหวังและเจ้าชายฉีหวัง

{yell}Imperial token is here, as if the emperor himself is present!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Long live the emperor!
Open the gate of West Pass!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เปิดประตูด่านชายแดนตะวันตก!

Open the gate, see the young hero off!
Prince Qi Wang, I plan to pass through West Pass to the southwest region, I need your personal order.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You have always served me faithfully, I naturally agree to your small request. However, West Pass is a key location, my personal order alone is not enough, you need to get the personal order from Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้ารับใช้ข้าอย่างซื่อสัตย์มาโดยตลอด ข้าจะยอมรับคำขอเล็กๆ น้อยๆ ของเจ้า. อย่างไรก็ตาม, ด่านชายแดนตะวันตกเป็นสถานที่สำคัญ คำสั่งของข้าเพียงอย่างเดียวอาจไม่เพียงพอ. เจ้าต้องได้รับคำสั่งส่วนตัวจากคังหวังด้วย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Thank you, Prince Qi Wang.
So it's the top scholar visiting, I have been negligent.
The top scholar is both civil and martial, perhaps the great task of pacifying the southwest will fall on you. I will write you a personal order to ensure your journey to the southwest is unimpeded.
In addition to this hand order, I also need to get the hand order from Prince Kang Wang to pass.
Alas, since this involves Kang Wang, I can't help, you have to rely on your own abilities.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อนิจจา, เนื่องจากสิ่งนี้เกี่ยวข้องกับคังหวัง, ข้าช่วยเจ้าไม่ได้ เจ้าต้องอาศัยความสามารถของตัวเจ้าเอง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerSurName}You are a brave and talented man, if you can solve the border problems in the southwest, it will be a great achievement. I will write you a personal order, as for Kang Wang's order, you need to figure it out yourself.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerSurName} เจ้าเป็นคนกล้าหาญและมีพรสวรรค์ หากเจ้าสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาชายแดนทางตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ได้ มันจะเป็นความสำเร็จที่ยิ่งใหญ่ ข้าจะเขียนคำสั่งส่วนตัวให้เจ้า ส่วนคำสั่งของคังหวัง เจ้าต้องคิดหาทางเอาเอง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: West Pass is located on the border, used to guard the southwest, it's related to the safety of the country! You, a man of the rivers and lakes who is neither literate nor martial, why should I make an exception for you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ด่านชายแดนตะวันตกตั้งอยู่บริเวณชายแดน ใช้เฝ้าทิศตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ เกี่ยวข้องกับความปลอดภัยของประเทศ! เจ้า, คนแห่งแม่น้ำและทะเลสาบ ที่ไม่มีทั้งความรู้และความเข้าใจ ทำไมข้าจะต้องยกเว้นเจ้าด้วย

Prince Kang Wang, I plan to pass through West Pass to the southwest region, I need your personal order.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: องค์ชายคังหวัง, ข้ามีแผนที่จะผ่านประตูตะวันตกไปยังภูมิภาคตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ ข้าต้องการคำสั่งส่วนตัวจากท่าน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: As my son-in-law, I naturally agree to your small request. However, West Pass is a key location, my personal order alone is not enough, you need to get the personal order from Qi Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในฐานะลูกเขยของข้า ข้าย่อมยอมรับคำขอเล็กๆ น้อยๆ ของเจ้า, อย่างไรก็ตามด่านชายแดนตะวันตกเป็นสถานที่สำคัญ คำสั่งซื้อส่วนตัวของข้าเพียงอย่างเดียวไม่เพียงพอ เจ้าต้องได้รับคำสั่งซื้อส่วนตัวจากฉีหวังด้วย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Thank you, Prince Kang Wang.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ขอบพระทัย องค์ชายคังหวัง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You are a distinguished guest of my mansion, it's rare that you have a request, I naturally agree. I will write you a personal order to ensure your journey to the southwest is unimpeded.
In addition to this hand order, I also need to get the hand order from Prince Qi Wang to pass.
Since this involves Qi Wang, I can't help either.
What do you have to do with me, that you want me to write you a personal order? West Pass is a key location, it's very important, not everyone can pass at will.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าต้องการจะทำอะไรกับข้า, ถึงอยากให้ข้าเขียนคำสั่งส่วนตัวให้แก่เจ้า? ด่านชายแดนตะวันตกเป็นสถานที่สำคัญ, สำคัญมากๆ, ไม่ใช่ทุกคนจะผ่านได้ตามใจชอบ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I advise you not to have any improper thoughts.
Are you here to take the boat, sir?
I thought this ferry was abandoned, no one would do the ferry business here anymore.
There used to be the Sea Serpent Gang causing trouble on the river, now that the Sea Serpent Gang has been wiped out by the government, I dare to come out and continue to ferry.

Actually, I've heard privately that the reason why the Sea Jiao Gang was successfully wiped out was mainly due to the efforts of a young hero. However, this kind of thing is too embarrassing for the government, so they didn't mention a word about this young hero.
Hehe, the young hero you mentioned is me.
Are you the {PlayerName}, the hero {PlayerSurName}?!
I'm flattered, I'm flattered.
Where does the hero {PlayerSurName} want to go, I will take you there for <color=#c44b0e>free</color>!\nIt's my honor to row the boat for the hero {PlayerSurName}.
Where should I go now?
The boat is leaving——
The boat is leaving——
The boat is leaving——
Where does the hero {PlayerSurName} want to go today?
Are you here to take the boat, sir?
I thought this ferry was abandoned, no one would do the ferry business here anymore.
Previously, the Sea Jiao Gang impersonated rich merchants to lure passers-by, and those people don't know where they are now.
For some reason, the Sea Jiao Gang no longer scams here, and the old man dares to continue to row the boat and ferry.
If the guest wants to cross the river, the old man will give you a free ride.
Where do you want to go today?
I just do good deeds in my life, don't ask about the future.\nIf you want to take a boat, I will take you there for free.
Where should I go now?
Where do you want to go today?

I am well-fed and clothed, and I don't want to idle away my remaining life at home.\nIf you want to take a boat, I would love to. Chat with me on the way to relieve boredom, and the boat fare will be waived.
Where should I go now?
Where do you want to go today?

I had a son in my old age, thanks to the blessing of the Bodhisattva. Now I want to do a good deed every day to accumulate virtue for my children and grandchildren. If you want to take a boat today, I won't charge you any boat fare.
Where should I go now?
Where do you want to go today?
It seems that all the good things in the world have been collected by the Glittering Artifact House. I really don't know what kind of background the owner, Shi Wansan, has.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ดูเหมือนว่าสิ่งของดีๆ ในโลกนี้ล้วนต่างถูกเก็บรวบรวมไว้ที่หอไข่มุก. ข้าไม่รู้จริงๆ ว่าเจ้าของหอ สือหวานซาน มีความเป็นมาอย่างไร.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Why should you care about others? As long as we work together, no matter what they auction, we can take it all and then sell it to others at a higher price. This is a very profitable business.

Haven't you heard? Recently, a mysterious force called <color=#c44b0e>Night Demon Square</color> has emerged outside the city, seemingly intending to compete with the Glittering Artifact House in secret.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าไม่เคยได้ยินเหรอ? เมื่อเร็วๆ นี้มีสถานที่ลึกลับแห่งนึงที่เรียกว่า <color=#c44b0e>จัตุรัสปีศาจราตรี</color> ได้ปรากฏตัวขึ้นนอกเมือง ดูเหมือนว่าพวกนั้นตั้งใจที่จะแข่งขันกับหอไข่มุกอย่างลับๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Night Demon Square is deserted during the day, but every midnight it is brightly lit, just like a ghost market.

It's well known that the Night Demon Square only auctions off some rare and strange materials. Unless one is obsessed with crafting or alchemy, who would spend a lot of money to compete for these materials? Unless for personal use, it's extremely difficult to resell them.
Brother, you're absolutely right!\nLet's go and see what items are up for auction at the Glittering Artifact House, so we can be prepared.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: พี่ชาย, ท่านพูดถูกจริงๆ!\nไปดูกันว่ามีรายการอะไรบ้างที่จะประมูลที่ หอไข่มุก เพื่อที่เราจะได้เตรียมตัวให้พร้อม.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: That's exactly what I was thinking.
A midnight auction at the Night Demon Square? Sounds interesting.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, are you ready to participate in my auction?
Alright, please enter, Brother {PlayerSurName}!
Open daily at Zi Shi, Brother {PlayerSurName}, don't miss the time if you want to participate.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, please don't ruin my auction.\nThis is a matter of my livelihood, please show mercy, Brother {PlayerSurName}.
{PlayerName}! You're blatantly disrespecting me!\nIf it comes to this, don't blame me for being rude!
{PlayerName}, you are no longer a guest of the Night Demon Square, you are not welcome here!
I accidentally killed the owner of the Night Demon Square just now, it seems I can't stay here for long, it's best to leave.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, my auction will not be held until <color=#c44b0e>Zi Shi</color>. Please be patient, Brother {PlayerSurName}.
You are not welcome at the Night Demon Square, please run away.
There is a strange mountain cave here, with people occasionally coming in and out, I wonder what it is.
Hey, stop right there, kid!
May I ask what you need?
This is the territory of the Horse King Cave, all passersby must pay half of their money as a toll!
(I didn't expect these bandits to be so rampant, should I pay the toll?)
Hmm, if everyone was as sensible as you, I wouldn't have to work so hard.
Losing money to avoid disaster... losing money to avoid disaster...
Oh, we've got a tough one here.\nBoys, come out and teach this young master a lesson.
The world is really not peaceful, if I didn't have martial arts, I might have ended up in a very tragic situation.
Kid, I'll keep the money on you for you.\nI'll spare your life, remember to thank me for my mercy.
Thank you, thank you for sparing my life...
There is a temple here, it looks quite eerie, it doesn't seem to have any incense offerings.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: มีวัดอยู่ที่นี่ ดูวังเวง, มันแทบไม่มีธูปบูชาเลย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The six major sects that were once famous in the martial arts world have now become a thing of the past, and there is no longer any power in the world that can compete with me. Now there are only some insignificant small sects left in the martial arts world, I want to gather them together and intimidate them!

I heard that the Ritual Platform is a good place, just right for me to establish my authority.\nI have already sent a message by carrier pigeon to the heads of those small sects, asking them to gather at the Ritual Platform.
Now that you all are gathered here, some of you are compromising, some are playing both sides, and some have ulterior motives.
No matter what, I'm afraid there are not many of you who sincerely regard me as your master.
The six major sects that are famous in the martial arts world have all been wiped out by me, let alone your unknown small sects.
Today, I, {PlayerName}, give you people a chance!
I alone will deal with the nine of you joining forces!\nFists and feet have no eyes, Inseparable has life!
At this point, do you still want to be lucky?
We are willing to regard {PlayerName} as our master!
Congratulations to {PlayerName} for unifying the martial arts world!
Now that I have unified the martial arts world and become the true Jianghu Conqueror, what should I do next?

There is a magnificent waterfall cascading down the mountain ahead, would you like to go and explore?
You head towards the waterfall, after two quarters of an hour...
That was terrifying, I was almost swept away by the water, I better keep my distance.
Although the waterfall is majestic, it doesn't scare me at all.\nIt's perfect for tempering my body with the powerful impact of the waterfall.
Gather your energy, calm your mind...
Suddenly, the sky is filled with dark clouds and thunder roars...
Doing too many bad things will indeed lead to divine punishment, it's really retribution.\nHowever, after suffering divine punishment, it seems like a baptism of the heart, not so evil anymore.
Evil thoughts rise up without warning, various thoughts rush in,
The inner energy you've painstakingly gathered is shattered in an instant,
With a spurt of blood, you forcefully end this meditation.
That was close, I almost Obsessed.\nIndeed, doing evil deeds will inevitably lead to a troubled conscience, it seems my state of mind is not mature enough.
As time passes and the water washes over you, you gradually immerse yourself in your inner world...
Standing in front of you is a person who looks exactly like you, this is your inner demon...
Defeating the inner demon really benefits a lot, but this inner demon seems to be growing stronger, I'm afraid I may not be able to remain Self-restrained for long.
This inner demon is really hard to subdue, I almost Obsessed.\nNow that I'm Internal disorder, I better not fight with people casually in the near future.
You calm your energy, time flies...
Haste makes waste, let's try again later.
It seems you are also a martial artist, you can serve as my Whetstone.
Who's there, hiding in the shadows?

Hehe, you're still alive after all that.\nWell, a Whetstone like you can be used a few more times, next time we meet I will surely take your life!

Things are different now, this time I will defeat you!

Hmph, we'll see!

My skills are specifically designed to take lives, this time you were lucky to survive, but you won't be so lucky next time.
I recently acquired a superior martial arts skill, but unfortunately, I haven't fully comprehended it yet.\nWhen I successfully learn it, it will be your day of doom. Pray for your luck.
You despicable villain, don't even think about running away alive today!
Hehe, I have mastered the divine skill, today only one of us can run away alive.
How is this possible, how is this possible!!!
I have mastered an unparalleled martial arts skill, how can I still fail to assassinate a person who is almost obsessed...

The way of learning martial arts requires talent. How can a stupid pig like you who is eager for quick success understand the true mystery of superior martial arts? Superior martial arts in your hands is simply a waste.

I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name, sir?
I am Li Leya.\nIt's an honor to meet you, brother {PlayerSurName}!
So it's brother {PlayerSurName}, nice to meet you.\nI am Li Leya.\nI enjoy singing and playing the flute, if brother {PlayerSurName} is interested, we can discuss it together.
Why was Brother Li locked up in this Prison?
It was just a trivial matter, not worth mentioning.
If it was a trivial matter, why were you locked up in Prison? Now that we're in the same boat, you don't have to hide it from me.
I just saw a bully harassing a young girl and taught him a lesson...
I didn't expect the Official to come and protect the bully, so I taught the Official a lesson too.
You think assaulting an Official is a minor matter? It could lead to exile at best, and execution for treason at worst!
{PlayerSurName} brother, there's no need to panic. These people can't harm me.
I have a feeling that Brother Li intentionally got himself locked up here by the Official...
Haha, {PlayerSurName} brother, you are indeed astute. However, this matter is of great importance, and I can't explain it to {PlayerSurName} brother for the time being.
Alright, you'll tell me when you're ready.
Li Leya, you've been hiding here and making it hard for us sisters to find you!
Damn, those crazy women have found this place!
How dare you, you're defying the law, are you planning to break into the prison?!
Get lost!
When nature calls, it can't be delayed~
Li Leya, you have two choices: either go back with us to apologize to the abbot, or cripple your own martial arts!
Should I step in and help Li Leya, who is being pressured by these people?
Phew, finally got rid of the big trouble, no need to hide anymore.
Brother Li, considering we fought off the enemy together, isn't it time you told me what's going on?
I didn't mean to deceive {PlayerSurName} brother, I just didn't want you to get involved in this mess.

I've been obsessed with Musical since I was a child, and I love collecting music scores from all over the world. I even disguised myself as a servant to sneak into Melody House and secretly copy the rare music scores there.

Until one day, for some reason, a fire broke out in the attic of Melody House where the music scores were stored, and most of the scores were burned. Fortunately, I had gained a lot from this trip, so I left.

Afterwards, they realized that I had left without saying goodbye, and they concluded that I was the arsonist. They also insisted that I had stolen their sect's music score, so they sent disciples to chase me relentlessly.
A few days ago, I knew they would chase me to the vicinity of Chuxiang City, so I deliberately annoyed the Official and got myself locked up in this Prison, hoping to avoid them.
I didn't expect the women of Melody House to be so powerful. If it weren't for {PlayerSurName} brother's help, I would have been taken back to Melody House and skinned alive.
So you're saying that the arson and theft of the music scores have nothing to do with you. Why don't you explain it to them?
{PlayerSurName} brother, have you never dealt with women? Once they've made up their minds about something, no amount of persuasion will change it.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: "Young hero, your writing is not up to the standard of elegance. In this provincial examination, you did not pass."
Sigh, the provincial examination is indeed much harder than the college examination...

What kind of question is this...|It's so hard...|I regret not studying enough when it's time to use it...|Am I going to fail this time too...|What kind of question is this!|I have no idea at all.|I don't know...|This is too easy!|I will definitely pass this time!|Easy peasy~|This can't stop me!|This... should be the right answer.|I feel like someone is peeking at me.|Give me some inspiration!|Confucius bless me!|I don't know if it's right...|This is much harder than the college examination.|The person who set the questions really knows how to torture people.|I just reviewed this yesterday!|How can I not remember...
I can't believe I accidentally got first place! I'm so awesome!
Finally, I got the first place, this is indeed my strength~ Next is the metropolitan examination, watch me ace it!

"Young hero, you are indeed a talented scholar, easily passing the imperial examination. The prefecture once again congratulates you on passing the imperial examination, please go to the Confucius Temple to participate in the metropolitan examination, and don't forget the recommendation of the prefecture."

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Damn it, I was so close to becoming the top scholar again!

Young hero, you are already a scholar, do you still want to take this provincial examination again? If you still can't become the top scholar this time, isn't it a waste of time? The prefecture still suggests that you participate in the metropolitan examination...
{PlayerName}, are you here to take the metropolitan examination?
I, a humble student, am indeed here to take the metropolitan examination.
The curator reminds you that the metropolitan examination takes at least one day. If you fail to pass the examination, you can retake it three days after the results are announced.
Are you ready to take the metropolitan examination?
Come back when you've made up your mind.
Alright, then follow the curator.

Cai Yuanchang leads you to the place in Confucius Temple specially used for the metropolitan examination. The room is very narrow, so narrow that you can't even stretch out your arms. All you have in front of you is a table and chair, and the answer sheet on the table.
The metropolitan examination is over. The results will be posted on the <color=#c44b0e>bulletin board</color> in Daliang City in <color=#c44b0e>three days</color>!
The master of this hall is busy, young hero, you may leave on your own. If you wish to visit the hall, please feel free to do so.
The results of the examination should be out, go to the bulletin board in Daliang City to check the results.
Indeed, the results have been posted, let me find my name...
I actually passed with high marks! Country Top Examiner, I'm the top of the list!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าสอบผ่านด้วยคะแนนสูงจริงๆ! สูงสุดของการสอบประเทศ, ข้าอยู่อันดับต้นๆ ของรายชื่อ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Sure enough, I made the list, but I didn't make it to the top three. Although being a Recognized Scholar is not bad, I always feel unsatisfied. If I take the exam again, I should get better results.
I didn't make it, my name is not on the list, it seems I need to take the exam a few more times and try my luck.
{PlayerName}, you are already a Recognized Scholar, even if you become a Tribute Scholar, it's hard to become famous. Even so, do you still want to participate in the metropolitan examination again?
I still couldn't make it to the top three, could it be that this is as far as I can go with my abilities...
No, I've already retaken the exam once, I might as well take it a few more times, I don't believe I can't make it to the top three with my abilities!
Hit it, hit it, Country Top Examiner, monopolizing the top spot!\nMy efforts these days have finally not been in vain!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ทำได้, ทำได้, สูงสุดของการสอบประเทศ, จุดสูงสุดเป็นของข้าคนเดียว!\nความพยายามของข้าในที่สุดก็ไม่เสียเปล่า!

(Places a stone on the shrine)
It worked, it worked!\nLook, it's the God of Marriage blessing us.
My dear, you must not betray me in this life.
Our marriage is destined by heaven, if I betray you, may I be struck by lightning!
Hmm, hmm.
May I ask what brings you here, sir?
I didn't mean to disturb you two, I'm just curious about the God of Marriage's Shrine and wanted to ask someone about it.
This God of Marriage's Shrine is a place for destined couples to express their love, it shows sincerity when a man and a woman come together.
Since it's a place to express love, both parties need to be Bird of a feather, otherwise it would be unrequited love.
Bird of a feather... (Does this mean I need to have a Relations of 100 with the lady?)
The most important thing to form a bond here is a tribute - <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color>.

It is said that this stone is blessed by the God of Marriage, it can trace the three-life love fate of a man and a woman in the dark. If they are destined in this life, the Wedding Stone will shine with a strange light; otherwise, the Wedding Stone will shatter and destroy.
This Wedding Stone is so magical, where can I get it?
Wedding Stone is extremely rare, auction houses in various places may have a small amount of stock, the rest depends on your own luck and blessings.

Let me remind you, <color=#c44b0e>those who are unfaithful and flirtatious, will have too many distractions when worshiping the Wedding Stone. If they can't focus entirely on the person they are bonding with, then the God of Marriage will not feel their sincerity and will destroy the Wedding Stone as a warning.</color>
I see, thank you for telling me.
You're welcome, I wish you a happy marriage.
This place has facilitated hundreds of marriages, I wonder when my own marriage will come.
Before I find the right person, I better not come here often, so as not to feel disappointed.
Don't look or listen to what you shouldn't...
I'm being hunted by the government, aren't you afraid of getting involved with me?\nOr do you want to turn me in to the government for a reward?
Get lost before you really piss me off!!!
My Golden Bell Technique is not for show.\nEven if there are thousands of soldiers and horses, I can handle them alone!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ระฆังทองคุ้มกายของข้าไม่ได้มีไว้สำหรับแสดง\nแม้ว่าจะมีทหารและม้าเป็นพัน แต่ข้าก็สามารถจัดการพวกมันได้เพียงลำพัง!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerSurName} Brother, your team is full, it seems I can't help you this time.
Get lost before you really piss me off!!!
Lü Wenhuan! You're quite the arrogant official!
You! I didn't expect you to still be alive and show up in front of me.
Can anyone tell me what the hell is going on?
This man used to be a captain under my command. Five years ago, he got drunk and caused a fire, burning the armory's food and supplies. Now he is a wanted criminal by the court!
Drinking led to trouble, and the grain and grass were burned?\nHa, Lü Wenhuan, you really play the game of framing and eradicating the roots beautifully!
Why should I frame you when we have no grudges or grievances?
Isn't it because I found out that you were conspiring with the Yan State envoy, and you wanted to kill me to silence me?
Humph, you have no evidence, where is the proof?\nFraming a court-appointed official is a capital crime, let alone you are a repeat offender, you should be implicated with your nine clans!
The evidence... The big fire at the Armory didn't kill me, but it burned all the evidence clean.
{PlayerName}, you brought the person, I want to hear what you think about this matter?
General Lü, I believe in Shi Chen's character.
So you believe him, so you also believe that I colluded with Yan State?
Brother, I'm satisfied with your intention, you don't need to get involved in this matter.
From the day I chose to save you, I'm not afraid of trouble.\nI will trust every partner unconditionally, we share blessings and difficulties together.
Good brother...
{PlayerName}, since you are determined to go your own way, don't blame me for being ruthless!
{PlayerName} colluded with the court's designated criminal to assassinate me, committed unforgivable crimes, and should be beheaded!
{PlayerSurName} brother, we can't stay here for long, we don't need to explain here for no reason.
Yes, Brother Shi Chen, let's fight our way out together!
You and Shi Chen fought your way out and finally broke out of the General's mansion.
{PlayerName}, from today on, you are no longer a person of the General's mansion! Don't blame me for not remembering the old feelings when we meet next time!
{PlayerSurName} brother, you are really meaningful, you are not afraid to offend the General's mansion for me.
Brother Shi Chen, we are brothers who share hardships, no matter what happens, I will stand by your side.
A gentleman dies for his confidant, I recognize you as a brother, this life is worth it!
Brother Shi Chen, you slander General Lü without evidence, is it to justify your past mistakes?
{PlayerName}, even you don't believe me!
{PlayerName}, take down this designated criminal, and you will have a great achievement!
Brother Shi Chen, I'm sorry!
Good, very good!\nRather than falling into your hands and living worse than death, I might as well end it myself!
{PlayerName}, you made the right choice, I appreciate you very much!
Shi Chen pays respects to Abbot Hui Yuan.
Amitabha, I heard about your situation, rumors say you got drunk and burned the Armory, but I believe in your character, there must be something strange.
Although you have joined the army, you are still a disciple of Shifa Temple.\nWhen you are ready to let go of the worldly grudges, there will always be a place for you in Shifa Temple.
Thank... Abbot.
Unworthy disciple Shi Chen, pays respects to master.
I can't bear the word master from you!
Previously, the disciple left without saying goodbye to join the army. It was an urgent recruitment due to the urgent military situation at the border. Please forgive me, master.
Humph, considering that you almost sacrificed your life for the country in the border war, I won't hold it against you.
Now the disciple is being framed and wanted everywhere, bringing shame to the master.
Humph! There's no shame in making a mistake.\nAs long as you stay true to your principles and never forget your original intention, our master-disciple relationship will not be in vain.
I will certainly remember the teachings of my master.
Oh, you little devil, you've grown so much!
Is this how you behave when you see your senior brother?
Hey, take your dirty hands off, it will stunt my growth.
You were cuter when you were little, now you're not fun at all.
Humph, I still remember when you stole my candied fruit as a child, you promised to repay me double, where is it?
Let's talk about this later. The abbot is looking for me, I have to go.
Next time there's something delicious, don't expect me to share it with you.
Second senior brother, it's been many years, how far have you advanced in your martial arts?
If you're itching for a fight, you can experience it firsthand.
Second senior brother, you've learned to joke, I can't stand your punches and kicks.
Either practice with me or disappear from my sight.
Alright, I'll disappear and leave you in peace.
What, you have nothing to say to your third senior brother?
I don't get along with you, indeed there's nothing to say.
If you have nothing to say, then please run away, don't hinder my work.
Little brother... little brother...
I've been stabbed and can't move, can you help me find some medicine?
You were pretending to be seriously injured!
I have been wandering in the martial world for many years, if I didn't have a cautious heart, I would have died thousands of times.
The villain is indeed cunning, today I will bring you to justice!
Alas, the word 'official' has two mouths, they can frame and set up at will, and others don't know the real reason.
Well, there's no place for reason in this world anymore.\nKid, talking is useless, let's fight!
In a while, the government's officers will come and take you away.\nIf you've been wronged, you can appeal to the prefect in the court.
Thank you, young hero, for personally subduing this wanted criminal.\nHere is your reward, thank you for your outstanding contribution to Lin'an City.
It's nothing! I didn't do it for the reward,\nmainly because my sense of justice wouldn't allow me to let this villain continue to break the law!
Tsk, hypocrite!
{PlayerSurName} young hero, we will take the criminal back to the Government Office, goodbye.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: จอมยุทธ์หนุ่ม {PlayerSurName} เราจะนำตัวคนร้ายกลับไปที่ศาลาว่าการ, ลาก่อน

Little brother, are you here to help me heal?
Yes, how's your recovery today?
Thanks to your care over the past few days, I'm almost fully recovered.

My name is Shi Chen, originally a disciple of Shifa Temple, heard about the urgent military situation at the border and joined the army on a whim. After several years of accumulating military merits, I was assigned to be a captain in Chuxiang City.

Accidentally exposed my superior's dirty deeds, and overnight became a wanted criminal, had to flee everywhere. Unexpectedly, my identity was discovered by the city patrol in Lin'an City. If it weren't for the luck of meeting you, I would have been in jail.
Brother Shi Chen is a passionate man, Guardian of the Homeland is worth admiring.\nLittle brother {PlayerName}, nice to meet you, Brother Shi Chen.
So it's Brother Shi Chen!\nMy name is Shifa Temple, my secular name is {PlayerName}, nice to meet you, brother.
I didn't expect your medical skills to be so exquisite, but my injury won't heal in a short time, I'm afraid it will take three or four days at the earliest.

The coins in this <color=#c44b0e>Money bag</color> are for today's consultation fee.\n<color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen later</color>, if you could come and help me with the treatment again, I will definitely reward you generously!

The coins in this <color=#c44b0e>Money bag</color> are for today's consultation fee.\n<color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen later</color>, if you could come and help me with the treatment again, I will definitely reward you generously!

Understood!
The <color=#c44b0e>Healing medicine</color> from the city's pharmacy can heal my injury,\nI can't move around and I'm afraid of being discovered by my enemies, so I can only ask you to get it for me.
Please don't mention to anyone that you've seen me,\nto avoid being found by my enemies and being eradicated. I'm afraid it would also implicate you.
Understood!
Alas, it seems like the heavens want to destroy me...
I've already been healed today, I need to rest.\nDon't forget our appointment tomorrow, and don't mention to anyone that you've seen me.
Young brother, are you here to help me heal?
My injury has improved a lot today, thanks to your medical skills!

There are some valuable items in this <color=#c44b0e>Inventory</color>, consider it as today's consultation fee.\nAs usual, <color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen later</color>, please come and help me with the treatment again!
Understood!
My injury has improved a lot today, thanks to your Healing medicine!

There are some valuable items in this <color=#c44b0e>Inventory</color>, consider it as today's consultation fee.\nAs usual, <color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen later</color>, please come and help me with the treatment again!
Understood!
No one...\nCould the information be wrong? Or did the news leak out--
{PlayerName}, you step back first, I will keep an eye on this matter.
I'll take my leave.
No one was found in the Mountain cave.
It's really a bad year, I thought I could avoid the war in the north by coming to the south, but I was robbed by bandits outside the city several times, alas, it's really bad luck.
Where is this bandit's den, I'd like to see it.
The government's bounty has been posted for many years, many heroes have gone and never returned, are you going there alone to seek death?
You don't need to worry about me, I know what I'm doing.
In that case, I'll tell you...
After all this talk, so this is the place you're talking about!
You know this place?
Alas, I was happy for nothing, I thought I could eradicate the evil and promote the good again.
What do you mean? I don't understand.
I have completely eradicated the thieves in this Horse King Cave, they will never be able to commit crimes again in this life.
Really? This is great news, we no longer have to be on guard when we go out of the city.
It's just a mere Horse King Cave, watch me stir them up.
Young people these days are so impulsive, you better pray for your own good.

There's a monkey performer in the Lin'an market who has a lot of <color=#097a76>Monkey wine</color> hidden away, he doesn't show it to people easily.|The <color=#097a76>Relic House</color> is a real gold mine, no matter how rich you are, you can't withstand the consumption of a few days.|Young man, don't think of the stuff in the <color=#097a76>Relic House</color> as a way to make money, be careful not to bite off more than you can chew.|The girls in the <color=#097a76>Maiden House</color> are all tender and lovely, just thinking about it makes one's heart itch.|You martial artists coming to the city must behave, otherwise if you offend the public and get caught by the Official, you'll have to eat prison food.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: มีนักแสดงละครลิงคนหนึ่งในตลาดเมืองหลินอัน ซึ่งมี<color=#097a76>สุราานร</color>ซ่อนอยู่มากมาย เขาไม่แสดงให้คนอื่นเห็นง่ายๆ|<color=#097a76>หอสมบัติ</color> คือเหมืองทองคำแท้ ต่อให้รวยแค่ไหนก็อดใจไม่เสียเงินไม่ได้หรอก|เจ้าหนุ่ม อย่าไปนึกว่าของใน <color=#097a76>หอสมบัติ</color> จะเป็นช่องทางหาเงิน ระวังอย่าเคี้ยวมากเกินไป|สาวๆ ใน <color=#097a76>ตำหนักพิสุทธิ์</color> ล้วนอ่อนโยนและน่ารัก แค่คิดก็น่ารักแล้ว ทำให้ข้าใจสั่น|จอมยุทธ์ที่เข้ามาในเมืองทำอะไรต้องระวัง ไม่เช่นนั้น ถ้าเจ้าทำให้สาธารณชนขุ่นเคืองและโดนทางการจับได้ เจ้าจะได้ไปนอนกินข้าวแดงในคุก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Maiden House has been quite lively recently, an old woman has been making a fuss at the front door of Maiden House every day, wanting to break into Maiden House to find her husband, isn't this asking for trouble?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เมื่อเร็วๆ นี้ ตำหนักพิสุทธ์ค่อนข้างคึกคัก หญิงชราคนหนึ่งมาวุ่นวายที่หน้าประตูตำหนักพิสุทธ์ทุกวัน อยากบุกเข้าไปในตำหนักพิสุทธ์เพื่อตามหาสามีของเธอ นี่ไม่ก่อปัญหาหรอกเหรอ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: There's a bald man sneaking around the Ruined shrine to the north of the city, he looks like a wicked spirit, probably not a good person.

There is a place called Epiphyllum Valley in Wuyue, where the mountains are clear and the water is beautiful, and there are many wild monkeys and brown bears, which are fierce and brutal, and ordinary people can't go in to investigate.
But there is a sexy and gorgeous beauty living inside, if you are lucky enough to kiss her, you will have no regrets even if you die.
I saw this with my own eyes, not a Rumour listener, I almost lost my life for this, so if you want to know the location of Epiphyllum Valley, it's not a loss to spend a few coins.

<color=#097a76>The courtesan of Maiden House has set up four riddles, claiming that anyone who can crack them can enjoy her favor</color>. I've suffered before, those four riddles are simply deliberately difficult!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: <color=#097a76>หญิงคณิกาแห่งตำหนักพิสุทธ์ ได้ตั้งปริศนาขึ้นมาสี่ข้อ โดยอ้างว่าใครก็ตามที่สามารถไขปริศนาได้ก็สามารถชื่นชมยินดีกับเธอได้</color> ข้าเคยทนทุกข์มาก่อน ปริศนาทั้งสี่นั้นจงใจยาก!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: <color=#097a76>Jiujiang Water Camp</color> is already the largest gang on the river, and recently they have been recruiting and buying horses to expand their power everywhere, could it be that they want to dominate both land and water?
Kid, I see you're a martial artist, do you want to make money with your skills?
As long as it's not illegal, I'd love to make money with my skills.
Let me tell you, there's an underground Arena in Lin'an City, called <color=#c44b0e>Underground Arena</color>.
If you can defeat all the opponents in the Underground Arena, you can get a very generous bounty, and I heard you can even request a unique knife technique from the people there.
Where is this Underground Arena? I haven't seen any trace of an Arena in the city.
Don't mention you, even I haven't found out the exact location yet. I heard the <color=#c44b0e>performing man</color> in the Market knows the details, if you're interested you can ask him.
Why don't you ask him directly?
That guy charges too much, I don't have that much money to give him, so it's the same if you ask him and then tell me.
I've found out the location of the Underground Arena and how to get in, do you want to know?
Stop beating around the bush, tell me quickly!
(Is it really okay to just tell him the information I've worked so hard to find?)
I didn't expect your price to be higher than his, I might as well ask him directly.
I can't guarantee that his price is still the same, and if you come to me again, my price won't be the same either.
Fine, I'll buy your information. Tell me quickly.
You tell the other party the location of the Underground Arena and the secret code to enter without any reservation.
I hope this money is well spent.\nAt such a young age, you really have the potential to be a cunning merchant.
<color=#097a76>There's a mysterious box hidden behind the main hall of the Lin'an Government Office</color>. You might want to check it out when you have the chance.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: <color=#097a76>มีกล่องลึกลับซ่อนอยู่หลังห้องโถงใหญ่ของศาลาว่าการเมืองหลินอัน</color> เจ้าอาจจะต้องลองไปตรวจสอบดูเมื่อเจ้ามีโอกาส

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I hope your information is useful to me. Don't make me waste my time.
You tell the other party the location of the Underground Arena and the secret code to enter without any reservation.
I don't know what's in that box either. You might as well try your luck.
You tell the other party the location of the Underground Arena and the secret code to enter without any reservation.
I didn't expect such a straightforward young man. It's quite unexpected.\nHowever, I won't take advantage of you. Consider these items as your reward.
Kid, have you been to the Enlighten Tower?\nAnyone with some martial arts skills has gone there to try their luck at treasure hunting.
What's going on at the Enlighten Tower? What does treasure hunting mean?
How can you not know about such a big event?
I just arrived in Lin'an City recently, and I haven't had time to stroll around, so I haven't had time to inquire about what happened in the city.
In that case, let me tell you.
Thank you for your guidance.
This Enlighten Tower was originally used to suppress the river tide, later it became a place for dignitaries to play and sightsee, ordinary people are not allowed to enter.

Recently, a big shot from the Imperial City Department visited the Enlighten Tower and set up a treasure hunt Arena, claiming that anyone who can reach the top floor will receive a priceless treasure and the opportunity to join the Imperial City Department.
I don't know what the Imperial City Department is, but if it can be listed alongside a priceless treasure as the final reward, it must not be bad.

We ordinary people only hear that the Imperial City Department is very powerful, even the royal family and relatives dare not provoke them, I heard that even Prince Kang Wang is very polite to that big shot.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คนธรรมดาอย่างพวกเราได้ยินเพียงว่าหน่วยมหาดเล็กวังหลวงมีอำนาจมาก แม้แต่ราชวงศ์และเครือญาติก็ไม่กล้ารบกวนพวกเขา ข้ายังได้ยินมาว่าแม้แต่องค์ชายคังหวังก็ยังต้องสุภาพด้วย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: If that's the case, I'll definitely check it out when I have the chance. Maybe I can even become a high-ranking official in the imperial city.

As long as you don't get caught by the officials in the city, it doesn't matter if you cause trouble. Your skills can come in handy at critical times.|If I knew some sword techniques, I would have joined the <color=#097a76>Langya Sword Pavilion</color> a long time ago. Not only do they teach excellent sword techniques, but they also have the chance to reward divine weapons.|The head of the <color=#097a76>Plant Sect</color> is like a female bodhisattva. She has saved countless lives with her miraculous hands.|The <color=#097a76>Maiden House</color> sells sheet music, but it's a pity that I don't understand music. Even if I buy it, I won't understand it.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตราบใดที่เจ้าไม่โดนเจ้าหน้าที่ในเมืองจับได้ ก็ไม่สำคัญว่าเจ้าจะก่อปัญหาหรือไม่ ทักษะของเจ้ามีประโยชน์ในช่วงเวลาวิกฤติ|ถ้าข้ารู้วิชากระบี่ ข้าคงได้เข้าร่วม <color=#097a76>ศาลากระบี่หลางหยา</color> ไปนานแล้ว พวกเขาไม่เพียงแต่สอนวิทยายุทธกระบี่ที่ยอดเยี่ยมเท่านั้น แต่ยังมีโอกาสที่จะให้รางวัลอาวุธศักดิ์สิทธิ์ด้วย|เจ้าสำนักของ <color=#097a76>สำนักพฤกษา</color> เปรียบเสมือนพระโพธิสัตว์หญิง เธอช่วยชีวิตคนนับไม่ถ้วนด้วยมืออันมหัศจรรย์ของเธอ|<color=#097a76>ตำหนักพิสุทธิ์</color> ขายโน้ตเพลง แต่น่าเสียดายที่ข้าไม่เข้าใจดนตรี ถึงจะซื้อก็ไม่เข้าใจ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Let me tell you, on land, Prince Kang Wang's word is law; but on the river, it's the territory of the Jiujiang Water Camp.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าจะบอกอะไรให้, บนดินแดนคำพูดขององค์ชายคังหวังคือกฎหมาย. แต่เขตแม่น้ำนี่ เป็นอาณาเขตของค่ายน้ำจิ่วเจียง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I can't believe that the Jiujiang Water Camp, such a huge organization, was destroyed overnight. I wonder what powerful force they offended.
It's too easy for those guys from the Horse King Cave. Luckily, they died early. If they fell into my hands, I would make them wish they were dead.
Over the past few decades, various sects have been openly and secretly fighting each other due to sectarian views or personal interests, leading to deep-seated grudges.
Even if the heads of the Taoist Sect and Shifa Temple, the major sects, personally mediate, it's useless.
These sect leaders are highly respected and have a high status. Are there any conflicts they can't resolve?
They are powerful, but they are not the masters of the martial arts world. Others are not their disciples, so why should they obey them?
Could it be that becoming a master of the martial arts world really gives you command over the world?
Of course, this is a rule that has been passed down in the Jianghu for hundreds of years, who dares to defy it!\nHowever, in the past few decades, no new Jianghu Master has emerged.
Is it difficult to become a Jianghu Master? It can't be that there hasn't been one in decades.

To become a Jianghu Master, one must at least have <color=#097a76>prominence</color>, and make the six major sects such as Shifa Temple and Taoist Sect <color=#097a76>willingly submit</color>, and finally <color=#097a76>pass the challenge of the six sect leaders</color>. Only in this way will one be elected as Jianghu Master.

Becoming a Jianghu Master is so troublesome, not only do you need fame, but also the submission of the six major sects, and finally you have to surpass all in skills... With such strict conditions, it's no wonder that there hasn't been a new Jianghu Master for decades.

Nowadays, these Jianghu sects, with their people and territories, are not easy to deal with. Even if a Jianghu Master emerges and temporarily subdues them, they will eventually become disobedient over time, and the Jianghu Master will become a mere figurehead.
So, according to you, there's no solution to this chaotic situation in the Jianghu?
There are always solutions, it depends on whether you have the courage and strength...

Just eliminate the six largest forces one by one, the remaining small sects will naturally not dare to cause trouble for self-preservation. Then, take the opportunity to strike them, those who comply will prosper and those who resist will perish. At that time, wouldn't the martial arts world be in one person's hands.
Isn't this the path to becoming a Jianghu Conqueror?\nThe path of the conqueror is filled with countless bloody battles.
Yes, it is said that every year there are people who overestimate their abilities and want to become a Jianghu Conqueror, and as a result, the grass on their graves is half a person high.

The items in this <color=#097a76>Glittering Artifact House</color> are all extraordinary, and the prices are also incredibly high.|In today's world, it's all about human relationships.\nGifts to build relationships, without some connections, how can you survive in this world.|The owner of the <color=#097a76>Zhangyue Casino</color> is a fierce and hot-tempered beauty, who is said to only appreciate men with guts.|The master of the Imperial School is knowledgeable, if you can get his guidance, it's better than reading the books of sages for ten years.|I heard that the emperor went hunting in Yan Country and has not returned yet, I really don't understand, what is there to hunt in such a cold place.|The money I've earned in my lifetime probably isn't enough to splurge once in the <color=#097a76>Tower of Prosperity</color>.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สินค้าใน <color=#097a76>หอไข่มุก</color> นี้ล้วนมีความพิเศษและราคาก็สูงอย่างไม่น่าเชื่อ|ในโลกปัจจุบัน ทุกอย่างเกี่ยวกับความสัมพันธ์ของมนุษย์.\nของขวัญเพื่อสร้างความสัมพันธ์โดยไม่ต้องรู้จักกัน คุณจะอยู่รอดในโลกนี้ได้อย่างไร|เจ้าของ <color=#097a76>บ่อนจางเยว่</color> เป็นสาวงามที่ดุร้ายและอารมณ์ร้อน ว่ากันว่าชื่นชมผู้ชายที่กล้าหาญเท่านั้น|ปรมาจารย์ของสำนักบัณฑิตหลวงมีความรู้กว้างขวาง หากได้รับคำแนะนำ ดีกว่าอ่านหนังสือปราชญ์มาสิบปี|ข้าได้ยินมาว่าจักรพรรดิไปล่าสัตว์ในแคว้นหยานแล้วยังไม่กลับมา, ข้าไม่เข้าใจจริงๆ ว่าจะล่าอะไรในที่เย็นๆ แบบนั้น|เงินที่หามาทั้งชีวิตคงไม่เพียงพอที่จะไปซื้อของที่ <color=#097a76>หอไข่มุก</color> สักครั้ง .

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The special envoy of Yan Country has come to Daliang City again, I wonder what excessive demands he will make this time.
Do these special envoys from Yan Country come often?
They come every now and then, and each time they cause some trouble in the city, and the government doesn't dare to intervene.
What excessive demands do they make each time?
It's always about Gold, livestock and the like. The court keeps raising taxes to satisfy those people from Yan Country, which is really hard on us common people.

But this time the special envoy from Yan Country seems to be different, he didn't put on any extravagant show after entering the city, and he didn't disturb the people, I really don't know what he's up to.
Where is this person now? If I get a chance, I must go and see what these people are up to.
The special envoy of Yan Kingdom is now at the <color=#097a76>Tower of Prosperity</color>. The one guarded by Yan Kingdom soldiers is him.

I heard that the head of the Tomb Raider Sect has many ways to make a fortune overnight. If I can establish relations with him and get a hint, I won't have to worry about food and drink for the rest of my life.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าได้ยินมาว่าหัวหน้าสำนักปล้นสุสานมีหลายวิธีในการสร้างรายได้ในชั่วข้ามคืน ถ้าข้าสามารถสร้างความสัมพันธ์กับเขาและรับคำใบ้ได้ ข้าจะไม่ต้องกังวลเรื่องอาหารและเครื่องดื่มไปตลอดชีวิต

I'm so poor and they've never helped me.|I heard there's a female head-catcher in the <color=#097a76>Crime Investigation Bureau</color>. ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าหนู เจ้าเคยไป<color=#097a76>หอไข่มุก</color>ในเมืองนี้ไหม? ข้าจะบอกความลับให้เจ้าทราบ ที่นั้นเต็มไปด้วยสมบัติล้ำค่า แต่น่าเสียดายที่มีการคุ้มกันแน่นหนาและคนธรรมดาไม่สามารถเข้าใกล้ได้|พระสงฆ์ที่<color=#097a76>อารามฉีฟา</color>มักจะเทศนาเรื่องความดีอยู่เสมอ ข้ารำคาญเมื่อเห็นพวกเขา ข้าอยากจะทุบตีพวกเขาเพื่อระบายความโกรธ แต่พวกเขาก็สบายดี และสุดท้ายข้าก็หมดแรง|หัวขโมยทั้งเล็กและใหญ่ในเมืองต้าเหลียงส่วนใหญ่มาจาก<color=#097a76>รังนกนางแอ่น</color>ด้านนอก เมือง. พวกเขาพูดถึงการปล้นคนรวยเพื่อช่วยคนจน แต่ทั้งหมดนี้มันเป็นเรื่องไร้สาระ ข้ายากจนมากและพวกเขาไม่เคยช่วยข้าเลย|ข้าได้ยินมาว่ามีนักล่าเงินรางวัลผู้หญิงใน<color=#097a76>สำนักงานสืบสวนอาชญากรรม</color> แม้ว่าเธอจะไม่สวยเป็นพิเศษ แต่เธอก็ยังเป็นหนึ่งในร้อย น่าเสียดายจริงๆ|ในความคิดของข้า <color=#097a76>วัดขงจื้อ</color>เป็นเรื่องตลกใหญ่ เต็มไปด้วยคนแก่ คนอ่อนแอ คนป่วย คนทุพพลภาพ ข้าไม่รู้ว่าจะต้องโง่แค่ไหนถึงจะอยากเข้าวัดขงจื้อ

Next time I'll bring enough capital to make Zhangyue Casino go bankrupt. By then, the beautiful Yi Zhihua will have to throw herself into my arms.
Your luck won't last forever, and such a big money-making loophole will surely be interfered with by someone.
Who dares to cut off my wealth, I won't let him off!
Looking at your outfit, you must also be here in Daliang City to participate in the <color=#097a76>Wind and Cloud Arena</color>, right?
What Wind and Cloud Arena? I've never heard of it.
Ah, you haven't heard of the Wind and Cloud Arena?
I just arrived in Daliang City and know nothing. Could you please introduce it to me?

The Wind and Cloud Arena is an open-air arena in Daliang City, divided into four stages: Heaven, Earth, Mysterious, and Yellow. If you successfully challenge five opponents, you can advance from the Yellow stage to the Heaven stage.
What are the benefits of participating in this Wind and Cloud Arena?
Money and fame are secondary. The prize for the top rank in the heavenly stage is said to be a supreme elixir that grants longevity! Such a big temptation, anyone would want to give it a try.
I don't believe in the top-grade elixir, but I'm very interested in this opportunity to make money and gain fame.

Only in this way will one be elected as Jianghu Master.

Becoming a Jianghu Master is so troublesome, not only do you need fame, but also the submission of the six major sects, and finally you have to surpass all in skills... With such strict conditions, it's no wonder that there hasn't been a new Jianghu Master for decades.

Nowadays, these Jianghu sects, with their people and territories, are not easy to deal with. Even if a Jianghu Master emerges and temporarily subdues them, they will eventually become disobedient over time, and the Jianghu Master will become a mere figurehead.
So, according to you, there's no solution to this chaotic situation in the Jianghu?
There are always solutions, it depends on whether you have the courage and strength...

Just eliminate the six largest forces one by one, the remaining small sects will naturally not dare to cause trouble for self-preservation. Then, take the opportunity to strike them, those who comply will prosper and those who resist will perish. At that time, wouldn't the martial arts world be in one person's hands.
Isn't this the path to becoming a Jianghu Conqueror?\nThe path of the conqueror is filled with countless bloody battles.
Yes, it is said that every year there are people who overestimate their abilities and want to become a Jianghu Conqueror, and as a result, the grass on their graves is half a person high.

"{PlayerSurName} Young hero is allowed to participate in the martial arts event <color=#c44b0e>Peak of Challenge</color>. If you are ready, you can meet at the <color=#c44b0e>Peak of Challenge</color>."
A contest for the world's number one, I suppose all participants are top-notch experts. I must be fully prepared to accept the invitation, so as not to waste this excellent opportunity.
Who is coming and what is your purpose here?
Farewell, see you again!
I am {PlayerName}, invited to participate in the Peak of Challenge event.

The Peak of Challenge is over seven hundred feet high, and you can't reach the top without excellent Qinggong. \nI see that your steps are heavy and lack the sense of lightness, you can't reach the top of the Peak of Challenge no matter what.
The martial arts I practice are not known for their agility. Does this mean I have no chance to compete for the world's number one?
There is a remedy now. If you don't mind the trouble, you can practice Qinggong on the wooden stakes in the Shifa Temple Pond. However, it takes effect slowly and requires some patience.
Having a way is better than being completely blocked, I'll go and try it now.
Isn't it a martial arts event? Why are there so few people?
Everyone present is a brilliant talent. It's not an exaggeration to say that it's a rare martial arts event with all the heroes gathered here.
Apart from {PlayerName}, everyone here has been competing for the title of "world's number one" for decades, and there is still no conclusion.
I hope that your participation this time can bring a different variable to this stalemate...
How should we debate?
As long as someone can beat everyone here one by one, he is the world's number one recognized by everyone!
So simple, let's start quickly, I can't wait!
{PlayerName}, let me test your current ability first.
{PlayerName}, it seems that you have no chance to be the world's number one...
You fainted due to severe injuries, and after a long time, you finally woke up slowly.
Indeed, the student surpasses the master, I'll just watch from the sidelines.
I have long lost my desire for fame and fortune, and I came here this time to guide the younger generation.\n{PlayerSurName}, let me see your true skills!
Young people are eager for quick success and lack a few points of skill.\nHowever, I would rather give way and give you this opportunity to make a name for yourself.
Buddha of Immeasurable Life, {PlayerName}, don't disappoint me.
Indeed, you did not disappoint me. The martial arts world is yours in the future.
Amitabha.
Well, well.
Congratulations {PlayerName}, you are the world's number one...
Wait a minute!!!
Is it you?! I didn't expect you to escape. Are you here to make trouble today?
Since it's a contest for the world's number one, why didn't anyone notify me to participate?\nDo you want to close the door and secretly elect a world's number one? I'm the first one to disagree!
What do you want?
It's simple, let this little guy compete with me. If he can make me admit defeat, then I'll go my own way, and he can be the world's number one.
{PlayerName} my friend, what do you think?
Obedience is better than politeness.
{PlayerName} my friend, this person has already mastered his martial arts, don't be careless!
How dare you try to kill me!
I've been trapped by you as a demon for more than ten years, today is the day I come to settle the score!
It seems that it's true that the new generation surpasses the old one after thirty years.
Little guy, the title of the world's number one is yours now!
The world's number one...
Am I already the world's number one...
What should I do next?
{PlayerName} my friend...
The matter that has been hanging for decades is finally settled today.
Congratulations to {PlayerName} my friend, you are now truly the world's number one!
These top masters are so vulnerable, I really feel lonely at the top.
What should I do next?
{PlayerName} my friend, you're finally here.
Isn't it a martial arts gathering? Why are you the only one here?
Perhaps {PlayerName} my friend knows better than me why the others didn't show up.
Is this a trap, are you trying to judge me?
My friend, you misunderstand, the grudges of the martial arts world have nothing to do with me.
I'm just a witness to this peak debate, now that the others can't make it on time, it seems that the title of the world's number one belongs to you...
When did the title of the world's number one become so cheap, try to win over me first!
This guy is in the wrong place, aren't you going to do something about it?
I, old man, can't control him.
What should I do, what should I do
Hey, don't waste my time, I'm quite busy, can we speed this up?
This is your doing, don't blame me for being ruthless.
Enough talk, make your move.
Done, wrap it up!
I need to check if there's another bug leak, how can anyone beat me in this martial arts world.
I won, I finally won
Ban Ping Shenxiancu...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ป้านผิงเสิ่นเซียนซู...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Heh, it's nothing special.
{PlayerName} my friend...
You've offended that guy, what are you planning to do next?
That guy shouldn't hold a grudge, right?\nWhat should I do next?
Now that you are truly the world's number one, your future martial arts journey will surely be dull and boring, and you've offended someone you shouldn't have...
Sigh, take care of yourself.

{PlayerName}, this is your great opportunity, you must seize it.\nShow them how powerful you are!
If you want to travel the martial arts world in the future, just find us at the old place.
(Playing a tune for you, "Entering the Battle", to cheer you on.)
Don't worry, I'll definitely show them how powerful I am! You guys go back to the old place and wait for me!
Now I have both the original and translated versions of Vairocana Solar Sutra, I want to see what kind of profound martial arts this is.
