Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I see, no wonder it requires joint consultation with the original to fully interpret.
As expected, you have also seen through the red dust and finally become a monk.
Are you... Do I know you?
All the rouge is but a skeleton...
You are the scholar I met at the entrance of Shifa Temple before, I didn't expect you to really become a monk.
I am Monk Shi Chi, who became a monk earlier than you, now I am your senior brother.
Nice to meet you, senior brother.
This senior brother looks somewhat familiar, have we met somewhere before?
All the rouge is but a skeleton...
You are the scholar I met at the entrance of Shifa Temple before, I didn't expect you to really become a monk.

You call me senior brother, it seems that you have not yet become a monk, you are a lay disciple of this temple.\nI am Monk Shi Chi, who became a monk earlier than you, indeed I am your senior brother.
Nice to meet you, senior brother.
This master looks somewhat familiar, have we met somewhere before?
All the rouge is but a skeleton...
You are the scholar I met at the entrance of Shifa Temple before, I didn't expect you to really become a monk.
I have no more attachments in the secular world, I only accompany the ancient Buddha with the green lamp for the rest of my life.
I should not disturb the master's cultivation, I will take my leave.
Oh, you didn't want to join us at first, but now you have also become a monk like us.
Senior brother looks a bit familiar, but seems a bit more miserable.
I was just trained by the second senior brother, this is nothing.\nWe met at the entrance of Shifa Temple, at that time I invited you to become a monk with us three for mutual support.
I remember now, you are the martial artist who came to learn from the master.

Now I am your senior brother, my Dharma name is Shi Tan.\nIn the future, you should often exchange ideas with me, so that your martial arts will grow faster. I don't believe I can't beat you if I can't beat the second senior brother.
I will have to ask senior brother for more guidance.
This senior brother looks somewhat familiar, have we met somewhere before?
Can you still recognize me in this state?
I remember now, you are the martial artist who came to learn from the master.
Now my Dharma name is Shi Tan, I am no longer the ignorant country bumpkin I used to be.
You have entered as a lay disciple, it seems that it will be even more difficult to learn the superior martial arts in the temple in the future.
I wonder if senior brother has learned superior martial arts, I sincerely ask senior brother to teach me.

Superior martial arts are not so easy to learn, haven't you seen me practicing every day and getting beaten up, I only have a rough understanding of Arhat Boxing, I don't know when I can learn powerful martial arts like Prajna Palm.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สุดยอดวิทยายุทธนั้นไม่ใช่เรื่องง่ายที่จะฝึกฝนได้. เจ้าไม่เคยเห็นที่ข้าฝึกซ้อมทุกวันแต่ก็ยังถูกทุบตี ข้าแค่มีความเข้าใจคร่าวๆ เกี่ยวกับหมัดอรหันต์ ข้าไม่รู้ว่า เมื่อใดข้าจะสามารถเรียนรู้วิทยายุทธที่ทรงพลังอย่างฝ่ามือปัญญาได้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Senior brother, you can definitely do it, keep going!
In the future, you should often exchange ideas with me, so that your martial arts will grow faster. I don't believe I can't beat you if I can't beat the second senior brother.
Master, you look peculiar, and there is a vaguely familiar feeling, have we met somewhere?
It's you! Did you come in specifically to laugh at me?
I remember now, you are the martial artist who came to learn from the master.
So what if it is, now my Dharma name is Shi Tan, I am no longer the ignorant country bumpkin I used to be.
Master, why are you so embarrassed, do you have to pay such a big price to learn martial arts here?
Humph, do you think it will be easy?\nAnyway, you won't understand what I say, if you were as weak as you, the outcome would be more than just embarrassment.
I didn't expect you to become a monk too, it seems that the excuse you made outside the temple was just pretentious.
Such an unfriendly tone of speech, it feels somewhat familiar...
I remember now, you are the arrogant young master who temporarily became a monk before.\nI didn't expect you to still have such a bad temper after becoming a monk.

I am your senior brother, my Dharma name is Shi Man.\nYou should speak to me with respect, otherwise I will accuse you of disrespecting your senior brother and causing discord among fellow disciples. Be careful, the disciplinary elder brother might confine you!
(He has already become a monk and still calls himself a young master, this senior brother is really arrogant.)
Senior brother is magnanimous, I was wrong.
This senior brother looks somewhat familiar, have we met somewhere before?
You, a secular disciple, are seeking a conversation with me, you must have ulterior motives.
I remember now, you are the arrogant young master who temporarily became a monk before.\nI didn't expect you to still have such a bad temper after becoming a monk.

I am your senior brother, my Dharma name is Shi Man.\nYou should speak to me with respect, otherwise I will accuse you of disrespecting your senior brother and causing discord among fellow disciples. Be careful, the disciplinary elder brother might confine you!
Wow, I'm so scared, I beg senior brother not to stoop to my level.
Humph, you better behave in the future, otherwise you will suffer.
You really think you are something, I call you senior brother when I'm happy, when I'm not, you are nothing in my eyes. You want to suppress me with temple rules, pah!
Senior brother, you can definitely do it, keep going!
You, you, you...
Save your energy, as long as secular disciples don't make big mistakes, they won't be punished for a few words with fellow disciples.
This master looks familiar, have I seen him somewhere?
You are seeking a conversation with me, you must know that I come from a distinguished family, you must have ulterior motives.
I remember now, you are the arrogant young master who temporarily became a monk before.\nI didn't expect you to still have such a bad temper after becoming a monk.
My Dharma name is Shi Man, the abbot of Shifa Temple, Master Hui Yuan, is my master. You should speak to me with respect!
Wow, I'm so scared, I beg the master not to stoop to my level.
Humph, I am someone you can't afford to offend, get out of my sight, don't be an eyesore here.
You really think you are something!\nMaster Hui Yuan has countless disciples and grand-disciples, who do you think you are to be dependent!
You, you, you...
Save your energy, if you don't change your bad temper, if you really offend someone you can't afford to offend, you will be in trouble.
Hey, you are the new disciple of the Shi generation, you didn't greet the senior brother, it's really rude.
Senior brother? You little bean-like guy doesn't look like a senior brother.
Here it is sorted by the order of entry, not by height and age!
I see, then I reluctantly recognize you as the senior brother.
Since it's our first meeting, is there a gift?
Sorry, I almost forgot.
Junior brother salutes senior brother!
You really don't understand the ways of the world, that's not what I want.
There are such small monks in Shifa Temple, it's really pitiful to be vegetarian every day.
Don't look down on people! I am the senior brother of the Shi generation!\nIf you become a monk one day, you have to respectfully call me senior brother.
Don't worry, I won't be so desperate to become a monk.
Alas, it's a pity, your aptitude is just right to learn the superior martial arts of this temple.
What did you say? My aptitude is just right to learn what superior martial arts?!!
No, I didn't say anything.\nYou heard wrong, I said you are handsome, it would be a pity if you become a monk.
Are you treating me as a fool or a deaf...
Who are you, why do you look so unfamiliar?
I just joined Shifa Temple, I'm not familiar with the situation here, I want to request from senior brother.
I am the second senior brother of the Shi generation, my Dharma name is Shi Yu.\nI am responsible for teaching the basic martial arts and guiding the junior brothers in their practice.
Junior brother pays respect to the second senior brother.
Is the master teaching these monks martial arts? The martial arts of Shifa Temple are really fierce.
Peeping at martial arts is a big taboo in the martial arts world, please leave as soon as possible.
My apologies for being nosy, you guys continue your practice, don't mind me.
Just kidding, I'm running away now.
We have a new member in our Shifa Temple, this is a great joy!
I wonder which senior brother you are, how should I address you?
Haha, I'm the third senior brother of the Shixi generation, my Dharma name is Shi E, in charge of the meals in the temple. I don't have any special skills, just that my cooking is so-so.
Are all the meals for so many people in the temple arranged by you? It must be very hard.
It's not hard, I enjoy it.\nBut if junior brother has time to lend a hand, I would be very grateful.
I'm happy to help.
If the donor visits here, are you also interested in our temple's vegetarian meals?
Forgive my ignorance, is the vegetarian meal of Shifa Temple famous as Master requested?
Haha, not to brag, but my top-notch Arhat tofu is so good that even my master's ancestors would praise it after tasting it. It almost made it to the imperial menu.
You praise it so highly, wouldn't it be a pity not to taste such a delicacy?
Unfortunately, not everyone can eat this top-notch Arhat tofu, at least those with high reputation and martial arts skills are qualified to taste this Arhat tofu.
What a mystery, even eating tofu has so many rules.
What did you say? My aptitude is just right to learn what superior martial arts?!!
Hehe, please forgive me, this delicacy is not for everyone, otherwise how can it show its uniqueness?
(Should I return this string of Sandalwood prayer beads to the elder brother?)
Hey, little junior brother, don't go.
What can I do for you, senior brother?
I lost a string of prayer beads, can you help me find it?
Elder brother, have you been anywhere recently?
Big brother, is this prayer bead yours?
That prayer bead is something I've had since I was a child, it might have been left to me by my parents, it means a lot to me.
Benefactor, please wait. Can you help this little monk with a trivial matter?
Little master, is this string of prayer beads yours?

Reading scriptures is beneficial, it's the only way to comprehend the Buddha's teachings.|<color=#c44b0e>Reading scriptures in the Scripture Tower</color> can subtly increase EXP, although it's incredible, it's true.|The advantage of <color=#c44b0e>reading scriptures in the Monk's room</color> is that you can rest in bed at any time, RecoveryStamina.|<color=#c44b0e>Reading scriptures in the quiet room</color>... unless it's absolutely necessary, it's better not to go to such a place.|There are countless scriptures in the Scripture Tower, it's said that there are also many Martial ArtsManuals, I really don't know when I can go in and have a look.|The elder uncle master always finds it too troublesome to enter the Scripture Tower through the main entrance, so he always uses Qinggong to jump directly to the top floor from outside the building, leaving the gatekeeper uncle master feeling helpless.|A monkey appeared in the temple at some point, very spiritual, obsessed with listening to the scriptures, and it is said that it once sneaked into the Scripture Tower to steal scriptures.|The third junior brother always has a smiling and kind face when he sees anyone, looking just like Maitreya Buddha.|The second junior brother is old-fashioned and taciturn, and seems to have no other interests besides studying martial arts.

To use the martial arts of this temple, one must have a kind heart to show its power.|If you lack talent, only diligence can make up for it.|The superior martial arts of this temple cannot be understood without a deep understanding of Buddhism.|If you want to learn more advanced martial arts, you must first have the ability to defeat me.|The elder uncle master's <color=#c44b0e>Dragon Slaying Fist</color> is said to be a skill he was born with.|The disciples in the Copper Man Array are not weaker than me, but they will show some mercy to those who are benevolent.|<color=#c44b0e>Tathagata Palm</color> and <color=#c44b0e>Dharma Staff</color> are the martial arts of this temple, and they have not been passed down for many years.|Only after breaking through the Arhat Array here can you qualify to enter the Arhat Hall to challenge the Golden Body Copper Man Array!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หากต้องการใช้ศิลปะการต่อสู้ของวัด เราต้องมีจิตใจที่เมตตาถึงจะแสดงอานุภาพออกมา|หากคุณขาดพรสวรรค์ มีเพียงความขยันเท่านั้นที่จะชดเชย|วิทยายุทธที่เหนือกว่าของวัดแห่งนี้ไม่สามารถเข้าใจได้หากไม่มีความเข้าใจในพุทธศาสนาอย่างลึกซึ้ง|ถ้าเจ้าต้องการเรียนรู้วิทยายุทธขั้นสูง เจ้าต้องสามารถในการเอาชนะข้าให้ได้ก่อน|<color=#c44b0e>หมัดปราบพยัคฆ์มังกร</color>ของอาจารย์ลุงผู้เฒ่ากล่าวกันว่าเป็นวิทยายุทธที่สร้างมาเพื่อเขา.|ลูกศิษย์ในค่ายมนุษย์ทองแดงไม่ได้ด้วยกว่าข้า แต่ก็ควรจะเมตตาต่อผู้มีศีลธรรมบ้างสิ|<color=#c44b0e>ฝ่ามือตถาคต</color> และ <color=#c44b0e>ไม้เท้าธรรมะ </color> เป็นวิทยายุทธ์ของวัดแห่งนี้ และไม่ได้สืบทอดกันมาหลายปีแล้ว |หลังจากผ่านค่ายอรหันต์ที่นี่เท่านั้น เจ้าจึงจะมีสิทธิ์เข้าสู่หอพระอรหันต์เพื่อท้าทาย ค่ายกลทองคำมนุษย์ทองแดง!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I'll give you this staff technique, it's up to you whether to practice it or not.
I'll give you this boxing technique, it's up to you whether to practice it or not.

The way of cooking is the same as martial arts, it's all about practice.|It's okay to come here for free food and drink, but don't ruin the plants in the vegetable garden, they are my hard work.|If you also know some cooking skills, you can use the stove in the kitchen here.|I came to Shifa Temple just to focus on cooking vegetarian food, I'm not interested in practicing martial arts, reading scriptures, or understanding Buddhism.|The most important thing to join Shifa Temple is to abide by the rules and precepts, those who do not follow the rules deserve to be locked in the dark room to copy scriptures.|I don't know when someone can help me with the cooking, so I can focus on studying recipes.|I have to make it nutritious and delicious, why don't I become a royal chef with this skill.|Don't look for me if you want to learn martial arts, but we can talk if you want to learn cooking.
Fortunately, I arrived in time to catch today's morning class.
Seeing that all five aggregates are empty...
...Endure all suffering.
Sariputra, form does not differ from emptiness
Form is emptiness, emptiness is form
Neither born nor extinguished, neither defiled nor pure
The mind has no obstacles, and because there are no obstacles
Gaté gaté, paragaté

...squeak squeak squeak.
Squeak squeak, squeak squeak squeak...
Squeak squeak squeak, squeak squeak squeak...

One shichen later...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Oh no! Today <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color> forgot to go to the Hall of Great Strength for morning class!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่นะ! วันนี้ <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color> ลืมไปหอแห่งความยิ่งใหญ่สำหรับชั้นเรียนตอนเช้า!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I didn't go to morning class again, this is a bit of a loss.
I forgot to go to morning class again...
Forget it, if I didn't go, I didn't go.
You can earn Sect contribution by attending morning class at Chen Shi every day and helping a few senior brothers. Sect contribution can be exchanged for special items from this temple here.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าสามารถรับความดีความชอบสำนักได้โดยการเข้าร่วมชั้นเรียนตอนเช้ายาม Chen Shi ทุกวันและช่วยเหลือศิษย์พี่ศิษย์น้องอาวุโสสองสามคน ความดีความชอบสำนักสามารถแลกเปลี่ยนเป็นสิ่งของพิเศษได้จากวัดนี้ที่นี่

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: If you want to practice martial arts, you can go to the Training field to find your second junior brother Shi Yu. You can start with hitting wooden stakes and progress gradually.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หากเจ้าต้องการฝึกฝนวิทยายุทธต่อสู้ เจ้าสามารถไปที่ลานฝึกซ้อมเพื่อตามหาสือหยูศิษย์พี่รองของเจ้า เจ้าสามารถเริ่มต้นด้วยการตีเสาไม้และค่อยๆ ก้าวหน้าไป

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: To learn superior Martial Arts, you must pass through the Arhat Formation of Shi Yu to enter the Arhat Hall and challenge the Bronze Man Formation. Once you reach a certain level in the Bronze Man Formation, you can receive the teachings of superior martial arts.

In the Scripture Tower, you can read scriptures to comprehend Buddhism. If you want to reach higher levels, in addition to having a deep understanding of Buddhism, you also need to pass the test of the bronze man array.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ภายในหอพระคัมภีร์ ้เจ้าสามารถอ่านพระคัมภีร์เพื่อทำความเข้าใจพุทธศาสนาได้ หากเจ้าต้องการก้าวไปสู่ระดับที่สูงขึ้น, นอกจากจะมีความเข้าใจพระพุทธศาสนาอย่างลึกซึ้งแล้ว เจ้ายังต้องผ่านการทดสอบของมนุษย์ทองแดงอีกด้วย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The martial arts of our temple can only be comprehended by those with great Buddha's fate, so let everything take its natural course, there is no need to force it.
Did you understand?
Amitabha.
The Shifa Temple is about to open a small competition, specifically to test the learning progress of the disciples. The winner will directly qualify to enter the Arhat Hall.
Are you ready to participate in the small competition?
Good, this year's small competition of Shifa Temple will start immediately, I am looking forward to it.

Shi Ming, although you joined the latest, among the new disciples, your Martial Arts achievement is the highest. I grant you permission to go to <color=#c44b0e>Shi Yu</color> to challenge the Arhat Formation. If you pass the Arhat Formation, you can enter the Arhat Hall and have the opportunity to practice superior martial arts.
Shi Ming, don't you want to enter the Arhat Hall?
(Suddenly remembered that <color=#c44b0e>Shi Ming</color> is the Dharma name given to me by the abbot, and Shi Yu is the second senior brother on the training field, I didn't react for a moment.)
I was overjoyed and lost my composure for a moment, please forgive me, Master.
As a Buddhist disciple, we should be without sorrow or joy. In addition to studying Martial Arts, you also need to temper your mind.
I will heed the Master's teachings.
This defeat is not a big deal, it was expected.\nThe small competition will reopen in three days, you can participate again.
Why is the third senior brother here so late.\nShould I follow and find out?
You've been dragging this on for so long, and you haven't gotten what the master wants, you should know the consequences!
The temple is watching closely, and there have been many newcomers recently. We always need to avoid people's eyes and ears to act, so it has been delayed for some time.
There's a guy who's been getting close to you recently, do you want me to kill him for you, so he doesn't ruin the good thing.
Are they talking about me?
If we can kill one less person, let's kill one less, as a way to accumulate blessings for the master.
Are you, the bloody Yama, talking to me about compassion today?\nDon't think that just because you've shaved your head, you really consider yourself a Bodhisattva who saves the suffering!
The Great Sun Tathagata that the master wants...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตะวันตถาคตสูตรที่ท่านอาจารย์ต้องการ...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Silence!
Junior brother, you've been hiding long enough, come out!
Should I call you third senior brother, or bloody Yama?
I don't want to be your enemy, it's best if you pretend nothing happened.\nIn the future, I will still be your third senior brother, and you will still be my junior brother.
Do you still want to let him live and run away? Can you bear the consequences if you ruin the master's big plan!
Junior brother, don't oppose me, okay? You can't beat me, I don't want you to die by my hand.
Fatso, are you deaf when I talk to you!\nThis kid has to die today, even if the Heavenly King comes, he can't save him!
The Heavenly King...
The Heavenly King can't save him, I will!!!
You dare to betray the master...
Now I need an answer from you, are you going to be my enemy?
Third Senior Brother, I haven't tasted your Arhat tofu yet, I don't want to miss such a delicacy.
What a pity, my state of mind has changed now, and I can no longer make such transcendent delicacies.
Junior Brother, I won't be able to accompany you in the future, take care of yourself.
You don't know how long you've been unconscious, you struggle to get up...
Did Third Senior Brother knock me out because he wants to do something without me?
What's this in my arms?
Is this what Third Senior Brother gave me? What on earth is he trying to do...
As long as you do something harmful to Shifa Temple, you are my enemy! It's not me against you, but you against the entire Shifa Temple!
In that case, you might as well die!
I didn't expect your martial arts to be so high!
Hehe, are you surprised? Unfortunately, I can't kill you today.
Junior Brother, cherish the next few days. It won't be long, or even very soon, you and all these old monks in Shifa Temple will die, none of you will escape!
What are you going to do?
What on earth is this guy trying to do?!
You don't know how long you've been unconscious, you struggle to get up...
I didn't expect that guy to show mercy to me and not kill me.
What's this in my arms?
Is this what that guy gave me? What on earth is he up to.
Abbot, it's terrible! Shi Ming was attacked and is in critical condition!
{yell} What!!!
{yell} Abbot, watch out!!!
What are you doing!!!
Third, Third Senior Brother! Weren't you supposed to have already...
Hmph, with your level of skill, you thought you could take my life?\nI just held my breath to fool you!
You--!
(Opera recitation) My lord, have you finished your task~
The old bald donkey has been seriously injured by me, his Vajra is not so invincible after all.
Uh, puh--
I didn't expect the old bald donkey to actually injure me...
(Opera recitation) More harm than good, what use is there in keeping you~
Shi E, have you really chosen this path of no return?
Old bald donkey, do you remember? You said I was too obsessed, lacked a forgiving heart, and refused to let me enter the Arhat Hall to comprehend superior martial arts.

From that moment on, it was you who forced me onto this path of no return. I want to prove to you that I don't need the charity of the Shifa Temple, the so-called Arhat Hall, or the Golden Copper Man, I can still master unparalleled martial arts!!!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตั้งแต่บัดนี้ไป เจ้าคือผู้ที่บังคับให้ข้าเข้าสู่เส้นทางที่ไม่อาจหวนกลับได้ ข้าอยากจะพิสูจน์ให้เจ้าเห็นว่าข้าไม่ต้องการความเมตตาจากอารามฉีฟาหรือหออรหันต์หรือมนุษย์ทองคำทองแดง ข้าก็ยังสามารถเชี่ยวชาญวรยุทธ์ไร้เทียมทานได้ !!!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: (Opera recitation) Cut the grass and remove the roots, leave none behind~
(Opera recitation) The whole army is wiped out, what to do, what to do~
(Opera recitation) Revenge is not too late for ten years, retreat is the best strategy!
Abbot, are you alright?

It's nothing, I didn't expect Shi E to fail to appreciate my good intentions in the end. He was willing to collude with the Nine Factions Sect in order to master superior martial arts, and now he has died, his resentment should have dissipated.
But these people from the Nine Factions Sect are so eager to make a move on the Shifa Temple, it seems that the Shifa Temple doesn't have much time left.
You mean they are from the Nine Factions Sect?

The leader is one of the protectors of the Nine Factions Sect, Feng Xizi, who is absurd and unpredictable, sometimes male, sometimes female, sometimes old, sometimes young, but his martial arts skills are not weak.

The future of Shifa Temple rests on your shoulders. From today, I <color=#c44b0e>grant you permission to leave the temple and travel</color>. Try to uncover the conspiracy of Nine Factions Sect as soon as possible, there might still be a glimmer of hope for Shifa Temple.

From now on, you need to be vigilant about the movements of Nine Factions Sect in the martial arts world. Try to uncover their conspiracy as soon as possible, there might still be a glimmer of hope for Shifa Temple.
You have made a great contribution today, so I will teach you a unique skill, which will be of great benefit to your journey in the martial arts world!
Thank you, Abbot!
Thank you, Abbot!
Shifa Temple has been established for hundreds of years. If it is destroyed by you today, it is the will of heaven, and I can do nothing about it.
(Is it really necessary to destroy Shifa Temple when things come to a head?)
Put down the butcher's knife and become a Buddha on the spot, Amitabha.
The sea of suffering is boundless, but turning back is the shore.
You little rascal, I didn't expect you to harbor such malicious thoughts! I am blind to have been involved with you.
In that case, I have no choice but to use the Vajra Exorcist!

No more incense burning,
No more lingering Buddhist chants,
The Buddha's smile when he picked up a flower in the past has now become a joke.
The ancient temple that has stood for hundreds of years has finally collapsed today!
Is the Buddha taller, or the devil taller?
Today's battle will surely go down in history and be remembered in the martial arts world.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I am {PlayerName}, may I ask who you are?
In this Yan Yun Iron Army Palace big tent, the one sitting in this position, besides me, the marshal Wan Yan Wuzhu, there will be no second person.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเต็นท์ขนาดใหญ่ของกองทัพเหล็กหลวงหยานหยุน, ผู้ที่นั่งอยู่ในตำแหน่งนี้ นอกจากข้าแล้ว จอมพลหวันหยานอู๋จู, จะไม่มีบุคคลที่สอง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: So you are Wan Yan Wuzhu.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ดังนั้นเจ้าคือหวันหยานอู๋จู

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I pay my respects to Marshal Wan Yan.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, I have heard of your name for a long time, no need for formalities, please get up quickly.
Thank you, Marshal.
I pay my respects to Marshal Wan Yan.
Hmm, rise.
Thank you, Marshal.
I pay my respects to Marshal Wan Yan.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, I have heard of your name for a long time, and seeing you today, you are indeed a young hero!
Marshal, you flatter me.
I pay my respects to Marshal Wan Yan.
A mere martial artist, you are quite tough in front of me, the marshal.
You are not among the ranks of heaven, earth, parents, and teachers, so you are not worthy of my kneeling.
The Yan Yun Iron Army is invincible!
{PlayerSurName} brother, well done!
{PlayerName} is a role model for our army!
Sir {PlayerName} is brave!
Sir {PlayerSurName} is invincible!!
Who is there? Those with unknown identities will be killed without mercy!!!
If that's the case, then go in, but don't wander around and look around. No one can save you if something happens.
Hahaha, are you joking?
Do I look like I'm joking?
Boy, this marshal hasn't heard such arrogant words for a long time.
Since you have the courage to annihilate my Yan Yun Iron Army, dare you enter the camp?
Courageous! Spirited!\nHowever...
However what?
Those who are brave but lack strategy tend to die early, and today you will be no exception.
In the face of absolute power, all conspiracies and tricks are nothing but illusory bubbles.
Since you are so confident, let this marshal see if you can be an exception.
It's more interesting to slowly eliminate you from the periphery, I won't put myself in danger.
From the moment you dared to provoke, you were already in danger.\nThis marshal is waiting for you in the camp, let's see if you have the ability to reach me.
Hehe, I'm afraid you can't stand the loneliness and come to see me.
What a bullshit Yan Yun Iron Army, with this ability you still want to unify the Central Plains?
Pah, trash!
Get lost, you riffraff!
Are you here to deliver a reply to Lü Wenhuan?\nWhere's the letter, give it to this marshal.
General Lü wrote in his letter that you are young but insightful, knowing the principle of abandoning darkness for light.
This marshal appreciates you very much, I believe you are a smart person, and you should know how to choose when the time comes.
Reply to General Lü, although he has the intention to surrender, the price he offered is not small, this marshal needs to test his sincerity.
This marshal is about to lead the army south to attack Chuxiang City, if he can defend it, then negotiate with this marshal.
I will reply to General Lü right away.
General Lü wrote in his letter that you are young but stubborn and don't understand the principle of seeking benefits and avoiding harm.
It's indeed unusual for a fool like you to survive until now, I wonder if you will regret it when disaster strikes.
Reply to General Lü, since you all want to test the bottom line of this marshal, then this marshal will fulfill your wish.
This marshal is about to lead the army south to attack Chuxiang City, if you can defend it, then stick to your ridiculous national righteousness.
I will reply to General Lü right away.
Brother, may I ask who is the old man in this cage?
Are you new here? This is our rarity, this is the current Xuan He Emperor of Zhao!
Are you kidding me, how could a country's emperor be locked up here?
Why would I lie to you!
This old guy is our marshal's bargaining chip in negotiating with Zhao, and has already asked for a lot of good things. When the oil and water are squeezed dry, this old guy will not survive.
He has enjoyed a lifetime of glory and wealth, and now he lives like a dog, it's so satisfying to watch.
I've never seen an emperor in my life, let alone a living one, can I go in and have a look?
Although this PrisonKey is on me, I dare not OpenPrison without permission.\nOpening the prison without orders is a beheading offense.
In that case, I won't make it difficult for you, brother.
Brother, I heard that the current Xuan He Emperor of Zhao is locked up here?
Yes, this is no secret in our Palace Camp.
Such a disgrace for a king to be treated like livestock, is the Marshal planning to keep him locked up like this?
This old guy is our marshal's bargaining chip in negotiating with Zhao, and has already asked for a lot of good things. When the oil and water are squeezed dry, this old guy will not survive.
He has enjoyed a lifetime of glory and wealth, and now he lives like a dog, it's so satisfying to watch.
Alright, there's nothing to see here, you better run away quickly, or else if the Marshal sees us, we'll be in big trouble.
In that case, I won't make it difficult for you, brother.
Who goes there? This is a military camp, intruders will be killed!
The prisoner greets the military officer.\nMay I ask if the officer has any orders?
Who are you and why are you locked up here?
The prisoner's name is not worth mentioning, being locked up here is what I deserve.
There's nothing else, you don't have to kneel, get up.
Thank you, officer.
The prisoner greets the military officer.\nMay I ask if the officer has any orders?
Are you the Xuan He Emperor of Zhao?
The prisoner dares not claim to be the emperor, now I'm just a prisoner under the Marshal.
Living a life worse than pigs and dogs as an emperor, do you loathe the Marshal?
It's fate, the prisoner deserves it, how can I blame others.
It's good that you think this way, get up, I have nothing else.
Thank you, officer.
Who are you and why are you locked up here?
You don't look like a Yan person, nor do you look like a soldier or officer of Yan, it's no harm for me to tell you.
I am the current emperor of Zhao - Xuan He Emperor!
Are you kidding me, how could a country's emperor be locked up here?
Yan used the excuse of a face-to-face talk between the two monarchs to deceive me out of the palace, who would have thought they set up an ambush, my guards were all killed, and I became a prisoner.
Yan keeps asking for ransom from our dynasty, but once they get the ransom, they keep breaking their promise and refuse to let me go.
You are brave and skilled, if you can find a way to save me, I promise to reward you with a high position and great power when I return to the court!
Thank you, Your Majesty!
Can you tell me your background now?
Greetings, Your Majesty!
Who are you, aren't you afraid of death for breaking into the prison?
It seems that I was overthinking...
I am {PlayerName}, favored by the head of Cai Yuanchang, and given the title of <color=#c44b0e> Hui Yuan </color>.
{PlayerSurName} Hui Yuan, please get up.\nYou are a scholar, how dare you enter this den of wolves, are you colluding with the Yan people?
I have some martial arts skills, otherwise I wouldn't dare to break into the prison.\nThis Yan army camp is a den of wolves to you, but to me, it's just like strolling in my own backyard.
I am a commoner {PlayerName}, wandering around the world, free and easy.

So you are the brave {PlayerSurName}, no need for formalities, please stand up.\nSince you are from the common people, your martial arts must not be weak, otherwise you wouldn't dare to come to this den of wolves.
Your Majesty is wise! Not to boast, but my skills are not invincible, but they are rare to match, this Yan army camp is a den of wolves to you, but to me, it's just like strolling in my own backyard.
In that case, do you have a way to help me escape from here?
Are you here to help me escape?
Luo Tianxiong of the Crime Investigation Bureau is willing to risk his life to protect Your Majesty back to the palace!
Luo Tianxiong, why didn't you show up to meet me just now?

Replying to Your Majesty, in recent years, there have been many impostors pretending to be Your Majesty, as this is a matter of great importance, I did not dare to recognize you rashly. Now that I am sure of Your Majesty's identity, I am willing to risk my life to protect you.
In that case, it's understandable. You and {PlayerName} will protect the carriage together.
Yes!
Old minister Cai Yuanchang welcomes your majesty back to the palace!
Cai Yuanchang, I have been imprisoned for so long, why didn't you, as the prime minister, try to save me, and let me almost lose my life here!

Replying to your majesty, since your majesty went hunting in the north, the court has been in chaos. The princes and generals in various places are governing on their own, busy fighting for power and unable to respond to the court's orders. The old minister is heartbroken but powerless to stop it.

The old minister is always concerned about your majesty's safety. This time I came here at the risk of my life, with the determination to succeed or die. If I can't bring your majesty back, I will die in this Yan army camp, and my blood will set an example for all the subjects!
My dear minister, please get up quickly, I misunderstood you.\nIn that case, you and {PlayerName} will protect the carriage together. After returning to the court, I will reward you heavily!
Yes!
I am {PlayerName}, currently serving under Marshal Ye.
Why didn't Ye Pengju lead the Ye Family Battalion to save me himself, what's the use of sending you here?

Marshal Ye was worried that leading the army here would alert the enemy and force Yan to do something unfavorable to his majesty. Therefore, he ordered me to come to this Yan army camp alone, to act discreetly.
I didn't expect to see the light of day again in my lifetime!
Now that the Yan army has been wiped out, and I have escaped from danger...\n{PlayerName}, I want to reward you, I want to grant you an official title!!!
Thank you for your majesty's love, saving your majesty from danger is my duty.\nI still prefer a free and easy life, I don't care about rewards and titles.

There are many talents in our dynasty, but they all refuse to serve in the court and contribute to the country, preferring to bury their talents among the people. Is this my fault in governing the country?
Some people are good at governing strategies, some are good at business in the market, everyone has their own ambitions and can't be forced.
I see, you don't want to accept high official positions and rich rewards...\nBut I still want to reward you, reward your sect, I want to make your name known to the world!
I see, you don't want to accept high official positions and rich rewards...\nBut I still want to reward you, I want to make your name known to the world!
I grant you the Imperial token, as long as you are not plotting rebellion, holding this token can make all officials bow their heads and obey orders. Remember, this token can only be used once!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้ามอบตราจักรพรรดิให้กับเจ้า ตราบใดที่เจ้าไม่ได้วางแผนก่อกบฏ การถือตรานี้สามารถทำให้เจ้าหน้าที่ทุกคนก้มศีรษะและเชื่อฟังคำสั่งได้ โปรดจำไว้ว่าตรานี้สามารถใช้ได้เพียงครั้งเดียวเท่านั้น!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Thank Your Majesty.

Those who have merit will be rewarded, those who have faults will be punished, I have always been clear about rewards and punishments!\nThe first thing I will do when I return to the palace is to punish those traitors who are indecisive!
Your Majesty, we are still in a dangerous place here, to avoid any unexpected events in the long night, we should run away as soon as possible!
Hmm, thank you. Let's return to the palace!
Yes!
Uh--
Your Majesty, what's wrong with you?
I, I'm afraid I can't make it...
It's the deadly poison!
Your Majesty, pull yourself together, you'll be fine!
Master, I'm coming to find you...
Who is {yell}, who did it!!!
{PlayerName}, from now on, my life and property are entrusted to you.
I swear to protect your majesty with my life, please start your journey, your majesty!
{yell} Someone is breaking into the prison, come and reinforce!!!
Let's fight!!!
You dare to kill the emperor!!!\nYou all go to accompany him in death!!!!
The emperor is dead... Let's not tell others for now, to avoid chaos in the world.
{yell}You choose not to take the path to heaven, but insist on breaking into hell!
You talk too much!
{yell}You're brave, but unfortunately, today you're going to leave your life behind!
Not necessarily!
I've been waiting for you for a long time, how about a short break?
Sending you to reincarnation, it doesn't matter if it takes a little longer.
I'm guarding this place, I bet you can't escape even if you had wings!
Just with you few, you think you can stop me!
I didn't expect to see the light of day again in my lifetime!
{PlayerName}, the poems you recited during the breakout just now really stirred up my blood and fighting spirit! Your loyalty and patriotism are evident.
I was just angry and couldn't help but blurt out, making a fool of myself in front of you.
A bloody battle, good poetry, good scenery, good skills!
Thank you for your praise.
Although these poems were not written by you, but in this situation, with these heroic and passionate verses as a backdrop, it's an unprecedented feat!!!
{PlayerName}, with this feat, you are already a top scholar, and a talent in both literature and martial arts!\nToday, I will grant you the title of top scholar!
Thank you, Your Majesty!!!
Now that I have escaped...\n{PlayerName}, I want to reward you, I want to grant you an official title!!!

You caused a great disturbance in the Palace Camp of Yan Kingdom to save Xuan He Emperor, causing countless casualties to the Yan army, which completely infuriated Wan Yan Wuzhu!\nWan Yan Wuzhu ordered the Yan Yun Iron Army to assemble and head south immediately, with their blades pointed directly at Chuxiang City, vowing to kill and avenge their previous humiliation!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าสร้างความปั่นป่วนครั้งใหญ่ในกองทัพหลวงของอาณาจักรหยานเพื่อช่วยจักรพรรดิซวนเหอ ส่งผลให้กองทัพหยานได้รับบาดเจ็บนับไม่ถ้วน ซึ่งทำให้หวันหยานอู๋จูโกรธเคืองอย่างที่สุด!\nหวันหยานอู๋จูสั่งให้กองทัพเหล็กหยานหยุนรวมตัวกันและมุ่งหน้าไปทางใต้ทันที โดยใบมีดของพวกเขาชี้ตรงไปที่เมืองฉู่เซียง โดยสาบานว่าจะฆ่าและล้างแค้นให้กับความอัปยศอดสูครั้งก่อนของพวกเขา!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The brave are enlisted, without considering personal interests. Sacrifice oneself for the national crisis, regard death as homecoming!

In the Qin Dynasty, the moon was bright and the Han Dynasty was closed, the long march of ten thousand miles, people have not yet returned. As long as there are flying generals in the dragon city, they will not let the Hu Horse cross the Yin Mountain.

The long clouds of Qinghai are dark and the snow mountains are lonely, the lonely city looks far away at the Jade Gate. The yellow sand has fought a hundred battles in golden armor, and will not return until Loulan is broken.

The mountains and rivers are broken, the wind is blowing, the life is floating, the rain is beating the duckweed. Who hasn't died since ancient times? Leave a loyal heart to illuminate the annals of history.
I'm here, sending you to the Pure Land!
Kill the gods if they block the way, kill the Buddha if they block the way!

With us brothers guarding here, even a fly wouldn't be able to fly up to the building.|Those people from the rivers and lakes upstairs are really hard to deal with, if it weren't for the several protectors of the door, they wouldn't be able to capture them.|Among the people who were captured, some of them are indeed good-looking, what a pity, sigh...|No one would have thought that this long-abandoned Buddha Temple would become the final resting place for those people from the rivers and lakes.|The master ordered that if one person escapes from upstairs, all of us will die!|Don't sway in front of me, or I'll think you're up to no good!|The people from the rivers and lakes who were captured were all beaten up and wounded, even if they were luckily rescued, they would be half disabled.|Hurry up and send a few to die, just to accompany us to relieve our boredom.|I advise you not to think about going upstairs to save people, otherwise I guarantee you won't be able to run away alive from here.
Brothers, someone who doesn't know better is here to keep us company!
Just with you few wastes, you dare to point fingers at me!
Intruding into the prison is a serious crime, kill without mercy!
How dare the idiots downstairs let outsiders upstairs!\nWait until I kill this kid, I must settle accounts with those idiots.
Enemy attack, everyone be on guard!
Why did you just come, I almost thought I was going to die here.
Good, it's okay now, I'm sorry I came late.\nNext, I'm going to seek justice for you from the Nine Factions Sect, you go back to Nest of Swallow first, I can only rest assured when you are there.
Alright, I'll listen to you.
I don't like to owe favors, I'll repay you when I get the chance.
I am Hua Qingqing from Nest of Swallow.\nI don't like to owe favors, especially this kind of life-saving favor, I will definitely find a chance to repay you in the future.
Qianxue, how are you, are your injuries serious?
These minor injuries are nothing, but why did you rush in so recklessly?\nThe Nine Factions Sect is not easy to provoke, what you did is too dangerous.
For you, I would dare to take any risk!\nI'm going to settle accounts with the guys from Nine Factions Sect, you go back to Crime Investigation Bureau first, you should be safer there.
Alright, you must be careful.
Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for your rescue. I will definitely repay your kindness in the future.
I am Luo Qianxue from Crime Investigation Bureau.\nThank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, for your rescue. I will definitely repay your kindness in the future.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าลั่วเฉียนเสวี่ยจากสำนักสืบสวน ขอขอบคุณจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName}สำหรับการช่วยเหลือ ข้าจะตอบแทนเจ้าในอนาคตอย่างแน่นอน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You have a conscience! I thought you were too timid to come.
Even if I have to go through the ends of the world, I will rescue you, let alone this mere Buddha Temple!
Alright, I don't want you to take such a big risk, you can do more with your life.
What's the point of living a hundred years without you!\nSiniang, you go back to the village first, I will make the people of Nine Factions Sect pay for this.
Don't make me wait too long, you must come back safely!
Siniang? How did they catch you too!
How would I know!\nI just woke up and found myself locked up here.
You should go back to the village first, it's not convenient for a woman like you to wander outside.
I really can't stand staying here for a moment!
I almost forgot to thank you, I was rude.
No problem, no problem.
You don't seem to be a martial artist, how did you get caught by the people of Nine Factions Sect?
How would I know!\nI just woke up and found myself locked up here.
Do you have a place to stay?\nYou should go back quickly, it's not convenient for a woman like you to wander outside.
I really can't stand staying here for a moment!
I almost forgot to thank you, I, Hua Siniang, was rude.
No problem, no problem.
I can't believe I'm not dreaming, I thought I would never see you again.
Those bastards from Nine Factions Sect dare to hurt you, I will make them pay a hundred times over!
If they hadn't used such despicable means, how could I have fallen into their trap. I will definitely make them taste the power of Ye Family Spear!
No, you must return to Ye Family Battalion first!
No, I want to go with you!

This time Nine Factions Sect has captured so many martial artists, they must have a big plan.\nYou returning to Ye Family Battalion is not only to ensure your own safety, but also to prepare Ye Family Battalion for the unpredictable future.
Alright, I'll listen to you this time.
But you have to promise me, come to Ye Family Battalion as soon as possible, I still want to wander the martial arts world with you.
Miss Ye? They even dared to kidnap the daughter of Marshal Ye, they are really bold.
I was just about to settle accounts with those bastards, let's break out together!\nI will definitely make them taste the power of Ye Family Spear!
You'd better hurry back to Ye Family Battalion first.
Why?!\nWe, the children of the Ye family, never tolerate such humiliation.

This time Nine Factions Sect has captured so many martial artists, they must have a big plan.\nYou returning to Ye Family Battalion is not only to ensure your own safety, but also to prepare Ye Family Battalion for the unpredictable future.

I was blinded by anger and almost neglected the important matter. I should indeed hurry back on my horse.\nSince that's the case, let these bastards live a little longer, and teach them a lesson later.
Finally, I don't have to be stuck in this hellhole anymore!\nI will definitely make those bastards taste the power of Ye Family Spear!
Ye Family Spear?

I am {PlayerName}.\nI just heard you mention the Ye Family Spear. This Ye Family Spear is the unique spear technique of the Ye Family Battalion. May I ask what is your relationship with the Ye Family Battalion?
My name is Ye Yinping, my father is the Marshal of the Ye Family Battalion.

Why?!\nWe, the children of the Ye family, never tolerate such humiliation.

It's my fault for not protecting you thoroughly!
If Nine Factions Sect dares to target you, I am destined to be invincible with them!
I've been alone for long enough, no matter the dangers, this time I want to face it with you.
You go back to the inn to heal first, during this time I also need to investigate the details of Nine Factions Sect, so that we can catch them all at once.
You're not planning to deal with the entire Nine Factions Sect by yourself, are you?

Rest assured, I cherish my life so much, how could I possibly risk it.
Don't forget the promise you made to me!
Miss Ziyan, I didn't expect you to be caught by them too.
Humph, there are masters of poison lurking among them, and I was caught off guard.
This is not a place to stay for long, Miss Ziyan, you should run away quickly.
I, Jiang Ziyan, never owe anyone anything. If you need help in the future, you can find me at Hotel Prosperous.

What's the situation with this beautiful Taoist priestess?

I, the Taoist master, deliberately let them catch me. I was planning to see what they were up to. Now that you have intervened, I will not get involved in this drama.

Yes, I will definitely be cautious.

Since Nine Factions Sect has made a move on you, they must have plans for Confucius Temple. Elder brother, please hurry back to Confucius Temple to prepare for any unexpected events.
That's exactly what I intend to do!\nYou should come back with me, Nine Factions Sect is not something you can handle alone.
Now that things with Nine Factions Sect are starting to take shape, I need to continue.\nPlease rest assured, elder brother, I will act within my means and not take unnecessary risks.
If that's the case, take care of yourself.\nIf you encounter any difficulties, return to Confucius Temple as soon as possible, and I will lend you a hand.
How did Brother Cai get caught too?
It's a shame to admit that these petty thieves are proficient in the art of disguise, luring me into a smoke trap disguised as a disciple of Confucius Temple, which led to my capture.
Since Nine Factions Sect has made a move on you, they must have plans for Confucius Temple. Brother Cai, please hurry back to Confucius Temple to prepare for any unexpected events.
I had this intention, let's part here and meet again at Confucius Temple in the future!
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask why you are also detained here?

It's a shame to admit, I am Cai Youzhi, a common disciple of Confucius Temple.\nThese petty thieves are proficient in the art of disguise, luring me into a smoke trap disguised as a fellow disciple, which led to my capture.
So you are Master Cai from Confucius Temple, my apologies for the oversight.

I owe you a great debt of gratitude. I need to rush back to Confucius Temple to discuss countermeasures with my fellow disciples.\nOnce this matter is settled, I sincerely invite Brother {PlayerSurName} to stay at Confucius Temple, and we can have a good time with Brother {PlayerSurName}.
How did you show up during my rare moment of leisure?
I heard that Nine Factions Sect has captured many people from the martial arts world. I believe in the virtue of saving lives, so I broke in to save as many as I could.
Hmm, with your "If I don't go to hell, who will" courage, you do remind me of myself when I was young. I remember being as spirited and talented as you...

I know I'm excellent, but now is not the time for idle chat.\nWe shouldn't stay here for long. Please hurry back to Shifa Temple and warn your fellow disciples not to fall into the hands of Nine Factions Sect.

Hmm, this matter indeed cannot be taken lightly... (munching on a chicken leg)\nIt seems I need to hurry and tell those disciples, so they don't all get captured... (continues munching on chicken leg)
Kid, if you can't win in a dangerous situation, run. It's not shameful. As long as Blue Mountain exists, there's no fear of running out of firewood.
I'm off!
Munching...
It's admirable that the master can still have a good appetite in prison.
Such a beautiful day is rare in a lifetime. If I don't enjoy it, wouldn't it be a pity?
Munching...

We shouldn't stay here for long. Please hurry back to Shifa Temple and warn your fellow disciples not to fall into the hands of Nine Factions Sect.
Hmm, this matter is indeed urgent...\nIt seems I need to hurry and tell those disciples, so they don't all get captured...

I'm off!

Hmm, this matter is indeed urgent...\nIt seems it's time to return to Shifa Temple, and tell those disciples to be careful...
You don't seem to be in a hurry at all.
Wait, did you just say "Shifa Temple"? Are you a monk from Shifa Temple?!
I am Lai Toudian from Shifa Temple... (munching on a chicken leg)\nWhat's so surprising? Haven't you seen a monk with long hair?
Burp~~
I've never seen a monk who blatantly eats meat...
Meat and wine pass through the intestines, but Buddha remains in the heart. If people learn from me, they are like entering the demonic path.

Miss Qu Wangyou, who happens to know a few ways to treat wounds, is here to alleviate the pain for you, my fellow martial artists.

Sure, sure.

Who would be in the mood to play dice in prison? I guess you're the only abnormal one here.

No.
Have you ever heard of Zhangyue Casino, where "fortune lost can be regained"?
No.

Oh, my apologies.
Hmph, boring man!

What does {PlayerSurName} want from me, the owner of this establishment?

Confucius Temple was founded by the fifth generation of Confucian sages, and since its inception, it has been tasked with inheriting Confucianism, educating the people, and realizing the great governance of the world.

Confucius Temple advocates benevolence as the foundation, governing by virtue, self-restraint and returning to rites, teaching without discrimination, teaching according to aptitude, and valuing the people over the ruler.

The five Confucian virtues of benevolence, righteousness, propriety, wisdom, and faith are the foundation of our disciples. Those who are unkind, unjust, disrespectful, and unfaithful will be severely punished to maintain the reputation of our sect.
Our sect combines literature and martial arts, not for the purpose of defeating enemies, but for survival in troubled times and the continuation of Confucian heritage.
Our Martial Arts focus on close combat, not on causing damage, but on weakening the enemy's strength by adding negative states.

In our sect, there are Martial Arts like <color=#c44b0e>Frozen Storm</color> that rely on Intelligence to function, and there are also Martial Arts like <color=#c44b0e>Gentleman's Courtship</color> that enhance damage with Dexterity.

Mengdie, don't do anything stupid!
Ling Mengdie cut off her own life with a sword, the greatest sorrow is the death of the heart.\nA wisp of soul scattered with the wind, to another world to follow her brother.
You lied to me, you all lied to me!
My brother is dead, he's actually dead!
Brother, are you just going to leave me behind?
Brother, don't leave me, I want to go with you!
{yell} Mengdie, don't do anything stupid!
This time, I'm really going to sleep forever...
Ling Mengdie cut off her own life with a sword, the greatest sorrow is the death of the heart.\nA wisp of soul scattered with the wind, to another world to follow her brother.
{PlayerGivenName}Brother, I haven't seen you around lately, have you been okay?
What's wrong, {PlayerGivenName}brother? Why do you look so upset? Do you know something?
Actually, your brother has already...
...No wonder I've been feeling uneasy lately, so that's why...
Brother, we, the Ling siblings, will never be separated. I'm coming to find you...
Mengdie, don't do anything stupid!
Ling Mengdie cut off her own life with a sword, the greatest sorrow is the death of the heart.\nA wisp of soul scattered with the wind, to another world to follow her brother.
Wherever my brother goes, I will follow!
{PlayerGivenName}Brother, your team is full. I want to join you in the world of martial arts.
Wherever my brother goes, I will follow. I won't leave you.
If my brother were here, do you think he would let me join your team?
Brother, you've upset my sister. Can you please appease her?
I was so bored in the Confucius Temple, this time I want to enjoy the scenery along the way.
I wish you could leave a spot for me.
This place is so beautiful!
Do you know where this is?
I've read about it in books, this is the God of Marriage's Shrine, a place for couples to pledge their love.
You're so knowledgeable, you even know this.
I've heard about it before, but seeing it today, it's indeed as amazing as they say.
Do you know the history of this God of Marriage's Shrine? And why the Wedding Stone has magical effects?
There are dozens of versions of this story, both official and unofficial, each more incredible than the last...
Two shichen later...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {yell}You're so unfair, how could you fall asleep!
Hmph, I won't tell you anymore!
I fell asleep without doing anything important, I'm such a stupid pig!
Wait for me, Dream Butterfly.
This place is so beautiful!
Do you know where this is?
I've read about it in books, this is the God of Marriage's Shrine, a place for couples to pledge their love.
You're so knowledgeable, you even know this.
I've heard about it before, but seeing it today, it's indeed as amazing as they say.
Do you believe the rumors about the God of Marriage's Shrine and the Wedding Stone?
What rumors?
It's said that if a couple offers a Wedding Stone at the God of Marriage's Shrine, they will be blessed by the matchmaker god for life.
I believe it, why not!
\n|I refuse to believe it, do you have a Wedding Stone or not? Let's test whether the rumor is true or false.
Wedding Stone... I seem to have forgotten to bring it.
It seems that I can only bring the Wedding Stone next time to try again.|\nWhat is written in the book may not necessarily be correct.
I feel like this is a bit childish.
Wait for me, Dream Butterfly.
Do you want to place the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> on the shrine?
It seems you don't believe the rumor either, if you don't want to try, let's just go back.
I feel like this is a bit childish.
Wait for me, Dream Butterfly.
You place the Wedding Stone on the shrine, and the two of you begin to pray devoutly.
It exploded, the Wedding Stone actually exploded!
What... what is this?
The book says this happens when one of the couple is not faithful enough, can it really be so strange?
It must be made up by the book, as the ancients say, it's better to have no book than to believe everything in it.
You're right, let's go find more Wedding Stones and try a few more times to verify some of the absurdities in the book.
I feel like this is a bit childish.
Wait for me, Dream Butterfly.
This is...
Mission accomplished!
Dream Butterfly...
I didn't believe it at first, but now I've seen it with my own eyes, it seems the ancients didn't deceive me.
But the book says that once a couple is destined, they are bound to spend a lifetime together.\n{PlayerGivenName}Brother, do you think we were too hasty?
(You just realized that?)
This is what they call fate, it's better to bump into it than to choose a day!
Who would have thought that verifying the truth of something would one day involve myself.
Master Cai, I have fulfilled the promise I made to you.
Hmm, today I will grant you and your sister freedom.
I've found the Dragon lice for the medicine to heal my sister, please fulfill your promise.
This Dragon lice needs a male and a female to be used in the medicine to have a healing effect...
You didn't mention needing two Dragon lice in the first place!
Whether you save her or not is up to you, but since I promised to cure her, I will not go back on my word. It's your responsibility to gather the medicine.
Brother Ling, don't worry, we'll find another way.
Have you gathered the two Dragon lice yet?
I advise you, the longer you delay, the more frequently Xiao Ya's symptoms will occur. When the disease becomes incurable, no medicine can save her.
Go and bring Ling Mengdie here, I will personally remove her illness.
Now everything is ready except for the east wind.
What else is missing? Can you tell me all at once?
Of course, it's your own essence blood, {PlayerName}.
What do you need my essence blood for?

This Dragon lice is an extremely yin and evil creature. If used directly on the human body, it will be rejected, resulting in being Poisoned or even Critical. Your essence blood can counteract the toxicity of the Dragon lice.
Now it depends on whether you are willing to give up your essence blood.
(Do you want to give up some of your essence blood to save Ling Mengdie?)
What a pity, a once-in-a-century genius is about to fall.
No need for more words, just take it!
Good, since you are so generous, let's see what I can do.
One day and night later
Little sister, how do you feel?
I feel relaxed as never before, and my mind is clear. Has my illness been completely cured?
It seems so.
Brother, now that I'm cured, can you pursue your own Passive realm with peace of mind?
If I want to be free from others in this life, I can only keep pursuing the peak of Passive. Then no one will look down on us, and no one will bully us!
Actually, I prefer the old days. Even though I knew my time was limited, the days with you were the happiest of my life.
Silly girl, from now on, your brother and {PlayerName} will protect you. You won't be wronged again.
{PlayerName}? Can he be trusted?
If he dares to be unreliable, I'll beat him up for you.
{PlayerName}, here's a Manual for you. If you can master the skills in it, I won't dare to beat you.
Brother, you finally don't have to do what you don't want to do for the Confucius Temple anymore.
From now on, we will no longer be controlled by Cai Yuanchang.
The medicine to heal Miss Mengdie - Dragon lice, is ready. Can Miss Wangyou start the treatment now?
In addition to Dragon lice, another important medicine is also indispensable.
What other medicine is missing? I'll go find it.
Far in the sky, close in front of your eyes, the key to this medicine is you!

There are morning classes every day at <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color>, learning is endless, and reviewing old knowledge can lead to new insights.|There are often ignorant youngsters causing trouble outside the Confucius Temple, they are all attention seekers, it's really annoying.|After passing the imperial examination, you can find the head of the academy to participate in the <color=#c44b0e>metropolitan examination</color>. If you pass the metropolitan examination, you can become a Recognized Scholar.|A Recognized Scholar can host a <color=#c44b0e>question and answer session</color> once a day to answer the simple questions of the students.|As a disciple of Confucianism, you must pay respect to the statue of Confucius in our sect.|Shu Kuang and Hua Chi often collect unappraised Calligraphy and Paintings for our sect. You need to go back to the <color=#c44b0e>Disciple's room and sit at the desk</color> to carefully read and understand the profound meaning within.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You are a new disciple, this is the Map - Confucius Temple, you might need it in the future.
The white-haired woman guarding the Sage's Stele is called Ya Qin. She has a bad temper, so don't provoke her if it's not necessary.
Confucius Temple is known as the leader of the literary world. We have come today to learn from you. I wonder which one of you from Confucius Temple is willing to accept our challenge?
I am {PlayerName} from Confucius Temple, how would you like to challenge us?
So it's the famous hero {PlayerSurName} here, we have offended you, we dare not disturb Confucius Temple again in the future.
So it's the top scholar appointed by the emperor here, we were blind, we have offended you, we dare not come again in the future.
Five upper couplets, all must be answered correctly to pass. If one couplet is wrong, it means that Confucius Temple is deceiving the world!
Haha, Confucius Temple is nothing more than this, they are all wine bags and rice bags!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ฮ่า ฮ่า, วัดขงจื้อก็ไม่เห็นจะมีอะไรดีไปมากกว่านี้ ทั้งหมดที่มีก็แค่พวกรากไม้กับกระสอบข้าว!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: There are hidden talents in Confucius Temple, I didn't expect such a small scholar to be so outstanding!\nWe will go back and find a few absolute masterpieces, and then come to argue with you!

Confucius Temple is known as the leader of the three religions, and the scholars under its banner all look down on us.\nToday we are here to seek justice, to test the quality of Confucius Temple, to see if it deserves the honor of being the leader of the three religions!
I am {PlayerName} from Confucius Temple, how would you like to test the quality of Confucius Temple?
You, you are {PlayerSurName}, the great hero {PlayerSurName}!
If we had known you were at the Confucius Temple, we wouldn't have dared to cause trouble even if we had the courage of a bear and a leopard. Please forgive us, we will leave immediately.
No, no more testing. Your cultivation is unfathomable without any comparison.\nWe will never disrespect the Confucius Temple again, we will leave on our horses immediately.

If we two fight against you alone, and win, we will admit that the Confucius Temple has the qualification to be the leader of the three religions; if we lose, we will let the world know that the Confucius Temple is just a fame-seeker, not worthy of representing the Confucianism, not worthy of being the leader of the three religions!
The Confucius Temple is indeed not as good as its reputation, neither literary nor martial, what a big joke!
It was just a slip of the hand, today's competition doesn't count!\nWe will go back and learn for a few days, then come back to compete with you.
You can only answer questions once a day, and you have already answered questions for the students today.
Are you ready to answer questions for these students?
{PlayerName}, your answer is wrong. Go back and read more books before showing off your knowledge. Don't mislead others today.

{PlayerName}, you are knowledgeable and your answers to the questions today were excellent.\nI didn't expect that these tricky questions from these little guys didn't stump you, I look forward to your future performance even more.

Mr. {PlayerSurName} is so powerful!|Mr. {PlayerSurName} speaks so well!|I want to be like Mr. {PlayerSurName} in the future!|The teacher speaks much better than Grandpa Jiujiu!|Can Mr. {PlayerSurName} come to lecture tomorrow?|I wish I could listen to Mr. {PlayerSurName}'s lecture every day!|Thank you, Mr. {PlayerSurName}!|Mr. {PlayerSurName} is better than the teachers at the Imperial School!|I understood as soon as Mr. {PlayerSurName} explained it!|Thank you, Mr. {PlayerSurName}!|If Mr. {PlayerSurName} comes to lecture every day, I will definitely be able to pass the exam in the future!|This is the first time I've found studying so interesting!|Is today's lecture over?|Listening to Mr. {PlayerSurName}'s lecture, time flies so fast.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Now is not the time for lectures, {PlayerName}, come back during the day.
I'm ready, please start asking questions.
I'm not interested, I won't accompany you in this boring activity.
Today's poetic inspiration is exhausted, it's better not to overdo it, let's enjoy poetry another day,
Stealing half a day's leisure, Brother {PlayerSurName}, would you like to compose poetry with me?
I will recite a line of poetry, please Brother {PlayerSurName}, recite the next line.
These poems are all famous verses passed down through the ages, I didn't expect Brother {PlayerSurName} to make mistakes, it's really disappointing.
These verses filled with sword qi seem to contain the ultimate truth of Martial Arts. Every time you read them, you feel a surge of heroism, as if there is endless strength in your body.
It's a pigeon letter from the Confucius Temple...
"Recently, our school is holding a small martial arts competition. All students of our school can sign up at the altar. All students, please return to our school quickly."
{PlayerName}, you came at the right time. The head of the school personally selects the direct disciples. If you can come out on top in this competition, you will be the chosen one.
Come to me to sign up when you are ready.
Are you ready to participate in the small competition?
This year's competition at Confucius Temple is hosted by me. You are all my students. No matter who wins, I will be proud.
{PlayerName}, I won't lose to you!
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to be the champion of this year's competition. It's really beyond my expectation. But because of this, you stand out, surpassing the blue from which you came.

Today, I accept you as my direct disciple and pass on to you the talent of our school, <color=#c44b0e>Disciples of Confucius</color>. I hope you can glorify our school and carry on the spirit of Confucianism in the future.
Student {PlayerName}, thank you for passing on the talent of our school.
Don't be so discouraged, the small competition will reopen in three days, and I hope you can shine then.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, the head of the school is looking for you. Please go to Dacheng Hall as soon as possible.
{PlayerName}, there is an urgent matter that needs your immediate attention.
Please give your orders, head of the school!
I heard that the Tomb Raider Sect is digging ancient tombs in the Central Plains. One of the tombs is said to be the tomb of a Confucian sage, named Mang Mountain Pit.

The journey is unpredictable. Before you leave, I will teach you a martial art for self-protection.\nWhich of these two martial arts do you prefer?
Thank you for teaching me martial arts.
Go early and return early, don't make any detours.
What's the situation at Mang Mountain Pit?
This tomb is just a tomb of a scholar. The tomb owner is proficient in Machinery and left a Machinery man to guard the tomb.
Did you find anything in the tomb?
So that's what happened...
There is such a thing in this tomb!\nFortunately, it didn't fall into the hands of the villains. You did a good job!
This internal strength Manual is a reward for the excellent completion of this task. I hope you will continue to work hard and not let me down.
What happened to Hongxuan? Why didn't he come back with you?
Ling Hongxuan was outnumbered and heavily injured at Mang Mountain Pit.
What a pity, what a pity...
You can go now. If there is anything else, I will tell you.
Ling Hongxuan is heavily injured and has returned to the Confucius Temple first, maybe he hasn't had time to report to the master.
This kid doesn't know any manners at all!
Alright, you may leave now. If there's anything else, I will instruct you.
I didn't see Ling Hongxuan on this trip, I wonder where he is now.
Alas, I'm afraid the odds are not in his favor...
Alright, you may leave now. If there's anything else, I will instruct you.
You can go now. If there is anything else, I will tell you.
Isn't this Ling Hongxuan? Why isn't he moving!
(Checking his breath...)
So he fainted due to excessive Bleeding. What should I do now?
One shichen later...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Am I in the underworld?
I didn't expect to see you {PlayerName} here, seems like you've done quite a few bad deeds.
It was my miraculous Regenerate that pulled you back from the brink of death!

You're still injured, let me take you back to the Confucius Temple for treatment.
I can walk by myself, I don't need anyone's help!

Get lost, I can walk by myself, I don't need anyone's help!
Does your friend look down on women, or does he feel humiliated to be saved by a woman?
Maybe he lost too much blood and his brain is damaged.

Am I in the underworld?

Blegh——
{yell} you idiot, you moron!

I am the leader of the Tomb Raider Sect, Ming Bufan!

Confucius Temple, Cai Yuanchang... \nOld man, you can't hold back anymore...

Although the output is not much this time, I always keep my word.\nThis Cicada gem and this Manual are your rewards.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The Crime Investigation Bureau has been investigating too strictly recently, we need to lay low for a while.

I'll come back another day.

Indeed, I just arrived not long ago.\nBoss, do you have any good things to recommend here?
As a host, I have a good item that just arrived. If you want it, I can give you a 40% discount, how about it?
Opportunities are fleeting.
So, have you made up your mind? Do you want to buy this item?
Good! Here you go, sir.
You look like a martial artist, are you interested in making money?
What do you mean?
I know a way to make money. Since you just bought something from the store, I'll give you a discount. This piece of information will cost you 10 guan, do you want it?
If you can't bear to part with your child, you can't catch a wolf. If you can't even bear this little money, it seems you don't have the courage to do anything big.
So, have you made up your mind? Do you want to buy this information?
You are indeed a straightforward person, I like doing business with people like you.

The news of making a fortune is - there is an ancient tomb outside the city, called Mang Mountain Pit. The Tomb Raider Sect has already dug up a lot of good things from it, you might as well try your luck.

The so-called respect for the dead and the departed, the Tomb Raider Sect, these earthy scholars, have no regard for taboos and are wantonly tomb-robbing in Zhongzhou. This is an unforgivable crime that disregards human ethics and morality!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สิ่งที่เรียกว่าความเคารพต่อผู้ตายและผู้จากไป, สำนักปล้นสุสาน, เหล่านี้ต่างไม่คำนึงถึงข้อห้ามและเป็นเพียงการปล้นสุสานอย่างป่าเถื่อนในจงโจว นี่เป็นอาชญากรรมที่ไม่อาจให้อภัยได้ซึ่งไม่คำนึงถึงจริยธรรมและศีลธรรมของมนุษย์!

Yes, sir!

The Tomb Raider Sect disregards human ethics and morality, robs ancient tombs, and is unforgivable in both law and reason.\nToday, by the order of the head of the Confucius Temple, I am here to exterminate the Tomb Raider Sect!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: สำนักปล้นสุสานเพิกเฉยต่อจริยธรรมและศีลธรรมของมนุษย์ ปล้นสุสานโบราณ และให้อภัยไม่ได้ทั้งในด้านกฎหมายและเหตุผล\nวันนี้ ตามคำสั่งของหัวหน้าวัดขงจื้อ ข้ามาที่นี่เพื่อทำลายล้างสำนักปล้นสุสาน

Can I exchange my life for two pieces of secret news?
The head's order is to eradicate the Tomb Raider Sect, I cannot be lenient!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คำสั่งของหัวหน้าคือกำจัดสำนักปล้นสุสาน ข้าไม่สามารถผ่อนผันได้!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Good, you did very well.\nDid the head of the Tomb Raider Sect say anything to you before he died?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ดี เจ้าทำได้ดีมาก\nหัวหน้าสำนักปล้นสุสานพูดอะไรกับเจ้าก่อนที่เขาจะเสียชีวิตหรือไม่?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: No.
Good, {PlayerName}, you are indeed an outstanding disciple of the Confucius Temple, your future achievements will be limitless.

It is said that a profound Martial Arts is hidden in the Calligraphy "Orchid Pavillion Preface". Only those who are proficient in calligraphy and painting and have extremely high Intelligence can comprehend its mystery.
What about the second piece of secret news?
Your head, Cai Yuanchang...
More than a decade ago, he entered an ancient tomb with my help, where he found a fragment of an ancient book on Longevity and a prophecy that only showed half...
Longevity? Could it be a fairy's tomb?

I don't know if it's a fairy, but since then Cai Yuanchang has been obsessed with alchemy according to the ancient book, making himself neither human nor demon, what you usually see is his disguised appearance.
What is the half prophecy you mentioned earlier?
Three teachings into one, Confucianism rules the world, the Cai family rules the royal family...
There's no more?

The stone wall indeed only shows these few words, then a small line of text hints "see the following text in sixteen years", speaking of which, it's exactly sixteen years this year, I'm also curious what the following text will say.
From this prophecy, it seems a bit rebellious.
The deal is over, you should seek your own fortune under Cai Yuanchang.\nCai Yuanchang will never let me go, from now on I can only hide my name and mix in the rivers and lakes.
How is the matter of the Tomb Raider Sect handled?

I told the servant to tell the woman that her husband is not in the Maiden House. Why is she still pestering me?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Do you know where the woman's husband is now?
Where else could he be? He must have gone to Epiphyllum Valley to find that fox spirit.
In broad daylight, I can't believe there are monsters in this world!
Are you really stupid or just pretending?

The fox spirit I mentioned lives in the <color=#c44b0e>Epiphyllum Valley</color>, known as the "First Beauty of Wu and Yue". It is said that she is not a native of the Central Plains, but she is so beautiful and enchanting that everyone in Lin'an City considers it a blessing to see her.
If that's the case, all your guests at the Maiden House should be in Epiphyllum Valley. Why would they come to Maiden House to sleep with flowers and willows?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I want to go to Epiphyllum Valley to see how difficult it is to see this beauty.
Don't blame me for not warning you, the last guy who spoke such nonsense is now buried waist-deep in grass.
This is a map of Epiphyllum Valley. If you can go and teach that fox spirit a lesson, I will reward you.
Have you found the person, young man?
He's not here. Your husband might have gone to <color=#c44b0e>Epiphyllum Valley</color>.
Why would he go to such a place...
Thank you, young man.\nI'll go to Epiphyllum Valley to look for him. If I can't find him, I'll come back.
What are you doing here again, itching for a fight?
Don't misunderstand, I'm just here to inquire about some news.\nWhere is the husband of the woman you beat up now?
If that guy is still alive, he should be in <color=#c44b0e>Epiphyllum Valley</color> now.\nI've told that woman countless times, but she just wouldn't believe me.
