Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I want to go to Epiphyllum Valley to see for myself. Who can stop me if I want to see the beauty?
Humph, she doesn't know how high the sky is and how thick the earth is.\nThe last guy who bragged, his grave grass is now waist-high.
Young man, I didn't expect you to come too.
Aren't you the woman from Lin'an City looking for your husband? Have you found him?
I didn't expect there to be countless wild monkeys in Epiphyllum Valley, and people blocking the road with swords, so I haven't really entered Epiphyllum Valley yet.
It seems that the valley is not safe, you should wait here for my news.\nIf your husband is indeed inside, I will bring him out safely.
That would be great, very good.
{yell} Stop!
I am the gatekeeper of Epiphyllum Valley, ordered by my master to select those who enter the valley.
Selection? Do I have to be picked over like goods by you to qualify to enter the valley?
To enter the valley, you must excel in at least one of martial arts, wealth, or fame.
Let me think about which aspect I excel in...
Epiphyllum Valley doesn't accept trash, roll back where you came from.
There are many who can fight, who do you think you are? If you have the ability, defeat me first, then talk big.
You do have some skills, but even if you pass my test, you may not necessarily see the master.
What do you mean? Speak clearly!
You vulgar people who only know that money opens the way!\nEven if you pass my test, you may not necessarily see the master.
What do you mean? Speak clearly!
I am {PlayerName}, am I recognized?
You, you are {PlayerName}!
Please enter the valley, the road ahead is not peaceful, good luck.
What do you mean? Speak clearly!
I didn't expect there to be such a beauty in the world!
I am {PlayerName}, I have something to disturb the beauty.
There is no self, no person, no sentient being, no life, red powder skull, white bone flesh, Amitabha.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่มีตัวตน ไม่มีบุคคล ไม่มีสรรพสัตว์ ไม่มีชีวิต กะโหลกผงสีแดง เนื้อกระดูกสีขาว อมิตาพุทธ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I am a monk, my secular name is {PlayerName}, I have something to disturb the female donor.
Do you think I'm beautiful?
This...
Women dress for those who please them, I am Man Tuoluo, nice to meet you, Mr. {PlayerSurName}.
You are a monk with lust, it seems you are a flower monk.\nI, Man Tuoluo, am afraid I'm going to have an eye-opener today.
I've heard that you Central Plains men are pretentious, today I really got to see it.\nI, Man Tuoluo, nice to meet you, Mr. {PlayerSurName}.
I, Man Tuoluo, greet the little monk.
On such a beautiful day, Mr. {PlayerSurName}, why don't you...
Young master...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์น้อย...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I couldn't help myself for a moment...
On such a beautiful day, little monk, why don't you...
Female donor, please respect yourself.
What are you hiding from, I won't eat you
I am a monk, female donor, don't push too hard!
Alright, alright, I won't tease you anymore.
Tell me your purpose, I suppose you're not just here to see me.
I was entrusted by someone to come to Epiphyllum Valley to inquire about someone's whereabouts.
This man is the husband of an old woman in Lin'an City. I learned from Maiden House that he should be in Epiphyllum Valley at this time, but I don't know where he is.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ผู้ชายคนนี้เป็นสามีของหญิงชราในเมืองหลินอัน ข้าได้รู้จากตำหนักพิสุทธ์ว่าเขาควรจะอยู่ที่หุบเขาโบตั๋นในเวลานี้ แต่ข้าไม่รู้ว่าเขาอยู่ที่ไหน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I know who you are looking for.\nHowever, if you want to know his whereabouts, you need to follow the rules of my Epiphyllum Valley.
What are the rules of Epiphyllum Valley?
If you come to Epiphyllum Valley and ask me for help, either prepare more gifts that I like, so that I can see you differently; or accept my knife technique. Which one do you choose?
If you come to Epiphyllum Valley and ask me for help, either prepare more gifts that I like, so that I can see you differently; or accept my knife technique. Which one do you choose?
I forgot to tell you just now, if you don't accept my knife technique, the only outcome is to stay in this Epiphyllum Valley as a fertilizer for flowers.
Don't you have any pity for women at all?
Since I won, please tell me where that person is.
You men are really heartless...
That waste got lost and was trapped in the pavilion in the middle of the lake. After you find him, take him out of Epiphyllum Valley as soon as possible. I don't want to see him for a moment.
As for you, my world is always waiting for you~
I have done what you asked me to do, now it's time to fulfill your promise, right?
You men are really heartless...
That waste got lost and was trapped in the pavilion in the middle of the lake. After you find him, take him out of Epiphyllum Valley as soon as possible. I don't want to see him for a moment.
As for you, my world is always waiting for you~
Young man, are you here to save me? You are here to save me, right!
I'm here to find someone, to find the husband of an old woman in Lin'an City for her. Miss Man Tuoluo said he should be near this pavilion in the middle of the lake.
Yes, yes, it's me, it must be my wife who asked you to save me.
Are you sure that's your wife?
Take me to see her and you'll know. I can't explain it to you in a few words.
Husband, I finally see you...
Wife, it's only been a few days, why is your hair all white?
Why is your husband ragged and skinny, how much have you suffered these days?
Don't mention it, it's a great fortune to be alive.
That flirtatious fox is really a ruthless character, turning her face faster than turning a book, without any old feelings.
Thank you, young man, for helping me find my husband. I don't have any decent gifts to thank you. I'll give you this little thing.
This is what I specially asked for you from the Plant Sect when I was young. How can you give it away easily?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือสิ่งที่ข้าขอมาเป็นพิเศษจากสำนักพฤกษาเมื่อตอนที่ข้ายังเด็ก จะให้ไปง่ายๆได้ยังไง?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The young man saved your life. Besides, this is not something important.\nLet's go home quickly. A golden nest and a silver nest are not as good as our own grass nest.
I have to face this yellow-faced woman when I go back
I spent so much money and didn't even touch her hand
When I save enough money, I have to come again
{PlayerSurName} Young master, I will be waiting for you at the pavilion outside the inn at Zi Shi tomorrow. Would you honor me with your presence?
It's an honor to be invited by the Master. I will definitely be there on time.
Not for the love of the world, but for the sake of the past.
What brings you to me?
It's about the Master of the Maiden House escaping from her lowly status.
What right do you have to interfere in this matter?
Even if you are a top scholar, aren't you afraid of degrading your own status by standing up for a lowly person?
That's not within my consideration for doing this.

Considering that we will be colleagues in the government sooner or later, I remind you that it was Kang Wang who arranged for her to enter the Maiden House. Without his permission, no one can help her escape from her lowly status.
Kang Wang has now ascended the throne and become the emperor. This matter can't be brought up again in any case, otherwise it will bring disaster to the Master of the Maiden House.
I never thought I would come here one day...
The scenery here is nice, isn't it?
Be honest, how many girls have you brought here before?
Yan, my sincerity towards you can be witnessed by heaven and earth, there's no room for anyone else in my heart!
I believe you're sincere, but it doesn't matter if there are other sisters, I don't mind.
Well, that...
There's nothing inconvenient to say, no matter how many lovers you have, I've said, I don't mind.
{PlayerName}, if you're sincere to me, put the Wedding Stone on, let the matchmaker bless us.
Wedding Stone... I seem to have forgotten to bring it.
Ah, it seems the Wedding Stone I gave you has been used for another girl.
That seems a bit hurtful...
Wait for me, Yan.
Do you want to place the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> on the shrine?
It seems I'm not worth your spending a Wedding Stone on yet, let's come back later.
That seems a bit hurtful...
Wait for me, Yan.
You place the Wedding Stone on the shrine, and the two of you begin to pray devoutly.
It exploded, the Wedding Stone actually exploded!
Is the matchmaker also despising my past...
Don't overthink it, the matchmaker won't be unreasonable. Maybe today is not a good day, let's pick a good day and try again.
Today is not a good day for anything, it seems that's the only way.
I was a bit distracted just now, I'm sure I can do it if I try again.
Wait for me, Yan.
I didn't expect it to succeed!
If I could have flowers all over my head, don't ask where I'm going...
Yan, we've succeeded, shouldn't we celebrate?
How should we celebrate?
{PlayerSurName}, from now on, I'm yours.\nI've given you my dowry, don't let me down in the future.
Oh, you're joking, sir. I'm a woman of the dust, born lowly, and can't go anywhere at will.
Although my sister is generous, she is not a saint who is free from desires. Don't you plan to coax her?
I dare not aspire to such heights, lest I ruin your Fame.
I've been waiting for you here for so long, you finally remembered to come find me.
You don't seem to be here specifically to pick me up, otherwise why wouldn't you leave a seat?
My friend, you look weary, where are you going?
I saw a Ferry here and thought I could take a boat to see other places, but it seems the boatman is not here, no one to steer the boat.

Coincidentally, I have a cargo ship of my own and I'm planning to recruit some folks to do business in Daliang City. If you wish to return to your hometown in glory one day, why not join me in doing business and making money? I guarantee you'll never have to worry about food and drink in the future.

Opportunities to make money are fleeting. The comfortable life of fine clothes and good food, beautiful wives and concubines is just around the corner. If you're still hesitant, I'll have to find someone else.
(Such a pie-in-the-sky opportunity doesn't come often. Should I seize this chance?)
Well, there are too many scammers these days, it's right to be cautious when such good things happen. However, sometimes being too cautious can also make you miss more opportunities.
Have you decided to join me in doing business and making money?
(Such a pie-in-the-sky opportunity doesn't come often. Should I seize this chance?)
If I had been as indecisive as you back then, I wouldn't have achieved the wealth I have today.
Yes, a man should be decisive and resolute in his actions. What great things can be achieved by being hesitant and indecisive!
Today is the turning point in your life. If you achieve something in the future, don't forget the help I gave you today.
Of course, I will certainly repay your kindness with gratitude.
Come aboard with me quickly, your good days are about to begin.
Half a day later, the cargo ship docked, and the scene before your eyes seems a bit different from what you expected...
Where is this...?
This is a good place. I made my first pot of gold here.
Wait for me here for a moment, I'll go to the cabin to check the goods, and I'll come to pick you up later.
The ship, why is the ship setting sail?
{yell} Hey, I haven't boarded the ship yet!
Newcomer, stop shouting. That guy sold you. Just get used to it here.
What did you say? He sold me?
What do you think he meant when he told you he made his first pot of gold here?
Take me back, I don't want to stay in this ghost place for a moment!
Brothers, the newcomer is a bit fiery, let's cool him down!
The gang leader was killed by him, let's avenge our leader! Revenge!
Newcomer, are you still fiery now?
Damn, you beat me up like this, you tell me if I'm fiery!
Hmm, I like heroes with backbone like this.
Brothers, since he wants to be a hero, let's fulfill his wish.
No, no more.
You stay here today, <color=#c44b0e>tomorrow</color> someone will take you to Run away.\nI advise you, if you do anything out of line, I can't guarantee you'll live to Run away.
I should have kept someone who can sail, how am I going to Run away from here now.
Am I going to die alone on this deserted island...
Have you made any progress on the information you were asked to investigate by the Sea Serpent Gang?
You're asking about the whereabouts of the Imperial Seal, right? Our Sea Jiao Gang is absolutely reliable, we have collected most of the clues about the Imperial Seal.
The Imperial Seal has been through wars and is said to have been split into three pieces, called the Seal of the Sky Dome, the Seal of the People, and the Seal of the State.
The Seal of the Sky Dome was carried by the old emperor. Since the old emperor went hunting in Yan country and never returned, the whereabouts of the Seal of the Sky Dome is unknown.
Someone once saw the Seal of the State in a certain place in the southwest region, but this person was delirious when he revealed the news, and he died not long after.
Continue, any clues about the Mark of the Common People?
I only heard that the Mark of the Common People was guarded by the Imperial City Department back then, I don't know the other details.
Hmm, you need to further investigate, this is very important to us!
Yes, yes, the Sea Serpent Gang will do its best.
I have found a group of laborers for Dragonfly City these days, which should be helpful to Lord Liusheng's grand plan.
(Labor? Is he talking about me?)
Dragonfly City will remember your contribution, don't let down Lord Liusheng's expectations of you!
Yes, yes, I can't repay Lord Liusheng's kindness even if I die.
Recently, there have been many cases of missing people in various places, it turns out to be the work of your Sea Serpent Gang!
Are all the Sea Serpent Gang idiots? They didn't react at all when someone sneaked in.
Guards, throw these people into the river to feed the fish!
After a bloody battle, the Sea Serpent Gang was wiped out, and the people of Dragonfly City fled in panic.\nYou came to Lin'an City with the officers...

{PlayerSurName} has made great contributions in helping to suppress the bandits, you can go to the Lin'an Government Office later to receive the reward from the prefect, we have to go back to report, we'll leave first.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerSurName} ได้มีส่วนร่วมอย่างมากในการช่วยปราบปรามพวกโจร เจ้าสามารถไปที่ศาลาว่าการเมืองหลินอัน ในภายหลังเพื่อรับรางวัลจากนายอำเภอ เราต้องกลับไปรายงาน เราจะออกไปก่อน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: It seems that there has just been a fight here, why are the people of the Sea Serpent Gang dying out so quickly?
Who are you...?

ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ว่ายังไงเด็กน้อย ยังไม่รีบกราบข้าเป็นอาจารย์ของเจ้าอีกหรือ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: My ambition is to join a famous sect, old man, you should find someone else to be your disciple.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ความใฝ่ฝันของข้าคือการได้เข้าร่วมกับสำนักยุทธชื่อดัง ผู้อาวุโสท่านควรมองหาคนอื่นมาเป็นศิษย์ของท่านเถิด

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Kid, without my guidance, aren't you afraid of future hardships?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เด็กน้อย หากไร้ซึ่งการชี้แนะของข้า เจ้าไม่กลัวความยากลำบากในอนาคตดอกหรือ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Thank you for your kindness, old man. I have self-awareness and don't need you to bother.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ขอบคุณสำหรับความเมตตาของผู้อาวุโส แต่ข้าสามารถดูแลตัวเองได้ ไม่จำเป็นต้องรบกวนท่านเลยแม้แต่น้อย

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The waves behind the Yangtze River push the waves ahead.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: คลื่นลูกใหม่ย่อมแรงกว่าคลื่นลูกเก่าจริงๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Disciple {PlayerName} pays respects to the master.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ศิษย์ {PlayerName} ขอคารวะท่านอาจารย์

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}... It's a worthy name for my first disciple, loud and imposing!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerName}... คือชื่อศิษย์คนแรกของข้าสินะ, ช่างน่าประทับใจยิ่งนัก!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I ask you, what was your original ambition in the martial world?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ขอถามเจ้า ปณิธานดั้งเดิมที่จะเข้าสู่ยุทธภพของเจ้าคือสิ่งใดกัน?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: My original ambition was...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ปณิธานดั้งเดิมของข้าคือ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Hmm, indeed ambitious, you will definitely be extraordinary in the future.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อืมม เป็นปณิธานที่ดี ในอนาคตเจ้าจะต้องไม่ธรรมดาแน่นอน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since you have become my disciple, I will definitely help you achieve your lifelong ambition, so as not to waste our master-disciple relationship in this life.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อเจ้ามาเป็นลูกศิษย์ของข้าแล้ว ข้าจะช่วยให้เจ้าบรรลุปณิธานอย่างแน่นอน เพื่อไม่ให้ความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างอาจารย์กับลูกศิษย์ของเราต้องสูญเปล่าในชีวิตนี้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Haven't asked for the master's name yet?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ศิษย์ยังไม่ได้ถามชื่อของท่านอาจารย์เลย?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: My name... you will know it later, no need to ask now.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ชื่อของข้า... เจ้าจะได้รู้เองในวันหน้า ตอนนี้ยังไม่จำเป็นต้องถาม

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What is the name of our sect, I should know this.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: แล้วสำนักของเราชื่ออะไรล่ะ ข้าควรต้องรู้ไว้นะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Hmm, indeed, we should name the sect...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อืมม จริงสิ เราต้องมีชื่อสำนักด้วยสินะ...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since your ambition is to be the best in the world, let's call our sect Unparalleled Sect!\nThe purpose of our sect is to fully help you become the best in the world, take a good look at the unique talent I have customized for you later.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อปณิธานของเจ้าคือเป็นอันดับหนึ่งของยุทธภพ เช่นนั้นจงเรียกสำนักของเราว่า สำนักไร้เทียมทาน!\nจุดประสงค์ของสำนักเราคือการผลักดันเจ้าอย่างเต็มที่ เพื่อให้เจ้าเป็นยอดคนที่เก่งที่สุด มาดูความพิเศษของสำนักเราที่ข้าได้เตรียมไว้ให้เจ้ากันเถอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since your ambition is to unify the martial arts world, let's call your sect the Heavenly Path Gang!\nOur sect's purpose is to fully assist you in unifying the martial arts world and acting on behalf of Heaven. Later, take a good look at the unique talents of our sect that I have customized for you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อปณิธานของเจ้าคือการรวมยุทธภพเป็นหนึ่ง เช่นนั้นจงเรียกสำนักของเราว่า เส้นทางสวรรค์!\nจุดประสงค์ของสำนักเราคือการช่วยเจ้ารวบรวมยุทธภพและทำตามบัญชาสวรรค์ มาดูความพิเศษของสำนักเราที่ข้าได้เตรียมไว้ให้เจ้ากันเถอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since your ambition is to protect your family and defend your country, let's call your sect the National Protection Society!\nOur sect's purpose is to fully assist you in making meritorious deeds, protecting your family and defending your country. Later, take a good look at the unique talents of our sect that I have customized for you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อปณิธานของเจ้าคือ ปกป้องประเทศชาติและบ้านเกิด เช่นนั้นจงเรียกสำนักของเราว่า สมาคมพิทักษ์แผ่นดิน!\nจุดประสงค์ของสำนักคือการช่วยเหลือเจ้าในการสร้างความดีความชอบ ปกป้องประเทศและบ้านเกิดของเจ้า มาดูความพิเศษของสำนักเราที่ข้าได้เตรียมไว้ให้เจ้ากันเถอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since your ambition is to be the richest in the world, let's call your sect the Wealthy Gate!\nOur sect's purpose is to fully assist you in becoming the richest person in the world. Later, take a good look at the unique talents of our sect that I have customized for you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อปณิธานของเจ้าคือการเป็นคนที่ร่ำรวยที่สุดในโลก เช่นนั้นจงเรียกสำนักของเจ้าว่า ประตูมั่งคั่ง!\nจุดประสงค์ของสำนักเราคือการผลักดันเจ้าอย่างเต็มที่ เพื่อให้เจ้าเป็นคนที่รวยที่สุดในโลก มาดูความพิเศษของสำนักเราที่ข้าได้เตรียมไว้ให้เจ้ากันเถอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since your ambition is to have numerous beauties, let's call your sect the Flower Sect!\nOur sect's purpose is to fully assist you in becoming the number one in the world. Later, take a good look at the unique talents of our sect that I have customized for you.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ในเมื่อปณิธานของเจ้าคือการถูกรายล้อมด้วยสาวงาม เช่นนั้นจงเรียกสำนักของเราว่า สำนักบุปผา!\nจุดประสงค์ของสำนักเราคือการช่วยเหลือเจ้าอย่างเต็มที่ เพื่อให้เจ้าเป็นยอดคนที่เก่งที่สุด มาดูความพิเศษของสำนักเราที่ข้าได้เตรียมไว้ให้เจ้ากันเถอะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The sect's name is too casual, what is this unique talent of our sect!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตั้งชื่อสำนักมักง่ายไปไหมเนี่ย ความพิเศษของสำนักเราคืออะไรกัน!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Don't be surprised, the name of the sect is just a code, it has no practical significance. Any sect will gradually decline and die after thousands of years. Instead of caring about the name of the sect, it's better to live in the present and stand out.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไม่เห็นจะแปลกอะไร ชื่อสำนักเป็นเพียงแค่ชื่อเรียก ในทางปฏิบัติมิได้มีความสำคัญใดๆ ไม่ว่าสำนักไหนๆเมื่อเวลาผ่านไปล้วนเสื่อมถอยและล่มสลาย แทนที่จะยึดติดกับชื่อสำนัก มิสู้อยู่กับปัจจุบันอย่างสง่าผ่าเผยดีกว่าดอกหรือ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: {PlayerName}, you are the eldest disciple of this sect, and the responsibility of revitalizing the sect falls on you. The position of the head of the sect will be yours sooner or later, don't think about it too early.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: {PlayerName} เจ้าเป็นศิษย์คนโตของสำนักเรา ความรับผิดชอบในการฟื้นฟูสำนักตกอยู่ที่เจ้าแล้ว ไม่ช้าก็เร็วตำแหน่งเจ้าสำนักย่อมเป็นของเจ้า จงอย่าได้วิตกเร็วเกินไป

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I wish you could pass it on to others, I feel a bit pressured as the founding disciple.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าหวังว่าท่านจะส่งมอบภาระนี้ให้ผู้อื่น ในฐานะศิษย์รุ่นแรก ข้ารู้สึกกดดันจริงๆ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Next, your master will be by your side to guide you at any time. Unless it's a matter of life and death, he won't easily show up, after all, you will have to stand alone for our sect in the future.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ต่อไปอาจารย์จะคอยอยู่เคียงข้างเพื่อชี้แนะเจ้าตลอดเวลา เว้นแต่จะมีสถานการณ์ความเป็นความตาย จึงจะไม่ยอมปรากฏตัวง่ายๆ เจ้าจะต้องยืนหยัดด้วยตนเองเพื่ออนาคตของสำนักเรา

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Master, master?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์ อาจารย์?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Stop yelling, your master has many enemies and can't show up easily.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: หยุดโวยวายได้แล้ว อาจารย์ของเจ้ามีศัตรูมากมายจะปรากฏตัวพร่ำเพรื่อได้อย่างไร

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Disciple, are you planning to be a lone ranger or invite several partners to venture into the martial arts world together?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าลูกศิษย์ เจ้าคิดจะท่องยุทธภพคนเดียว หรือจะหาสหายร่วมท่องยุทธภพด้วยกันกับเจ้าล่ะ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Since you have this idea, your master won't bother to teach you about the ways of the world.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เมื่อเจ้าคิดเช่นนี้ อาจารย์ก็จะไม่เสียเวลาสอนเจ้าเกี่ยวกับวิถีทางโลก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: If you want to stand out in the martial arts world, blindly fighting and killing will only leave you isolated and helpless. The martial arts world values interpersonal relationships. Having one more helper increases your strength, and at the same time, you have one less enemy.
Let me take the doctor in this unnamed village as an example to guide you on how to get along with him and then invite him to join your team and fight alongside you.
The doctor likes <color=#c44b0e>tea leaves</color>, which are sold by the peddler in the village. You can buy some <color=#c44b0e>low-grade tea</color> from the peddler to give to the doctor.
Your master will give you all the coins he has for practice. If you run out of coins, you can only go to the Lost Forest to hunt wild game for money.

The doctor likes <color=#c44b0e>tea leaves</color>, which are sold by the peddler in the village. The peddler is not open yet, you can wait until daytime to buy some <color=#c44b0e>low-grade tea</color> from him to give to the doctor.
Your master will give you all the coins he has for practice. If you run out of coins, you can only go to the Lost Forest to hunt wild game for money.

Raise the Relations of Doctor {郎中·白头翁} to <color=#c44b0e>Close (Relations value 40)</color> through Gift. If Low-grade tea is not enough, you can wait for the Peddler to restock tomorrow and Buy more.
When your Relations with others reach a certain level, you may be asked to help complete some tasks. It's best to help others, as you may receive unexpected rewards.
Try to help the doctor complete his tasks, as they are his long-held wishes.
You have fulfilled his wish, now you can <color=#c44b0e>Invite</color> him to join your team.
Well, having a doctor who is good at Heal in your team will reduce the threats you face in the future.

Apprentice, the <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color> is full of vipers and wild boars, which is a good place for you to improve your cultivation in the early stage. Killing these beasts can earn you EXP, and when accumulated to a certain level, you can level up.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เจ้าลูกศิษย์ ที่<color=#c44b0e>ป่าสาปสูญ</color> เต็มไปด้วยงูพิษและหมูป่า เป็นสถานที่เหมาะกับเจ้าในการฝึกฝนขั้นต้น เมื่อฆ่าพวกมันเจ้าจะได้รับค่าประสบการณ์ เมื่อสะสมถึงระดับหนึ่ง เจ้าจะสามารถเลื่อนระดับได้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: First, level up to <color=#c44b0e>Level 10</color>, and then your master will formally teach you the unique Martial Arts of this sect.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ขั้นแรก เพิ่มระดับจนถึง<color=#c44b0e>ระดับ 10</color> จากนั้นอาจารย์จะสอนวรยุทธประจำสำนักสำนักให้แก่เจ้า

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Keep this medicine with you, don't hesitate to use it.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: รับยานี่ไป อย่าลังเลที่จะใช้มันล่ะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Good, good, my disciple is indeed extraordinary, now it's time for you to practice our martial arts.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ดี ดีมาก ศิษย์ของข้าไม่ธรรมดาจริงๆ ถึงเวลาที่เจ้าจะได้เรียนรูวรยุทธของสำนักเราแล้ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Our martial arts were created by the master who learned from all families. The so-called one method leads to all methods, our martial arts are Fist Kung Fu, but they are also very beneficial to other types of Kung Fu!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: วรยุทธของสำนักเราถูกคิดค้นโดยท่านปรมาจารย์ โดยหลอมรวมจากวรยุทธหลายแขนง กล่าวกันว่าหากเข้าใจเพียงหนึ่ง ก็จะสามารถเข้าใจได้ทั้งหมด แม้ว่าวรยุทธของเราจะเป็นวิชาหมัดและฝ่ามือ แต่ก็มีประโยชน์อย่างมากเมื่อสู้กับวรยุทธอื่นๆ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Master will now formally teach you our martial arts, you must practice diligently and not slack off. I hope you can glorify our sect in the future and let the master's hard work be passed on.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ตอนนี้อาจารย์จะสอนวรยุทธให้ เจ้าต้องหมั่นฝึกฝนอย่าได้เกียจคร้าน ข้าหวังว่าเจ้าจะนำพาสำนักเราให้เจริญรุ่งเรืองในอนาคต เพื่อสืบทอดปณิธานของอาจารย์ต่อไป

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Don't forget to <color=#c44b0e>find this Manual from 【Item】, choose Learn, then you can level up in actual combat.</color> When you have practiced this palm technique to a certain level, you can learn the internal skills of this sect.
Good apprentice, now you are qualified to learn the internal skills of this sect, and I will teach you now.

Learning martial arts is like sailing against the current, if you don't advance, you will retreat. You can't slack off for a day.\nGo and practice the "Sigh Method" I just taught you to the sixth level.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: การเรียนรู้วิทยายุทธก็เหมือนกับการแล่นทวนกระแสน้ำ ถ้าไม่ก้าวหน้าก็จะถอย เจ้าไม่สามารถหย่อนยานได้สักวัน\nไปฝึกฝน "วิธีถอนหายใจ" ที่ข้าเพิ่งสอนเจ้าให้ถึงระดับที่หก

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Now, in order to test your learning, I am going to assign you a big task!
Suddenly speaking so seriously, I feel something is not right.
There is a red-haired wild boar in the depths of the Lost Forest. Go and kill or subdue it to prove your current strength.
Before doing this, it's best to <color=#c44b0e>level up to Level 20</color>, so that the gap is not too big, and you won't be unable to fight back.
Master, I have completed the "big task" you assigned me. What reward will I get this time?
Master? Master! Master~~~~
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์? อาจารย์! อาจารย์~~~~

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Oh, you're so noisy. You've done such a trivial thing and you're disturbing my dream. You're really unfilial!
(Master is really grumpy when he wakes up.)
Take this Manual and Learn it carefully. If you can master it as soon as possible, the petty thieves in the world will pose little threat to you.
Since you have completed the task arranged by the master, there is naturally a special benefit...

The <color=#c44b0e>Bandit Camp</color> in the Nameless area is a menace to the community and ravages the neighbors. As the founding elder disciple of this sect, you have the responsibility to eliminate these demons that harm the world!
Master, you seem to have forgotten something. \nDidn't I already wipe out this Bandit Camp?
Ah, well done! I'm very pleased to see that you have such a righteous heart, my disciple.
Master, you used to only ask me to kill small snakes and wild boars. Now you suddenly want me to wipe out a bandit camp. Are you trying to make our sect extinct?

Is the Frost Fist taught by the master just a show? If you can't even destroy a bandit den that is not in the mainstream of the rivers and lakes, you'd better go home and stop wandering in the rivers and lakes.
With the Bandit Camp easily wiped out, Master, do you know of any other bandit camps or thief dens? Tell me, and I will eradicate them one by one, to rid the people of these threats!

Just wiped out a group of insignificant bandits and you're already getting ahead of yourself? Not to mention that there are always bigger fish to fry, not all bandits and thieves in this world are bad people. Many of them are forced into banditry by the government.
If you can't distinguish between right and wrong, good and evil, and only know how to use brute force, won't you end up helping the tyrant in the end!
They don't have labels on their faces indicating who is good and who is bad, how am I supposed to distinguish?

Reading ten thousand books is not as good as traveling ten thousand miles, and it's the same for us martial artists. We can't just pursue passive cultivation, we also need to travel around and experience the hardships of the common people. Then you will gradually understand how to distinguish.
Where are we going to travel now?
First, go to the Nameless village and find the Coachman. Have him take us to <color=#c44b0e>Chuxiang City</color> for a visit. It's been a long time since your master has been a respectable person.
Aren't we supposed to walk ten thousand miles? Although riding a horse carriage is convenient, won't we miss a lot of the scenery along the way?

Your master has worked hard for half his life and doesn't want to waste time on meaningless things. If you don't mind the trouble, catch a pet to serve as your foot power, it might even be faster than a horse carriage.
I forgot to tell you, it will take some time for the Coachman to arrive. In the meantime, you can go to the Lost Forest to practice your skills, so you'll be prepared for the future.
Finally back to Chuxiang City, I wonder if old friends are still the same...
Disciple, since we're in Chuxiang City, let's go visit an old friend with your master.
Who is this old friend of yours, Master?
He was just a minor character back then, but now he's the pacifying general of a city.
Where can we meet this pacifying general?
He should be in the General's mansion in Chuxiang City. However, with your current status, you may not be able to see him easily. Just play it by ear.
General Lu, long time no see.
Who are you... Identify yourself!
"To have a house of ten thousand rooms, to shelter all the poor under the sky!"
The sorrow and joy finger method, you are, you are Yan Gexing!!!\nIt's been many years, and you've changed so much.
(So Master's real name is Yan Gexing, why didn't he tell me before?)
What brings you to me?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: มาหาข้ามีเรื่องอะไรรึ?

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: It was you who invited my second senior brother to Chuxiang City for a banquet years ago, and then he disappeared; and you became the pacifier of Chuxiang City, the reason for this is why I am looking for you today.

Yan Gexing, times have changed, who in the martial arts world doesn't know that you have lost all your martial arts and your Meridian is completely destroyed. In the past, you and your brothers were invincible when you joined forces, but now, hehe...
If I capture you, I can exchange favors with those martial arts sects.
My disciple, they want to capture me to exchange favors, what do you think?
Whoever dares to disrespect you will have to pass me first!
Didn't expect, the pretty boy is quite powerful.\nSir, how about letting the sisters accompany him to play?
Beauty, this kid has received Yan Gexing's true teachings, you have to be careful, don't hurt yourself.
The concubine thanks the lord for his concern.
The concubine is incompetent, please punish me, my lord.
The beauty is innocent, quickly go to the side and rest.
Yan Gexing, I didn't expect that you, a waste, actually accepted such a face-showing disciple. It seems that what you want to do is planned to be completed by your disciple.
Yes, this kid has unlimited potential in the future. What I couldn't do back then may not be impossible in his hands.

The incident back then was led by Cai Yuanchang of Confucius Temple, and all three religions were involved. Your senior brother was ambushed by the masters of the three religions, defeated and captured, and I don't know where he went.
Aren't you planning to capture me and give me away as a favor anymore?
Now that I am living a life of luxury, why should I get involved in your messy affairs of the three religions and nine streams, don't bother me in the future.
Disciple, don't disturb Mr. Lu in his Drunken life, let's go.
I don't know where the three religions have taken my senior brother. The matter of Nine Factions Sect still needs my senior brother to solve.
At this point, it is necessary to go to Confucius Temple as soon as possible.
Master can't show up, disciple, you go on behalf of me to ask the curator Cai Yuanchang if he knows the whereabouts of Chu Kuangsheng.
Where did this junior come from, daring to break into my Confucius Temple!
What can I do for you, {PlayerSurName} son, in Confucius Temple?
Ask the curator about the whereabouts of Chu Kuangsheng.
Where did you hear this person's name?
No comment, I was commissioned to inquire about this person's whereabouts.
It's no harm to tell you, he is being held in <color=#c44b0e>Lin'an CityCloud Forest Temple</color>, and I will take you to see him soon!
{yell} Come here, catch the remnants of the devil!
I always feel that you won't be so kind to tell me where you are easily.
Because I'm about to send you to meet him on the Horse, there's no need to hide anything.
Not good!
Your kung fu seems a bit familiar, could it be...
Step back, my disciple!
Yan Gexing, you're still alive!
I didn't expect you to recognize me in the end.
You sent this little one to find out about that person, didn't you? Even if you know, can you save him? Moreover, do you think the head of this hall will let you go?
A tiger bullied by a dog when it falls on the plain, even the small Confucius Temple dares to show off in front of me.
Let's go!
It turns out to be bluffing...
As expected, there's not much left of your skills...
Master, what should we do next?

Since our whereabouts have been exposed, we can't be foolish enough to go to the Cloud Forest Temple.\nThe most urgent task is for you to quickly improve your cultivation, and the master needs to clear the old injuries on his body.
How can the old ailment on your body be removed?
Over the years, the master has traveled around and has already found out how to remove the old ailment. However, due to the lack of reliable people to escort, he has not been able to make the trip.
Now that I have accepted you as a disciple, your strength and character are passable. Whether the master can achieve Nirvana restoration this time depends on you.
Before this long journey, let's go back to <color=#c44b0e>Nameless village</color> first. The master once left some things there, and it's time to take them out.
Disciple, do you find this stone tower a bit strange?
Don't see anything unusual?
Ya—Hei—
Master Yan, this old monk has been waiting for a long time!
Hmph, I thought there would be a grand welcome for me. It seems that my reputation is about to be forgotten. Well, let me play with you today!
Master, you are still recovering from your injuries, can you handle it?
Your master, even if he just eats and sleeps every day, his cultivation is increasing day by day, which is not comparable to ordinary people. Today, let you see the old man's skills!
Master Yan's skills are indeed extraordinary, but there are more than just us monks blocking your way...

Master has a premonition that this trip will not be smooth sailing, and you may encounter some difficult enemies. Your cultivation level must reach at least <color=#c44b0e>level 70</color> to barely cope.
Disciple, this step is unpredictable, your current cultivation level is shallow, do you really want to enter the temple?
(With my current strength, the master thinks that my cultivation is shallow. Do I need to reach level 70 or 80 to be sure? Should I insist on entering Cloud Forest Temple now?)
Since you are so determined, be extra careful.
Master, master, how are you?
Disciple, you finally came out... Did you save the person?
I'm incompetent, Uncle Obsessed died in an explosion.
{yell} What, what did you say!!!
Second senior brother, why do you have to compete with me for everything, even death, why do you have to die before me...

Disciple, your master can't hold on any longer, I'm going to follow your uncle. When I took you as a disciple, I planned to make you surpass your uncle, to show him that the disciple I trained is a thousand times stronger than his disciple...

Your master and your uncle were as close as brothers, but because of the past, there was a rift between us. Your master and your uncle had different philosophies, and eventually went their separate ways, leading to today's disaster...
Cough, cough, cough...
Before your master leaves, he leaves you a thought—
Worry before the world worries, and enjoy after the world enjoys—
Thinking of the vastness of the world, I can't help but shed tears—
Disciple, with this move, there are few opponents in the martial arts world. Your master can leave with peace of mind...
<size=200%>Master—</size>
If I hadn't rushed out in time, your old life would have been lost!
Hehe, my senior brother can't bear to see me die, our bet is not over yet.
{PlayerName}, come and kowtow to your uncle.
Nephew {PlayerName}, meet uncle.
The boy you took in has extraordinary roots and a temperament that suits my taste. If one day you kick him out of the sect because you don't like him, I'll take him in.
Dream on, I'm counting on him to take care of me in my old age.
Senior brother, you have been imprisoned for these years and know nothing about the outside world. Do you know what the Nine Factions Sect has become now?
Junior brother, are you still coveting the position of the leader of the Nine Factions Sect? Are you still not reconciled to what happened back then?
Pah, who cares about this crappy position. I just can't bear to see it ruined!
It seems you still have prejudice against my disciple!

Senior Brother! Over the years, you've been imprisoned and cut off from the world. The Nine Factions Sect is now causing chaos and wreaking havoc everywhere. If we don't take action, it will surely lead to a great disaster!
Sigh... still this bad temper.
Master and Uncle Master seem to have a deep connection with the Nine Factions Sect. What exactly is this Nine Factions Sect?

The Nine Factions Sect was originally created by your master and your master's brother to shelter the downtrodden scholars of the world. Later, the Nine Factions Sect became a mix of dragons and snakes, causing trouble everywhere for fear that the world would not be in chaos...

Master and your Senior Uncle had a disagreement over the future direction of the Nine Factions Sect, and were forced to run away. Since then, the Nine Factions Sect has become increasingly reckless, even disregarding the three schools, and has finally been suppressed by their joint forces.

Your Uncle Master is obsessed with Passive, has no interest in managing the Nine Factions Sect, and has handed everything over to his disciple. And it is his disciple who, although has strengthened the Nine Factions Sect, has also led the Nine Factions Sect into an irretrievable situation.
Now, the master can no longer allow Nine Factions Sect to run rampant, it's time to clean up Nine Factions Sect and return it to its original essence.
The disciple will do everything possible to help Master achieve his wish!
\n|Our master-disciple relationship is a matter of fate, we won't have many opportunities to be together in the future, I want to leave you with some memories, so as not to leave regrets later...
Disciple, watch carefully~
Burp~~~
With this move, there are few opponents in the martial arts world.

The location of the Nine Factions Sect's main hall has been moved multiple times, and even Master doesn't know its whereabouts now. Your team is full now, so Master will return to the Nameless Village first. If you find out the location of the Nine Factions Sect's main hall, don't forget to inform Master.

The location of the Nine Factions Sect's main hall has been moved multiple times, and even Master doesn't know its whereabouts now. We are weak and can only hope that those well-informed forces can help us find clues.
May I ask if the clan leader knows where the Fountain of Youth is?
Given our relations, I don't want to reveal such important information to you.
Hehe, the Fountain of Youth is now at the end of Melody House, just past a pavilion. If you see something you shouldn't, you're on your own.
May I ask if Miss Butterfly knows where the Fountain of Youth is?
Butterfly seems to have overheard brother mentioning the "Fountain of Youth", but Butterfly doesn't know where it is.
May I ask if the monk knows where the Fountain of Youth is?
Hmm? You dare to inquire about the Fountain of Youth, do you want to die!
May I ask if Miss Allure knows where the Fountain of Youth is?
I'm sorry, {PlayerSurName} son, I can't tell you about this.
The Fountain of Youth is at the end of Melody House, just past a pavilion. However, I advise {PlayerSurName} son not to go there casually.
Hmm, the Fountain of Youth... I seem to have heard sister monk mention it, but I can't quite remember.
The place ahead must be the legendary Fountain of Youth. It seems inconvenient now, let's wait a while before we come.
This must be the legendary Fountain of Youth...
Disciple, go and keep a lookout for your master. Your master needs to heal his injuries.

The highest good is like water. Water benefits all things and does not compete with them. It dwells in places that all dislike. Therefore it is close to the Way. Living in a good place; Heart is deep; Kindness is good; Words are trustworthy; Governance is good; Ability is good; Movement is timely. Only by not competing, there is no blame...
\n|Ah--Ha!!!
Congratulations, Master, congratulations, Master!
To go to the southwest, you need to pass through the <color=#c44b0e>West Pass</color> of the Nameless area. The guards there are somewhat unreasonable, it's best not to conflict with them.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เพื่อจะไปแดนตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ เจ้าต้องผ่าน<color=#c44b0e>ประตูตะวันตก</color>ที่พื้นที่ไร้นาม แต่ทหารที่นั่นไม่ค่อยมีเหตุผลสักเท่าไร ทางที่ดีอย่าไปมีปัญหากับพวกเขาล่ะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: The master is no longer there, and now I am the only one left in the sect. Should I continue to persist for this sect?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์เองก็ไม่อยู่แล้ว และข้าก็เป็นคนเดียวที่เหลืออยู่ของสำนัก ข้าควรคงสำนักไว้ต่อไปไหม

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What does it matter to me to glorify the sect? The ambition I promised to the old man was just nonsense when I was hot-headed, who would remember it?
How could I possibly hang myself on a tree, there are more and stronger martial arts waiting for me in other sects!
Even if I am the only one left in the sect, for the master's inheritance, for the ambition I promised to the master, I will persist!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: แม้จะเป็นคนเดียวในสำนักที่เหลืออยู่ แต่นี่เป็นสิ่งที่อาจารย์เหลือไว้ ปฎิธานที่สัญญาไว้กับอาจารย์ ข้าจะไม่มีวันกลับคำ!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: I heard that someone at <color=#c44b0e>Hotel Prosperous</color> is discussing the <color=#c44b0e>Chu Xiang Hero Meeting</color>, you go and find out what this Hero Meeting is all about.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ได้ยินคนที่ <color=#c44b0e>โรงเตี๊ยมรุ่งโรจน์</color> คุยกันเรื่อง <color=#c44b0e>ชุมนุมวีรบุรุษแห่งจูเซียง</color> เจ้าลองไปดูว่าชุมนุมที่ว่านั้นคืออะไร

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Disciple, this is a great opportunity for you to show your face, you must win the championship of this Hero Meeting!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ศิษย์ข้า นี่เป็นโอกาสอันดีที่เจ้าจะได้สร้างชื่อ เจ้าต้องเป็นผู้ชนะของงานชุมนุมนี้ให้ได้!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: A good teacher produces a good student, my first disciple is not comparable to these mediocre people.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์ที่ดีย่อมสั่งสอนศิษย์ที่ดี ศิษย์คนแรกของข้าย่อมเหนือกว่าคนทั่วไปพวกนั้น

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Today you won the championship in the field, taking this opportunity, the master will teach you a second-class finger method to add icing on the cake!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: วันนี้เจ้าได้เป็นผู้ชนะ เป็นโอกาสอันดี อาจารย์จะสอนวิชาดรรชนีขั้นที่สองแก่เจ้าเพื่อให้นี่เป็นโอกาสที่ดียิ่งไปอีก!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Disciple, do you know what is the most famous place in this Lin'an City?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ศิษย์ข้า เจ้ารู้หรือไม่ว่าสถานที่ใดมีชื่อที่สุดในเมืองหลินอัน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: How would I know, it's my first time here.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ข้าจะรู้ได้ยังไง นี่เป็นครั้งแรกที่ข้ามาที่นี่นะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: It's the most famous place for fireworks in Wu Yue - Maiden House.\nWhen I was young, tsk tsk...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: นี่คือสถานที่แสดงดอกไม้ไฟที่มีชื่อเสียงที่สุดในหวู่เยว่ - ตำหนักพิสุทธิ์\nสมัยเมื่อข้าเด็กๆ จุ๊ จุ๊ จุ๊...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: So Master is a regular customer there.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ที่แท้อาจารย์ก็เป็นลูกค้าประจำนี่เอง

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Nonsense, I was handsome when I was young, I didn't need to go to such places!
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ไร้สาระ สมัยหนุ่มๆข้าน่ะรูปงามขนาดไหน ไม่จำเป็นต้องไปสถานที่เช่นนี้หรอก!

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: When you get old, you regret not having seen it. Just right, I'll take you to see the world~
Hey, so this is what it's like inside Maiden House...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เฮ้, ภายในตำหนักพิสุทธิ์เป็นแบบนี้นี่เอง...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alas, they are all vulgar, only the owner of this place is barely acceptable.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เฮอะ พวกนี้ล้วนเป็นของชั้นต่ำ มีเพียงเจ้าของนั่นที่พอใช้ได้

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: With such high standards, it's not easy to serve you here.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ท่านมาตรฐานสูงเช่นนี้ คงยากนักจะทำให้ท่านพอใจ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Hey, so this is what it's like inside Maiden House...
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: เฮ้, ภายในตำหนักพิสุทธิ์เป็นแบบนี้นี่เอง...

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Alas, they are all vulgar, this Maiden House is not as good as its name.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อนิจจาพวกเขาล้วนหยาบคาย ตำหนักพิสุทธิ์แห่งนี้ไม่ได้ดีเท่ากับชื่อของมัน

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: With such high standards, it's not easy to serve you here.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ท่านมาตรฐานสูงเช่นนี้ คงยากนักจะทำให้ท่านพอใจ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Good disciple, you forced Tong Daofu of the Imperial City Division to fight you with Blood reversal, it shows that you are not only talented, but also diligent and hardworking, I am really proud of you!

The Wind and Cloud Arena in this Daliang City is Acclaimed in the martial arts world, with many fourth-tier masters of Heaven and Earth Mysterious Yellow, I really don't know what position my first disciple can achieve now.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ลานประลองวายุเมฆาแห่งเมืองต้าเหลียงนี้ได้รับการยกย่องเป็นอย่างยิ่งในยุทธภพ ด้วยลำดับชั้นการประลองถึง 4 ระดับ ฟ้า ดิน ลี้ลับ เหลือง ไม่รู้ว่าศิษย์คนแรกของข้าจะไปได้ถึงขั้นไหนกันนะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Why not go and fight a match to find out, as the first disciple, if you can't become the leader of the Heavenly Tier, it's a bit unreasonable.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ทำไมเจ้าไม่ไปทดสอบดูล่ะ ในฐานะศิษย์เอกของข้า หากเจ้าไม่ได้อันดับแรกของลานประลองชั้นฟ้า ก็ดูจะไม่สมเหตุสมผลแล้ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Master, your disciple is now the leader of the Heavenly Tier, aren't you going to praise me?
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์ ศิษย์ของท่านเป็นอันดับหนึ่งของลานประลองขั้นฟ้าแล้ว ท่านจะไม่ชมสักหน่อยหรือ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What's there to be proud of for defeating a bunch of small fry? \nIf you have the guts, go and win the Peak of Jianghu to make your master proud.
Master, all the Coins on the disciple can't add up to 1 Guan, if this continues, I will have to sleep on the streets.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: อาจารย์ ศิษย์มีเงินติดตัวไม่ถึง 1 ตำลึงด้วยซ้ำ ถ้ายังเป็นอย่างงี้ต่อไป ข้าคงต้องนอนกลางถนนแล้ว

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You are really useless, when I was young, I was not as down and out as you.

Well, I'll take you to make some money, let's get through the current difficulties first. There is a <color=#c44b0e>Relic House</color> in the city, you go there and "borrow" a few Guan for emergency.
Disciple, I want to solemnly warn you, making money here is not the right way, you must know when to stop and not get addicted, don't forget your ambition.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: ศิษย์ข้า ข้าขอเตือนเจ้า การหาเงินเช่นนี้ไม่ใช่วิธีที่ถูกที่ควรนัก เจ้าต้องรู้จักที่จะหยุดเมื่อถึงเวลา อย่าหลงลืมปณิธานแต่เดิม แล้วหลงพัวพันไปกับมันล่ะ

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: What are you doing with so much money on you!\nWhat you need to do now is to improve your strength as soon as possible, otherwise no matter how much money you save, you can't keep it, don't you know the principle of "Innocent of Honorable, guilty of holding a jade"!

<color=#c44b0e>Chuxiang City's Dirty Street, Daliang City's Glittering Artifact House, and Zhongzhou's Night Demon Square</color> all hold auctions from time to time. You can use your money to find many good things, you should really go and see.
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: <color=#c44b0e>ตรอกเล้าหมูเมืองฉู่เซียง, หอไข่มุกของเมืองต้าเหลียง และจัตุรัสปีศาจราตรีในจงโจว</color> ล้วนมีการประมูลเป็นครั้งคราว เจ้าสามารถใช้เงินหาของดีๆ มากมายได้ที่นั้น, เจ้าควรจะลองไปดูจริงๆ.

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: Feeling dizzy, weak in the limbs...
What you have is a symptom of excessive Stamina exhaustion, which not only greatly weakens your damage and Defense effects in battle, but may also induce sudden death!
Master, what should I do now? I don't want to die young!

You can recover your stamina by staying at the <color=#c44b0e>inn in the village</color>. If you don't have money, you can make do with a night on the <color=#c44b0e>straw mat in the broken house</color> in the village.

With your current skills, you can go to Xiangfan's <color=#c44b0e>Wild Wolf Valley</color> to hone your skills. There, you can train yourself to grow more appropriately. You can also hunt for animal skins and meat to sell to merchants.
Wuyue's <color=#c44b0e>Epiphyllum Valley</color> is dangerous, but it's just the right Whetstone for you now.

With your current strength, you should be able to handle the beasts in the <color=#c44b0e>Soul Destroyer Forest</color> in Xiangfan. Don't always pick on the weak, fighting inseparably with the enemy is the fastest way to increase your EXP.
"{PlayerName} Young Hero:"
"Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, no matter where you are, whether you are homesick or reunited, we are grateful for your acquaintance in this world of martial arts."
"To express our gratitude, we specially offer you mooncakes from our studio for you to taste. Thank you again for your tolerance and support for 'Hero's Adventure'."
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: "เพื่อแสดงความขอบคุณ พวกเราจึงขอมอบขนมไหว้พระจันทร์ของสตูดิโอให้ท่านชิมโดยเฉพาะ ของคุณอีกครั้งที่คอยอดทน และสนับสนุน 'Hero's Adventure' อยู่เสมอ"

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: "Half Full Studio"
ชีวิตเป็นสิ่งไม่เที่ยง ความสงบของจิตใจคื: "Half Full Studio"

Life is impermanent, peace of mind is th: You use thunderous methods, causing a wave of bloodshed in the martial arts world.
Under your great reputation, all factions are sincerely frightened, only to bow down to you.
You stand alone at the peak, overlooking the turbulent winds and clouds,
At this moment, it seems like the whole Jianghu is under your control!
You have accumulated countless Gold treasures, and the economic lifeline of the whole world is in your hands.
You indulge in mountains of gold and silver all day, enjoying the wealth and glory you have earned through life and death.
Beautiful women are like clouds by your side, each with their own charm. Drunk in the flowers, love never gets old, beauty fades, you must cherish.
The moon sinks and the sun rises, the stars move, a short night seems to last a hundred years,
The rise and fall, glory and disgrace are all fleeting, fame and wealth are all illusions.
You, who have understood the mysteries of the stars, at this moment truly understand what it means to be an ant under the sage...
You have chosen someone else, this general does not like fickle people, you better not come to this general to join in the fun.
Go away, this general is not in the mood to deal with you people from the rivers and lakes, don't be an eyesore in front of this general.

Your passion is commendable, young hero, but the training of the Ye Family Battalion is extremely harsh, and you can't keep up with your current physical condition. If you really want to join the army, come to me when you <color=#c44b0e>level up to 25></color>.

Every man has his duty in the rise and fall of the world, young hero, there is more than one way to serve the country if you are willing.\nYoung hero, you gather heroes from all walks of life, resist foreign enemies, punish the evil within, and it is more convenient to do things than to join the army.
I can't stand scoundrels like you the most!
I didn't expect you to be such a person, daring to slander Marshal Ye!
Marshal Ye is blind to let a scum like you join the Ye Family Battalion!
The thing I hate the most in my life is shameless villains like you!
I, {PlayerName}, am just an insignificant person in the martial arts world.
The show is about to start...
Kid, are you trying to lure my disciple into joining the Yan Yun Iron Army?
(What a great body technique, I didn't notice when he appeared behind me)
Old man, good birds choose trees to nest, and wise ministers choose masters to serve.\n{PlayerGivenName} brother, you are such a talent, it would be a pity if you can't use your martial arts.
Who says he can't use his martial arts? When his martial arts are great, he will drive you Yan dogs back to Yan country, and he will be famous in history.
My disciple will never be a traitor who will be stinking for thousands of years.
In that case, I should take action as soon as possible to avoid future troubles.
You can try.
Haha, I was just joking, why do you take it seriously?
In that case, I won't force you.\n{PlayerGivenName} brother, we will meet again.
Master, at least let me speak, why did you reject him directly for me?
Kid, I can't stand by and watch you be bewitched and become a sinner of the ages!\nIf you want to be a running dog for Yan country, wait until I die, out of sight, out of mind.
What I mean is, let me reject that guy in person, and then scold him a few more words, wouldn't it be more refreshing, and it can also completely cut off their thoughts of pulling me.
Well, that's the disciple I taught.
It seems that you are trying to win me over, based on my understanding of you...
I must tear this traitorous kid to pieces today!
If I had known today, I shouldn't have saved this kid in the Lost Forest.
You shameless villain, today you have to apologize with death!
Chuxiang City, a must-contest place for the military...
I am {PlayerName}, it's just a small effort, Miss Ye doesn't need to be polite.
Lin'an City in the south of the Yangtze River...
{yell} Leave your things behind!
Give me back my things!
Such treasures naturally belong to those who have the strength to keep them. Even if I gave it to you, someone else would steal it sooner or later.
Who are you, you're not from the Jiuli tribe!
You're a defeated soldier, you have no right to question me.
Damn, I almost forgot something important. Why would I waste my time talking to you!
{yell} Chief, give me back my things!!!
With your insignificant skills, you dare to snatch from the tiger's mouth!
You can kill but not insult!
I didn't want to kill you, I just wanted to ask you a few questions.
Who are you, you're not from the Jiuli tribe, why do you want to steal this thing?
My name is Yue Yong Yingyu, I am from Dragonfly City, this item is very important to us...
It seems you know the origin of this item, why not tell me about it.
Why do you think I would tell you!
To get her to reveal the origin of this item, I should...
I hope you keep your word!
The legendary Imperial Seal, after several wars, was broken into three pieces, each possessing one third of the original Imperial Seal's national destiny.
They are respectively named the Seal of Heaven, the Seal of the People, and the Seal of the Nation, and the Seal of the Nation you just obtained is one of them.
So, gathering the three seals is to restore the Imperial Seal?
Exactly!
I've told you the origin of this thing, it's very important to me, can you fulfill your promise to me now?
Collecting three seal stones can restore the Imperial Seal, so this seal of the country...
I didn't expect there to be such a trustworthy person like you in the martial arts world. Can you tell me your name? I don't want to become enemies with someone like you in the future.
{PlayerName}。
{PlayerSurName}……{PlayerGivenName}……
{PlayerSurName} Sang, I've remembered your name.
Shameless, how can you break your promise!
All is fair in war, who told you to trust others easily!
I will never forget the humiliation you gave me today! \nOne day I will surpass you, and repay you tenfold, a hundredfold!
A moment later...
Please let me go, I'll tell you everything I know, sob...
The legendary Imperial Seal, after several wars, was broken into three pieces, each possessing one third of the original Imperial Seal's national destiny.
They are respectively named the Seal of Heaven, the Seal of the People, and the Seal of the Nation, and the Seal of the Nation you just obtained is one of them.
I've already told you the origin of this thing, can you let me run away now?
Of course, how could I make things difficult for a girl?
Tell me your name, I want to know who defeated me today!
{PlayerName}。
{PlayerName}, I will never forget the humiliation you brought me today! One day I will surpass you and repay you tenfold, a hundredfold!
Take care on your way.
A moment later...
I've never seen a man as vicious as you!
If you don't tell me what you know, what just happened was just an appetizer.
Despicable!

{PlayerName}。
{PlayerName}, I will never forget the humiliation you brought me today! One day I will surpass you and repay you tenfold, a hundredfold!
Take care on your way.
Pretty lady, since you refuse to speak, don't blame me for not cherishing your beauty...
You dare!
Do you think I dare or not?
Don't, don't touch me, I'll tell you everything.

You're not from the Jiuli tribe, tell me who you are!
Pah, dream on!
To make her reveal her origin, I should...
I hope you keep your word!

{PlayerName}。
{PlayerName}, I will never forget the humiliation you brought me today! One day I will surpass you and repay you tenfold, a hundredfold!
Take care on your way.
The ancient capital of all dynasties, Daliang City...
Who's there? This is the Glittering Artifact House, not a place where anyone can enter casually.
I am {PlayerName}.
{PlayerName}? Never heard of it. You, a nobody, are not qualified to enter. Go away and don't cause trouble here!
What kind of person is qualified to enter?
At least your Fame needs to reach <color=#c44b0e>Level 4, Rising Star</color>, otherwise you don't even qualify to cross this threshold.
It's you again! This is not a place for you to hang around, go away!
I am {PlayerName}, I want to enter this Glittering Artifact House!
So it's Young Hero {PlayerSurName}...
Please come in.
So this is the legendary <color=#c44b0e>Imperial Seal</color>. I wonder what use this treasure will have for me.
I wonder if the identity of this <color=#c44b0e>special guest</color> will matter...
This <color=#c44b0e>Half Full Studio</color> is indeed very Trustworthy!
Have you ever heard of the verse "With the Heaven sword in hand, slay the whale across the sea"?
Never heard of it.
Have you heard of "The long sword shines beyond the sky"?
No, I haven't.
Alas, as a disciple of the Sword Pavilion, you haven't even heard of the records of the legendary swords.
Are you talking about the Heaven sword?
This Heaven sword is said to be the sword used by Emperor Wei Wu. It can cut hair with a puff of breath and cut iron like mud. It was later stolen and its whereabouts are unknown.
It's a pity that I can't see such a divine weapon.
Our master has a blueprint for the Heaven sword, but it requires a lot of contributions from our sect to borrow.
But with my current level, even if the blueprint is in front of me, I probably can't reach the level of Emperor Wei Wu's sword.
(Do you want to give the Heaven sword in your hand to Ou Ye Heng?)
This, this, this... isn't this the legendary Heaven sword!!!
Where did you get it? You didn't make it, did you?
Are you really giving it to me?\nEven though it's a replica, it's priceless to me!
I won't say thank you for your great kindness. I accept your generous gift. I love it!
Come on.
Moon Elder, I pray to grow old with {PlayerName}, to live in harmony...
A moment later...
You were so loud when you made your wish, I heard it all.
What should I do then, my wish won't come true.
I was just teasing you, I was also sincerely making a wish just now, I didn't pay attention to what you were saying.
Phew, that's a relief, you scared me to death.
The mountain's clouds and water are clear
Night after night, incense is burned to show respect
Wearing a Lotus, facing the Big Dipper
The Star Lord grants me Longevity
You're in a good mood tonight, Uncle Master.
You're in a good mood tonight, Taoist priest.

The stars in the sky each have their own mysteries and wonders. The Southern Dipper governs life, the Northern Dipper governs death. All humans are born from the Southern Dipper and pass through the Northern Dipper. If a person worships the Star Lord of their destiny, they can eliminate their sins, stay away from disasters, it's truly wonderful.
These ethereal things are too mystical, it's hard to believe.
The Zhenwu Sword Formation and the Star Array passed down by our sect were evolved by our ancestors based on these celestial stars. This is not ethereal after all.
Observing the celestial stars and constellations can create such a powerful formation?\nAfter watching for a moment, I'm already dizzy and can't figure out any mysteries.
In the eyes of this Taoist, the sky is filled with constellations; but in your eyes, they are just twinkling points of light, naturally you can't see anything special.

If we talk about the best stargazing spot, the <color=#c44b0e>Cloud Sea Cliff</color> in Wuyue far surpasses this place. If you have the chance, this Taoist will personally guide you through the celestial stars and constellations, to broaden your horizons.
{PlayerName}, there are numerous stars in the sky, and the ancients divided these stars into three enclosures and twenty-eight mansions for easy identification and differentiation.
The three enclosures are the Purple Forbidden Enclosure, the Supreme Palace Enclosure, and the Heavenly Market Enclosure.
The twenty-eight mansions are...
After a night of guidance from La Tazhang, you finally have a basic understanding of the stars in the sky.
I've worked hard all night, it's up to you how much you can learn.
When you can break the Star Mansion Formation in one fell swoop, and then go to the Star Observatory to watch the stars, you will have a deeper understanding.
Thank you, Uncle Master, for your generous teaching.
Thank you, Taoist, for your generous teaching.
Finding a place to sleep is the most important thing, I'm dead tired.
Miss Forgetful, I have a friend who is suffering from a strange disease, do you know how to treat it?
What is your friend's condition now?
As my friend gets older, the time spent in Slumber gets longer and longer, sometimes even falling asleep while standing.
This is a very rare symptom, your friend's vitality is being consumed in large amounts, which is why they are often tired.
Is there any way to cure her?
There is a way, but the medicine is hard to find. It requires a poisonous insect called <color=#c44b0e>Dragon lice</color>, which is said to live in ancient tombs for hundreds of years.
With this clue, it's easy to handle. When I find the Dragon lice, I hope you can personally cure this lady.
I didn't expect there to be such a beauty in the world!
I am {PlayerName}, sorry to disturb you, beautiful lady.
There is no self, no person, no sentient being, no life, red powder skull, white bone flesh, Amitabha.
I am a monk, my secular name is {PlayerName}, sorry to disturb you, lady.
Do you think I'm beautiful?
This...
In that case, would you like to stay and keep me company?\nThis place has clear mountains and water, being buried between this landscape is also your good fortune.
What do you mean by that?
You say one thing and mean another, pretentious, men like you are only fit to be flower fertilizer.
What do you mean by that?
If any man steps into Epiphyllum Valley, there is only one way to death!
I have no grudge against you, why do you want to kill me when we just met?
There's not a single good man, I shouldn't have saved that guy who got lost in Epiphyllum Valley!
It seems there's something I don't know, why don't you tell me?
Did you buy the news about Epiphyllum Valley from Lin'an City?
Indeed.
The person who sold you the news is the one I saved...
He promised me over and over again that he would never reveal any information about Epiphyllum Valley, otherwise I wouldn't have saved him, let alone let him leave the valley.
Money moves the heart, how many people can stick to their principles?
Don't talk so righteously, you're not necessarily any better.
I can't promise you anything, but if you want to keep me here, I'm afraid that's not possible.
You men, all you know is to bully weak women!\nWhat do you want to do to me?
Your legs are your own, I have no intention of stopping you, nor do I plan to retaliate against you.
Hmph!
Beautiful lady, where are you going?
Indeed, she is full of charm and seductively beautiful. The money spent is well worth it.
It seems that it was that greedy fellow who guided you here.
Where did this kid come from? Could he be this beauty's lover?
What... what are you going to do?!
Such a beauty living in seclusion in the mountains is like a pearl cast into the dust, what a pity...

If I were to present you to Lord Kang Wang, perhaps my rank could be further promoted; at worst, I could present you to the special envoy of Yan Kingdom, and I could profit from both sides, ensuring my safety in this chaotic world.
Go reincarnate with your beautiful dreams!
I'll help you!
Epiphyllum Valley is no longer safe, it seems I need to run away from here earlier, who knows what kind of character will come next.
People like me, if we lose our protection, will sooner or later become someone else's caged canary. This is my fate, what can I do?
Maybe I can help you.
Throughout history, for every faithful lover, there is a heartless man. I don't believe in my own luck, nor do I believe in anyone's promises anymore.
However, you seem to be different from others, perhaps...
I won't trust anyone anymore, especially men, so don't bother trying.
Your current <color=#c44b0e>Trustworthy</color> is not enough to make me trust you.
It's time to let you know my name. My name comes from a strange flower in my hometown - Man Tuoluo, which can drive people mad and also lead to their destruction.
Your sincere eyes encourage me to make another crazy choice. I choose to trust you, hoping that I didn't make the wrong choice this time.
Do you think I'm beautiful?
There's no place for me in your team right now, don't keep me waiting too long~
{PlayerName}, I have a question and I hope you can answer me honestly.
I will tell you everything I know.
Before this, how many girls have you made vows of love with?
(This is a tricky question, how should I answer?)
I don't care how many people you've had feelings for, or how many vows you've made; I just want to know if you can continue to be sincere to me, and not deceive me.

I originally planned to copy the demonic technique I learned and give it to you, but since you've already learned the Vairocana Solar Sutra, I don't want there to be a second person in the world who has mastered both Buddha and demon techniques, so I'll give up on this idea.

I happened to be here and saw you showing off your spear skills, so I stopped to watch.
Brother Yuanba, don't misunderstand, it's me!
Central Plains man, are you trying to steal my spear skills?
Your spear skills are fierce and brutal, with a strong killing intent. Only a brave man with astonishing strength can control it. How can ordinary people dare to hope for it?

I am Han Hongyu, the current head of Tiger Escort. Now Tiger Escort is recruiting powerful escorts, I wonder if any friends in Jianghu are interested in trying?

Escort {PlayerSurName}, you are one of us, Hongyu can't hide it, this is a long story...

This Tiger Escort was founded by my father and was once the leader of the four major escort bureaus. My father had a high reputation, and both the rivers and lakes and the local government gave him some face, so there has never been any mistake in the escorts protected by Tiger Escort.

Until a few years ago, my father received a special business, requiring him to escort a person to the north, and he had to lead the team himself. It was this business that caused my father to disappear without a trace, and we have no news of him.
This matter is quite strange, I still don't know who commissioned it, who is being protected, and where to go.

My father has been away for a long time, rumors are flying around the escort bureau, and people's hearts are scattered. Soon, most of them left, leaving only some old brothers who my father trusted very much to guard this sign with Hongyu.
Hongyu can't let Tiger Escort be ruined in my hands, I want to make Tiger Escort regain its former glory, I want to wait here for the day my father returns.
The recruitment of escorts today is a helpless move. Although the remaining escorts in the bureau are loyal, they are weak and unable to cope with slightly risky escorts.

Now that Tiger Escort has the help of Escort {PlayerSurName}, it is truly like a tiger with wings added. From now on, the escort bureau will rely on you for the <color=#c44b0e>escort business</color>.
Escort {PlayerSurName}, this is your first time escorting, there are some precautions I need to explain to you.

<color=#c44b0e>You can choose the value of the goods to be escorted here, the higher the value, the higher the risk, and the greater the return. However, if you fail, it will damage the reputation of the escort bureau, so you must be cautious.</color>
After choosing the goods, you can go to the courtyard next door to find the <color=#c44b0e>porter to start the escort</color>.
Delivering the goods to the designated recipient is considered a successful escort. The escort bureau can gain reputation, and you can also get a dividend based on the value of this order.
You seem to care a lot about the reputation of Tiger Escort?
Of course, if we want to revive Tiger Escort and make the escort bureau recognized as one of the four major escort bureaus again, we need to have at least 1500 reputation.
So how is the reputation of the escort bureau now?
Zero...
My father also started from scratch back then, and now the skinny camel is bigger than the horse, I will definitely make Tiger Escort return to the ranks of the four major escort bureaus!
The goods you chose to escort have the recipient's information written on them. Deliver them as soon as possible.
Tiger Escort's reputation is currently <color=#c44b0e>{TagNum:虎威镖局声望}</color>.\nWhich escort mission are you planning to choose now?

Hmm, the goods are intact. Tiger Escort is indeed a reputable brand, trustworthy.
Hmm, Tiger Escort did a good job on this escort mission. I look forward to the day you rise again.

Tiger Escort, as the former leader of the four major escort agencies, still works meticulously without any mistakes.

I didn't expect Tiger Escort to deliver this order that other escort agencies dare not accept. It's really amazing.
Tiger Escort didn't disappoint the old customers. I will still entrust my goods to you in the future.
It seems that the recipient of this escort is not here. I'll leave the goods here for him to pick up. Anyway, the goods have been delivered intact.
Kid, this mountain is mine, this tree is mine. If you want to pass, leave some money!
The goods were robbed by bandits. Now there's no way to explain to the customer, the reputation of the escort agency will be damaged.

What kind of world is this? The soldiers openly rob property, just like bandits.
Do you Tiger Escort still want to become one of the four major escort agencies one day? Today I will smash your goods, and see who will hire you for escort in the future!

Deliberately targeting Tiger Escort, smashing goods, damaging the reputation of the escort agency, this is not something ordinary bandits do. It must be a competitor trying to trip us up, it's too much!
The atmosphere seems a bit wrong. Should I step forward to help Han Hongyu?

Your father was actually commissioned by the court to escort the current emperor to Yan Kingdom. Because this matter is not very honorable, very few people know about it. Only your father and a few palace guards accompanied him.

Later, I heard that the emperor was detained by the Yan army, and the whereabouts of the other escorts are unknown. If you want to know where your father is now, I'm afraid you have to ask the emperor in person.

In the Yan army camp, but the exact location is not something we people in the martial arts world can find out.

I advise you, now that Tiger Escort's reputation is growing, and you have a young expert to help you, don't seek your own death. The power of Yan Kingdom is not something ordinary people like us can resist.

"Old man has an urgent matter to entrust to the young hero, please return to <color=#c44b0e>Nameless village</color> quickly"

You're a man of your word, I'm willing to be your brother.\nIf you ever need my help in the future, I will not hesitate.
