Hahaha, I have you as a junior, this life is worth it!\nIn the future, if there is a place where you need my help, I will do it for you no matter what!
Well, if you want to see a beauty, don't be stingy with money.\nThe location of Epiphyllum Valley is...

I heard that this <color=#097a76>Jiujiang Water Camp</color> is recently expanding its manpower, regardless of background and character, as long as you can pass the test, you can join. Are you interested in trying?
Recently, for some reason, more and more people in Lin'an City are getting sick, vomiting and diarrhea, body pain and fatigue, and there is no cure for the time being, which makes people panic.
If the cause of the disease is not found, Lin'an City will soon become a ghost town.
So many people have the same strange disease at the same time, and there is no cure...
I should go to the doctor in the city to understand the situation, maybe I can find some clues to solve the problem.
I came here for the strange disease in the city, can you please tell me more about the situation of this strange disease?

It's strange to say that hundreds of people in the city are sick at the same time, and the symptoms are basically the same. At first, I thought it was a cold, but there are also symptoms of diarrhea and shortness of breath, which is puzzling.
I have asked each patient in detail about their onset of illness, hoping to find a commonality and trace the source of the disease...
Have you found anything, sir?
It's the water source. These patients have almost all fetched water from the well near Pier in the past few days. This is their only common experience.
Could there be a problem with the water in the well?
What's strange is that I have specifically fetched some well water for observation and found nothing unusual. I didn't get sick after drinking it either.
However, some patients have mentioned that the <color=#c44b0e>well water fetched at night is sweeter than that during the day</color>. I don't know what the difference is.
It seems I need to go to the well and take a look.
This seems to be the well that the doctor mentioned...
I didn't find anything unusual.

Could the patients' statement that "<color=#c44b0e>the well water fetched at night is sweeter than that during the day</color>" be the key to the difference in water quality? It seems I should come back at night.
Congratulations {PlayerName}, you are the world's number one...
Wait a minute!!!
Is it you?! I didn't expect you to escape. Are you here to make trouble today?
Since it's a contest for the world's number one, why didn't anyone notify me to participate?\nDo you want to close the door and secretly elect a world's number one? I'm the first one to disagree!
What do you want?
It's simple, let this little guy compete with me. If he can make me admit defeat, then I'll go my own way, and he can be the number one in the world.
{PlayerName} my friend, what do you think?

Whoever is not convinced, come down and experience it.
Alright, congratulations to {PlayerName} young friend, now you are truly the "Peak of Jianghu"!
It seems that he has been to the Forest Tower to pick Fungus, fished by the Pond, and also searched for bird nests in the trees...
I'll try my best to help you find it...
Yes, yes, the scent of sandalwood is too familiar, this is the one I lost.
Then let's return it to its rightful owner.

Since you've helped me so much, I have to thank you properly.\nI'll share some of my Sect contribution with you, from now on you're my junior brother, with me covering for you, I guarantee you won't be taken advantage of in the temple!
What do you need help with, little master?
I lost a string of prayer beads. Can you help me find it?
Where have you been recently, little master?
It seems that he has been to the Forest Tower to pick Fungus, fished by the Pond, and also searched for bird nests in the trees...
I'll try my best to help you find it...
Yes, yes, the scent of Sandalwood is too familiar. This is the one I lost.
Then let's return it to its rightful owner.
Amitabha, thank you, benefactor.\nI have nothing to repay you with. I just found a chicken egg this morning and have nowhere to put it, so I'll give it to you.
The prayer beads are something I've had since I was a child. They might have been left to me by my parents. They mean a lot to me.
You are the latest to join, and your cultivation is not enough. You don't have the skills to compete with your senior brothers yet. Come back to me when your strength has improved.
During this time, you can go to your second senior brother, <color=#c44b0e>Shi Yu</color>, to practice and improve your martial arts skills.
It's not time to reopen the small competition yet, please be patient.
The small competition is reopening, are you ready to participate now?
The Shifa Temple is full of hidden talents. Your senior brothers are not to be underestimated. Are you ready for the small competition?
So you're {PlayerName}, I've heard of you.\nThe Grand Marshal is eager for talents. If you join the Yan army, the Marshal will surely value you.
Where did this nobody come from, daring to meet our Marshal? Get lost!
I am the daughter of the head of the Tiger Escort, Han. Please tell me where my father is.
You, you are the daughter of Han, the head of the escort?
Yes, I beg you to tell me where my father is.

Alas, we were ambushed by the Yan army back then. Han, the head of the escort, sacrificed himself to protect me. In the end, he was outnumbered and was killed on the spot by the Yan general, <color=#c44b0e>Xiao Yuanba</color>...
What... what did you say?
Han, the head of the escort, was brave and loyal. It's a pity that he died young. The country has lost a great talent...
Xiao Yuanba... I will make you pay!!!

The most urgent task is to save me and escape from here. As long as we can escape, I will greatly reward the Han family, even making Han, the head of the escort, a great general is not out of the question.
Miss Han, I will remember the revenge for your father. Now is not the time for revenge, we need to escape from here as soon as possible.

It's that simple.
I, the master, have calculated countless people and things, but I can't figure out your mind...
{PlayerName}, from now on you are no longer a part of my Confucius Temple. I will not blame you for the past, and I hope you can keep today's events a secret.

(For some reason, the unease in my heart is getting stronger. Should I tell Cai Yuanchang the truth...)
I haven't found any news yet.
This is not like your usual style. Don't make me wait too long, go and do your job quickly.

Master Cai, if I were to spread the word about how you've turned yourself into something neither human nor ghost in your pursuit of longevity, do you think this Confucius Temple would still have any standing in the martial world?
I, as the master of this temple, have treated you well. Are you going to be a chance taker?
Treated me well? Hmph, we both know the truth. You can drop the pretense.
As long as you swear not to reveal what happened today, I, as the master of this temple, will give you the treasure of the temple and will not pursue today's matter in the future.
Since you're so sincere, then I, {PlayerName}, swear that I will not let a third person know about today's matter. If I break this oath, I will have no place to be buried when I die!
I will trust you this time, take the item and run away from Dacheng Hall now!

Sorry, Master Cai, I've taken your cultivation. I won't talk about today's matter, but please be careful with your words and deeds in the future.

What do you want to talk about with the master?
You've never heard of Miss Qincheng, the famous courtesan?
But it's not surprising, Miss Qincheng is so famous that she rarely shows up in a year, and spends the rest of her time in seclusion.

Miss Qincheng has close relations with a power called Melody House. Many top performers in various places come from Melody House. They are known for their exceptional beauty and talent, but they keep their bodies clean and sell their skills, not their bodies.

Practicing music scores such as piano, flute, and lute can improve your musical skills. Although the instruments used are different, they all lead to the same goal. I have beginner-level music scores available for purchase here and at the Tower of Prosperity in Daliang.

If you want to further improve your musical skills, besides getting exquisite music scores by chance, you can only look for Melody House. It is said that they have collected all the strange and wonderful music scores in the world, and it is said that "all the wonderful sounds in the world come from Melody House".
I'm just a woman of the dust, it's better not to mention the past, so as not to offend your refined taste.
Would you like to hear a story from me?
Please speak, Master, I'm all ears.

There was a young lady from a noble family, who was proficient in the Four Arts since childhood. She should have met a good man and spent her life with him. However, her family suffered a disaster, and overnight, this lady became a lowly servant and was sent to the Ministry of Rites.

The court wanted to negotiate peace with the Yan Kingdom, and selected several beautiful singers from the Ministry of Rites. This lady was among the chosen ones, prepared to be sent to the Yan Kingdom as a gesture of sincerity.
What awaits these girls will be a place more cruel and torturous than the Ministry of Rites. It's not an exaggeration to say that it's a place of certain death.

Unexpectedly, they encountered a woman of Peerless Elegance on the way, who rescued all the singers being escorted. Most of the singers chose to follow this woman and leave their homeland, but the unfortunate lady insisted on returning to her hometown to find her lost relatives.
When this lady was searching in Lin'an City, she was discovered by the city patrol to be a lowly servant and was about to be severely punished...
Then, those officials suddenly became very respectful overnight. Not only did they stop making things difficult for this lady, but they also arranged a place for her to settle down...
Thank you, young master, for taking the time to listen to my boring old story.
Flowers bloom and fall in their own time, always relying on the Lord of the East.
Whether to go or to stay, how can one decide!
If I could have flowers in my hair, don't ask where I'm going.
Master, I'm sorry to have kept you waiting. I'm here for our appointment.
You are indeed a man of your word, young master.
Master, why have you invited me here tonight? Is there something you need?
I have a huge problem and I need {PlayerSurName} young master's help.
There's no need for such formalities, please get up, Master.
I beg {PlayerSurName} young master to help me escape from my lowly status and recover my noble identity.
How can I help you escape from your lowly status?
The Prefect controls the population and household registration of the whole city. This matter requires you to go to the Government Office and find the Prefect.

I beg Prince Kang Wang to spare the head of Maiden House and remove her lowly status.
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to plead for a woman of the wind and dust in front of me.
I spent a lot of effort on her back then, now she is an important piece in my many plans, how can I abandon all my previous efforts because of your few words?
What can I do to let her go?
I won't make it difficult for you, just help me find the Seal of Heaven or the Seal of the Nation, and I will let her go and restore her good family status.
Deal!
Help me find the Seal of Heaven or the Seal of the Nation, and I will let her go and restore her good family status, there is no other way.
Do you want to give the things you got to Kang Wang?
The world's beauty is just icing on the cake for me, but this Seal of Heaven is like a long-awaited rain for me, it's extremely important!

{PlayerName}, I keep my word, I will remove the lowly status of the head of Maiden House and restore her good family status, whether you two fly together or hide her in a golden house, it has nothing to do with me.
Thank you, Prince Kang Wang for your kindness.
The world's beauty is just icing on the cake for me, but this Seal of the Nation is like a long-awaited rain for me, it's extremely important!

{PlayerName}, I keep my word, I will remove the lowly status of the head of Maiden House and restore her good family status, whether you two fly together or hide her in a golden house, it has nothing to do with me.

I have successfully asked Prince Kang Wang to remove the lowly status of the head of the house, from now on you are free.
{PlayerName}, will you take me away?
You are free now, you can go wherever you want.
For so many years, only you care about me, care about me, you are different from other stinky men!
I don't care if you have other lovers, I just want to stay by your side, I don't want to stay in this dirty place anymore.
{PlayerName}, will you take me away?
(Why do I feel uneasy about such an easy decision?)
In that case, I won't bother you anymore.\nI wish you meet a good person and grow old together.
Are you really telling the truth, not just to make me happy?
Absolutely true!
I have never told anyone my boudoir name, today I will only tell you, my name is <color=#c44b0e>Yan Rurui</color>. I am a few years older than you, you won't dislike me, will you?
Sister Yan, I'm overjoyed, how could I dislike you?
Sister, I take your words seriously, I will wait here until the day you really take me away.

It doesn't matter, you are a noble person and forget things easily, I am just a woman of the wind and dust, you don't have to worry about me.
Now that Kang Wang is dead, there is no solution to this matter, what a pity...
Now that Kang Wang has ascended the throne, the matter of the Maiden House's master can never be brought up again, otherwise it will bring disaster to the Maiden House's master.
Damn, how could I forget about the matter of the Maiden House's master!\nNow that Kang Wang is dead, I'm afraid there's no solution to the matter of the Maiden House's master...
A mere commoner wants to meddle in this matter?\nI'm busy with official duties, please leave.
The prefect of Lin'an City... he has actually...
...It seems that no one can help me escape from my lowly status.\nI've delayed your affairs, I'll take my leave.
Damn, I made a mistake—\nWith the death of the prefect of Lin'an, I'm afraid there's no solution to the matter of helping the Maiden House's master escape from her lowly status...
Come on, hurry up and place your bets, let's play a few more rounds before we get caught!
Big, I don't believe I won't win!
Hey, don't bet with me!
What are you doing here?
Don't hit me, I'll go on guard right away!
I, I, I'll go feed the crocodiles...
Idiot, it's not the leader who's here, you're so scared, you have no guts at all!
I've seen you, you're {PlayerName} who just joined, right?
Don't laugh at me, we brothers just play a few rounds of dice here during our breaks.
Brother, you look like you've never played dice before, how about I introduce you to the rules?
It seems you're an expert, then I won't bother.
Brother, do you want to try your luck?\nWe're all not rich, just bet 100 Coin each time!
Brother, you seem to be an expert in this, do you want to play a few rounds?\nWe're all not rich, just bet 100 Coin each time!
Alright, if you want to play, just come find me.\nBy the way, don't tell the leader...
Okay, I'll keep it a secret for you.
Brother, do you want to play a few rounds?\n100 Coin to start the game.
If you want to play, come find me again.
Brother, you're really lucky!\nI'm out of Coin now, let's play again when I've gathered some money.
I haven't gathered the money yet, brother, wait a few more days.
I've finally gathered some money, this time I must win it all back!
Brother, you're too lucky, all our money has gone into your pocket, please spare us.
I have a bad feeling about this...

Listen up, people of Jiujiang Water Camp: You have no respect for the law, repeatedly plundering ships and injuring countless people. I, the general, am ordered to suppress you. If you don't surrender, when will you?
(They've actually blocked the entrance to the water stronghold, are they trying to prevent us from running away?)
Chief, we're in trouble, the government troops are here to suppress our Jiujiang Water Camp!
It seems someone wants to test the strength of our water stronghold.
Follow me out to meet these fearless guys, let them witness the power of the chief.
You shrimp soldiers and crab generals dare to attack Jiujiang Water Camp, it seems you've never heard of my notorious reputation.
Ding Fengbo, you're just a small loach in front of thousands of soldiers and horses, stop bluffing.
Today, you will see who is the loach in the mud and who is the dragon above the river!
This is not quite what I expected.
The bandit leader is weak, it's time to wipe out the water stronghold!
With me here, who dares to cross the line!
Go back and tell your master, Jiujiang Water Camp is not a soft persimmon, if you insist on going your own way, I will accompany you to the end!
Yes, yes...
I have to admit I'm getting old, the world really belongs to the young.
Go back and tell your master, Jiujiang Water Camp is not a soft persimmon, if you insist on going your own way, I will accompany you to the end!
Yes, yes...
Did you see my sword technique in the last fight?
The chief's Devouring Blade is extremely domineering and unparalleled, I have benefited a lot.
No matter how many waves there are, just one blade, like a whale swallowing! One Blade down, blocking the river and cutting off the sea!
Hmm, it seems you have already understood it.
The chief's sword technique is amazing, truly invincible.
Alas, it seems you haven't grasped the essence of it.
You shrimp soldiers and crab generals dare to attack Jiujiang Water Camp, it seems ignorance is truly fearless.
You're just a small loach in front of thousands of soldiers and horses, stop bluffing.
Today, you will see who is the loach in the mud and who is the dragon above the river!
Go back and tell your master, Jiujiang Water Camp is not a soft persimmon, if you insist on going your own way, I will accompany you to the end!
Yes, yes...
I seem to have gained some insight from the last fight...
Kid, you single-handedly defeated the government troops who tried to wipe out the water stronghold, impressive, really impressive!
No wonder my precious sword has been humming non-stop, it seems it has found its new owner. Well, a precious sword should be given to a hero, and a beauty to a good man, today it belongs to you!
Doing this kind of business too much will harm your virtue, and only those who are rich and unkind are our targets, so there's nothing to do today, go and rest.

There's a wealthy man from the local village passing by on the waterway, it's said that the bodyguards he hired are weak and easy to defeat. Interested brothers might be able to make a small fortune if they hurry.
Which hero are you, why are you stopping us here?
Leave your gold and valuables, and we'll let you run away; otherwise, we'll send you for a swim in the river.
A kid who hasn't even grown his hair properly is trying to be a water bandit, it's laughable.
Alas, looking down on people, I can only send you to the river.
It seems this guy is not as rich as I thought.

There's a greedy and lustful general passing by on the waterway, it's said that he only has a few personal guards with him. Letting such a person pass freely in front of our Jiujiang Water Camp is simply a disgrace.
The government official is here, you little bandits better back off!
What kind of bullshit official, I'm here today specifically to teach you a lesson.
Chop him up and feed him to the fish, don't delay my journey.
Then I'm afraid I'll have to offend you.
Beating such people is absolutely guilt-free.
The eunuchs of the Imperial City Bureau have been frequently visiting Lin'an City recently. I wonder if we can get some information from them. They should be near the water village by boat.
Who dares to intercept the official ship of the Imperial City Bureau!
Why has the Imperial City Bureau been frequently visiting Lin'an recently? Can you tell me why?
You lowly commoners not only intercept official ships, but also spy on the Imperial City Bureau! I want to see how bold you are to do these beheading things.
Since you don't seize the opportunity given to you, don't speak again.
The people of the Imperial City Bureau are indeed a bit powerful, no wonder they are so arrogant.
Miss Qincheng, is the promise still valid today?
Qincheng can't disobey the master's orders, unless {PlayerSurName} can make the master change his mind, it's not too late to find Qincheng.
Master, don't keep me in suspense, tell me what the benefit is?

In the future, every time you complete the task given by the master, you will get a certain degree of <color=#c44b0e>Sect contribution</color>, which can be exchanged for many good things from the master. The master wants you to know that our sect's treatment is no less than those of the three major sects!
Now that you have the ability to defeat the red-haired pig, it seems that I should arrange some challenging tasks for you.
Master, I guess you are going to the Confucius Temple to find this person named Cai Yuanchang to ask some questions, right?
If it's so easy for you to guess, can I still be your master?
As the eldest disciple of this sect, you are the face of the sect. The urgent task is to improve your Fame. The master's disciple is not a nameless little person.
I also want to be famous all over the world and known to everyone, but Fame is not so easy to improve, isn't it accumulated over a long period of time?
If it really takes you ten or twenty years to make a name for yourself, don't say you are my disciple by then, I can't afford to lose that person.
The fastest ways to increase Fame include: <color=#c44b0e>dueling</color> with people in the martial arts world, and you can gain considerable Fame by defeating them for the first time.
If you have the ability to <color=#c44b0e>eliminate or subdue</color> some martial arts forces, you can gain a lot of Fame.
In addition, actively participating in some martial arts events can also earn you a good amount of Fame.
Disciple understands, I will go and bring honor to our sect!
The trouble caused by Nine Factions Sect in Chuxiang City has been resolved.
The crisis in Daliang City has been lifted, Nine Factions Sect will not make a comeback for the time being.
Fortunately, we arrived in time, so Lin'an City did not cause bigger chaos.
Nine Factions Sect instigates various sects to be hostile to each other, kidnaps merchants to occupy their shops, and poisons the city, causing epidemics. What are they trying to do?
Create chaos, distract the attention of various sects, and provide more development opportunities for Nine Factions Sect. It seems that Nine Factions Sect is going to make a big move.
Those things can finally come in handy.
Disciple, the things are below, take them out.
Alright, leave it to me!
A moment later...
Finally dug it out.
Disciple, these things are yours now.
Before leaving, the master will teach you a unique skill of our sect. This skill does not involve the Coin character and is passed down orally. You must remember it in your heart.
The hand rises like an arrow and falls like thunder, a thousand mountains have passed and the birds have flown away!
One shichen later...
Master, it's rare to see you so generous after knowing you for so long.

Next, we are going to the southwest region to find the <color=#c44b0e>Eternal Spring</color>. The sect's internal strength combined with the immersion in the water of the Eternal Spring can completely remove the hidden dangers of the old injury.

This Immortal Spring was originally the forbidden area of a certain sect in the southwest, but that sect has long been abandoned and no longer exists. Therefore, <color=#c44b0e>if you want to find out the exact location of the Immortal Spring, you need to ask the martial arts people in the southwest region</color>.
The journey to the southwest is dangerous and unpredictable. There are no towns for supplies there, so you'd better prepare. The master will wait for you in the village.
Can we set off now?
Now that the master's identity has been exposed, there is no need to hide anymore. Make a place in your team, the master doesn't need to hide anymore.
Now that the master's identity has been exposed, there is no need to hide anymore. The master will accompany you on this journey to the southwest openly.
A war of attrition, huh? The tactics of the three religions remain the same.
You go in and save people, I'll hold them off!
Junior Brother, you've already left the Nine Factions Sect. You shouldn't interfere with its affairs anymore!
If you insist on causing trouble for my disciple, don't blame me, your Senior Brother, for not showing mercy!
Alas, what bad luck!
Before that, you need to quickly increase your Fame, so that you can get more valuable information.
I didn't expect that I would have the chance to return to the peak of Passive in my lifetime...

That was a unique move that Master realized based on a martial art I saw before, called Nine Flow Unification!

I didn't teach you this ultimate technique before, not because I wanted to keep it to myself, but because I was worried that you would be greedy and not be able to master it.
Now that you have achieved great martial arts skills, I no longer have this concern. I will officially teach it to you today.
Thank you, master!

However, I'm somewhat relieved that you were able to defeat these top-ranked small fry in the martial arts world. I don't need this armor anymore, you can wear it. Whether you're going to stir up trouble or cause a commotion, it will come in handy.
Young people must balance work and rest. If you ruin your health, you will regret it when you get old.
Disciple, there's a Linlang Temple nearby, where lives an old man who knows everything from heaven to earth. Have you heard of him?
I haven't heard of him, master. Are you familiar with this old man?
We've known each other for decades, we're very familiar. But he doesn't care to see me now.
I've visited a few times, he's like a real immortal.\nAre you familiar with this immortal, master?
We've known each other for decades, we're very familiar. But he doesn't care to see me now.
What I want to tell you is, there's a <color=#c44b0e>Linlang Go puzzle</color> in his Linlang Temple. No one has cracked it for more than ten years. I want you to try it, you might get some benefits.
As the master commands, the disciple will obey.
The chessboard in front of you is the key to triggering the Linlang Go puzzle. If you're ready, go and try your luck.
Hehe, don't let the water flow to others' fields.
The master has made a pact with Fu Yaozi inside, to sever all ties and never meet again in this life!\nIf you want to see him, don't drag the master along, the master is a man of his word.
You little rascal, you're trying to trap your master on purpose, aren't you!

You little rascal, you're taking your master's words as wind passing by your ears, aren't you!

When the master was young and traveling in Zhongzhou, he discovered a large underground palace with many ingenious Machinery puppets inside. They are quite powerful and suitable as opponents for you at this stage.
I have many good things on me. If you want to practice your StealSkill, take the treasures from me when I'm not paying attention.
As a disciple of Nest of Swallow, you must constantly study the way of Steal to stand out among your peers and complete the tasks assigned by the boss more excellently.
With my relentless efforts, my StealSkill has finally been accomplished. Next, I will display my empty-handed skills and fill my pockets with all the rare treasures in the world!
There's a woman in Daliang City dressed in brocade, her body adorned with jewels and precious stones, it's really tempting.
{PlayerName}, do me a favor, retrieve an Agate from that woman in brocade for me, as a reminder for her not to be so ostentatious in the future!
Well done, now let's see if she dares to flaunt her expensive jewelry everywhere.
Seeing that the woman in brocade has lost her jewelry, she probably won't be flaunting it around today, and that makes me feel a lot better.
It's too much, that woman in brocade doesn't learn her lesson and is flaunting her jewelry everywhere again! {PlayerName}, you're familiar with this, you know what to do, right?
I don't believe she's so rich that she dares to flaunt her wealth even after losing a few gems.
You tell Hua Qingqing about what happened with the woman in brocade.
I'm sorry for the trouble, it's my fault, I shouldn't have asked you to provoke that beautiful woman...
So it's you, this little rascal, who's been causing trouble behind my back, see if I don't teach you a lesson!
I know I was wrong, please forgive me, beautiful sister.\n(What an ugly freak, I feel like vomiting just looking at you, I better get rid of you quickly)
Well, seeing that you're so sensible, I'm a generous person, I won't hold it against you.

According to reliable information, a merchant from the Western Regions has recently arrived in Daliang City. He is said to have a lot of valuable Xiyu treasures on him. Instead of letting others benefit, we might as well take them and sell them for charity.
{PlayerName}, why don't you handle this matter. Don't let the merchant from the Western Regions notice anything, just take one piece of jewelry each time, there's plenty of time.
Good job, as long as we don't alert him, we can slowly take all the good things from him.
This merchant from the Western Regions has a lot of jewelry on him, we don't need to rush, sooner or later all the good things on him will belong to Nest of Swallow.
{PlayerName}, it's time to borrow some jewels from that Western Region merchant again.
Good job, as long as we don't alert him, we can slowly take all the good things from him.
You tell Bu Juechen about what happened with the Western Region merchant.
I was wondering why the pawnshops wouldn't give a high price, I thought they were deliberately lowering the price, turns out they were just worthless rocks, this is a real miscalculation.

The purpose of our Nest of Swallow is to use the wealth of the rich to help the poor. But acting too frequently can attract the attention of the government, so our disciples also need some ways to make money.
I don't care how you make your money, as long as it's handed over to Nest of Swallow, it's a charity for the poor.
10 Guan can be exchanged for 150 points of Sect contribution, if you have extra money, you might as well donate it for contribution.
(Do you want to donate 10 Guan for 150 points of Sect contribution?)
You have already donated money today, if you have extra money, donate it tomorrow, I also need to carefully plan how to use this money to maximize its value.
Do you want to donate 10 Guan as a charity for the poor? By the way, 10 Guan can be exchanged for 150 points of Sect contribution.
(Do you want to donate 10 Guan for 150 points of Sect contribution?)
There have been rumors in the martial arts world recently that there are six thieves causing chaos, in fact, they are six wanted criminals causing trouble in various towns.
{PlayerName}, although these six people are guilty and deserve to be punished, there are some key cases that need to be extracted from them, so try to capture them alive!
These people are extremely vicious, I'm sure they won't give in easily, how can I capture them alive?
Using the <color=#c44b0e>Immobilize</color> method can subdue them, and then you can capture them alive, our sect's constables will be responsible for receiving and escorting these people back.
Yes, sir!
Ren Yapo, you traffick women and children, disregarding human relations, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
Cao Shangfei, you steal people's property, disregarding national laws, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
Po Jie Seng, you bully men and women and do evil, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
One-eyed Dragon, you rob houses and kill for money, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
Kunlun Slave, you hurt the innocent with your martial arts, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
Cultist, you spread heretical teachings and mislead the young, today I represent the Crime Investigation Bureau to arrest you!
I failed to capture all six thieves alive, to prevent them from causing further trouble, I had to kill a few, please punish me, Chief Constable.
Alas, things have come to this, although it's not perfect, it's better than letting them continue to be Adventurous outside the law.
I have successfully captured all six thieves alive, they are now locked up in our sect's prison.

Well done! {PlayerName}, you are a lucky star of the Crime Investigation Bureau! This mission was completed very well, this item that I have treasured for many years is given to you as a reward, I hope you will continue to work hard!
All six prisoners have been dealt with, it's time to go back and report to the Chief Constable.
As a disciple of Langya Sword Pavilion, you must strive for excellence in forging skills, so that you can win the favor of the Pavilion Master and stand out among the disciples.
My crafting level has finally reached Master. Now, as long as I can get the blueprint for the divine weapon Sharp, I can forge a legendary divine weapon with my own hands!
Hahahaha

Guarding this treasure in the back mountain, the disciples of the Sword Pavilion can't even mine a few decent pieces of Ore. It's hard to believe that the once proud mining skills of the Sword Pavilion are in decline.
Please help me mine <color=#c44b0e>10 pieces of Iron mine</color> from the back mountain. I want to craft some low-level Weapons.

Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Please help me mine <color=#c44b0e>10 pieces of Refined iron</color> from the back mountain. I want to craft some low-level Weapons.
Here are the Refined irons you requested.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Please help me mine <color=#c44b0e>5 pieces of Black metal</color> from the back mountain. I want to craft some mid-level Weapons.
Here are the Black metals you requested.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Please help me mine <color=#c44b0e>1 piece of Thousand years black iron</color> from the back mountain. I plan to try again to complete the Sharp that I didn't finish last time.
Here is the Thousand years black iron you requested.
Thanks to your help, there's nothing else for you to do today.
Nest of Swallow·Hua Qingqing, I've heard a lot about you, {PlayerSurName}, a rising star in the Langya Sword Pavilion. I'm here to challenge you!
Hmph, you're not as good as I thought.
The disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion are indeed as good as their reputation. I admit defeat.
Blue Wind Camp·Kong Yidao, I'm here to experience your exquisite martial arts, {PlayerSurName}!
The rumors are exaggerated, what a disappointment.
The rumors are true, I, old Kong, admit defeat.
Jiujiang Water Camp·Ding Haitang, I've come to challenge you, {PlayerSurName}. Please don't hold back!
The disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion are not as good as they say. I thought you would be more powerful.
You are indeed an outstanding new talent among the disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion. I've learned a lot today.
{PlayerSurName}, your reputation precedes you. I, Spring and Autumn, am here to challenge you!
What a disappointment, you're not as good as I thought.
Today's trip was worthwhile, {PlayerSurName}, you are much better than me.
I am Shifa Temple·Lai Toudian, today I'm itching for a fight and I've come to learn a few moves from you.
I thought I could have a good fight, but you're just a paper tiger. What a waste of my time.
Fighting with a master is indeed refreshing. It was worth the trip.
Crime Investigation Bureau·Qiu Zhimo, I request to learn from your high skills.
Hmph, that's all.
Your martial arts are superb, Qiu Zhimo admits defeat.
I am Taoist Sect·La Tazhang, today I also came to join the fun and see what the outstanding young generation is capable of.
I came with high hopes, but left disappointed. I really have nothing better to do than to seek such a boring thing.
The new generation surpasses the old. I am satisfied today.

A Hei Yuan has appeared at the end of the back mountain of the Sword Pavilion, and its temperament is extremely violent. The disciples in the pavilion have suffered a lot from it. If this problem is not solved as soon as possible, the mining veins in the back mountain will not be able to continue to be mined, and the materials needed for forging will also be unavailable.
{yell} Roar! Roar!!!
This guy is indeed not friendly at all, no wonder many people have suffered from it.
This big guy is a living creature after all, how should we deal with it?

Big guy, according to our agreement: if you lose, you are not allowed to hurt people in the future, and you must avoid other disciples of Langya Sword Pavilion; if you win, I will let you go this time.
Hmm...
We follow the agreement, you have to behave in the future, and you are not allowed to hurt people at will!
What a powerful guy, but I won't give up, I will subdue you one day!
I don't believe I can't solve this Hei Yuan this time!
{yell} Roar! Roar!!!
The trouble here has finally been resolved, and there should be no more people to hinder the mining veins.
Oh~ Oh~
What a gentle and docile big guy, they must have been scared by his fierce appearance, it doesn't look like it has any attack power at all.
The trouble behind the Sword Pavilion in the Mountain should be resolved, right?
There is no Hei Yuan here, they must be too lazy to go to the back mountain to mine, so they made up a story to scare people.
Since no special situation has been found, whether this matter is true or false, it should not exist now.
Hei Yuan is already dead, the trouble here should be resolved too.
This vein is incredibly hard...
Yeah, it took so many days to get this little bit.
Keep it down, don't attract others!
What are you afraid of, anyone who comes can only die.
Stop talking, get to work!
Ah--
{yell} Achoo!!!
You are here to steal ore!
No survivors, kill!!!
So that Hei Yuan was guarding this vein, I shouldn't have killed it.\nIt's a pity that after Hei Yuan's death, these night thieves who covet the vein have become even more unscrupulous.
Since the trouble with the Hei Yuan on the back mountain was resolved, disciples often heard strange noises coming from the end of the back mountain late at night, and they didn't know why.
Fortunately, I arrived in time to catch today's morning class.

The human path is faint, the immortal path is vast.|The ghost path is joyful. When the gate of life is open.|The immortal path is always auspicious, the ghost path is always ominous.|High and clear spirits, sad songs echo in the void.|Only wish for the success of the immortal path, not for the poverty of the human path.|But want to stop human calculations, cut off the gate of human life.|Tie the evil spirit, cut off the six ghost edges.|The heavens are shaking. My path is flourishing!
One shichen later...
Oh no! Today <color=#c44b0e>Chen Shi</color> forgot to go to the Star Observatory for morning class!
I didn't go to morning class again, this is a bit of a loss.
I forgot to go to morning class again...
Forget it, let's go with the flow.
At this moment, the moon is bright and the stars are brilliant, it's rare to appreciate such a wonderful scenery...

These little stars seem to correspond to the positions of the array eyes in the Star Array, could it be that the predecessors of the Taoist Sect were observing the stars at the Star Observatory at night, and then they realized this unparalleled array?
With my current knowledge and cultivation, if I observe the stars here, given time, I will definitely be able to comprehend something.
Do you want to meditate and comprehend now?
Do you want to meditate and comprehend today?
One shichen later...
Today I always feel restless and agitated, I don't know what changes will happen, do I still want to meditate and comprehend?
One shichen later............
Another shichen passed..........
The brilliant stars in the sky gradually become solid, like a big net, trapping you tightly in it...
It seems a bit overconfident to try to comprehend the way of heaven like the predecessors...
At this moment, you have never felt so relaxed and comfortable...
The pills needed today are already enough, no more are needed for now.
I urgently need 6 <color=#c44b0e>Illness removal pills</color> here, you go and refine them.
Could it be that you have already refined the pills I need?
Well, you've worked hard.
I urgently need 4 <color=#c44b0e>Revitalization pills</color> here, you go and refine them.
I urgently need 3 <color=#c44b0e>Seven stars pills</color> here, you go and refine them.
I urgently need 2 <color=#c44b0e>Blue wave powders</color> here, you go and refine them.
I urgently need 2 <color=#c44b0e>Enlighten pills</color> here, please go and refine them.
The infiltrators in the Taoist Sect have been wiped out, thank you for your hard work.

Recently, many infiltrators have sneaked into the Taoist Sect at night, intending to sneak into the Star Chaser Pavilion to steal our Martial Arts Archive. Unfortunately, we are currently understaffed and unable to guard against them.
Should I participate in the night patrol today?
After a careful patrol...
Someone is coming indeed, what a bold move!
Die!
You fled in the face of battle, almost allowing these people to successfully infiltrate the Star Chaser Pavilion. Others disapprove of your behavior.
Like a moth to a flame, overestimating one's abilities!\nI'd better continue patrolling to avoid any accidents.
One shichen later...
Tonight's patrol is over, the mission is finally completed successfully.
The old Taoist noticed that the Zhenwu statue in the hall has been dusted. {PlayerName}, from now on, you will be responsible for cleaning the Zhenwu statue. Don't slack off.
The Zhenwu statue is dusty, such an important task is given to the disciple, disciple...
Lord Zhenwu, I have been disrespectful.
One shichen later...
There is a hidden Machinery in this Zhenwu statue. With my current skill, it's easy to open it. Should I activate the Machinery to find out what's inside?
There is a beautifully crafted robe hidden inside!
You have already cleaned it today, thank you for your hard work.
Master, I am here to clean the Zhenwu statue.

The old Taoist noticed that the Zhenwu statue seems to have lost a lot of its aura compared to before, and he doesn't know why. {PlayerName}, you don't need to clean the Zhenwu statue for now. Let's wait until the old Taoist finds out the reason.
(Should I clean the Zhenwu statue?)

This is the merit box of the Shifa Temple. It is said that donating money into it can improve relations with the Shifa Temple. Other temples' merit boxes claim to accumulate merit to eliminate karma, I wonder if this one works.
How much should I donate...
You have already donated today, donating again will not have any effect.
The Shifa Temple has been destroyed, what's the use of donating money into it?
I am no longer your match, don't come to spar with me anymore.
I happen to be bored, how much force do you want me to use to spar with you?
I was careless this time, I didn't pay attention.\nNext time we will compete again, I will make you convinced!
You are really vulnerable, you should practice on the wooden man stake before you come to me.
You are really vulnerable, next time I will reduce some strength to compete with you.
You were able to block my attack with ten percent of my strength. It seems that your skills have far surpassed mine. You should go to the big leader to spar, you will benefit more.
I didn't expect you to be able to learn the two completely different scores of "Laughing at the Red Dust" and "Proud Wanderer" to near perfection!

It seems that you are more suitable for this item than I am. This was also given to me by the expert who passed me those two scores. Today I will give it to you, it can show its greater value in your hands.
The biggest regret of my life is that I trusted a young man named <color=#097a76>Wan Yan Liang</color>. Not only did I trust him, but I also taught him everything I learned...

Who knew that he would deceive my trust, sneak into the Scripture Tower to steal precious scriptures, and then disappear. As a result, I was punished to guard the Scripture Tower for the rest of my life.
Later I found out that this person is a member of the Yan royal family, and now he holds a high position in the Yan army. It's too late to regret.
Master Hua Yan, it's been so many years, I didn't expect you to still hold a grudge.
You beast, you dare to come back!
{PlayerGivenName}, brother, Hua Yan's rage hasn't subsided, I don't want to get involved in this mess, I'll leave first!
{PlayerName}, I didn't expect you to get involved with someone like Wan Yan Liang!
I can't believe he would do such a despicable thing, I'll go and seek justice for the master.
Humph, who knows if you're all the same.
After all these years, this old monk has given up hope of finding the stolen Scripture.
You deceived Master Hua Yan in the past and stole the Scripture from the Scripture Tower, causing the master to be punished. Isn't it time to return the Scripture?
{PlayerName}, are you here on behalf of Shifa Temple to ask for the Scripture?
Your tone is full of threats, do you think this will change my mind...
Hey, why so serious? I'm just joking with you.
Humph, I advise you not to meddle in other people's business.
Yes, I'm here on behalf of Shifa Temple, and also to seek justice for Master Hua Yan.
Alright, then beat me first, then we'll talk about the rest.
You think you can stand up for others with your mediocre skills? You should weigh your own abilities first.
You're still as invincible as ever, aren't you?
I admit you have some skills, but it won't be easy to get me to return the Scripture. If you can find the translated version of Vairocana Solar Sutra for me, I'll give you the Scripture.
Who do you think you are, stealing other people's things and then demanding other things in exchange.

The Vairocana Solar Sutra is hidden in Shifa Temple. If you want to stand up for Shifa Temple, the only choice is to exchange it with the Vairocana Solar Sutra. This is called losing in the east and gaining in the west.
I sneaked into the Scripture Tower to find this Vairocana Solar Sutra. Now that I have the Scripture, the previous Scriptures are like waste paper to me. I'll give it to you as a favor.
The Scripture hidden on my body has disappeared... Damn thief.\n{PlayerGivenName}, brother, please forgive me, let me look for it, I'm definitely not a man of empty words.
Master Hua Yan, the Scripture stolen by Wan Yan Liang has been recovered, please check it.
It, it really is the Scripture that was stolen back then...
Good, good...
Years ago, this old monk made a vow that if anyone could find the Scripture for me in my lifetime, I would reward them with a precious treasure. I hope you won't refuse.
What do you want to exchange, sir?
How many Coins do you want to exchange, sir?
How many Coins do you want to exchange, sir?
How many Coins do you want to exchange, sir?
How many Scrap silvers do you want to exchange, sir?
How many Gold bullions do you want to exchange, sir?
{PlayerSurName} young hero, I've been waiting for you here for a long time.
Who are you, and how do you know me?
I'm just a minor character in the <color=#c44b0e>News Platform</color>.
News Platform?

The News Platform can be said to be the most informed organization in the world today. Both the martial arts masters and young talents in the rivers and lakes are on the watch list of the News Platform.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, you have started to show your talents at a young age, and you are definitely worth our attention.
I always feel like I'm being watched...
We will use carrier pigeons to deliver the latest martial arts news to you, so you don't have to travel far to know what's happening in the world.
This is great, I won't have to wander aimlessly in the martial world anymore.

"{PlayerSurName} has reached the fame of <color=#c44b0e>Rising Star</color> and is now eligible to be a guest of honor at the <color=#c44b0e>Glittering Artifact House</color> in Daliang City. ——Rumor Mill"

Judging from the tone of this letter, it seems that unknown rookies are not qualified to enter the Glittering Artifact House. If it weren't for my current fame, I would probably be turned away at the door. I wonder what kind of place it is.

"The evil <color=#c44b0e>Nine Factions Sect</color>, which once disappeared from the martial world, has now resurfaced. The traces of Nine Factions Sect have appeared in various towns. All martial artists, please be vigilant to avoid harm to yourself. ——Rumor Mill"
These guys just can't stand being idle...
What did you say, master?
The Nine Factions Sect is unscrupulous. Given their nature, they can't do any good deeds. Let's hurry up and go, maybe we can still make up for the loss.

"Night Demon Square will hold a <color=#c44b0e>Treasure Competition</color> in three days. There will be many rare and exotic items for <color=#c44b0e>auction</color>. Is your money bag ready, young hero? ——Rumor Mill."
The owner of Night Demon Square, Shen Wuqi, is dead. I wonder who is hosting this Treasure Competition.
Brother Shen, Night Demon Square is holding a Treasure Competition, don't you need to go back and take charge?
Such things can be left to the people below, there should be no chaos.

I must find some good stuff today!|Why hasn't the Treasure Competition started yet!|If I can get one item, it's a victory!|I've even brought out my coffin money!|I've brought the money for my wife!|I've been waiting for a long time today!|I'm so anxious, why hasn't it started yet!|The Treasure Competition is all treasures!|There are all good things today!|I heard they are all rare treasures!
It's so lively here today.
Today Night Demon Square is holding a Treasure Competition. To prevent unrelated people from disturbing the venue, you need an invitation to enter!
The Treasure Competition is only open for one day, no waiting after the time.
It seems that the Treasure Competition has ended.
Please come in, guest. I hope you can get satisfactory items at the Treasure Competition.
The rules of this Treasure Competition are the same as usual auctions, the highest bidder wins.\nIf anyone dares to do something inappropriate, be careful not to get out of this Night Demon Square!
{yell} Now the Treasure Competition is officially open!
The Treasure Competition is only open for one day, no waiting after the time!
I am the ultimate winner of this Treasure Competition!
{PlayerName}, you disrupted the Treasure Competition and smashed the signboard of Night Demon Square. From now on, we are enemies!
It's been a long time since I've seen such a lively scene.
It's the people from Nine Factions Sect!
You are a step late, the Treasure Competition has just ended.
Arriving early, we don't have the money to participate in the auction; arriving late, all the good stuff has been taken away. So not too early, not too late, just right.
There were quite a few good things at the auction just now, the old woman was really envious.
What on earth do you people want to do!
Kid, others just need to leave the treasures they got from the auction, but you, I'm afraid you have to leave your life to slightly make up for the mistake you made to the Nine Factions Sect.
These people seem to be tough
The Nine Factions Sect has been causing quite a stir recently
A wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him
This kind of situation is too tough to resist
As long as the Blue Mountain is still there, there's no fear of running out of firewood
{yell}What the hell is Nine Factions Sect, I don't believe in evil!
Who else wants to try the power of this Exploding thunder bullet?
The rest of the people were intimidated by the powerful power of the Exploding thunder bullet, leaving their things and fleeing in embarrassment.
Little guy, choose a way to die, grandma will definitely satisfy you.
If death is inevitable, I will send you to hell first!
Unexpectedly, even with our combined strength, we can't handle this kid.
Only the sect leader can deal with this kid personally.\nThis mission failed, go back and prepare to accept the punishment.
The Nine Factions Sect has big plans, their presence is everywhere.
These few worthless guys from the Nine Factions Sect can't stand a few punches and kicks from my disciple, it seems that I have taught my disciple well.

"The whereabouts of the current emperor have been found. The emperor is imprisoned in the Yan Yun Palace Camp in Zhongzhou. All righteous people in the world are requested to rush to the rescue and help the emperor escape as soon as possible. - Feng Wen Tai"

Since ancient times, the emperor has been the most important person in the world. The emperor's distress and the turmoil in the court are not a blessing for the people. The most urgent task is to rescue this guy first to stabilize the situation.
Disciple, you have done your best.\nEveryone has their own fate, perhaps this is the retribution for what he did in the past.
Unexpectedly, someone doesn't want this Xuan He Emperor to live and run away from the Yan Yun camp, so who would benefit the most from this situation?
The throne is vacant, and all the princes who are eligible to inherit the throne are suspicious...

Is it possible that the reason why the emperor has survived until now is the tacit understanding of several forces, and once the tacit understanding is broken, someone will take the initiative to eliminate the threat to themselves?
The imperial family is the most ruthless. For the sake of ruling the world, what do righteousness and shame mean to them?
We ordinary people should not get involved, it's not worth being cannon fodder for them.
Another pigeon message, I wonder what news this time...

"The army of Yan has already risen and invaded the south, aiming directly at Chuxiang City. If Chuxiang falls, the Yan army will drive straight in, and thousands of people will inevitably become slaves of the fallen country..."
"The rise and fall of the world, every man has his duty, all righteous people in the world are requested to help defend Chuxiang City and protect the peace of the local people. - Feng Wen Tai"
This Feng Wen Tai is a bit strange, although the news is well-informed, but never seen any related personnel appear in various major events in the world, is it just being an armchair strategist?
Disciple, Chuxiang City is being besieged by a large army, what are your plans now?
Naturally, I will go to the rescue and fight my way in and out!
Good, I will watch your performance, don't let me down!

"The Nine Factions Sect is detaining a large number of martial arts figures in the Buddha Temple, using this as bait to invite the heads of the three religions to discuss matters. The matters discussed by the Nine Factions Sect are mostly harmful to the country and the people, otherwise they would not have to resort to despicable means to force the three religions..."
"If we can rescue the trapped martial arts figures as soon as possible, there may still be a chance for things to turn around. ——Rumor Platform"
The Nine Factions Sect is becoming more and more lawless in their actions!\nHmph, this must be the masterpiece of that person's beloved disciple.
Disciple, you have had quite a few dealings with the Nine Factions Sect, what do you think of this Nine Factions Sect now?

These people will stop at nothing to achieve their goals, and they act without considering the consequences. Such a force is a great threat to the martial arts world, and I don't know why it hasn't been eradicated yet.

The Nine Factions Sect can compete with these hundred-year-old major sects, and they have their own way of survival. Besides, there are other forces secretly supporting the Nine Factions Sect, so the time is not yet ripe to eradicate the Nine Factions Sect.

However, the Nine Factions Sect has set up this banquet in the Buddha Temple. Although their intentions are malicious, it can be seen that they are taking risks and are at their wits' end. The Nine Factions Sect is probably on the verge of destruction.

"Xuan He Emperor has passed away, and he did not leave a will before his death, leaving the throne vacant. Kang Wang ascended the throne in Wuyue, and the era was named Jianyan; shortly after, Qi Wang ascended the throne in Zhongzhou, and the era was named Longxing. ——Rumor Platform"
"The commander of the Ye Family Battalion, Ye Pengju, was dismissed and imprisoned in the Supreme Court, charged with holding troops and intending to rebel."
This is outrageous, my father, the commander, is loyal and devoted, and he was actually framed and imprisoned!\nI'm going to turn the Supreme Court upside down and rescue my father.
Breaking into a prison is a serious crime, aren't you just confirming the charge of rebellion against Marshal Ye!
Brother Ye, stop, don't go!!!
Marshal Ye is being held in the Supreme Court near Lin'an, it seems to be the will of His Highness Kang Wang, no, he should now be called Jian Yan Emperor. My opinion on this matter...

The Ye Family Battalion is strict in military discipline, and Marshal Ye is loyal to the country. Marshal Ye is wronged.\nI'm going to the Supreme Court to find out the truth, and see who is framing the loyal and good.

The Ye Family Battalion is popular among the people. I heard that some people only know about the Ye Family Battalion and not the court. Ye Pengju is suspected of being too meritorious and threatening the master. It is not inappropriate for the emperor to take precautions.
However, I am also very concerned about whether Ye Pengju really has the intention to rebel. It seems that I have to go to the Supreme Court to find out.
Disciple, you have done something that makes me very pleased!\nYou can choose to support Marshal Ye regardless of your personal safety. The so-called bravery cannot be bent, you are a real man!
It's all thanks to Master's teachings, I can't disgrace our sect at any time.
You have done something that greatly disappoints me, you actually chose to frame Marshal Ye on the spot!

You may have your own difficulties, but let me tell you, there are things to do and not to do in life. If you only care about your own gains and losses, and ignore righteousness and morality, what's the difference between you and those people from the Nine Factions Sect now!
This will not happen again, if you do such a bastard thing again, I will have to clean up the sect myself.
I know I was wrong.

"The location of the Nine Factions Sect's main altar has now been found, it is near Lin'an City. Now the Nine Factions Sect is in internal and external troubles, it is a great opportunity to annihilate them in one fell swoop! ——Rumor Platform"
Disciple, time waits for no one, it's time to clean up this filthy Nine Factions Sect.
Another pigeon letter from the Rumor Platform, I wonder what it's going to tell me this time.
"Dragonfly City took advantage of your unpreparedness and kidnapped all the women who have emotional bonds with you, inviting you to meet on Fish Island..."
"Fish Island is an eastern island, accessible via Lin'an Pier. ——Rumor Platform"
The small Dragonfly City is so audacious, daring to kidnap my women, I will wipe out everyone in Dragonfly City!
I need to go to Fish Island, please set sail as soon as possible, boatman.
If it was a few years ago, it wouldn't matter to go there, but now Fish Island is occupied by a group of unknown people, who dares to go there is seeking death.
Those people kidnapped my women and forced me to go to the island for a meeting, so I have to go.
Is it worth risking your life for a woman?
For my only love, what's wrong with risking my life!
One... you seem to underestimate me.
Each one is my love, what's wrong with risking my life for them!
It's been a long time since I've seen such a loyal and righteous person, I'll risk my life to accompany you, Honorable, and take you there!
The strong wind and waves can't extinguish the raging anger in your heart, you've never hated so much in your life!
We've arrived at Fish Island, those people are on the island, you need to be careful.
Long heard of, but never seen.\nThe famous {PlayerName}, today we finally meet.
Who are you, why did you kidnap my women!
Allow me to introduce myself, I am Liu Sheng Wucang, the city lord of Dragonfly City, nice to meet you.
I'm not interested in chatting with you, just let my women go!
{PlayerSurName}, we meet again.
It's you, Fu Bu Bingwei!
You're still alive!
Thanks to you, I'm not the same as I used to be!
{PlayerSurName}, I didn't expect us to meet again in this way.
Hmph!
{PlayerSurName}, being impatient is not good for you. I advise you, since you're here, be at peace.
You kidnap our people on our territory and have the audacity to ask me to talk to you calmly? I don't know where you get your confidence.
The reason I invited you here is to prove that our Dragonfly City is the true Martial Arts, and your so-called proud kung fu is just for show.
I want to completely break your Passive backbone, so you can never hold your head up again!
Arrogant, ignorant!
I didn't expect the martial arts of Dragonfly City to be so vulnerable.
You must have used some magic, otherwise you couldn't have beaten us!
Is the gap between us really that big...
How to deal with these three guys from Dragonfly City?
{PlayerSurName}, you really deserve to be the first war god of China, after this battle, I am sincerely convinced.
If that's the case, you guys get out of here as soon as possible!\nIf you dare to set foot on Fish Island again, I swear I will eradicate your Dragonfly City!
This knife manual is my painstaking work, as a compensation for disturbing your family, please accept it.
Thank you for your mercy, {PlayerSurName}.
I thought I would never see you again, brother.
I'm glad you came to rescue me in such a dangerous place.
I knew you couldn't bear to leave me.
I was just careless and fell into their trap, don't laugh at me.
If you had come a little later, we wouldn't have seen each other.
You're quite skilled, worthy of being the man I've chosen.
I've been waiting for you...
You did well this time.
You risked your life, what if something happened to you?
They are all bad people, they said they would throw us into the sea to feed the fish if you didn't come...
Those guys from Dragonfly City are asking for death, they dared to put me in a cage!
You are more important than me, it's not worth taking such a big risk to save me.
As long as everything is safe...
I don't feel safe without you.
Those guys from Dragonfly City are even worse than my Black Robe Group, they are inhuman beasts.
You were too kind to them, if I had done it myself, I would have crushed them to dust!
I'm fine, sir, don't worry.
Big brother didn't disappoint Wei, big brother is Wei's hero!
I, a county princess, was put in a cage, I've never been so humiliated.
Hehe, I knew you would come to save me!

Your beloved died in this battle, and you are deeply distressed.
You guarded the deserted island alone for a day and a night,
The dead are gone, the living are like this, there are more important things for you to do.
You have to cheer up and leave Fish Island with guilt, and return to Lin'an City.
You and everyone else returned to Lin'an City, the women were reluctant to part with you.\nBut in order not to hinder you from doing more important things, they had to part with you temporarily.
Every time the pigeon of Fengwen Terrace appears, nothing good happens...
"I sincerely invite {PlayerSurName} to meet at Cloud Sea Cliff, please don't break your promise. - Master of Fengwen Terrace"
Is the person behind this Fengwen Terrace finally willing to show up?
It's good to go and see, and let him answer the doubts in my heart.
Black screen transition, near the cliff, Chai Wang appears, facing the upper right, the protagonist takes a few steps forward
{PlayerSurName}, you really kept your promise.
I am the master of Fengwen Terrace, and I have another identity, that is, the descendant of Royal blood, Xuan He Emperor bestowed the title of Chai Wang, hereditary and irreplaceable.
So it's Prince Chai Wang, I'm sorry for my rudeness.
{PlayerSurName}, I suppose you have many doubts now, feel free to ask, I will tell you everything I know.
What do you plan to ask Chai Wang?

There was a system of "Fengwen Zoushi" in our dynasty. The original intention was that the remonstrance officials could impeach the ministers based on the Rumour listener, so a large number of people who made a living by selling news appeared in the rivers and lakes.

The affairs of the Rumour Listener are inherently difficult to discern, and for a time everyone was on guard, fearing that they would be impeached by their political enemies with fabricated charges, eventually leading to a chaotic situation in the court where everyone was impeaching and being impeached.

Years later, the court abolished the "Rumour Reporting", and the group of people who used to peddle news had no way to continue, so I gathered them under my wing and established the Rumour Platform. I let these people continue to gather information, but instead of reporting to the court, they gathered it here with me.
Is there anything else you want to know?

The original intention of establishing the Rumour Platform was for self-protection. The court has always been eyeing me, the Royal blood, with hostility. I have no intention of harming others, but I cannot be without the intention of guarding against others.

Now, as the Rumour Platform has grown in scale, its responsibilities have risen to the level of collecting intelligence from surrounding countries and monitoring the movements of various forces in the martial arts world.
Although I am a king of a foreign surname, the late emperor was as gracious to me as a mountain, and what I am doing now is doing my best to help the late emperor secure his territory.
Is there anything else you want to know?

Now that the late emperor has passed away, his body is not yet cold, and the two princes, Kang Wang and Qi Wang, are eager to ascend the throne and proclaim themselves emperor, confronting each other from afar, dividing the great territory into two.
Since the Yan army retreated, the common people could have lived in peace for a while, but now it seems that war is about to break out again. What guilt do the soldiers and the common people have?

I am deeply indebted to the late emperor, and even if I were to shatter my body and bones, it would be hard to repay him. Seeing the fruits of the late emperor's lifelong efforts about to be torn apart by later generations, the country is not a country, and I am truly heartbroken.
So what can I do?

The thrones of the two princes are both illegitimate and unjust. If left unchecked, who knows how many people will rise up in the future. So the urgent task is to persuade the two princes to temporarily give up the throne...

Whoever finds the Imperial Seal first is the one who is destined by heaven, the true emperor! In this way, not only is it legitimate and just, but it also gives an explanation to the people of the world.
{PlayerSurName} My dear brother, this matter concerns the fate of the people, and I can only entrust it to you.
Why do you think I can accomplish this?

My dear brother, you are now well-known and famous all over the world, and the two princes will come to you sooner or later. If you don't take the initiative, you will only be waiting for death when the time comes.
I can't answer you right now, I need to think about it.
Well, {PlayerSurName} my dear brother, take care of yourself.
{PlayerName} Hold on, the emperor has a verbal edict for you!
Which emperor is it?
How dare you! There is only one true dragon emperor in the world today, and that is <color=#c44b0e>Jian Yan Emperor</color>!
Alright, what does the emperor command?

The emperor's verbal edict: "Qi Wang has disregarded the rites of monarch and minister, and has committed the great crime of treason! I cannot bear to see the innocent people suffer from the hardships of war, so I specially command {PlayerName} to sneak into the Central State Palace and execute the traitor, as a warning to others!"
The verbal edict has been read, {PlayerName} will you accept the decree?
Do you accept the decree of Jian Yan Emperor?
Well, it's been a long time since I've seen someone with such backbone. In that case, you'd better pray for your own good fortune.
I'm telling you, you only have <color=#c44b0e>five days</color>. If you can't get it done within the deadline, watch out for your own life.
{PlayerName}, the deadline has passed and there's no progress!\nI can't protect you anymore, you'll have to fend for yourself from now on.
The emperor has specially praised you and sent me to bring you the reward.

(Drinks all the wine in the cup in one gulp)
